Perfect location. Near shops n mtr. 6 stars luxury apartment. Very clean n big one. Everything was provide very well. Seem like hotel .  Really satisfied wilson! U help me so much.

name: Cozy place in Hong Kong Island
summary: Great location near to Wan Chai and Admiralty MTR station. Walkable distance to many fabulous restaurants in town. Good for both business or leisure traveller.

host.about: Frequent traveler who likes to know more about the locals in addition to the sightseeing.

loc.address: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: It's really a great and sweet house. Carmen is so nice lady. The last day we went out buying tickets and forgot checkout time. Carmen reminded us won't be worry and wait in patience.
Carmen’s apartment is cosy, clean and well located. Carmen did her best to help us every time we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carmen is a nice and warm host. Her place is small but cosy and very convenient. The location is perfect to visit HK : both close to lively areas at night, and to nature paths for an early jogging.

The flat is cosy and very well located, and Carmen was really helpful throughout our stay! Just be aware that the apartment may not be suitable for 3 tall adults (as it was our case), as beds are very small.

There are 2 types of AirBnBs - one feels like a hotel and the other is someone's actual home. This is the latter - do not expect a hotel experience. Location is great (Star St in Wanchai has boutique shops & nice restaurants, you're less than 5 min walk from the MTR and less than 30 min walk to Central). Building is more modern than most in the area, with a doorman and elevator. Apartment has an open view (not easy to come by on HK island!) Carmen keeps her place tidy and well equipped with everything you need. Bed is short (as others have noted) and the sofa is small too. Bathroom is basic but shower has hot water and ok pressure. Kitchen is tiny but there is plenty of space in the fridge and a water boiler. Carmen is friendly and super responsive! Bottom line: Great for a couple of nights only.

name: Vacances de reve à Espinho (Porto)
summary: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal.

host.about:
Habitant en Charente Maritime, nous sommes tombés amoureux du nord du Portugal.
Nous souhaitons vous faire decouvrir ce magnifique pays.

reviews.txt: Muy buen sitio

The apartment is really nice. All you need is there.
Maria is very beautiful. Thanks
Peter
Marie and Maria were very helpful. The apartment was clean and we found everything we needed. Just as described.
I was happy to stay here. Apartment was big and clean. Location was also good, near cafes, beach, train station. Host helped with any questions.
Nice treatment and attention, high recommendable!!

name: The Porto Concierge - Beach Manor
summary: Totally renovated and fully furnished apartment with sea view in vibrant Porto beach area. Lots of bars, restaurants and shops are just around the corner.

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

reviews.txt: We enjoyed our stay here very much!  The place was very clean and comfortable.  It was right by the ocean, shops, grocery store, restaurants and bars.  The flat was modern and new.  Highly recommended.  Transportation (bus) nearby.   Wonderful!

We stayed at the appartment for 5 days and had a nice stay. It's nearby the sea in a quiet area of porto. You find everthing you need, even for a longer stay. There's a washing maschine, dish washer, mirco wave etc. 
We enjoyed our time there and would go book again! The only negative point: we had to wait a long time in front of the appartment to get our keys, because of an organisational missunderstanding - annoying but I guess it isn't usual.

The apartment is exactly like on the photos: clean, modern, right next to the beach and spacious enough for a family of four. The bathroom and bedrooms are very nice and big. Super market is two minutes walking from the apartment. Porto city center is a 15 minute bus ride away. Communication with the host was always fast and clear. We were even provided with a welcoming gift! 
There are, however, two downsides: the apartment is not equipped with an airconditioner or fan (which is not disastrous, but it can get pretty hot if you're not used to Portugese summers), and sounds from upstairs neighbours and the busy road it lies on can be heard at night. If you're a light sleeper, I suggest taking soundproof earplugs with you. 
Otherwise, it's a beautiful apartment if you want to enjoy both the city center of Porto and the beach!

Beautiful appartement on a great spot very close to the beach. Just a 1 minute walk. Unfortunately the noise of the traffic near the house was load. Take the historical tram to the old city of Porto,  it is very convenient. Many good restaurants in the neighborhood. The interior of the apartment is very new.  Good beds, bathroom nice and clean. Great. We loved our stay in this great place.

The apartment is really spacious and new with a dishwasher and a washing machine. It is although quite noisy mainly because of the road. As we were staying already in Porto we asked if it was possible to drop off our luggage before 14 o clock which wasn't possible and check in wasn't complety easy but overall it was good.

I stayed only 2 days but the way I was welcomed was perfect with on top of it a big bottle of wine, of water and a map of Porto... What more can you ask for?
The apartment was very nice and as described on the pictures :
with 2 rooms with double beds. 
A nice bathroom with a big shower and a toilet 
+ an additional separate toilet .
The kitchen was well equipped with everything needed .
The neighborhood was very nice and really close to the beach ( 1 minute walk true a little tunnel) 
Perfect for running or biking along the coast 
At least 2 supermarkets in the same street and bakeries+
Less than 15' minutes drive to the airport and 15' to city center .
Many different buses + the old tramway and double decks hop on hop off buses .
The perfect place to stay if you want to combine beach holidays and visits .

It was my third time in Porto and I wanted a place around the Foz area cause I really like it there. Lots of parking available and quite a lively area with spectacular bars/restaurants right on the beach (the beach is not the best though)

Jorge's place is, quite frankly, spectacular. A 2 bedroom appartment with absolutely everything you may need. We even cooked there and it felt like home.

The style of the place is very modern, comfy leather couch and all. The host was very punctual and we had no problems at all

As a summary, I certainly recommend both the place and the host. It was a pleasure and I am already looking forward to being back there again

The apartment is absolutely fantastic! It is only steps from the beautiful beach area of Foz do Douro and was very spacious and clean. Jorge was great with communication and always available if needed. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Foz, then I would recommend this place.

Our stay here was really great. From the moment we checked in they were very attentive and had very open communication. The property looked exactly as it did in the pictures, I would even say it was better. There was a lot of space, the kitchen was very well stocked and clean. There was an extra half bathroom, which we weren't expecting but was very nice to have. And the bedrooms were big, very nicely decorated, and the beds were fantastic. My group and I really enjoyed our stay here and would not think twice before staying here again!

This condo is just as described. It's in a great location near public transit and if you prefer to just hang about the neighborhood it's a few steps out the front door. The condo is modern, clean and quiet. And the beds are super comfy!
zona agradavel do Porto
Lovely,clean apartment. Very modern. Very comfortable beds.

We had a very enjoyable stay at Beach Manor. The flat was as bright as advertised and very convenient for two couples. The location was perfect, with restaurants and shops within walking distance and handy public transport to the centre of Porto. We had no issue finding parking spots on the street for our car. On the (minor) negative side, we thought a second set of keys should have been provided when the place is for two couples and you require the key to get out of the building. The washing machine did not tumble dry clothes so a dryer would have been handy. Last I had to fix the TV myself as it was not working, but in the end we never watched it anyway :-)

It is a very nice and comfortable appartment very well located if you like beach and walking. No metro station around but there is a good bus connection with the city centre and Matosinhos area if one wants to visit more than Foz quarter. 
I can recommend this offer.

name: Peaceful Apartment near Casa da Música
summary: Our apartment is in the city center and one of the noblest areas of Porto. It is next door (about 50m) to Casa da Música of architect Rem Koolhaas authorship where you can see building uniqueness as well as benefit from quality, diverse and constant programming . It is very close to public transport, shopping and access to and from the city. Despite being very well located and central it is extremely quiet and peaceful, ideal for vacation for two or for a some family days.

reviews.txt: It was great to stay at this place, it looks like the pictures show, works well for one or 2 people, very comfortable and in a good location. I was able to easily get to where I needed to go, and was also easy to just walk around. The apartment itself was clean and cozy, Rita was very friendly upon arrival and always responsive when I had any questions, before, during and after my stay. Definitely recommend staying here!
very nice and available
The apartment was so well-located and cosy, we loved it! Rita was very nice and attentive. Would definitely repeat!

I enjoyed my stay at Rita's apartment. It was clean, cosy and the location was great, just 50 or so metres from the nearest metro station. Rita was a good host, easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone who comes to beautiful Porto.

name: SUPERHOST-LARGE&CLEAN-Near Pierloti
summary: You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul I'll help you all your travel. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport,taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi, Big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7. Towels, shampoo

host.about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.txt: Kubilay K. est une personne tres aimable vous etes chez lui bien plus que chez vous. Cette experience a ete un vrai plaisir et je repartirais chez lui des que possible. Il prend soin de vous sur tous les plans. En plus le logement est dans un quartier tres vivant et anime. Ce sejour a ete une reussite et je me demande comment voyager sans airbnb. Si vous venez a Istanbul allez chez Kubilay et vous toucherez du doigt cette realite.

Kubilay is now my best friend in Turkey :) I can't exagerate for his hospitibilty. Despite of my insistance he paid for my dinner, dessert a nice tea afterward and paid for the minibus to the shisha place. Frankly, it might have exceeded the rent I paid. I wanted to go to Kurdistan but non of information was available in English he called the bus company for me and then he came with me to the bus terminal then he barganed on my behalf and I got a cheaper ticket as the result. He didn't leave until he made sure I went on my bus safely. In my return also his friend came with me to Taksim to make sure that I'm getting the right bus to Sabiha airport. I highly recommand him if you want a host who is also your tour guide and freind. Also the prices in the shops are considerably cheaper near his place rather than touristic area like Taksim and you are a 2 TL away from Taksim, so his place is ideal in any sense.

Kubilay est un hote tres agreabe, qui se soucie de vous, vous donne de bon conseil. Il nous avait prevu le petit dejeuner et tous les soirs nous etions acceuillis par du the et des fruits secs.
il est tres facile de se rendre dans les differents lieux interessants de la ville.
a ce prix la, nous ne pouvions rever mieux. n hesitez pas a le contacter.

Kubilay is really good host! Welcoming, gentle and polite. Our baby loves to play with him!:) The apartment itself is clean and calm. It takes a bit time to get to the city centre (Taksim or Eminonu) but it's ok for us. I definitely would recommend everyone to stay with Kubilay.

anyone going to instanbul and looking for a beautiful place to stay at and make a friend then please stay at kubilay HIGHLY RECOMEND
EVERYONE to stay at his place thanks a lot kubilay u r the best if u ever come to visit punjab please stay with us

The stay at Kubilays place was very nice. Everything was clean and the check in worked very good. Kubilay is very nice and helpful. A perfect opportunity to visit a non touristic part of Istanbul. Thank you.

Host: Kubilay is an easy-going & really nice guy! That translates to a host that's pretty much as relaxed & helpful as u want him to be. And he gives u space if u want it too.

House and room: Kubilay pretty much opened the house to u. Room is basic.

Location: a good suburb about 30-40mins bus ride away from Taksim, depending on traffic. Pretty convenient; 1 direct bus to the Spice Bazaar. 1 direct bus to Taksim.

Highly recommended to those who wants to experience local living.
Kulibalay it's a very good Guy and i have spent a very good travel in this apartment. If You have some question kulibalay can explain you how discover the city.
Very nice room in a good location. Kubilay is also very accommodating. Would stay here again

Kubilay is a really sweet guy and a great host. He pointed out landmarks on our way to the apartment so we wouldn't get lost when we ventured out on our own.  He answered a thousand questions about Turkish politics and life in Istanbul.  He is really considerate of guests with maps, keys to the apartment and  an Instalbulkart  in the guestroom.  The apartment is really clean and is in a great location. Everything you need is nearby. The bus is close by and is easy because the stop is one end of the line and Emminou is the last stop at the other end.  It's a very nice place to come home to after a day of being a tourist.

It was a pleasure to stay at his. He helped me out with busticket, brought me for dinner and then tea with his mate. The room is ok and the flat is clean and peaceful. I would highly recommend stay at Kubilay's.

I had a great time here! Kubilay is a really great host who provides you with a nice room, great company, and great conversation. The apartment is also nicely located in a place where Taksim and Eminonu are just a bus ride away, respectively. I stayed for 5 nights.

name: Charming and cozy condo Plateau Mt-Royal/ McGill
summary: Charming and cozy ground floor studio condo in Plateau Mont-Royal. Steps from McGill University (3 min) or trendy St-Laurent Street (5-7 min). Located right on Prince Arthur. Easy access to public transportation, groceries, restaurants, cafes, bars.

host.about: Great food, that's what Montreal is all about!

reviews.txt: This studio is really really well located, comfortable and well equipped. I needed to spend a night away from home running around Montreal, and being on the cusp of downtown and the plateau made it easy for me to reach most places I needed to go on foot. Saint Laurent is right around the corner too. Tarek is a friendly and funny guy, and was easy to coordinate with (he actually checked me in personally at 11pm). Oh, and the bed has been replaced by a full one! Definitely would recommend this place to tourists who want a cosy space and central location.

My husband and I had a great time staying at this studio for our daughters graduation. The location is one block away from McGill Downtown campus. The host was very kind to help us find free parking right next to the house upon arrival. The facade of the house looks like a heritage site, very beautiful. The studio has all new facilities, the bathroom is large for a studio and fully renovated. Kitchen is nice, it also had some breakfast items. This place is great for a couple. The only downside is the mattress, not the most comfortable. Otherwise an A+ place and host. Would highly recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at Tarek's charming place which is just how he described it -- a cozy ground floor studio condo that is perfectly situated. We were just steps from the scenic McGill University, a short walk to the vibrants bars & restaurants on St-Laurent Street, and were conveniently able to walk to many other places during our stay. The exterior of the building is beautiful and historical looking while the interior is updated, comfortable, and super clean... all while being very peaceful and serene when we needed a break from sightseeing. 

Tarek was a superb host -- he was very kind and communicative with us from the get-go and was flexible to some logistical issues we had. He even gave us "must-see" and "must-eat" tips and overall made us feel very welcome on our first visit to Montreal. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience staying at Tarek's apartment.  It was very clean and spacious for a studio, and the location was fantastic.  We hit quite a bit of unexpected traffic and were about an hour and a half late arriving, and he was extremely accommodating for us.  He helped us find parking, and was available for questions throughout our stay.  Check out was a bit cumbersome because of an unforeseen conflict, but Tarek was very accommodating to make it as easy as possible for us.

We had a really nice stay at Tarek's place. The room is very clean and cozy. Location is perfect too. It is close to McGill University and few minute walk from rue St Laurent. Bus stop is just around the corner too. Tarek is also an amazing host and really accommodating. Would highly recommend!
I enjoyed my stay in this place. it is clean, neat, and we furnished. The host is very helpful and responsive. it is close to downtown and very quite.

Tarek was very helpful and flexible regarding our check in and check out.  We came an hour later than we had expected (as our train was delayed) and he was very understanding.   We were three adults staying for three nights, and although the place is set up for one or two adults, Tarek provided us with an inflatable mattress, and things worked out fine.  The place is nice, fully renovated, and very well located, in the heart of McGill Ghetto.  It's very lively with all the students setting up for the school year.  There are a lot of ammenities close by and the location is quite central.  Overall, a very nice stay.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Tarek's place for a weekend trip to Montreal. Tarek was an extremely gracious, communicative, and accommodating host. His place is clean, cozy, and very comfortable (the bed is a dream). The apartment is in a superb location: convenient to public parking garages, close to more delicious restaurants and cafes and bars than I can count, only a 20-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts, and just a little longer to the Old Port and Notre-Dame Basilica. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer!

Everything about Tarek's place was great.  Perfect location for checking out Montreal.  He was informative about what to eat/visit/check out and I would absolutely recommend this place to others.  A nice quiet apartment, very close to St/ Laurent!

Tarek was extremely accommodating. When we arrived in Montreal, was about to rain really hard for hours upon hours -- so Tarek arranged to meet us earlier to give us the keys. He also left us some breakfast items. 

The apartment was very clean. Great location. Couldn't have been happier.

My girlfriend and I stayed in this condo for a few nights on a holiday to Montreal, and it was exactly what we needed. The condo itself is fully self contained and in a fantastic location to explore every corner of the city. Tarek was a great host, being very accommodating for late check ins and early check outs, while also recommending some delicious restaurants. The bathroom and kitchen were both very clean in good condition. I'd definitely recommend this condo to anyone, and we will definitely look to stay here again when we next come to Montreal!
Tarek's place is great! Great location, super clean, and Tarek was easy to reach and very accommodating. Would definitely stay again!
Very close to McGill.  A wonderful stay!
This place is very close to McGill University and also very practical to visit the city. A Great place to stay, with all you need to feel like home !

You'll find this place just as expected - charming, clean and in a great location. Separate side door entry is very convenient and the place itself is pretty well maintained. Tarek was easy to communicate with and a gracious host. We were very happy with our short stay here as we explored Montreal!

name: Appartement lumineux , Terrasse privée sur le toît
summary: Notre logement est accessible en transport en commun via deux lignes de métro (orange et bleu),  du centre-ville de Montréal. Dans un quartier vivant, près de la plaza st-Hubert, du cinéma beaubien, du parc Molson, vous trouverez à proximité tout ce donc vous aurez besoin pour vous divertir et vous accommoder: pharmacie, épicerie, restaurent, bar, bixi, etc, et vous pourrez jouir des commodités offertes par notre logement et la ville de Montréal.

host.about: Painter, textile artist, costume designer, traveller, I love cooking, reading and yoga. I am also down to earth, social and respectful.

reviews.txt:
Jonathan and Catherine's place was really comfortable, clean and nice. Catherine was attentive, she made us feel at home and she even recommended us some places to visit.
We loved the private rooftop, you can read a book, drink a beer or enjoy the view.
Friendly and easy-going hosts. The arrival and departure was adapted to our own schedule, perfect. Great room, nice location, friendly hosts, nothing's missing

This is was a great place to stay for my trip in Montreal. You have a great coffee 2 blocks from the apartment called Etincele. Really friendly place and great coffee and home made Madeleine. If you want to buy some cheap fruits and vegetables; go to the shop at corner of Papineau and Beaubien. You also have a great shop at Beaubien and La roche on the way to the metro. 
You will be able to enjoy the rooftop for sunbaking or a apero at the sunset.

Well it was the first time that I use airnbn and going to someone's house! I can say it was totally amazing living in jonathan place! He treats me like we were friends before! The house is clean and well located also! I would say it was a brilliant experience and we are even friends now!
This really nice airbnb is close to a Bixi station and to the metro. I enjoyed my stay, Jonathan is a very nice person to live with. I'd definitely stay here again.
Great place, very nice roof top terrasse, Jonathan is very friendly and hospitable! :) thank you!

Clean, spacious, welcoming and warm space.  Jonathan was a great host, offering help with navigating the city, places of interest as well as honest conversation.   I cook, so it was wonderful to have everything I needed.  All in all zero complaints.  I hope to be welcomed here next time!

Jonathan is a very good host. The room is beautiful and the roof terrace is an additional plus. The apartment is very clean and located in a beautiful neighborhood of Montreal. There are nice restaurants and bars nearby. I'd stay there again.

Jonathan was very kind, considerate, and helpful. He's very easy to talk to and was available by phone if you needed anything whether information about the appartement or what to do/where to go in the area. The place itself is clean and cozy. It's in a calm, quiet neighbourhood, but easy to walk or bus anywhere else you need to go. The rooftop patio is amazing! I would definitely stay here again :)
Would totallly recommend Jonathan’s home, it’s clean and spacious. Jonathan was really helpful. And the rooftop just adds something special to the apartment.

name: Trendy Bright Loft in The Plateau
summary: Discover daily local life in the Plateau, friendly neighbourhood, cafes, bars, old-style artisans, few steps from Parc La fountain, Mont Royal, Downtown area and subways. Enjoy Free WIFI and access to your own personal desktop. Artsy modern loft, sky light, large windows, two balconies, decorated with our personal art collection, vintage objects, designer furniture.

host.about: Just a couple who loves traveling and seeing the world!

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Bright, sunny quite room Bushwick
summary: A bright, sunny quite room in the heart of bushwick/ridgewood border.  7 min walk form the Jefferson L train which brings you directly into the Manhattan in about 20 min including 14th St Union Square stop.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: young responsible adult

reviews.txt:
had a wonderfull airbnb experience stayin at louise place, she wasn't there but her sister eleanor is absolutely nice! it's a quiet house with a real room! louise is sharing her own room and it was the best bed i ever slept in through airbnb!! 
you really feel at home and eleanor let you all the privacy you need! the place is 5mn walk from the train bar & pubs and there's a deli and a laundry 1bloc away the neighborhood is quiet and you have an amazing view on manhattan's skyscrappers!
will definetely recommand this place and will be back there, if needed! 
thanks!

Elle, Louise's sister who rented out the room, was more than accommodating during my stay!

The apartment was beautiful and I wish I could stay there forever. The room is in the back and extremely bright and sunny as well as quiet and private.

name: SUİTE ROOM 2 or 3 people WİTH TERRACE
summary: *BREAKFAST *Airconditioning *Flat Tv/ Satellite with thousand of world channels *Heating system  *Refrigarator *Bathroom with hair dryer *All linens and towels are provided  *No housekeeping fee *Nearby parking on Street Within 1-5 minutes walk: -Grocery, bakery and mini markets -Restaurants with Turkish and European Cousin -A Hamam (Turkish Bath), -Several banks,  -A pharmacy,  -A post office,  -Famous Kumkapi Fish Restaurants  -Beyazid Grand Bazaar -Supermarkets (BIM and ŞOK),

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We have spend a great time in this airbnb! The location is great ... near a lot of thing (hagia sofia, the blue mosque, the grand bazaar, ...), and we loved the terrace with the view on the sea!
This hotel surpassed my expectations. It’s very cozy hotel. Administrations and staff are very friendly and attentive. I was comfortable. Tasty breakfast. Thank you very much!

The apartment is great, big, confortable,good light and good bathroom. Is a little away from the noisy center street and that is nice. Muro is so nice, always offering tea, info and a nice chat. The breakfast is good, big and very practical to start the day and walk Istambul. We love staying here, because also has a roof top to watch the view.

Muro was nice, however as we've been experiencing a lot lately with airbnb the host has screwed up some important detail.  When we came to check in he said our room was taken and we were to move to another location.  First off, not cool, secondly he didn't offer to give us anything in return for this major inconvenience.  The other place was not up to our standards and we requested a refund which he made in cash.  This was kind of him, but still we want things to run smoothly.  Vacationing is amazing, but it's a costly affair that always adds additional stresses and one stress we like to avoid is accommodation issues.
Muro is friendly and good person.. all other guys who works there are helpful and nice.. just the room was not soo good looking like in picture.. otherwise eveything was Good :)

If you are looking for a place to stay and your budget is limited, this is your place, close to downtown, walking distance to Gran Bazar, Hagia Sofia even Topkapi, do not expect any fancy. Muro is a great host, he helps us to get a taxi, train, give us great tips about the city and always answer our questions. Breakfast is a plus, the variety, and taste make you feel in Turkey (instant coffee no my favorite all do).

name: COMFORTABLE & COZY! MAUI BY DAY...RELAX AT NIGHT!!
summary: A charming studio apartment located in the Island Sands ocean front condominium complex!!! You will find everything you need to enhance your stay in our direct ocean front location with unique West Maui mountain views.   Our Premier condo offers a central Maui location for exploring Maui beaches, sights and beauty!  Then relax in a comfortable condo where you can Cuddle & Cozy up after soaking up glorious Maui sun filled activities.

host.about: Ralph & his wife Nancy are former residents of Maalaea Village and are permanent Maui residents living in Kihei!  We live just 20 minutes drive from our condo which enhances communication and we welcome the chance to serve as your host!  We are active in the Maui community and support various community organizations.   We are active adults and enjoy the many outdoor activities that Maui offers...we relish the opportunity to be your host!

reviews.txt: A perfect spot for a trip to Maui. Centrally located to everything. The condo is gorgeous & has absolutely everything you need! We highly recommend.
Thank you Ralph & Nancy  for a nice and cozy place to stay in Maui . We had a wonderful time and the accommodations were perfect. I would recommend to everyone to stay at your place.
Great AirBNB experience! Beautiful condo centrally located. Hosts were awesome and handled all the details as stated and then even went above and beyond! Excellent!!!
Nancy and Ralph's place was wonderful.  It was very clean and quiet and the bed was very comfortable.

Nancy and Ralph made our wedding and honeymoon stay great. We arrived at the apartment to have a wedding balloon, wine, and pineapple champagne waiting for us. Everything was very clean, organized and clear. All items needed for a comfortable stay are provided by the host. Communication was clear and immediate which made us very comfortable staying there. Thank you both gain for the amazing stay and location.

The location is perfect, away from the crowds yet a 4 minute walk from the beach, beach walk with access to Kealia Pond boardwalk, the Maui Canoe club, etc!! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the condo itself, being the best equipped we have stayed, from cooking needs, layout and attractiveness, bed comfort, to beach equipment and binoculars!  Ralph and Nancy are attentive to all needs, and welcoming with local wine, chocolates, coffee, and easy communication.  We highly recommend.

Highly recommended, you will not be disappointed! Ralph and Nancy’s place is conveniently and centrally located in a quiet part of the island. Walking distance from Maalaea Harbour which is great if you book any sea tours/excursions leaving from the harbour. Beautiful immaculate condo, cozy, very clean and well equipped. Quiet building and location. Easy and quick check-in, clear communication with the host who is quick to reply. Detailed instructions sent by email before our arrival were very helpful. Short drive to Kihei, Lahaina and Kahului Airport. Affordable and worth every penny. We will definitely return to Maui one day and hope to be able to stay here again.

Ralph's place is clean, modern, comfortable, and in a great location. The thoughtful touches of chilled wine, chocolates, and cold bottled water were appreciated after a long day of travel. The bed was very comfy and the bath/beach towels were soft and fluffy. Parking was easy and the neighbourhood felt very safe. The local restaurants are yummy, and I enjoyed being away from the busy area of Kihei; lounging poolside when I wanted some peace. I'll be back for sure!

Ralph's place was a wonderful and central location for us to stay for our honeymoon. We didn't have to deal with a bunch of tourists on the beach nearby and it was a pretty private street the complex was on. The amenities were great and we especially enjoyed the espresso machine in the condo along with the washer and dryer that allowed us to pack a little lighter for our trip. Relaxing on the patio in the evenings was also very enjoyable. We would definitely stay here again!

Great stay! Condo is exactly as the pictures appear. If you are a coffee drinker, you will seriously enjoy the espresso machine! My coffee at home is less satisfying after using that machine haha! For a pull out bed, very comfortable! However if you are tall like my husband, your feet may slightly hang off the edge. Very quaint and clean little condo, had a homey feeling right away! The beach that is a short walk away was one of my favorite beaches during our whole trip, and we got to walk it every morning! Would definetly recommend for a couple getaway!

This condo is amazing and the hosts are equally amazing! It definitely exceeded our expectations and is so much nicer in person. The A/C unit keeps the room very cool after a day out in the sun. There is a washer and dryer in the room which is such a bonus! Everything is sparkling clean and works perfectly. The bed is very comfortable and easy to unfold. These are hands down the best hosts you will ever have on AirBNB as they truly care about you having a great stay! No detail is forgotten and they truly go above and beyond.

I really enjoyed my stay in Maalaea.  Was a little unsure about how effective simply opening the windows would be at night, but the winds on this part of the island are always strong so I never had to bother with the AC (but it is there if you need it).  Beyond that, the unit had everything I could want.  Plenty of dishes and utensils, excellent internet and guidebooks, and even beach chairs.  Would be a pleasure to return some day.

If you're on the fence between this place and some other one, let me tell you - stay with Ralph!! We had a fantastic week in Maui with Ma'alaea as our home base. Restaurants and shops and aquarium are walkable, and most of the spots on the island you want to be at are no more than 20 minutes away by car. We found the location so convenient and flexible, and were able to do everything we wanted. 

The space is even nicer than it looks in the photos, immaculately kept and with everything you could want. It even has tons of goodies for cooking - salts and spices and even olive oil! The box of beach goodies - chairs, boogie boards, a cooler - were super handy and we used them a ton, saved us money too. 

If you're worried about not having a beach view, don't be. The mountain view is gorgeous, and you can walk to the beach in minutes. 

Mahalo, Ralph! We'd stay here again <3

This is a very great place to stay while visiting Maui. Wake up and make yourselves a cup of coffee from the espresso machine to get the day started. Comes with all the house essentials you can think of. If booking lots of boat activities like snorkeling tours, sunset dinners and guided fishing trips departing from Maalaea harbor. Look no further than this condo because it is a very short walk to the harbor which will cut back travel time and save you money on parking!! I highly recommend dropping by beach bums also located at the harbor for drinks and some delicious BBQ!!! Nice central location on the island makes for easy travel and good time. Loved our stay at this condo! Very unique shower and ac unit to keep you cool! If we make it back to Maui we would look to book this condo again!!

Loved staying at this cute little studio condo. It is perfect for a couple's getaway! The place is fully stocked with everything you will need. Cooking supplies, boogie boards, beach chairs, and travel books with great tips for outdoor activities. Maalaea is a great place to stay on the island because it is close to many things and very beautiful! 
Mahalo, Ralph!

The place was true to the pictures! Very nice and clean.  It was a great place to stay and location was perfect being in the middle of everything.  Ralph was quick to respond prior to going and if we had questions on what adventures to do while in Maui. The espresso machine was neat and already had coffee at the place which was very good!  Would highly recommend and great value!

Wonderful apartment in excellent location. Many extras including beautiful views, excellent coffee machine, beach equipment, long sandy beach close by, comfortable furniture indoor and out. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this apartments and would return.
Great place for a getaway in Maui. Strongly recommend to all travelers.

This is a small but charming place. It is well appointed, all stylish and new surfaces, interesting touches. The Murphy bed was very comfortable. There was wine and chocolate waiting for us and an espresso machine! Ralph was extremely accommodating and easy to reach. Check in was a breeze. This location is very central so you can get everywhere on the island equally well (except of course Hana).  The only downside of this little harbor town is that the area is extremely windy all the time- the windiest part of the island, and one hears it all night.
Such a beautiful suite. Nice private beach behind property. Great location and apartment. Would definitely recommend

name: Quaint Polynesian Style Cabin on a Working Farm
summary: This adorable cabin includes a cute bathroom complete with shower/toilet/vanity.  The walk-in closet is a nice touch to store away personals. There is a sitting area, the sleeping area, the outdoor kitchen and a shaded patio that serves as an outdoor living room.  Views of the ocean, the Hawi windfarm, Maui all set on a working farm just a short walk from downtown Hawi!  The décor is set in a Polynesian style, bright, cheerful, and peace filled.  Wifi enabled.  Created with Pure Aloha!

reviews.txt: A very clean cottage in a secluded farm. We got fresh eggs and muffins from the owner. If you're not afraid of 'water beattles', it's perfect ;)

Stay here if you want a relaxing, beautiful, and unique Hawaiian escape. Wonderful quant town with plenty of nearby beaches and great sight seeing. The farm is lush and absolutely beautiful and everyone is wonderfully hospitable. it made seriously consider moving here.

I had a wonderful peaceful stay, Loved the cute little town about a mile away. Everything was great. I will definitely go back there on future visits and highly recommend this as an alternative to an expensive resort stay.

Great place! As someone who has backpacked Europe and traveled all over the US, I can say this place is outstanding. Affordable price and it still feels like a hotel. You get your own cabin, so nice privacy. Everything feels like brand new, very clean. Les worked hard to attend my necessities and communication was never an issue. Beware that it's a very rainy place, so I'd recommend bringing your umbrella. Location is not prime, so you will need a car... But I kinda enjoyed being away from all the madness. Overall, you will get your money worth it.

The place is really lovely. The sleeping area is clean and comfortable and the outdoor kitchen and lounging area made it possible to spend much of the time enjoying the fresh air and beautiful landscape. It's a little ways to town but a nice walk. I forgot an item there and they were very helpful in arranging to get it back.
beauiful setting,outside kitchen,lover our stay there

What a treat to have found Rev. Les' cabin... arriving there after a long day of solo travel in planes and cars I felt like I found a sanctuary. 
The cabin is very tidy, and everything is new and well maintained. The bed firm and very comfortable, I slept very well the three nights I was there. 
Although Rev Les informed me of possible daytime farm equipment noises, I never heard them as I was gone most of the days. The nights were quiet except for occasional rains when windows must be closed, there is a fan that keeps things cool and air circulating. This area of the Big Island is lush and tropical and with that beauty comes an abundance of life, so attention must be taken when preparing or storing any kind of food, as the ants will be quick to make an appearance. Sweet Hawi town is nearby with all its charms, and has a lovely Saturday farmer's market under the shade of a massive banyon tree. The fresh organic farm eggs Rev Les left for me were so appreciated, and the kitchen did provide for all I needed to fry them up for a delicious (Website hidden by Airbnb) were the kind and helpful communications I received from Rev Les. Mahalo for a delightful first stay on the Big Island! c:

Situated on a small farm, it is very convenient to Hawi.  Only about a mile, so you can walk to town if you like.  There are a few roosters in the area but otherwise was quiet and peaceful.  I'd never used an outdoor kitchen before but it worked great.  Patio furniture and table on the lawn in front of the cottage provides lots of outdoor living. The bathroom is small but clean and like new.  We'll be back.
Great place to stay, enjoyed the view from our room.

I highly recommend staying here if you want a peaceful and tranquil stay.  The farm Les lives on is full of fresh fruit and the sound of the trees moving in the fast wind is therapeutic. I will definitely be back for some more paradise.
Great place on a working farm, nice & peaceful, with a nice outdoor kitchen area with all the utensils & cookware you'll need. But bring your own food.  Would definitely stay again.  :-)
Highly recommend. Very private and comfortable

Rev. Les''s place is super, its a working farm and you have plenty of privacy at your own little cabin, there are a few on the property.  Everyone is so nice and its a great starting point to explore Hawi and Pololu valley.

The cottage is very neat and clean, like new actually.  It is quiet and yet close to Hawi town.  Nice yard with comfy outdoor furniture and shade awning.  This was our 2nd stay with Rev. Les.  Great communication and he is very quick to respond to any need.
This little cabin was perfect. It was super clean, the bed was great, and the bathroom was nicely renovated.
Rent this place!  If you are looking to explore the North Kohala coast there is so much to do, or not.  And Rev's cottage is perfect for both.

Rev. Les was a great host, greeting us upon arrival and available when needed. Communication throughout was great. The place was super clean and cozy. We would always come back and explore more of the northern part of the island.
Nice spot, beautiful birds and quiet. In a lovely town with lots to do.

My fiancee and I visited Hawi and staying at Rev. Les's gave us a great home base for exploring the surrounding area. The property is nice and felt secure with the gated entrance. The cabin was super cozy and felt like home while we were there with plenty of space and a very comfy bed. 
Rev. Les was responsive and a pleasure to talk to when we met him. We will look back fondly on our stay in Hawi and would love to come back!

name: Feel at home.. in a cosy and warm
summary: My place is very close to public transportations. Bus stops, metrobus and subway is only five minutes walk. There are plenty of restaurans and a very big shopping mall including cinemas, theatre and amusement park. 7/24 open shops around...

host.about:
Hey!

I'm Naz, a teacher living in istanbul trying to survive and enjoy at the same time :) I have been in istanbul for many years and i love sharing my ideas about the hidden parts of istanbul. As i like talking a lot, do not hesitate to ask anything.
I share the flat with my sister. Either my sister or I will be meeting you. Both of us are generally described as very friendly and easy going people . Hope to meet you

reviews.txt:
Staying with Naz was a very wonderful experience for my girlfriend and I. Her and her sister are great people, and I would highly recommend booking at her apartment. The apartment is well located next to a large shopping mall that also has the metro station in it. Only two stops to Taskim Square.

The room was exactly as described in the listing and is very comfortable, clean and spacious. We spent one week there and we would definitely stay again if we are in Istanbul.

To met naz and to visit istanbul was a great experience and .
First of all we want to say thank you to naz for her  wonderful hospitality.Our room was very comfortable and clean

Naz was the best host ever. She was very comunicative, friendly and helpful. Everything was like in the pictures. What we liked the most was the hygiene. It was very very clean. The location is central, 3 min away from the metro which can take you to any part od Istanbul, you just need to ask someone. I want to thank Naz for the great time and I highly recommend her place!

Naz was a great host! The room was big with a really comfortable bed. Both Naz's sister and her flatmate are very warm & easy-going people, I enjoyed our conversations. I hope to see you again one day!:)
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We really liked to stay here. Naz and her sister Gulcin are very good and friendly girls, always ready to help and gave a lot of useful information. Location is perfect, 5 minutes to big shopping mall, subway and other transport points. Thank you very much! Hope to see you again someday ;)

Naz and Gulcin are very nice and available we had a great time staying in their apartment and we are really grateful for their hospitality. place was really clean and comfortable in a nice and quiet neighborhood, also location was really good around 3 minutes walking to metro, bus and shopping center. We felt the real Turkish culture, they made us Turkish breakfast and shared a lot of useful information about Turkey and Istanbul. We really enjoyed our time staying there and we definitely recommend for everyone.

name: SOOTHING WAVES WITH A 180* OCEAN VIEW
summary: Valley Isle Resort 306  We are located beachfront with an amazing view  of the ocean and sunset. We can look right down into the water and watch the turtles swimming. We offer a full kitchen including poolside barbecue grills. Within a block of our Resort are several restaurants and bars. Our condo has a comfy queen-size wall bed along with a small sofa bed.   The ambiance is soothing and relaxing. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with one child).

host.location: Lake Havasu City, Arizona, United States
host.about: I am currently a 6th grade math teacher and competitive baton twirling coach.  I fell in love with Maui and the Valley Isle Resort over 7 years ago.  I have an amazing husband, 2 daughters with great husbands, and 3 grandchildren.  I have a love for the island and the culture of Hawaii!

reviews.txt: My first experience with Airbnb was perfect. The location was great, on one of the sunniest sides of the island, near a mall with a general store and a gas station. The condo was exactly as described, the building is right by the water and it's really tidy and well organised. The view is amazing. You get to wake up with the sound of the waves every morning and watch the beautiful Maui sunsets right on the balcony. The process was really simple and stress-free. The place was immaculate. We really felt at home and got everything we needed and more! I'm really grateful for Sherry and Shane's attention to detail and recommendations about the island. Thank you for making this experience better than we could have imagined. I hope we can stay there again soon!

Beautiful place along the beach. Good location. Pictures are pretty accurate and close to McDonalds, Maui Brewing Co. and a Coffee Shop within walking distance. No central A/C so be prepared to run the fans in the summer. Hosts were very responsive and extremely helpful with requests.
This was one of the coolest places I've ever stayed in. And definitely the most beautiful neighborhood.

The owners, Sherry and Shane, were great. They were very responsive, the place was great and the view was unbelievable. Thank you so much for sharing your place with us. It was a great spot for me and my wife to vacation as it was right by the ocean, grocery stores and restaurants. We highly recommend!

The view from the Lanai is nothing short of spectacular. It was every bit as advertised. Plus, the proximity of the 3rd floor to the actual ocean means you can hear the waves thoughout the day and night. We literally watched people line the beach in front of our lanai each night to watch the gorgeous sunsets - we didn't need to do that however, we could watch it from the lanai!  We're going to miss that. Folks from the north should be aware that there is no A/C here, which is common in Lahanai apparently, we learned, because of the strong trade winds which cool things considerably. The hosts were very responsive and gracious. This was a very nice experience and we look forward to our next Maui adventure!

Sherry left us great instructions.  We loved the location and the beach --not too crowded, perfect.  Garbage disposal and laundry facilities just across the hall.  The condo felt like a home ratherthan just a place to put your head!!  Beautiful view, and so nice that the sun was not  directly on the deck and condo, as it was quite warm and yet we saw the beautiful sun and sun set. Loved the rocking chairs.  A wonderful place to stay, hopefully again.!

We felt at home immediately upon entering the unit.  The pictures of the unit are very accurate; however, do not do it justice.  The lanai has the most breathtaking view I have ever had the privilege of experiencing.  Sherry and Shane were more than accommodating and made the arrival extremely easy.  They have everything you could think of needing at your finger tips.   They go above and beyond for their guests.  They respond immediately if you have an inquiry, and they have a homemade binder full of detailed information, including points of interests and restaurants to dine at. 
My husband and I are humbled by their graciousness as hosts. We could not be more content with our stay here!!
Mahalo!
This private home is amazing! Leaving the door open so the strong wind would come through the whole room was to die for! The view was magnificent! Amazing! I would definitely come back!

Sherry & Shane's condo was very clean and welcoming. It had all aminities for a perfect beach vacation including recommendation for restaurants, beach chairs etc..They were great hosts with clear and quick communication. The condo had spectacular view of the ocean and its proximity to the ocean gave us advantage to wake up with the sound of the crashing waves in the morning and amazing sunsets. We highly recommend this place!!!
This is a jewel of a place to stay-the views, the convenient location, and everything you need for a beach vacation-all in one spot! Thanks Sherry and Shane!
Loved this place! Beautiful beach front lot, caring hosts, and a really clean condo. I would recommend!

This is an awesome airbnb! By far the most stocked one I have ever stayed in. Sherry provided everything that we could have needed. Great portable beach chairs, cooler and towels. The kitchen was very prepared for major cooking endeavours. There were even spices and some cooking oils. Plenty of towels, pillows and blankets. All the things that you would hope there might be but sometimes aren't. The view from the room is perfect. You can hear the waves crashing and the view from the bed is directly into the blue of the ocean. We enjoyed the condo so much there were several days we didn't leave. So the perfect relaxing holiday we needed. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Maui.
Nice comfortable spot. Great communication.

We can only endorse all the wonderfully positive comments others have made about their experiences staying in this very comfortable, well-appointed condo.  We just knew from our communications with Sherry and Shane and their thoughtful attention to detail that we were being hosted by very generous and caring people.  We can’t thank you enough.

We loved our stay, and I would totally come back. The view was awesome. Close to food, shopping, beaches. Everything we needed was provided and our host checked in on us because of road closures, that was very nice. It was awesome!

Amazing! First time AB&B user and would have to say will be doing this again! Experience was nothing short of spectacular. Sherry's hospitality and attention to detail were phenomenal and the condo was immaculate and very cozy. Everything you needed to enjoy a great vacation was there. The accommodations were simply fantastic and would like to recommend this place to anyone who wants a stress-free, smooth and quiet environment. Location was key and Sherry's place makes you feel right at home! Will stay here again the next time we come to Maui...for sure! Thank you.
Drop dead views, nice beach. Condo has everything you need and more. Sherry is great hostess.

Our stay in paradise (Maui) was brought to perfection by Sherry's and Shane's fantastic condo. The photos you can see on Airbnb are very accurate, though they cannot fully capture the breathtaking reality of staying at this accommodation. In this apartment you will fall asleep and wake up to the sound of the waves of the Pacific ocean. You can enjoy an unobstructed view of the setting sun from the balcony while enjoying your dinner and/or a glass of wine/beer/whatever. You can go for a spontaneous swim in the sea, which is only a few steps away from your room.  Sometimes you can even see sea turtles in the water in front of the condo.

The apartment is perfectly equipped. You'll find everything you need for cooking, doing your laundry, going to the beach (beach towels, beach bags, a cool bag, beach chairs, etc.) and more.

We will definitely return to Maui in the near future and we hope that we can stay at Sherry's and Shane's condo again. We strongly recommend staying at their condo!

Fantastic stay. The apartment was perfect for the two of us, and having meals overlooking the ocean was certainly a highlight. The place was incredibly priced, very clean, and well-equipped. We continued to say throughout our time that we couldn't believe how great the place was. Thanks!!
Cozy place with a breath taking view

name: Habitación indiv con cama extra
summary: Acogedora habitacion doble con posibilidad de una cama extra en el barrio de gracia en un tipico piso modernista. Situado en pleno centro geografico de Barcelona y todos sus distritos. zona tranquila y bien comunicada por metro y bus.

host.about: Hola me llamo txus trabajo en el mundo de las terapias como osteopata y llevo 12 años viviendo en barcelona , me encanta esta ciudad y en especial el barrio de gracia , tranquilo y animado al mismo tiempo . Como viajero me gusta conocer gente de culturas diferentes y si lo necesitan ayudar a conocer esta maravillosa ciudad

reviews.txt: The apartment of Txus is perfect, we loved to stay here. I think the next time I'll go to Barcelona, I'll go there again if the apartment is free.

The apartment was better then expected! It is really cute and I love the tiled floor.
It was easy to find and a walk from town. Everyone was really friendly in the house and the kitchen had everything we needed :)
Relatively straightforward to get to from the airport, although luggage in the underground is a nightmare as there are often no escalators!
Would highly recommend this place!
Very nice and helpful. He waited for us until 2am, because we our airplane had a delayed. In the morning he cooked coffee and gave us all the neccesary information that we asked. Really nice staying.
Bien, amable y correcto
Txus was very friendly and accommodating. His place was walkable to attractions and comfortable. Would certainly recommend.

Top! Txus is very kind and helpful. He's a lovely and careful person. The house is very clean, the room is minimal but comfortable, i liked it. Close to the house there r bus stations and metro stations.

Very good stay by Txus who is a very nice thoughtful guy, ans very helpful and welcoming. His shared appartement is relaxing, each person is respectful. The area ist very calm, I loved this quarter. I recommand his place.
Txus is very kind, helpful and welcoming host! The beds were comfy and the bathroom was nice and clean. All you really need!

Txus is very kind and gentle. We arrived at 1:00Am and he is patient to wait us. and everyday and night he would chat with us. Haha. And my friend says he is sooooo handsome hahaha.The house is in the center of Barcelona. It's convenient to go Park Guell and beach also. We enjoyed live in Txus ' place.
We spent to months in the apartment. Everything was good and clean. Txus was very kind. Very good stay!

Txus was an incredible host. He offered any help we needed, gave us a city map, provided suggestions, and gave us a very clean and welcoming home to stay in. The location was perfect for seeing Gaudi's works and catching the metro to the city center by the beach. We loved it.
Good location, good and flexible host, basic accommodation but good value. Recommended!
Great place, very friendly host who keeps in good contact

name: Sydney Hyde Park City Apartment (checkin from 6am)
summary: Our city apartment is a bright, comfortable 1 bedroom with 24hr front-desk access. It is conveniently located directly across from Hyde Park and within walking distance of delightful cafes, restaurants, parks, major city attractions and public transport, including Museum Station which has a direct connection to Sydney Airport.

host.about:
At the centre of my life is my beautiful family...home is wherever my family is.

I enjoy filling my life with positive experiences and love to travel and experience new cultures, to meet new people, to read and just enjoy the beauty and wonders of the 'littlest' things in the world around me and my family.

reviews.txt: Friendly, helpful and welcoming hosts. Beautiful and comfortable apartment. Located opposite beautiful Hyde Park and close to Sydney's main attractions and public transport. We enjoyed having Sydney on our doorstep and exploring the city. Can't wait to visit again! Thank you Desiree and Julian.

Desiree's Airbnb was perfectly appointed. The space is incredibly clean and welcoming. She had everything I needed for work and relaxation. She also provided helpful instructions and was easy to contact for whatever I needed. The location is great - coffee, grocery, dry cleaning, bars, shopping all within minutes. Love this location!
The place is perfect for that single or couple who is on a getaway. Great location.  Not to mention your Hostess is impeccable.
A lovely, clean and spacious apartment right on Hyde Park. We loved the apartment and the little touches - a hand written note and fresh flowers. Thanks for having us, Desiree

My daughter and I came to Sydney for her medical school interview.  Desiree was an outstanding host - providing detailed instructions on every stage of our stay, including our last day where she kindly offered for us to check out later than the arranged time.  The apartment was immaculate and really did provide a home away from home. You could seriously just turn up at his place as everything is provided for the guest's use. Desiree thought of all the little special touches - from fresh fruit and sparkling water to chocolates and flowers.  The location is fantastic - walking distance to all that Sydney has to offer.   Her guide book and restaurant recommendations were wonderful.  Highly recommended  - better than any hotel stay!  We  will be back again!  Many thanks Desiree
Absolutely divine! Lovely spotless apartment in a fabulous location.

Hi
We had such a great time staying with Desiree.  The flat is perfect and centrally located. We couldn't recommend a better host.
Steve and Lucy

Desiree certainly knows how to make her guests feel welcome. Fresh flowers and chocolates on arrival is an example. Her attention to detail was very much appreciated and one of my best airbnb experiences to date. She was also quick to respond to all queries. The apartment is as shown in the photos and immaculately clean. Dont hesitate to stay here!

Our host Desiree is fantastic she had everything ready for us.  It was so easy we just turned the key and everything was there.  She kept in contact with me to make sure everything was ok which was very thoughtful.  There was fresh roses in the apartment really lovely touch also lots of groceries like tea bags, coffee, milk etc. which was great after a long flight.  There are even bath robes and lovely fluffy towels The apartment is beautiful very luxurious, we loved it.  It's spotlessly clean, great TV, WIFI, everything you need and more. It's a great location. Very easy to walk around from and also Museum station is right on the door step. It was our first visit to Sydney and should we go back I would love to stay here again.  I can't thank Desiree enough. We were absolutely thrilled with it. Truly 5 star.
A lovely, comfortable, well decorated apartment in a great location. Very friendly host. I can't wait to stay again.

name: 205 Punahoa 2 Bed Condo- Oceanfront
summary: 2 Bedroom Corner unit on the ocean! Since all Punahoa Beach condos are individually owned, each is decorated in its own island-style and all have an ocean front lanai perfect for your own outdoor dining above the Pacific. "ALL UNITS ARE NON-SMOKING"

host.about:
Aloha,
Here at Punahoa Oceanfront Vacation Rental's in Kihei, Maui Hawaii.  We offer Studios, One bedrooms, Two bedrooms, and One Bedroom Penthouses that is Ocean front and located right on the beach!  The amenities we provide in Punahoa is FREE PARKING, FREE WIFI INTERNET ACCESS CODE, & FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN / KITCHENETTES.  
Inside the units additional amenities such as:

- Hair dryer, Shampoo, Conditioner.

-Small cooler for your usage to take out and enjoy/travel beach or long drive around Maui.

-Beach chair & beach towels

On property we have two outside shower stalls to rinse off after enjoying your time at the beach.

We also have a gas barbecue grill.

Spectacular sunsets and perfect location for surfer's, stand up paddle boarding, and kayak.  Snorkeling from the Cove beach to Charley Young's beach is a must!  We frequently have visits from tired Honu's (Hawaiian sea turtles) resting on our shores / beach.  

***Please be respectful and DO NOT TOUCH/ FEED/ OR BOTHER THE HAWAIIAN SEA TURTLES & HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS!***

Send us a message or any inquires for additional information, we would love to welcome you to be our guest, stay with us here at Punahoa oceanfront vacation rentals, in Kihei Maui Hawaii!  Aloha nui loa!

- Zaldy 

Within walking distances from Fresh local farmers market and produces, outlets and little boutiques, variety of restaurants and bars, rent stand up paddle boards, boogie boards, and snorkeling gears.  Located right on the beach between Maui's famous Charley Young's beach & The Cove.  Close by Kalama beach park and playground.

reviews.txt: If you want to hear the ocean night and day, wake up to breathtaking views, see whales breaching in the distance from the spacious lanai, and end your day in awe of the best Maui sunsets this is the place to be!

We wanted to stay in Kihei and this place was absolutely the best location for us. Kihei market was merely a 2 minute walk away as was the surf school where you can rent out paddle boards or surf boards and other gear. Since it is centrally located, driving to other places in Maui was also convenient. 

Hospitality was outstanding - we knew where we wanted to go but the apt had a Maui guide book on the coffee table for quick reference. There were great amenities to play Music, a nice bookshelf with various reads if you just want to read by the beach and chairs to take to the beach  to relax in between your snorkeling/swimming excursions. 

The views - oh my god. The photos do not do it justice. We had sweeping views of the pacific and saw early morning paddle-boarders, surfers and sea turtles right from the balcony! Im sure if you come during the winter months, you can watch whales literally while drinking your morning coffee. No need to go to an expensive touristy bar to get that perfect Hawaiian sunset :) 

I don't know what else to say. Highly recommend for a great time.

name: Very special island bed and brunch
summary: A  new exquisite guest bathroom for you to enjoy, a king sized heated waterbed, air conditioning or heating or 3/4 single bed with innersprung mattress.  Both beds have sheepskin overlays - cosy or cool - your choice.   Experience the Hawkesbury River first hand. Hire a tinny, orwith a licence, a  fishing boat.  Bed, shower, brunch $140 per night, per person. This includes a lavish Brunch, with local fare, provided by the owner, who stays to look after you.   Customer happiness is paramount!

host.location: Dangar Island, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: We are used to international travellers as my husband was a well known opera singer in Europe, so feel assured that any special needs will be catered for.  Looking forward to meeting you. Ann

reviews.txt: My overall experience on Dangar Island was wonderful. Ann created a sense of being cared for, in a relaxed environment. Ann is a wonderful and interesting host with great historical knowledge of the local area. Meal time was fun; some of the food picked from the garden, the rest fresh, delicious and made to suit my individual requirements. Eating breakfast overlooking a pretty garden and watching the river made a pleasurable start to each day. My bed was comfortable and as promised by my host, big soft towels to use in the shared bathroom. The house itself is as interesting as its gracious host and well worth the short ferry ride to visit and stay in for a night or two. Most enjoyable!

We had a wonderful time staying with Ann at her amazing, historic and endlessly fascinating house. She even cooked Korean food for Minji, making her own version of KimChi! Her attention to detail and desire to ensure her guests have a great time makes Ann the consummate host. We thoroughly recommend a visit to this hidden treasure only 55min north of Sydney.

We couldn't have hoped for a more peaceful, beautiful setting for a weekend out of the city. Ann was a very warm and generous host who went out of her way to accommodate our interests including researching a suitable track in ku ring gai national park, and cooking a bevy of delicious vegetarian meals (complete with home grown herbs, veggies and chili!).

Dangar island itself houses a warm and friendly community and it was very special to have a host who is so proud and knowledgeable about her corner of the world. We look forward to our next stay!
Ann and her family were the most gracious of hosts, sharing their house, gorgeous food & (mostly bad) jokes to make me feel a part of the family.

Ann is a great host. We felt welcome. She is a local historian and gave us a great insight into the island. 
The place and location are good. We felt at home. We were very warm at night and it was quite romantic for us. 
We were on the island for other reasons and would recommend it to others, although I would say that it is fully priced.

Ann was a very welcoming a thoughtful host. Also a great local historian who shared stories of the early days of the island. The hot breakfast with ham, cheese, fresh fruit and croissants and a perfect egg was a particular highlight. 

Highly recommended! A++

The island itself is small and delightful, with the ferry ride across at dusk just lovely. We also highly recommend hiring a tinnie from Brooklyn to explore the river.

We had a lovely time at Ann's place. Ann and her husband are very interesting and considerate hosts. Lots of lively conversation. A lovely brunch.  Both rooms made up for us nicely. Great communication through the booking process.

Ann and her husband met us at the ferry and upon arrival I was presented with a surprise birthday cake! How fabulous. Gluten free too for me - very thoughtful indeed. A lovely birthday card too left on the dresser. It's personal touches like this that make for a great stay.

So nice to know a bit about the history of where you're staying. Ann does a great talk on the history of the island.

If you think you'll need a little sleep in, take earplugs as the local birds get excited in the morning. A wonderful symphony to wake up to, but if you're trying to sleep...  

Dangar Island is just wonderful - we keep coming back. It is a truly special place.

We'll  come again - both to the island and would happily stay here again.

We had a lovely time at Ann and Robert's on Dangar Island. Ann and Robert are both extraordinary people - fascinating and inspiring! We listened to Robert's opera CD on our way home! Ann made the most beautiful brunch for us. Their historic home is warm and inviting. Thankyou for a lovely time :)
Ann was a gracious host and a fantastic cook. She was very good company and her place is ideally located - very near the wharf, cafe, and bowling club as well as just a short walk to the beach.
Thanks so much Ann for being such a perfect hostess - I loved your cooking and was inspired by your garden. Maree

A cultural experience to be enjoyed and treasured. Definitely to be on the bucket list of anyone who enjoys diversity and appreciates the finer things in life such as being entertained by a knowledgeable hostess who can share the wonders of permaculture, the arts and history. loved and appreciated every second thank you Ann for opening your home and loving us so dearly.

Ann was the perfect host.  From the welcome smile, to the beautiful breakfast and the awesome surroundings, we were not disappointed.  Dangar island is beautiful and the weekend was made even more special by how well Ann looked after us.  Everything was as described and this place is full of history.  Definitely worth a visit
Gorgeous little treasure Dangar is! Ann is generous in sharing her little paradise, her amazing knowledge and stories. We will be back.
A charming B&B with lots of history and character. Ann took care of us and spoilt us with a lovely breakfast each morning. Not great for young families, but lovely for a couple.
Heritage house with a lovely host!

Ann's place is unique, historical and a memorable place to stay.  We enjoyed the history of the house, the stories told by Ann and the very genuine concern for our comfort on what was a 41 degree day.  Breakfast was delicious and tailored to our needs.  Thanks Ann for a lovely stay.
Lovely hosts on a beautiful island

name: Old Montreal.  ( Rent for at least 12 months)
summary: Great Apartment ideal for 1-2 guests, located in the heart of Old Montreal in the historic Basilica Notre-Dame area, surrounded by best restaurants, shops and major city attractions,two minutes walking to the Old Port. Very quiet building.  Condo rent  for at least 12 months, Contact me for detail

reviews.txt: Great location!  Unit was just as described.

The host was very responsive from checkin through to checkout. He waited for us to give us the keys and show us around though our train was two hours late. The place is as described new, modern, extremely clean. The building that the unit is small and quiet despite being extremely well situated. Would love to stay here again.

Andy was very accommodating . He took the time to walk us around the neighborhood and get us acclimated. The loft was perfect and the location was extremely convenient. Everything we needed and expected.
Wonderful, clean and modern apartment in a perfect location. Really appreciated the communication and flexibility with A when our plane was delayed and then rescheduled multiple times.

The loft was immaculate! The decor was lovely as well. It felt "good" - comfortable and safe the moment I walked in. I appreciated the security lock at the entrance to the building and the elevator. The location was awesome, just meters from the Basilica as promised. Also only a few short blocks to a metro stop to get to the 747 Bus to the airport.

I loved my stay in Montreal!! The air bnb was perfect for my short 3 night stay and I felt very comfortable there, it was definitely clean and tidy and had everything that I needed for my stay. I would most certainly use this air bnb again if I visited again. Many Thanks
The host was great.Friendly,easy to communicate with.  Great location
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I did not have firm arrival time and Andrew worked with me to make sure the key was exchanged without a problem. I wanted a downtown location and it was seconds away from the Basillica Notre Dame.  The loft was spacious, clean, modern, comfort  and attractive decor, with a well equipped kitchen, plenty of closet space and large bath area with shower/bath combined and a working air conditioner that I appreciated because there were some very warm days.   I did not meet Andrew  but all my questions were answered promptly.
The description was accurate and met our needs.

Great little studio in the heart of Old Town - super convenient and steps from the Notre-Dame Basilica. The apartment has everything you need and is impeccably clean. 

Only slight downside for us was the communication style - not quite as welcoming and flexible as we've become accustomed to with Air BnB hosts. More of a serviced apartment experience rather than a true Air BnB but comfortable and positive overall none the less. Thank you!
Great place in an excellent location. Highly recommended.
Great location in the heart of old Montreal.
The host canceled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Andy’s space was located in the most amazing location in Montreal. Walking distance to anything and so many options for shopping, food, patios, etc. The space is so cute and trendy just as described. They offer so many amenities in the kitchenette and bathroom so you don’t have to run out for the little things you might need. Very quiet inside the space. Check in involved walking to a nearby location to get the key from a lockbox but was manageable. Thx again !

Nice apartment in a great location.  However, this apartment is in a building that does not allow short term rentals.  We were not told beforehand.  There is a warning on the front door that you do so at your own risk.  Also, the owners were not very responsive to our concerns regarding the smoke alarm beeping regularly while we were there (it was never fixed for the full week we were there), and that there were no pillowcases for the extra pillows.

Perfect location for St Catherine’s and the Plateau. The apartment was in a great location and felt very safe with security door to main entrance. My wife and I loved our stay. Would highly recommend this appartment.

Olga and Andrei's place was very stylish, in a great neighbourhood, and easily accessible.  Contrary to what people are saying about the key location, it was very easy to find and a 3 minute walk from the condo.
Cons: There is a sign on the front door prohibiting short term rentals (AirBnBs), the pillows were flat as a pancake (there were extras in the closet but no pillowcases to go with them), a dishcloth and/or a hand towel would have been appreciated. 
Pros: The place was super quiet, in a lovely area, the bed was comfy, and we very much enjoyed our stay.

name: Chic 2BR in Festival Quarter by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the beautiful panoramic windows, sleek decor, and fully-equipped kitchen. Located in the Quartier des Spectacles, known for the renowned Contemporary Art museum - Place-des-Arts, you're close to an array of wonderful local shops and restaurants.

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Great experience, treated us well
Perfect location had a little Hiccup  with finding which apt was mine wasn't listed in guest details other than that I enjoyed my stay super clean neat .....I want a condo now haha

Location of the codo is very convenient for the seekers of "hub of attraction"
The condo is as perfect as shown in the pics and even better.
Flatbook made the stay very pleasant because of their 24/7 prompt responses and assistance.
Very well recommeded.
Our stay was great. Access codes were emailed to us before arrival, location was very convenient and the apartment was clean and well furnished. Wish every Airbnb was this easy.

We loved staying at this condo! The condo was clean, spacious and in a great location. The host responded to our questions within minutes and provided us with everything we asked for. We definitely want to stay at this condo again the next time that we are in Montreal.

Close to downtown Montreal. Had a wonderful stay at this location! Brand new condo, extremely clean! We had a great time at this air bnb!
Will definitely stay here next time we are in time.
