Super easy check-in/check-out process. Great spot and location, very clean, everything necessary for a good stay.

The Sondra group replied to any questions I had promptly and thoroughly.  The apt had all the amenities you could want, great wifi, and great suggestions for what to do and see in Montreal.  
The location was perfect as it was in walking distance to Old Montreal, downtown and Rue St Dennis.
They even left a nice gift for my birthday in the apt for when I arrived!  I highly recommend them for your stay in Montreal!
Mike White
We received lots of info prior to our stay and everything is well thought out. Location was great and the space was exactly what we were after.  Great!
Great location and nice unit.

Lovely condo that looks true to the photos and is in excellent condition. Kitchen was well appointed with the basic things we needed. Beds are a bit noisy and bedding is nice to look at but cheap quality so not very comfortable. Note that it is a great, central location though is on a somewhat seedier block of Ste. Catherine so you will see homeless people hanging around the church across the street from the condo often. We didn't have any issues though. As well, the smoke detector was off the wall and not working when we arrived, but I received a prompt reply via email from Sonder with an offer to fix it ASAP. Overall a good place to stay in downtown Montreal.

We enjoyed our stay in Sonder's place. The check in was easy and the apartment is really well located to get around the city. You can walk both to the Plateau area and the Old Town. 

The apartment also had everything we needed for our stay and we where able to eat some evenings at home when we did not have the energy to go out. One of the beds squeaked quite a bit so if you are a light sleeper it could be a bit hard. I would recommend a stay at the apartment.

Incredibly inflexible and unhelpful. Had to cancel a trip due to an illness. Very much understand no refund being made available as it was a last minute change. That being said, I did not expect to be charged cleaning fees for an unused apartment that had been cleaned prior to our arrival. 

AVOID

Great location close to everything! Only a few short blocks to the Just For Laughs festival and Place des Arts. Walking distance to the entertainment area of Rue Saint-Denis, Old Montreal and numerous other attractions.
Condo was new, very bright, very clean and modern in a secure building. Easy access instructions. Easy and great communication with the folks at Sonder. 
Hope to stay here again someday.

Horrible time entire family had to shower at ymca
Spent more time on the phone being passed around from rep to rep and low ball offers of compensation
Disgusted

This apartment is really well located! Super easy check in and check out. The apartment is so nicely decorated, super well furnished and extremely clean. I wish there was a little more of lights in the rooms.

name: ROOM + ENSUITE INNER CITY MOD HOUSE
summary: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking.

host.about: Hi, What can I say other than I am 39 years old, professional female in a relationship. Very easy going. I just recently renovated my whole house, pretty much a knock down job so new everything. I heard about air B&B and thought what a great idea. I have a clean house including a great kitchen so feel free to make yourself at home when you stay with me. Just let me know if there is anything in particular you may need. This is also the perfect room to shut yourself away in if that is what you'd prefer.

reviews.txt: I didn't meet Alison as she was away, but Adam let me in and explained everything to me. The house is beautifully (and very newly) renovated, the bed was wonderfully comfortable, and I had my own huge bathroom which was very luxurious. The street is quiet but very convenient to everything. All in all, a great bargain and a lovely place to stay - I'll be back!

Although I did not meet Alison, Adam showed me around.
He is very relaxed and this place was realy nice to stay.
Great bathroom and friendly quiet neighbourhood.  Easy to go to from this place to go to the centre as well.
Great stay in Rozelle in Alison's house. I needed a quiet and peaceful place to put my head each night while visiting friends in Sydney and it lived up to expectations!

Staying with Allison and Adam was wonderful. The place is centrally located and easy to walk to downtown Sydney or even take a bus. I was able to get in a game of cricket with Adam I had a blast coming from America this was my first experience in Australia. The place is very clean and modern love the bathroom and the kitchen is great too. The bedroom was at the top of flat very quiet, clean the bed was very comfortable slept well. I would highly recommend this place for anyone in the future it was wonderful place to stay Adam and Allison are great!
Easy stay with excellent bus connection to the city. Shower was my favourite at this place, besides of that I had a good sleep in the comfy bed.
Adam has been very helpful. House is modern and very quiet. My first time using AIRbnb and am impressed
The house was in an ideal spot for the party I was attending.  Warm comfy bed and lovely hot shower.

Alison and Adam were my saviours in Sydney. our logistics officer booked us an hotel in the middle of nowhere in Ryde, claiming that it was the nearest point to Sydney Olympic Park as i had to attend the WPC14 with my colleagues. When i check the location, had to cancel and rushed to my ultimate accommodation portal, broadcasting generic message to nearby hosts to secure an accommodation the soonest.

Alison was among the first to reply, and to pre-confirm...
By the time i got there, Adam was already waiting for me and even kind enough to give me all the directions at 8am and off course waited for me outside to make sure that i'm paying the right cab fee. 

What can i say Adam, made feel at home from very first moment, kind, genuine and warm welcoming host. The house is is really nice fully refurbished, in a quite and well connected neighbourhood. My room was upstairs, a nice sunny room with  a queen bed and a bathroom attached. After i dropped in my luggage, Adam gave me guided orientation tour to the house, with access to all amenities. 

Felt like a VIP 5 star treatment as Adam even gave me a pre-paid bus ticket, which made my first(s) bus rides easier as some stations are pre-paid only.  So now that you that i have been at a great apartment, with great hosts, that's all, Rozelle is a really nice neighbourhood. walking distance from my hosts' place, you can make it to the main street packed, with cafe, bars and restaurant, a vibrant market and lot of attractions. if you happen to stay over a weekend don't miss Rozelle Market (Sat & Sun). 

Now the funny part, Adam was so happy to receive me as he's a all star backgammon player and he knows that Lebanese people are really good at that and he was so eager for round. One night we decided to play a round and Adam's expectations went all down the drain, i think i was the first Lebanese ever to be clumsy backgammon player. We agree that we will play another time via (Hidden by Airbnb) and i will have support from fellow Lebanese players :)

All in all, i great time, the house is warm, clean, and comfortable and the hosts are simply AWESOME

Alison immediately replied to my booking request and organised for her hubby to meet me as I was checking in late.

They were very helpful and gave me a bus card to use. The room was very spacious and the house was close to transport and restaurants.

Excellent hosts in an excellent location.

I had a great stay! Alison was very efficient with my booking and advised me Adam would look after me on arrival. Adam was a great host, carried my case upstairs and even invited me to the pub. The room comfortable and had a great view. The bus around the corner was very convenient for me to get into the city. Thanks for having me!

It is lovely neighborhood, very easy access to all the buses to the city center. The host adam has been helpful and was generous to let me use his living room for my work. The first night the room floor was dusty but was happy it was thoroughly cleaned on the second day. The only concern I had was the room has no lock, given I was the only female guest in the house and did not know any of other (male) guests on the first day of arrival, I was slightly nervous in the first night until I met other guests who were very kind and friendly.

Thanks for a great stay, I have stayed here on three occasions, and have been welcomed by a very considerate host each time. The property is located close to shops restaurants and the gym. I would highly recommend this property and am looking forward to my next visit
Cheers
Elise

name: Sunny, private room on St. Denis
summary: 1 sunny, large, bright room available in 4 bedroom, 3rd floor walk up apartment on the corner of St. Denis & Sherbrooke. Close to vibrant night life but quiet apartment, downtown easily accessible. Bed, desk, window, dresser in a private room.

reviews.txt: It was an awesome stay!! Room is tide and clean, love the neighborhood, perfect location and the price is very reasonable. Highly recommend
Great place located in central Montreal! It is within walking distance to all the sights and sounds of Montreal and extremely convenient for travelers.

I had a very nice and relaxing time staying at Stephanie's place. The room was bright and tidy and the apartment was as well. I was made to feel very welcome and the all the house info is printed out for easy access. Fantastic neighbourhood as well.

The was exactly how I imagined it. Stephanie was really accommodating and respectful of my quietness. Can't beat the price and location combo everything is within 2min in every direction. Also a good coffee shop right underneath the apartment is so convenient. Only wish I had access to the balcony but that's just me. Overall perfect!

name: Allotja't en un elegant i lluminós pis modernista al costat de Passeig de Gràcia
summary: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia

host.about: Hi we are Lluis and Lali, we have rehabilitated this luminous apartment at heart of Barcelona. If you come to our city, this is a fantastic option, premium located, to enjoy your stay. See you at BCN :)

reviews.txt:
Lluis is the perfect host, with great communication beforehand and a very warm welcome, he was also really flexible and understanding at check out too.

The apartment is really well located and as shown in the pictures very clean, tidy and stylish.

The apartment has great facilities, the kitchen is fully stocked (not the we needed to use it with so many great restaurants) and the shower was fantastic.

The beds are really comfortable, and the rooms very quiet (if you have the windows closed) and there is air con.

I would definitely book this place again and look forward to returning.
Huge thanks!
Very nice place to live...

Lluis' place was clean, well equipped and perfect for our four day stay in Barcelona.
The location of the apartment is fabulous and dealing with Lluis was seamless.
The photos and descriptions match reality to the T.
Thank you Lluis for having us.

Lluis is great. He was very responsive and accommodating. His apartment is even better than pictured. It is in a lovely area with many good restaurants near by (paco meralgo for example). Morning and evening coffees from his nespresso machine in the gallery were a treat. I would stay there again. Perfect for up to 6 people.

Lluis is a perfect host in every respect.
The apartment is lovely furnished with an eye on detail and good quality. You will find everything you could possibly need in there, starting from equipment (wlan, hairdryer, kitchen equipment etc.) to things like guides and books of Barcelona and Gaudi (in spanish) as well as  brochures on tourist attractions.

Lluis is very attentive and provides you with all kind of information.
Thank you as well for the flexible check-in/out.
The 6 of us were all happy to have chosen this apartment for our weekend-trip.
We can highly recommend it!

Me and my friends had a wonderful time at Lluis' apartment. The place was neat and clean, spacious and comfortable. A nice surprise was that the 'gallery' is really a balcony when you open the outside doors, so you can enjoy the afternoon sun. Lluis is a straightforward and very friendly host. The location is perfect for a weekend trip and I would definitely recommend this apartment to parties of 4-6.

I traveled to Barcelona with 3 other adults and my 2 young girls. The house was fantastic (as was Lluis); I would gladly stay here again. Everything was great, the only thing I would warn you about is the Master Bedroom being loud at night as it faces the main street (noise of cars driving by etc.).

We loved staying at this amazingly located, clean, spacious and hip apartment. We travel often and are very picky so trust this review. They thought of all the details and amenities and the kitchen was very well equipped (they even thought of paper towels, tin foil, plastic wrap) and all appliances were new. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms roomy for Europe. Our hosts were friendly and willing to help in any way to make our trip enjoyable. Two of our children got ill and the host even made an appointment for us with their pediatrician and emailed to check up on how the kids were feeling after. Now, that's service! Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer...

We were warmly welcomed by our host on arrival even though it was quite late at night.  The apartment was well set out, clean, tidy and large enough to accommodate 5 adults. Our host emailed us with suggestions for day trips.  The maps provided about local restaurants and nearby supermarkets were appreciated. This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona, although a little noisy some nights. Barcelona is a wonderful city to visit and we can recommend taking the time to venture further out of the city.

Lluis was a great host and very helpful! He met us as soon as we arrived, and showed us around the apartment, which was exactly as seen in the pictures. During our week's stay he e-mailed me info on local restaurants to visit, as well as was responsive to questions I had about the city. We traveled with our 6 month old, and he helped provide us with a crib on request. All in all, a great place to stay with a great host!

Thank you for having us again Lluis.
As on our previous visit, everything ran smoothly and we very much enjoyed your beautiful apartment, hospitality and flexibility with our late departure.
See you in Barcelona sometime soon.

Lluis is very prompt in providing information and responding to questions.  We were not urged or required to check in at any certain time, he is very patient and understandable.  There are more amenities than other places, We really did not expect the nespresso, made us feel very welcome!

Lluis and his wife are very nice hosts.The apart is stylish and cosy,very clean.Another advantage is perfect location.Just one thing to know it was a bit noisy at night from the street.But it couldn't change our impression from the stay!Next time we will choose the same apart!

We had a wonderful time in this modern and clean apartment which is perfectly centrally located, nice shops in the neighborhood. The beds were very good. We liked the rain shower and the bath. Everything was very good and we would like to come back one time. Lluis is very helpful.

name: Museum Mile 1 BR - Madison Ave
summary: Welcome to our Madison Ave apartment. You will find this listing so charming, and well located. The apartment has a queen bedroom, balcony off the living room, and a spacious living room with a sleep sofa, and desk.

reviews.txt:
I stayed at USA Stay's apartment for a little over 2 months while I was on a business trip in New York. Excellent location if you prefer a quiet neighborhood. There is quite a number of restaurants and shops close by and it is only two blocks away to Central Park. Public transportation is within walkable distance too. 
Please note that you will need to buy some necessities such as trash bags, shampoos and so on as this is not an apartment that someone currently lives in (more of a hotel style with an empty furnished room). Also the streets could be a little loud at night because it faces to Madison Avenue. The service calls were handled promptly. Check in and out were easy. 
Overall I enjoyed my stay at this apartment and would recommend it to anyone who prefers a convenient location but not right into midtown where the traffics are.

This apartment is perfect for one person or couples staying in NYC for a long period and looking to experience the real Upper East Side, with its beautiful residences, shops and restaurants. The location is prime, very easy to hop on a bus or subway and make it anywhere. Nightlife is not big around, it's actually quiet and nice at night. Dave from USA Stay was super nice and helped solving certain issues that came up. The communication was great. There's a little market and cleaners downstairs, which is super convenient, and a Duane Read/Walgreens a couple of blocks away. You'll be 1 block from Central Park and the apt itself is incredibly cozy. You'll feel at home. Thank you!

The location and service was outstanding. However, be aware that the apartment is old and therefore not well isolated. You hear traffic from Madison Avenue, your neighbours and noisy radiators. Sometimes the water will never get hot, forcing you to take cold showers. Radiators may not work on cold days.
We stayed for two months in a nice location but the apartment disappointed us, especially when we considered the high price of our 2 months stay.

The apartment is located at UES, one block from Central Park and within close proximity within several museums (The Met, Guggenheim, Copper Hewitt). Nearest subway station is on either 96th street (6 train) or 86th street (4,5,6 trains).

The apartment is on the third floor of the building. The neighbourhood is generally quiet with the exception of traffic noises and bus noises (there's a bus stop right below) but apart from that it's generally quiet at night. 

It's a cosy apartment, and has everything you would typically need. The small refrigerator works well, however do note that the freezer section doesn't work, so avoid purchasing items that require freezing. Wifi and cable TV works well too.

I had no problems with the hot water in the shower, but do note that it does take a few minutes for it to get hot. 

Communication was great and the host, he was always quick to respond to questions or any problems. I found them incredibly communicative and helpful. 

I stayed for a period of two months. I am seldom around during the day as I am at work, and am usually only around at night. 

Overall I am satisfied with the apartment and my stay. 

Thank you very much!

We do NOT recommend to stay in this apartment for several reasons. First, there are cockroaches. First thing we saw upon entering were cockroaches in the kitchen area - without even having any food around or cooking. This was not properly disclosed before arrival. Although they sent somebody over who laid out baits, the roaches did not disappear. Second, (at least) two times there were unannounced strangers entering the apartment in order to look at it or to even take pictures. We know because we were at the apartment at this time. Third, the apartment faces Madison Ave, so it is rather loud. In addition, the windows are not well sealed so it gets cold/hot easily. Overall, considering what you get, the apartment is overpriced. In addition to get the key, you have to travel across the city to pick it up - very inconveniently.
Good location & vintage interior

name: Wellyet Guest House@Room 2
summary: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc.

host.about: Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

loc.address: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
The Host was cheerful and helpful on arrival and the room was clean and ready upon arrival. The Flats were quiet during the stay which was great as I really needed the rest after a long day of Business meeting. 
Highly recommended.

Natalie's guest house was a really small room in the tourist-center of Hong Kong. The room and the guest house provided everything one needs for a short visit in Hong Kong: WiFi, Shower, bed, and a safe place to stow your stuff away.
The air-con is quite loud during the night, but turning it of will lead to quite a hot room!

Although I haven't seen Natalie, her "ladies" were extremely friendly and helpful, even there was a language-barrier. BUT the airbnb experience - talking to locals - was missing.

The only thing, which is offended me, were the watch/stuff-salesmen right out of the guest house.

Natalie is a welcoming host, friendly and helpful. Her place is located at a convenient location just a couple of minute's walk to the MTR station. The room is as it describes, clean and everything is handy to get. Would recommend travellers to have a short stay at Natalie's place.

I had a very pleasant stay at Natalies guesthouse. It's in a great location from where you can reach everything easily (the MTR station is right next to the building). One part of the guesthouse was under renovation but Natalie gave me a bigger better room without charging me extra. The room itself was super clean, comfortable and perfect for a short holiday in Hong Kong. It had everything I needed - AC, little bathroom with shower, fresh towel everyday, shampoo and a big comfortable bed. You also feel really safe as you can only get into the guesthouse and room with a special keycard. The staff was super helpful too and so was Natalie. I only met her in person once, but she is incredibly friendly and really makes sure you have a pleasant stay. I can recommend the guesthouse for those who travel by themselves and need a quiet room to come back to in the midst of bustling Hong Kong. Thanks a lot, Natalie! All the best, Juliana
The place is clear
The place is clean and the crew is adorable! Very well situed in downtown HK. I stayed 5 nights in this tiny room without any problem. Recommended!
Natalie was super friendly and very helpful. Room was as described although the mattress was a little uncomfortable. Other than that, it was okay.
Fast response, the place is in the heart of the city, not difficult to find halal food nearby the hotel
Bed is comfortable. Good location. The lady boss, Natalie, is helpful and gives good suggestion. Will recommend for stay though the building looks old and black outside but inside the room is clean.

What a find! Location location location.  This super lovely spot was right in the center of everything including right on top of a train station.  Natalie was a perfect host and I felt completely taken care of.

The room is just as specified. Comfortable, clean and on a building located in the perfect spot if you want somewhere easily accessible to the main areas of HK. Victoria harbor is just 8 minutes away walking.

This place is great for short stays when visiting the city, it's more of a place to settle down after long days out. Check-in was smooth and helpful. Looks exactly like the pictures and it's clean, the hosts are mostly there to accommodate your requests.

Central down town area. Everything is at a walking distance. 
The room is ok. I felt very comfortable. 
I would pay a little more attention to the little details. I think that with little money and little effort it could look a lot better.  
In any case, i would repeat

Good location and good price. 
Stuff is nice too !

I will recommend

name: ☼☼ Lovely Colorful Studio ☼☼ Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: My Lovely Colorful Studio is in the center of the popular district Tsim Sha Tsui. There are many Yummy restaurants and shops, it's a very good location, It's the real Hong Kong. With 200 sqft and good design you will feel like home. It's located in a walk up building (2nd floor), right in the center of TST, less than 2min by walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★

host.about:
Hello i'm Hester, i'm from Hong Kong, I love my country and i hope you will like it!

I listed my studio in Airbnb cause i'm not often in Hong Kong as i work as an translator assistant, i have to travel in different place in the world. 

I love to travel, my favorite destination is Italy, I've been to Rome, Milan.. I love the food there.
I also often go to Singapore, i also live there, few weeks a month, it's amazing there..

reviews.txt: Amazing room in the center of Hong Kong. It was perfect for my stay. Hester and her friends were very responsive. I had issues entering the room at first, and Hester immediately took care of it. I'll choose this place again on my next visit.

It's a small but clean and comfortable studio. Convenient to public transportation and easy access to local restaurants. The owner gave us clean instructions to get here and replied quickly on any question. But if you have big luggage, it's a bit different to climb the narrow stairs as there is no elevator.

Very good communication and directions.
Bed so comfy after a long flight as was good hot shower.
Apartment air conditioned if needed, and quiet.
Enjoyed exploring the area very much, big variety of shops, cafes and walks etc.

Very central location easy to get to by A21 bus from the airport, stop at Kimberley rd. Place is small, Hong Kong standards, very clean, good shower and large flat screen. I definitly recommend this place.
It is a very good
This is a wonderful experiences stayed at here! Hosted made everything simple and easy to do and respond very fast!highly recommended
Room was clean, located at the heart of TST, just nice for 2pax.
The directions and information to our room was very accurate and we were kept informed the whole time.

It was a great stay! The room is very nice and clean.  Small size but the space is comfortable and enough for 2 persons. The location of the spartment is highlight, super easy to access to MTR subway, there are many restaurants surrounding and also cosmetic shops. I will stay there again for the next HK trip.

Location and price made this the ideal spot. We were able to get to all the tourist stops and hidden gems within minutes. The MRT is around the corner making transportation a breeze. Rooms small, but it's a room with a bed so what else do you need?

If you're on a budget and are looking for a "local" feel in the heart of Hong Kong, this is it.

name: Big Private BR Steps to Barnard Columbia & Subways
summary: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. You will be just steps from Columbia and Barnard Universities and a few blocks from the Manhattan School of Music, Jewish and Union Theological Seminaries, and Riverside, Morningside and Central Parks. With high-speed wifi, cable TV, printer, dishwasher, microwave, a/c, 24-hour laundry room and evening doorman

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hi - I'm a freelance writer and producer for TV and film, a native New Yorker, and the proud father of an amazing teenager.

reviews.txt: Paul was generous with an early check-in and helped us settle in to his cozy apartment.

We found the place serendipitously when another booking fell through and couldn't be happier. Not only was the place exactly what we needed but Paul is a genuinely nice, kind, interesting human being and it has been a pleasure to get to know him. We stayed as a couple for just over a month and miss it already. Paul showed us around the neighbourhood when we first got there and was easily contactable thereafter.

Paul's place is a unique gem decorated with his quirky eye for colour, style and collectible treasures. It has a cozy well decked out living room, a bedroom with a closet and a comfortable bed, spacious bathroom and a nice, sunny, open-plan kitchen surrounded by windows. It is neat and well organised. There is cooling and heating in every room (plus fans), and the kitchen is well stocked with pots, pans, and other requirements along with a nice big fridge and freezer.  We found the place had everything we needed for a comfortable long-term stay.

For us, the location so close to three big parks (incl. Central Park), Columbia and Harlem, was just right. There are transport options aplenty: bikes up and down Riverside Park, the 1 MTA line two blocks away and frequent Broadway buses.  Paul kindly lent us his two bikes which was a fab way to get around the city. Being located on the border of UWS is great as it is a relatively quiet area to stay but the rest of Manhattan is readily accessible through the 1 line meaning we got the best of Manhattan action combined with good sleeping! Would stay again in a flash!
I had a great stay! Paul was a great host, with helpful recommendations in the area. Definitely book with him if you can.

Classic Upper West Side apartment in a quiet residential building very close to Columbia University. Comfortable bed, well-equipped kitchen, sitting room, good water pressure. Paul was a great host with friendly and proactive communication.  We met him to receive the key and instructions, and then had the place to ourselves for the rest of the weekend. Would stay again!

A beautiful eat in kitchen which has clearly been recently upgraded.
Vistas of the church steeples was novel. The breezes from Riverside Park kept it cool as did AC units in each room.

Paul's place was perfectly located! I came into town for a conference at Columbia and was mere blocks away. Riverside park was also a nice surprise, as well as an abundance of grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops and bookstores. The subway was one block away. 
The apartment was cozy and fully stocked. It had everything I needed and then some!
Great location and Paul is very helpful an accommodating.

I hate to start out with such a great review because I'd like to keep this hidden gem for myself!  Paul's place is awesome! Great space and great location! I was in NYC for 2 weeks at Columbia and the location was just a few blocks away. I didn't want to deal with transit in the AM, although that would not have been a big issue anyway.  Plus, it's right off broadway (the broadway that has shows) so subways access was great. Since it's a college town, I felt super safe and there were minimal tourists and minimal bums also. A couple things to note: this is actually Paul's residence so there are some personal affects to be mindful of.  I really appreciated that though because I was able to tap into the Tylenol and bandaids in the medicine cabinet over the course of 2 weeks. Hey, anything can happen!  He was totally respectful of my privacy and wasn't popping in or out during my stay.  I'm hopeful that if Teachers college has anymore trainings that I get to go to, Paul's place is available!
Very safe and close to Columbia University!

Paul is a kind, interesting man who made us feel completely welcome.  He went out of his way to be accommodating.  The apartment is large & sunny, an unexpected treat in Manhattan. The location could not be better for a Columbia U. visit.  The bed/mattress was top notch.  If you are not used to NYC apartments you might feel put off by ANY pre-war apartment, but this is among the much better ones!

My husband and I had a private room in Paul’s apartment. Paul’s place is bright, comfortable, clean, and beautifully and uniquely decorated. The apartment is quiet and is located on one of the top floors of the building, providing views and the sounds of birds chirping. It is a few steps from Columbia and to the convenient red line. 

Paul was a gracious and considerate host, greeting us on arrival with a warm welcome and snacks. We always felt comfortable and free to hang out, make meals, and talk. Hands down one of the best airBnBs I’ve ever had the pleasure to stay in. It’s a NYC gem!

This is my first time as an AirBnB guest (I hosted for over a year when AirBnB had just started and had good experiences as a host). Paul, my host, hit it out of the park. The location is outstanding. Such a lovely upper west side block, across the street and around the corner from Columbia. I was visiting my son who is a student there. Even if Columbia wasn't your destination, Paul's apartment is one block from lovely Riverside Park and the Hudson River. Morningside park is a few blocks to the east. Central Park North and Cathedral Parkway are 5-10 minutes away. The 1 train stops 2-4 blocks away. The UWS is very gracious. The pace is less frenetic which is a nice thing at the end of a day of NYC touring. Yet the nearness of Columbia gives the neighborhood a youthful hip vibe. And Columbia's campus is outstanding; lovely and compact. I felt safe coming and going from Paul's building. The building was well maintained. The hallway outside his door wasn't dark and depressing. There is a laundry in the basement and a garbage chute in the hall on his floor. Paul's apartment is decorated with an artist's eye; the furniture, art, even the plates and skillets, were beautiful, colorful, special. The kitchen/sitting room was filled with light! Everything was in its place. My bedroom had a very big, comfortable bed. The bed linens were soft; the colors were muted and restful. There was plenty of drawer and closet space. The table lighting was exceptional. I had a lovely view of a church and Columbia outside my bedroom window. Paul was so kind to welcome me very early due to my 5a arrival into JFK on a red eye from SF. He was quickly responsive when I requested my stay. He met me and welcomed me into his home. He made me tea, fruit and nuts. He gave me plenty of towels and wash clothes. He gave me a shelf in the bathroom for my toiletries. I unpacked, showered (plenty of hot water), and headed out to my first meeting. Paul was lovely to talk to, yet respectful of my privacy. He welcomed both of my young adult children into his home. My daughter (who is graduating from NYU) cooked 2 breakfasts in Paul's kitchen. She so enjoyed his window seat in his kitchen. My son lingered and did schoolwork at the kitchen table. Paul's space was so much more gracious than a dorm room! Paul even printed out my boarding pass when I was out and about. He also printed 36 pages of work that I had completed while spending the day in the libraries at Columbia and the cafes near Columbia while my son wrote a paper. Making that personal connection with Paul enhanced my stay. But he was so quiet and gracious that guests who want to keep to themselves would also be comfortable. My son has 3 more years at Columbia and...

Extremely clean, quiet and close to Barnard and Columbia campuses, transportation and places to eat.  Paul was generous with his time and his space while allowing us great privacy.   We would return without pause.

Paul's apartment is a corner apartment in one of the typical New York buildings around Colombia university. The location could not be better. You are at the doorstep of Colombia as well as on a short walking distance to St John the Divine and Central Park. The 1-line (subway) is literally around the corner so Midtown is very easy to reach. The apt is quiet and I slept really well. Paul knows the area very well and was very generous not only sharing his apt but also his inside tips & tricks about the area. Paul is a genuine person who does whatever he can to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
Paul was a fantastic host. We're grateful for his help and for allowing us to use his wonderful apartment.

Great place, exactly what I needed. 

Paul was a great host and will for sure be returning when needed. He gave me my space as needed but was always there when and if I needed him for anything.

Feel like I made a friend in NYC :) Thanks again Paul!!

Paul's place is a great place to stay. Paul was very helpful with finding out what was happening in the city, suggestions for where to go, getting to know and navigate the area, and was fun to talk with about the history and character of the neighborhood and NY. He was great about check-in and out.  He is very thoughtful and accommodating and I would definitely stay here again!

Paul's communication at every stage of the process was fabulous from our initial inquiry to our arrival time.  He met us outside his apartment, got us settled in, answered endless questions about places to eat and get coffee, and how to manage the subway and trains for our various expeditions.   He was unfailingly in good cheer.  And I would absolutely stay with him again.

name: L'IDÉAL, ( à 2 min du métro Pie-IX ).
summary: Newly furnished appartment. You will feel the comfort and warmth as you walk in. Everything has been designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible. This apartment is ideal for its location and security (keypad lock). It is perfect for couples, or for passing travelers. Can accommodate a maximum of 4 with the sofa-bed. For your convenience will will also supply you with my private parking for one car.

host.about: Je possède cette maison depuis plus de 40 ans, mes enfants ont tous habités un moment ou l’autre en haut ainsi que quelque locataire, mais maintenant tout à été refait et c’est devenu un hébergement touristique bien meublé et complet maintenant c’est à vous d’en profiter.

reviews.txt: Very comfortable, and professional, very clean and homey. Thank you for hospitality.
We had an excellent stay at William's place. He did everything to make us welcome and his apartment is the nicest we have ever stayed in.

Perfect place to stay - very clean, spacious, and modern. It's also newly renovated so everything is very new. Right near the metro station and a free private parking spot is available if you need it. It was very relaxing. The communication with William and Susan was great. I would receive a reply within minutes whenever I needed to know something. When I arrived, William came out to help me find his parking spot and offered to help me with my things. I would definitely stay here again.
A wonderful place to stay. Very clean and a fairly convenient location.

This place is awesome! It is very clean and spacious. The parking spot was very useful. William is a great host, very easy to communicate with and message. I will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

Sue and Williams's place is extremely clean and everything is new. They have a lot of appliances for everyone's needs. They welcomed us with muffins, water, juice boxes and coffee (keurig machine) and just doing little things like putting up our wiper blades up so they don't freeze overnight. You will not be disappointed if you book with them :)

Anyone staying in Montreal would be lucky to have Sue & Will as their hosts. It is obvious that Susan takes this seriously and wants to make sure that you have the best trip possible. This was my first Airbnb and it was 10x better than any hotel and at a great rate. The apt was emaculate; she had it decorated for the holidays and had snacks I love, (toaster streudels) in the freezer. The metro is so close.  Can't say enough of what good hosts they were,(Will even brushed our car off for us) thanks guys!

If you stay at William and Susan's place, you'll be extremely satisfied!  The apartment was super clean, beautiful, welcoming, and safe.  They pay attention to all the details, provide everything needs for a comfortable stay, and go far above and beyond what could be expected as hosts.  I highly recommend this apartment!

Williams and Sue's place was fantastic! It's clean, modern, quiet and central. We were able to park our car at the apartment so we used Uber and the Metro which was a two minute walk from the apartment. We were able to walk to the Olympic park and bio dome and took the metro to the Montreal Canadians game which saved us on car parking. Sue was very responsive to our message and made us feel very welcome! We would definitely recommend their apartment and would love to stay again! Thank you for making our stay so pleasant, Hannah and Dan.
Excellent appartement !

name: Cheerful new renovated central apt
summary: The full equipped apartment located in the heritage district of Istanbul, colorful Tarlabaşı. If you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.

host.about: My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighbourhood,  and enjoy the city with walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. I know how it is important to be able to feel the city you are visiting from my experiences. So if you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.

reviews.txt:
We rented Aybike's apartment as a group of four. We were met by Aybike on arrival, she is a great host, very welcoming, responsive and attentive. We even got some sweets prepared by her mother, which was extremely sweet. Even though we only were the first guests for her, I am sure Aybike will be a great host. 
The apartment itself is cozy and bright. Although more people could potentially stay there we felt that it was perfect for four. It is fully equipped with everything necessary. We couldn't think of anything we would need that was missing. The location is great close to Istiklal street and a walking distance to many major attrcations. 
We can warmly recommend Aybike and her apartment!
Best regards,
Oksana, Victor, Liuda, Stas

The apartment was the cutest thing and so comfortable, Aybike was extremely prepared with everything and she's really nice, the apartment had everything we needed. Good location, it has a very friendly restaurant right in front of it, that is open 24/7. We had such a great experience!
Het appartement ligt in een goede buurt, dicht bij alles. Aybike is zeer gastvrij en leuk. Appartement zelf had ook alles.

We had an great time staying in Aybike's flat, it was the perfect flat in the perfect location for us. There was three of us staying in this flat and it was just right for us. The flat was clean and tidy, it had everything we need, plenty towels and bedding available for us. The flat is situated in the perfect location for you to get the real sense of Istanbul with its locals and the culture. It's so central, 2 mins walk away from Istikal Street, 10 mins walk away Galata and Cihangir and 10 mins on the public transport to Old City. 
Aybike was great she was very attentive to all our needs and very friendly and warm, any problem she was there. We had a lot of fun this flat it was great!!

We had a really wonderful time at Aybike's apartment- it was very well equipped with everything we needed (and more!) and was a great base from which to explore the city. It's in a busy and fun area but still quiet enough at night for good sleep. Aybike was a brilliant host- very accommodating and warm. We'd come back in a heartbeat!

Aybike made us feel very welcome, she was very nice and as our flight was changed to a later flight she waited in the apartement for us, thanks again! The apartement is equiped with everything you need, the bars outside and the hole area was always with a lot of people, we never felt unsafe at night walking in the streets.  we can recommend it!

Aybike was the nicest host you can imagine. She provided us with maps from Istambul and recommended some sightseeing points. She let us use her metro card during our stay. Her flat is clean, tidy and within a walkable distance from Taksim Square, where you can move to any part of the city. I definitely recommend her for your stay in Istambul.

We rented Aybike's appartment for 6 adults and 3 children! we easily fitted to this cosy flat. It had enough sleeping places for all of us. The flat is realy well equipted with everything needed for travelers and even some food left for the first snack. The location is good, near Istiklal street. Aybike was quick responcive. We had problems with hot water but it was solved quickly. Her mother was very polite and met us with  homemade sweet cookies. Every person were provided with set of towels for face and body. They were new, soft and clean. The streets are very nosy but when tired it doesn't metter :). I would like to come again and highly recommend it. Good luck and thank you Aybike!

Aybike's apartment truly is at the heart of Istanbul. We were able to walk to Taksim Street in minutes and use that find transport anywhere else. Shops and a 24-hour local eatery were seconds away. Her apartment was clean, cosy, and packed with everything one would need - all kinds of household items, maps and tourist guides, Internet, snacks, etc. We were five adults, including 2 elderly. Aybike catered to all of us wonderfully, even dropping off a fan when we mentioned that the elders were feeling a bit hot. Throughout our stay she was always responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and regularly gave advice regarding our Istanbul adventures. Even after we left, she informed us of an item we had left behind, and offered to help send it to us. Please visit us in Dhaka, Aybike!

We love that Place, just 3 min. walk to Istiklal street, 1 min. to Bus stataion and 5 to 10 min. to Shishane subway station, so I really cant think of a better location.
Aybike is a very professional Host and helped us all the way at everything we needed, starting from basic orientation to arranging Transfer to Airport, we loved the Apt. and really felt Home and will always stay there when we visit Istanbul Again.
Thank you Aybike

My boyfriend, dad, and I had a great time at this apartment! It is close to all the major tourist locations and close to shops, cafes, and galleries. Really a great location. The apartment is beautiful and the bed and pillows are super comfortable. Also the high speed internet works great and the AC was a nice bonus! I would definitely stay here again!

Amazing location, love the Apt# 
this is my 2nd stay and will always stay there.
Aybike and Fatima ( her mother ) are very kind and friendly Hosts.

This is our second stay at Aybike's apartment! We liked it so much at the beginning of our road trip all over turkey so we stayed here when we came back! 
My dad, boyfriend, and I were very comfortable here. It is close by to the main shopping and movie theater in Taxim, and close to all transportation, plus easy access to the airport via shuttle or taxi. 
Aybike has great communication skills and was always available for our arrival and advice. Highly recommend!

Aybike was very kind and attentive with communications, suggesting some nice things to do in Istabul. The apartment was in a great location, walkable to everything we wanted to do. The front room was light and airy, with an eclectic design. Both the bedrooms however have little natural light, so if this is important to you it might not be your best choice. There were some plumbing issues which were frustrating.  Aybike was quick to respond to concerns, though nothing could be done right away. Hopefully issues will be resolved quickly for the next guest.

We'd like to thanks Aybike for everything she did for us, it was nice trip to Istanbul, we have faced some problems, but we solved as well.
A suitable place for a certain number of people (between 1 to 4 persons), and all supplies are available in place.
the house was comfortable and close to Taksim square about ten minutes walking, and the house was very well equipped, the hosts welcomed us really nicely.

I cannot speak negatively at all. Beautiful apartment, well located, great hospitality. 

We were recieved by Aybike's mom, Fatima, which is a great person. Explained everything thing, showed us where everything is and offered us some nice pastries. Aybike, although she was not physically available, she was always reachable via phone and Airbnb communication. 

the apartment is a few minutes away from Istiklal st. and nearby many restaurants and grocery stores.

I recommend staying here.
I loved the apartment. Very cozy & clean. Temperature was very good. Beds are comfy and sheets are clean. Bathroom was awsum, loved taking showers. Perfect stay.

Me and my friend love aybike apartment soo much! we were traveling during winter time and Istanbul quite cold soo after all day long walking in the cold arriving in aybike apartment feels like heaven. Warm and comfortable. 

Very nice and cute apartment, good location, very good wifi connection, very near to istiqlal street. we are 7 people and the apartment has enough space for us. 

Thank you soo much!

name: Sunny Room (for One) Minutes from Coogee Beach!
summary: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb.

host.about:
Me:
I'm Brazilian living in Australia since 2010. I speak Portuguese and English and I love meeting new people from different cultures and languages!

As host:
I hosted over 80 people in 2 years of Airbnb and we earned Super Hosts status 2 years in a row! 
My husband Claudio is Italian and I'm Brazilian. We work from home and we are very fast replying guest messages when we are not here to answer in person. Despite our apartment being small, we have a comfortable size bedroom with a double bed and many cosy pillows so you can relax and rest after exploring Sydney! Also, we are 15 minutes walking distance to Coogee Beach (our favourite!).

As a traveller: 
I prefer quiet and relaxing homes and when travelling I barely stay on my Airbnb room as I am constantly exploring. I like to chat with my hosts to find out the best places to eat and see from a local's point of view as well as building friendship with my hosts.
I either travel alone or with my Italian husband Claudio.

reviews.txt: This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !
This was a lovely home for a short stay. Cindy and Miki were welcoming, nice and informative. Cindy is punctual with her responses to messages.
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.
A nice place to stay. well equipped:)

This place is great!
Cindy & Miki are lovely hosts and make their guests welcome.
The room is very nice & the location of the apartment is good because Coogee beach is approx 20 mins walk away & bus stops outside lead to the City & Coogee beach.
I recommend this place for your stay in Randwick :-)

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!

Lovely stay at Cindy and Micky's place, the location is quite convenient, although space of the room is a bit small. But it is so nice that Cindy provide me with fans in this hot weather! Rooms are also clean and elegant.
Great place to stay! Cindy was a great host. Check in and out was easy. Good advice on where to eat out.
The room is really cosy and the bathroom is nice and clean. It was a good place to stay in Sydney eventhough it's not in the inner city, because the bus stop is right in front of the door. :)
Fantastic! Very comfortable, clean and neat. Road noise started early but wasn't too bad.

I didn't really want to leave! This is a great place. The location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach, 5 mins to shops and bus stops directly outside the building. Couldn't ask for better. There is only one negative I can think of and even this is minor, no offer of teas or coffees for the morning. But that really doesn't take away from how much I enjoyed my stay! The bedroom was pretty much perfect, very comfortable. Bed was amazing! The apartment itself is very clean and tidy. And Cindy the host was great too! So friendly and welcoming. There is no doubt that I would definitely go back to this AirBnB room. Big thanks to Cindy for having me.
Cindy is a wonderful host, I had an awesome time during my stay in Sydney! The place is close to Randwick and public transport and not far from the city by bus.

No need to transfer to the city. This place is a good location and nice host:)
Just wifi connection is not so good. 
I had a good sleep at there.
I didn't see too much of Cindy or Miki, but they were both lovely! Great apartment, super comfy bed and spotlessly clean. Thanks guys!

name: Mike's House- Hina Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older rustic style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with queen size bed and own bathroom.  We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat.  There is off street parking and WIFI.

host.about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.txt: This house was AWESOME!! Rina, the owner is very cool. She is very laid back, friendly, and helpful!! Any question I had or if I needed anything, text her and she was there!! The house is very clean and comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with anything you would need. The water pressure in the shower was AMAZING!! We had a wonderful visit and my experience  at Mikes House exceeded all expectations!! Thank you Rina!! I guess in Hawaiian language that is.. Mahalo!! ;)

It was a wonderful time. Rina makes you feel right at home and the house has all the amenities you'll want. Paia is a great little town, with a super organic food store, restaurants, and coffee shops.
The town is kinda surfer central for the north shore area, with none of the condo sprawl one might find on the west side of the island.
It's also doable to stay there without renting a vehicle, but some excursions are better with a rental..
All in all, it was a very positive experience staying at "Mikes House".

Rina is a very welcoming and helpful hostess.  The house is a five-minute walk from downtown Paia but is much bustling with lots of space inside and plenty of parking.  The rooms are spacious and well appointed.

Light sleepers should know that the house is located on Baldwin Avenue, which is a busy road in the early morning, and there are chickens in the area, so you won't need an alarm clock.

Rina's place is a nicest one, situated in a most beautiful place, it is very so cozy, that it feels just like home. Rina is absolutely nice, too, and it is mostly due to her friendliness that you start feeling so at home there the moment you enter the house. Thank you so much, it was a pleasure for us to stay at you place, Rina, hope to see you again!

Aloha, Mike's place was exactly what we expected: friendly, helpful, clean! Once, before our arrival, I mentioned that I like Lilikoi (Passionfruit). When we arrived, Rina had Lilikoi Tea and Jam for us. After couple of days I asked if we could borrow 2 beach chairs, she didn't have any, but guess what? Next day she knocked and had 2 beach chairs on her shoulder, not the flimsy ones, the good ones....we thought that was incredible. The place is not the Hyatt, but comfy and clean. Our room was big enough for us,shower and toilet in the room, all was perfect. We could use the kitchen, which we did every morning. Well, what else is there to say? I told her, whenever we visit Maui, we will stay with her. She gave me/us a bye-bye present: Lilikoi candle, soap and body wash....a Hyatt would not do that !!
Mahalo Rina, you are a wonderful Host, Franz and Renate
Rina is a wonderful hostess and her place was very clean and welcoming!

rina is a very nice host. the house is great, close to the shops in piha. the kitchen is very big and well equipped: i had a very good time there and rina always checked whether everything is alright or if we were needing something .

This is a great place to stay! Starting with Rina and her helpful, relaxed and kind ways. The house is perfectly located half way between Hana and Haleakala. It is a 15 minutes drive from the airport, less than 10 minutes walk to Paia-Center with all its shops, restaurants and galleries. Beaches are also nearby. 
You can keep yourself for yourself or meet other guests from all over the world in the full equiped, handy kitchen or in the spacious TV-room. My room was comfortably large and very clean. Wifi worked well. I was provided with a parkingspace on the property. 
I can`t wait to come back again.

I exteneded my stay on Maui for a few days and wanted a simple, clean, comfortable place to stay in Paia and Mike's House suited my needs very well. Rina is very nice; very kind and helpful. I was able to leave my stuff in room on last day and picked it up early evening before catching flight home. Hana room is clean and comfortable with closed-in porch area with nice view of beach and mountains. Secure locks on doors with personalized codes. Well equipped, shared kitchen and living room. Opportunities to meet other nice travellers. Location is central and active with traffic on Baldwin Ave, roosters crowing and neighbours watching TV at night. Felt like every day, Hawaiian life and a nice way to end my visit.

We had a great stay at the Hina Room. It's very very clean and comfortable. You meet other people in the kitchen and can have a small talk. Rina is a lovely host who really care about her guests. Especially the very useful things like beachtowels and beachchairs makes it diffrent to other rooms. Highly recommend this place

The Hina Room was comfortable, spacious, and had a great breeze. The in-room bathroom is sufficient, but there is limited privacy because there is no door. I appreciated the vanity in the room. 

The shared areas where clean and in good shape. The kitchen was well stocked with supplies.

The host took care to provide the kinds of things you might want on your trip, but not might not have packed -- hair dryer, iron, beach chairs, towels, cooler, etc. That was very thoughtful and I appreciated that touch.

It was awesome, Rina and all the other people where stayed there were so friendly that we felt like it is our home.
Comfortable flat, gives you all you need for a pleasant stay during your holiday on maui.

Mahalo Rina

Rina was a delightful host and gave us all the information we needed. The kitchen was well supplied with cooking oil and condiments available. We enjoyed being within walking distance of the funky little shops of Paia which had good coffee and good restaurants. The house is also only 7 mile from the airport which helped with our early morning flight. The house was quite hot during the day but cooled quickly at night. Baldwin road traffic noise can be heard from the room but is less frequent during the night.

Rina was a fantastic host and was super accommodating! Her place is perfectly situated just down the street from town. Her place is a 5 min walk to the grocery store and the rest of all of the nice little shops and restaurants and 2 mins past there is a beautiful beach :)
We loved our private room and we felt secure and cozy in our nook :) and the kitchen is awesome! We definitely recommend putting your hat up at Rina's place if you're looking for the sweet spot in Paia ;)
Cheers!

We stayed one night in this room and it was everything we needed. Just a few blocks from great coffee and restaurants, and a clean comfortable room. Rina was very friendly and helpful. 

We appreciated having our own bathroom in the room, though it doesn't have a door. Overall we had a great stay in Paia and would recommend Rina's place!

Rina was an amazing hostess, sweet and extremely accommodating. We stayed here with our 7 month old and it was the perfect location in the beautiful town of Paia which was just a walk away. We stocked up on groceries at Mana foods which is a local version of Whole Goods - great selection. Great restaurants just a walk away. Nothing but good things to say about our 3 night stay here! Thanks Rina for all your insight and tips to make our stay so memorable!!

I had a great stay in Paia at Hoku's bed and breakfast. This location is wonderful because it's central to the Road to Hana, Mt Haleakela, and beaches on the West and Southern shores. Not to mention that the town of Paia has a very old school vibe that was fun to hang out in and be away from the touristy resort scene. Our stay with Hoku was convenient and our needs were immediately addressed. I would stay again when I come back to Maui. Mahalo!
Hoku was very informative and responsive with our communication. The room was just as we expected, nice, clean, and located a few steps from the town. Great place!
We have had a enjoyable time staying Hoku's house. The room was bright, clean and comfortable. The location is the best one in Maui. It is very convenient to main visiting points and shopping mall.
Lady who welcomed us was super nice -- room was clean, and other guests were quiet and respectful :)

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929

host.about:
Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

reviews.txt:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.
Muy chulo el apartamento y muy limpio todo bien
Een heel mooi en groot appartement: ideaal om met kinderen naar toe te komen! Alles heel proper en verzorgd.

5 girls living in the apartment. It is a big place and the distance between the apartment and the city center is ok (you can walk, use metro and bus). When we arrived, all of us noticed a smell all over the apartment - like kind of moldy. This sadly affected our stay in the apartment. The bedding had the smell to, and this was bad! The sink was broken among other thinks. 
Otherwise a big apartment with a little outside teresse. 
- Camilla, Andrea, Cecilie, Kia and Heidi

Regina was communicative before we stayed in the apartment and although she couldn't meet us during our stay, had arranged for someone to do so with keys and information. It's a really nice apartment in a quiet neighbourhood.
The place is spacious located in a nice area of the city

The communication with Regina was perfect. The flat is not really close to the city center, but with metro was it without problem and we had great opportunity to see the sun rise in park guel. I am sure, we would not have this experience without staying here. Thanks.

name: Lachine room+Free parking+Airport
summary: A nice room with King size bed in a new condo, free parking, near to Montreal International airport. By car 1m get into highway 20,13,easy go to Downtown,Dorval,St-Laurent,Laval, include breakfast GYM,  summer pool,BBQ; Dinner,car service possible.

host.about: A mother and son

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Bright room in Spacious house close to Airport
summary: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You’ll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift.

host.about: Hi, I am from New Zealand, Steve is from Malta, Coby is our son. We love living here in Australia and the beach nearby is a big plus for us. Coby and I love travelling, I have been to over 50 countries and Coby to 7 (not bad for a 7 yr old!)  We love the Airbnb accomodation, doing little road trips within Australia and meeting people. Steve lives close by with his two sons and is looking forward to travelling more with us when they get older.

reviews.txt: Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Angela's place was very close to the beach, and whisper quiet from road and airport noise.

Angela keeps a beautifully kept place. It is extremely well set up for guests and very comfortable.

Coby is a real sweetie, was well behaved, and good fun.

Thanks guys for being good hosts. I would love to come back.

Angela is a great and friendly host! Had a wonderful, comfortable stay at her place. Its very clean, bed is comfortable, and the room is spacious. The room is quite with fast internet access. Very powerful hot shower, good street parking. I would definitely stay here again and caanot recommend it enough! Thank you Angela!
Very happy with my stay. Very clean and quiet. Would recommend.

Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!
Great communication, great location, clean and very well laid out. Angela and Cody were great hosts.

Angela was very accommodating. Place was very clean exactly as shown in the pictures. Neighborhood is nice and near to some restaurants. She even had some listings of take-away menu on the table.

Will definitely recommend to my friends who will visit Sydney.

It was great to meet Angela and be welcomed into her lovely home.  While it's not close to the city center (about 45 mins away via public transit), it's definitely close to the Airport (15 mins away) and the beach (5-10 min walk).  Uber or taxi is definitely the best way to reach this place from the airport though public transit can be an option if you have a lot of time.

Bring your strong arms as you have to take your luggage up to the third floor as they don't have a lift.  But, once you reach to her unit, you'll be rewarded with a great retreat.  The house is very clean and the room was spacious.  There's a big window besides the bed that brings in lots of natural light and there's even a TV in the room! Angela wasn't home the evening we stayed so we weren't able to converse more.  But all in all, my family and I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.

I am grateful to Angela for her help- I was in a rush to find a place to stay, and I am glad I found her home. She very swiftly communicated with me in regards to how to reach her home. What's more, she has a lovely, tidy, and clean home. Thank you so much for accommodating me at basically a moment's notice! Her home is not too far from the airport, which is best reached by car (I used Uber).
Very nice, clean and confortable, Angela was very nice. I did like the place.

The place is clean and cosy, I liked the  neighborhood and the bed is comfortable. You will have everything you need. Angela is a a very good host, she received us on the night quite late and was always easy to communicate with her, responsive to all my questions and give us some options to go around. You will enjoy your stay.

It was a very good stay at Angela's place. Angela was responsive and very kind to guide me the way to get to location. Place is at a good peaceful location yet with some very good views across the road. Overall a good stay!
I really enjoyed my stay at Angela's. Would strongly recommend.
Fantastic place! Location is excellent, and Angela is a great hostess. I really enjoyed staying there and would recommend it to anyone.
Angela and Coby were very accommodating and friendly. Thanks again.

name: Deniz, orman ve şehir manzaralı.
summary: 70 M2, verandalı, bahçeli müstakil konut. 1 yatak odası+salon+mutfak+banyo+teras

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Amazing NEW Food Lover Balcony, close to FIRA, MWC
summary: Set in a prized area for tapas and vermouth, you'll get the best of Barcelona and sunset views in your very own Poble Sec pad. Enjoy the cool local vibe nestled below Montjuïc and fast transport connections to beach (10 mins) and airport (30 mins). Perfectly located, close to Mobile World Congress

host.about:
Hi,

We are a very small company that is using Airbnb to share our lovely apartments with travelers and adventurers heading to Barcelona. Our  company's journey began in 2013, when we carefully selected and purchased these apartments in barrio PobleSec. Each apartment has been renovated with our own hands, with careful attention to preserving some of the original features that make Barcelona architecture, and style famous. These apartments and the PobleSec barrio will make for a perfect base, for your own Barcelona adventure. 

Barcelona is a fantastic city with a dazzling combination of beach, culture, fascinating people, architecture, unique cuisine and artisans. This is a very rewarding place to live and an exciting city to visit. There is so much to see, taste and experience.  We are excited to host your stay in Barcelona, provide recommendations and help you to have the best experience this great city has to offer!


Safe travels :)

reviews.txt: Thank you very much, Jon, for your great job, warm welcome of my co-workers Amichai and Daniel! Your apartment is situated in a comfortable place, it took them not for a long time to get Fira Gran Via . I advise this apartment especially with such good owner to everybody!

We stayed here 9 nights in April. Oscar  (the host) was great. He helped us carry our luggage to the apartment  (4th floor) and gave us plenty of Tipps and suggestions what to do during our stay. The apartment itself was nice, clean and very new. Unfortunately the recent renovation caused some inconvenience. The hallways had a strong chemical smell due to the fresh paint. Also you could still hear some construction going 0 in other parts of the building. These initial problems are likely to be sorted out soon, but as of now i can only give it 4 star. Overall we had a great time in Barcelona.
We loved our stay at John and Oscars apartment. The apartment was very clean, modern and had a great location. We would stay again if returning to Barcelona.

Jon's apartment is situated in a location where attractions are at a walkable distance, and lots of eateries nearby. The place is bright and comfortable, and his recommendations are totally spot on! I also appreciate that he allowed us to check out at a later timing due to our late flight. I totally would recommend this apartment :)

First of all, we have to say that Jon is a very friendly host. We had a late check-in and he waited for our appearance late at night. He gave us a lot of interesting and worth seeing tips for locations, bars and restaurants to visit. We could change our check-out in the last day of our stay without problems. Jon arranged this in an uncomplicated manner.

The flat is very nice and functional furnished. All equipment is very new. The beds have comfortable mattresses in which we could sleep very well. In striking distance you will find bars and shops frequented by residents. Even the view from the small balcony over the roofs of Barcelona is a visit worth. A breath-taking view in Barcelona’s real life!

We recommend this apartment without retention and will rent it again for our next stay in this unique town. Thanks, Jon, for making our stay in Barcelona unforgettable!

Kindest regards from Switzerland
Ivan & Nadine

Nice apartment in good area, apartment is at the back of the block so no street noise and the balcony off the living gets sun late afternoon/early evening.
Easy check in and check out.

Nice place in The center of Barcelona. Mira mar is less than 3 mins walk and you can see the best view of The city.
Good flat and Jon is a fantastic person,
Thank you

Great communication from the start - and host made us feel very welcome on arrival. Local points of interest, restaurants and bars where all pointed out. The place was exactly as it appears in the listing - very clean and new fittings, which kept noise out too. Location is as good as expected. We had a great stay and the host was brilliant.

Great apartment, nice location (close to the old city but away from the busy streets!)  and most importantly great recommendations for very good places to eat (Jon provided a list of recommendations and we loved every single one we went to!). We had a great long weekend break!

We had a great time in Barcelona. The place is extremely nice and comfortable and Jon made us feel really welcome. He was always available when we had a problem (one morning we broke a plug and blew a fuse...). We can fully recommend staying there!
Ditte and Nathalie

The apartment is lovely and in a great location; it was easy to get to/from everywhere we wanted and close to some excellent pinchos bars. Jon's recommendations were spot on, especially for paella. He was such a great host and always got back to us straight away. Thanks Jon! We'd love to come back again.
We stay one week in this apartment and everything was exactely how you can see in the pictures. Nice location and nice furnitures. Jon is very kind and always available!
Clean and modern place. Easy communication. Convenient location. Recommended.

The flat is lovely - very clean, spacious and tastefully decorated. The location is convenient - within walking distance to a number of great restaurants and bars, and about a 15 minute walk from the airport shuttle bus. Jon and his niece Olivia were fantastic hosts, very welcoming and helpful, and Jon's recommendations for places to go in the area (particularly for paella, tapas and vermouth) were great. We had a lovely time staying in the flat, and would highly recommend to others looking to have a holiday in Barcelona. Thank you!

We had a fantastic stay at the apartment. Nice and simply renovated with everything you need to have a comfortable stay.
