My stay was very short as I was heading to the airport, and it's a relatively easy walk to the airport if you don't have too much luggage. Otherwise, it's an inexpensive taxi ride or short bus trip to the airport, which works just as well. Would definitely try to stay here again if I'm ever in the area again.
It was one of the best places that I have stayed in and I couldn't have asked for a better place and shuang was a wonderful host

The flat was very modern and we'll equipped, I only stayed for one night but it was a pleasant experience. Only downside was the bathroom wasn't that clean, maybe due to sharing with another airbnb guest, because the room was spotless. Thanks for having me to stay!

We stayed just for a short night but enjoyed our stay.
Very clean, tidy and modern apartment. A few minutes from the airport, around 15$ by taxi.
Thanks again
Very nice stay.  Shuang's room allows you to go in and out on your own schedule and is perfect for short or overnight stays.  Highly recommended!
Shuang's place was convenient, clean and tidy. We enjoyed our stay. Thanks, Shuang!

My girlfriend and I had an okay stay. the bed was clean and comfortable but there was no heat and Sydney was pretty chilly at night (~15C). everything was newly renovated but we still felt uncomfortable using the appliances.

name: 1Great location, calm cozy room w/ backyard-garden
summary: This cozy room in a greatly located apartment will open the doors for you to live in Montreal and experience all it has to offer, while at the same time enjoying a living space you can call home! We can't wait to have you here!

host.about:
Hi! My name is Ilam :)
I'm a student in communication, I also work at a café-resto, I love reading, painting, music, dancing (when no one sees me) cooking and eating, laughing, movies, talking and simply sharing life with others! 
I live with my boyfriend Fred who studies environmental science and is also a certified cabinet maker. We love sharing experiences and knowledge, we have hosted a great many people and have thus made our home a fun and harmonious  environment to be in!

reviews.txt: This was a great place to stay.  The location was in a nice neighborhood and transit was easily accessible.  Ila and Fred were exceptional hosts.  They are booth kind and accepting people who made me feel welcome from the moment I arrived.

name: Cute apt in artist's home
summary: We are renting a private basement apartment in our home. The apartment space is totally private, nothing shared. It has a separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchenette with mini fridge and coffee maker (there is no stove for cooking).  You will have use of a hair dryer. There are small windows in the bedroom and kitchenette area. The bathroom and kitchenette are all newly built. Full size bed sleeps 2 people. We cannot accommodate more than 2 people, sorry!

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: While my wife Silvia and I have managed our airbnb rentals for several years together, I will now be the main contact in order to give her a break. So here is a little about me. I'm a metal sculptor, assemblage artist with a degree in Biochemistry, I love to make art, surf and play with my two young kids, eat good food and travel. But now that I'm a Dad, I don't  travel as much, so I let we the travelers come to me. The kids and I love going to the beach at Rockaway, art openings and going to cafes. You might spot my kids and I racing down the sidewalks in Bushwick on our skateboards.

reviews.txt: We really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was nice and clean.  It was nice to have a little more space to settle into since we were staying for five days.  Silvia was very helpful and able to recommend great places to eat and visit.  The location is great as it is in a fun neighborhood and an easy ride to the city.

Silvia was a great host.  She provides a map of the Bushwick area and is very knowledgeable concerning the neighborhood.  She's always around in case of emergencies but leaves you alone to do your thing.  Would rent again.

We had a great time in New York.  Thanks for putting us up Sylvia!  The apartment is cute, and as advertised and access to the L and JMZ was very convenient.  Sylvia provided us a great map of local things to do--we only wish we had more time to enjoy everything.  Tea each night, a little light reading from "Broken Land" and the comfortable accommodations were the perfect respite after long days of sightseeing. We'd stay there again!

We stayed six nights and I would not choose it again. The apartment really is in the basement, it is pretty dark, you never know what the weather is like until you leave the house, the concrete floors make the apartment uncomfortable (bring slippers), there is no closet to hang-up your clothes and I found the place smaller than it appears on the pictures. We did not enjoy staying there. Silvia is very nice and helpful.

The accommodation was exactly as described. Really conveniently located to several different subways line stations which makes getting around really easy. Bushwick is a really interesting and safe place that Sylvia is lucky enough to call home and that my partner and I were lucky to call home for just over 2 weeks. There were hangers for coats etc and a large chest of drawers for other clothes. The place was really well heated. Sylvia & Ty were extremely helpful and gave us an insight into the local happenings. We would definitely stay here again.
We enjoyed our stay very much. Silvia was very responsive and helpful, the bed was comfy. Thanks!

We had a great time in Silvia's cute basement apartment.  The space is small but cozy, and the neighborhood is colorful and convenient to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Silvia provided us with a map of restaurants, shops and art galleries in the neighborhood, and she even gave us directions over the phone when we got lost trying to find the Brooklyn Flea.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay with Silvia again.

We stayed at Silvia's place for a weekend, she was very kind and responsive. The basement is cute and has a character. We didn't spend much time exploring the area, but there are plenty of choices for food and drinks and Silvia has prepared a list of them.  
Thank you Silvia.

I had a Wonderful stay!!!
Very sweet people who I like alot!!!
This was a great way to have meet 2 wonderful new friends!!
Thanks again!!!
Crews

Staying with Silvia was very nice.  I felt quite comfortable and safe.  The apartment was very clean and nicely furnished.  We didn't have a chance to spend time with Silvia and her husband, but they were very welcoming and Silvia gave us lots of tips for things to do in the area.  I would stay there again for sure.

My girlfriend and I had a very pleasant stay at Silvia's.  All of my expectations were met or exceeded.

She was friendly and helpful - available if we needed anything but also gave us privacy.  

The place was cozy and clean.  There was no air conditioning downstairs, but there are windows near the ceiling that can be opened for fresh air. 

I would definitely consider staying with Silvia again.  Thank you!

Silvia was very nice, as was her apartment. I will say that Bushwick has an edgy-ness that was a bit surprising at first but when you look a little closer there is a lot to love. I had an amazing time in the area and Sivila's apt was very central.

Thank you Silvia!

Keith

Just one word to describe my bnb experience with Silvia: Easy! From the beginning, she was available and friendly. The place is fairly close to Manhattan (15min metro distance) and safer than it looks at the first sight. I have slept like a baby. I would have liked to stay longer. Thanks Silvia!
I truly ejoyed my stay. Silvia gave me my privacy and the apt was well kept. If I had to come back I would not mind staying there. I recommend her.
We had a great stay at Silvia's! She's a gracious host, and the place was clean and cozy, thanks!

Hi, I stayed at Silvia's place in Brooklyn, it was great. I had never done a airbnb stay before and the place met all our needs. The water pipes were a tad loud at night, but I am a light sleeper. She also has a very cute daughter. Thanks Silvia! I will be sure to stay again next time.

Cosy, comfortable and convenient. The place is small, but private and quiet (well, very little street noise but bring earplugs if you're a light sleeper because of the pipes). Close to both the L and the M so very easy to get in or out of midtown or downtown Manhattan, or hipster Williamsburg, etc. A very good find, and we're thankful to Silvia for hosting us!

This basement apartment is exactly as it appears in the pictures. The place was clean and private with fully functioning facilities. Silvia was a great host to me and my boyfriend and was available before and during our stay to answer any questions or concerns. She was really helpful getting us acquainted with the area and provided a map of all the nearby restaurants and attractions. I highly recommend this place for a single person or a couple who seeks an affordable, private place in a cool, diverse, Brooklyn neighborhood.

Silvia was a gracious host, very easy to work with.  The apartment was clean and private. The hot shower was a blessing after long days of trekking around Manhattan and Brooklyn.  The only problem we had was with the neighborhood.  We heard a terrible street fight late on Saturday night, and we didn't feel very comfortable exploring the area during the day.  Other than that, I would recommend Silvia's place if you are looking to stay around the Brooklyn area.
Great place in a very convenient location. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Particularly pleasant on really hot days because it stays very cool. Hope to stay again next time I am in Brooklyn.

name: Central apartment in Almada street
summary: Cozy, restored very central apartment in Porto's heart. .free wi-fi.  .Very central: walking distance from main touristic points .2min walk from "Aliados "metro station .Big public parking just across the road with special price agreement

reviews.txt:
Rosa's friend Phillip met me at the apartment and was super friendly and went out of his way to tell me where I should eat,sites to visit and even a little history on Porto. Very nice guy.  
The apartment was in a prime location and was very clean with all amenities. The apartment was so lovely as it had the classic windows with the large wooden doors that you can close to eliminate street noise. The old classic tram goes by the apartment. I loved seeing it.  Basically everything is within walking distance and the apartment is located in an ideal location
I loved staying here and would gladly come back

Rosa's apartment is super-centrally located, and in close proximity to everything you could want from Porto, both eating, drinking, public transport (both buses and Metro), sights, tours etc.

I have only good things to say about Rosa and the way she handled my stay, and her friend provided me with some good pointers when I arrived (quite late) on the first night.

One thing -- if you like to keep some windows open at night and you are super-sensitive to noise, there is some traffic in the streets outside, but for me it was not a problem.

We had such a great stay at Rosa's place! Her friend was very welcoming and gave us nice tips for exploring beautiful Porto. 
The location was more than perfect- main attractions, bars, restaurants and supermarkets are just a few steps away. The apartment itself is situated in an old lovely building and nothing was missing inside. Street noise can be easily reduced with closing the wooden shutters :) 
We were very happy choosing this flat and we can truly recommend it!
Very pleasant stay, I would happily come back!

Rosa's apartment is lovely - really well located, well equipped and very comfortable. Easy to find and Flavia welcomed us well and showed us all the great places to visit. It's a bit noisy as on a main road but nothing some earplugs won't fix. Well recommended!
Rosa's apartment is in a perfect location! Also, we traveled wirh our infant son, and she provided a crib. We did not meet Rosa, but her friend Silvia warmly greeted us and gave us some great tips!

The apartment itself is small but perfect for 2. It gets a little noisy because the road in front of the building is constantly busy. But we enjoyed staying here because it's so accessible to everywhere! Fairly easy to locate too. Warning though, the water of the toilet isn't strong so.... It's not easy trying to flush some things :/

De verhuurder was flexibel met het inchecken. Doordat mijn verwachte aankomst tijd onzeker was, was dit al een fijn welkom. Het welkom was zeer hartelijk en voelde als thuis komen bij familie. Op de plattegrond van Porto had de verhuurder aangegeven wat de plekken zijn die het bezoeken waard zijn (ook de niet toeristische plekken). Hiermee heeft de verhuurder mij in korte tijd mij wegwijs gemaakt in Porto. 

Naast een geweldig gezellig appartement in het hart van Porto was de service helemaal super.

name: Roof Top Terrace
summary: Roof top of a wooden house, with city view balcony, the apartment is very appropriate for singles/couple travellers. You have kitchen and bathroom inside. Towels & linens are provided.

host.about: Zenka Rooms is on service its customers since 2010

reviews.txt: The flat is nice with a fancy balcony/terrace, it was great, I would definitely recommend it
Everything was perfect, strongly recommended
Sessiz, temiz ve merkezi tavsiye ederim

Really nice and clean loft apartment. Not for the tall or those who dont like stairs. It was perfect for our 1 night stay in Istanbul. The location was perfect for us and despite being so tiny, the place still felt very roomy. Would definitely stay here again.
The perfect location to explore the wonders of Istanbul. Not fir tall people though as the rooms go with the slope of the roof.
Zenka is very helpful and the place is very nice.

We loved this cozy little apartment, the balcony we had breakfast at every morning! It may not be suitable for tall people though, the ceiling is a bit low but otherwise we enjoyed the place and the neighborhood!
Nice, clean, cozy appartement and an amazing view from the terrace. Thanks.

The place is cozy and sweet, very clean, in the center of cihangir which is really cool for young people!
The ceiling is low, so you have to be ready to take care of your heads!
communication with the host wasn't there. The view make the apartment.

Make sure you are in communication with Zenka rooms prior to your check in date. After waiting at the address given for nearly two hours, we then heard from them for the first time and were told to go to a nearby restaurant to get the keys for the apartment. No WiFi for the duration of our stay, they did attempt to solve the issue with no luck. Also not a full kitchen if you need that, only a sink counter and fridge. Besides that the apartment is great, clean, beautiful terrace for relaxing on an evening. Not advisable for tall people! Thank you.
Thx!

Overall I am pleased with my stay.  The Cihangir neighborhood is lively and comfortable, one of Istanbul's remaining secular outposts.  When I checked in there was an issue with the apartment I booked - the host was quick to acknowledge her mistake and allow me to stay in another room in the building for the night.  As other reviewers have written - as this is an attic apartment, the floors in the bedrooms and bathroom are sloped, making it difficult to maneuver comfortably.  The bedrooms also get quite stuffy.  It would also be helpful for future guests to know that you will need to pick up the keys from the neighboring restaurant, Otto Cihangir.
Real nice place in central Istanbul. Not loud and with air con. Only thing, the roof is low, quite a problem for tall people.
We had a great time whilst there and all the staff at the bar below were very affable. Nice view of Istanbul at the balcony. I would stay there again.
It's very good flat for some short people, great location, great value for money.

name: Copacabana Apartment Posto 6
summary: The Apartment has a living room, toilet, bedroom (suite) and American kitchen. Well located, on the Copacabana beach block a 05 Min. walk from Ipanema beach (Arpoador). Internet wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room, kitchen with microwave, cooker, Blender, dishes, cutlery and service area with fridge, washing machine, clothesline for drying clothes and closet with several utensils for use.  The property boasts 45 m2.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Professora de Educação Física formada pela universidade Gama Filho.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Perfect location for Rio,very secure & very close to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, the apartment is clean and very comfortable, all the equipment are included.
The host Ana its so nice, it was always available for us to help us for anything in the city, I would definitely recommend her place and i will stay there again if I have the chance !

I had an amazing time at Valeria's flat. 
The flat is great!!! Very very clean.
The location is perfect!
And on top of everything Valeria and her husband are fantastic host.
I highly recommend it.

Local muito agradavel proximo do Mercado Zona Sul - padaria e comercio. Localizado a 1 quadra da praia. Ambiente agradavel host bem prestativa e muito educada. Recomendo a todos que queiram conhecer melhor o Rio!
Excelente anfitrion siempre estuvo pendiente de lo que necesitabamos. El departamento es muy comodo limpio, y muy bien ubicado.

todo fue como estaba en la descripcion, inclusive tanto en toallas como ropa de cama habia de mas para cambiar, muy satisfecho por todo, ubicasion, internet, tv, comodidades y la atencion de ana, que estuvo siempre dispuesta a atendernos, inclusive dejando un celular para urgencias, colmo nuestras espectatibas

The location is perfect, ideal and safe walking distance to Ipanema and Copacabana, including Arpoador just 800 metres away; cheap for Uber to nearby attractions too. I even walked to Leblon from there in under 40 minutes. 

The hosts met me up front and helped me with my luggage. They don't speak English, but are very charming and helpful, so we communicated via (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate, using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The building is slightly older. One day there was no water in the building due to maintenance. The hosts warned me about this, there was nothing they could do and I was prepared. Only issue is that after the water came back, because of the older pipes, it was brown for a little while, just have to let the taps run for several minutes. 

The bed isn't the most comfortable for an extended stay (I was there for eight nights), but for short durations it's fine. 

There is a washing machine in the apartment, it works great, I dried my clothes by hanging them on chairs, hooks, etc. 

The WiFi is strong and reliable. 

There is a grocery store and a couple of reasonably priced restaurants on the block, as well as two different banks. Excellent for visitors. A drug store is also available on the next block at the corner. 

Overall the inconveniences were small and the positives of this location was great.

Ana and Jose were wonderful hosts.  They were there when we arrived and showed us everything.  They provided a cell phone for us to use to be in contact with them and were very patient with our lack of technological experience. They were always helpful and accommodating. The apt. was very comfortable and convenient.  I highly recommend this place.  Ana speaks Portuguese and understands Spanish.  If you speak English, she has friends who can help with the translation.

Ana is an amazing host, she was very accommodating with check-in time and was very easily reached with any problems, even though none transpired. The apartment is about 1.5 blocks away from the beach with banks, restaurants, and a super market within a 10 minute walk. Would highly recommend staying with Ana to anybody wanting to see Rio.
Era como estaba en el anuncio de airbnb

name: Charming apartment in Santa Teresa
summary: Recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment in the bohemian neighbourhood of Santa Teresa in Rio de Janeiro. This airy and light apartment is close to many trendy bars, restaurants and cafes and has a supermarket 5 minutes walk away.

host.about: I am a Brazilian/Italian national who has lived in London for the last 30 years. I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and Spanish fluently and like the rest of the world, I love travelling and meeting people from different parts of the world. Other interests include foreign film, reading, astrology and working out (pilates and yoga).

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Fantastic, spacious, warm, comfortable and centrally located apartment.  With excellent bars and cafes just around the corner, we loved the location.  A short easy stroll to the main restaurant area and tourist shops. We didn't use the local supermarket as purchased stuff down by the metro and took a taxi up the hill.  The photos are very good and show just what the apartment is like.  Branca and Tereza were very helpful and responsive to questions.  Would definitely stay again if we ever get the chance.  Thank you.

Branca's flat is great! It's in a wonderful around up in the Bohemian neighborhood of Santa Teresa. We were there during carnival- it had great proximity to the blocos without being right in them. The flat had plenty of space and Branca and Wanderley made sure we had everything we needed at all times. Would recommend 100%!!

Branca's apartment is very well located in charming Santa Teresa, with incredible views of the city. Everything is very clean and well-organized. Wanderley, the apartment manager, is super friendly and responsive. He sat down with me at check-in and helped orient me on the map. We had a lovely time here and would certainly come back!
El mejor apartamento en el mejor barrio administrados por los mejores anfitriones. Todo 10 puntos!

name: Room in apartment with beautiful view, in Botafogo
summary: Large apartment, comfortable room with TV. Separate bathrooms, but complete. TV room. Beautiful views of Guanabara Bay. A place near malls and easy transportation by both bus and taxi. Bakery close by. Next to the bakery called "Pão de Açúcar."

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Uma das coisas mais importantes para nós são as boas relações humanas. Receber um hóspede nos da oportunidade de conhecermos novas idéias, culturas,trocarmos experiências e fazermos a vida melhor com bons e agradáveis relacionamentos. Gostaria que amassem o Rio de Janeiro como eu. com seus defeitos, qualidades e belezas. E isto começa pela minha casa. Desejo que a estadia comigo, reflita todo o carinho que tenho pela cidade e pelos que a visitam.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I had a great time with Ida, she is a lovely host and the room was nice, quiet, very clean and cozy. The location is also great and the view, wow! Amazing! I recommend staying with Ida at anytime.

La estadia en la casa de Ida la cual cabe mencionar es super espaciosa y de muy buen gusto, es el lugar ideal para hospedarse si uno quiere explorar la ciudad de Rio de Janeiro, ubicada en un punto central y con una vista desde su sala a la bahia excelente. Ademas de que a unos pocos minutos a pie se encuentra la playa de Copacabana, la estacion de metro y un centro comercial. Por otra parte debo hacer especial mencion a la predisposicion de Ida, para aportar la informacion necesaria ya sea para movilizarse en la ciudad, que lugares visitar o bien evacuando dudas o problemas que puedan presentarse. Recomendable 100 % sin ningun tipo de objecion. La estadia en Rio de Janeiro supero mis expectativas gracias a su colaboracion...

Memorable staying. Ida's place was Very clean and tidy and good view from the house. You can see the sugar loaf. Ida really looks after me while i was staying in her house. She was like my mum in Brazil. I felt safe and secured.
Muito bom, fui bem recebida, ambiente limpo e aconchegante com total (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.

name: 2 BR Oceanview - Great Location!
summary: Location, location, location... This is a great 2 bed, 2 bath condo is within walking distance to fabulous restaurants, all kinds of shopping, and even the grocery store.  Simply walk across the street to the beach for swimming, surfing & kayaking.

reviews.txt:
The perfect spot for a surfer to land as The Cove is directly across the street and checking the surf from the room with a cup of coffee was the early morning ritual :) Awesome backyard with pool and shower area. A most enjoyable walk to great food like Kihei Cafe for breaky and South Maui Fish Company Food Truck for the best fish tacos. 

Comfortable beds with plenty of pillows, lots of beach necessities in unit, and easy parking make this a perfect spot for families or a couple like us. 

Jennifer was easy to work with and very responsive and accommodating! Will be back for sure!

Jennifer was available and helpful. She did what she said she'd do. The space is in one of the best spots in Kihei! Couldn't get any better as far as location goes..if you're wanting to enjoy sunsets on the ocean, a little pool right outside your door, walking to the ocean, surfing, great food, and the beauty of this area, this spot is an affordable little gem.

Jennifer was a great, accommodating host.  She assisted with early check-in since nobody was staying the evening before!  She also allowed us to have our privacy, though remained in close contact via text throughout my 4-day stay.  She does live above the apartment (a separate entrance entirely) so it's possible to have her help easily.

I was pleased with the location directly across the street from the water (not a swimming beach but a couple-minute drive to several great sandy beaches).  Fine food options nearby.  I recommend Joy's Place around the corner for smoothies or an acai bowl.  And I recommend the awesome poke truck two blocks over for great fish!

Jennifer's place was perfect for my family vacation.  This 2BR with pool and yard is nice, and across the road from a local surf spot.  We rented longboards one day and SUPs from the surf shop next door.  The patio was quite enjoyable to eat our meals.  She has a well stocked kitchen.  Jennifer was responsive to my questions, and was helpful suggesting a late night restaurant, Zippy's, for our evening arrival.
The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Overall, Jennifer was a good host.  She responded to everything and does actually live close by (a good thing too, because the door code wasn't working when we arrived, but it was quickly addressed).  She was also helpful in giving us a bit of extra time for check-out.

Just to say a couple things about the actual condo, the pictures do portray it in the best possible light.  Nothing deceptive, but there are elements that could use updating that are not shown.  The bathrooms need some TLC and there are lots of wires and cords everywhere (especially the bedrooms).  Everything else was clean and safe.  The kitchen is up-to-date with every appliance you should need, including a blender and toaster.  There is a newer washer and dryer right in the unit, which is very convenient.  We didn't use the TVs, but there are 3 of them - one in the main living room and one in each bedroom.  Parking was very convenient - a reserved spot that's just steps away from the ground level entrance (the condo is on the ground level and doesn't have any stairs).  There are several beach accessories waiting as well - a cooler, beach chairs and boogie boards are there for your use, along with plenty of beach towels.  There are 3 AC units and all of them worked, but they are noisy.

The noise level outside was generally good.  There were a few inconsiderate very early morning departures from other units, but nothing major.  The park across the road closes at 8pm, so there was no late-night noise to speak of.

The location in general is great.  The park across the road is not a swimming beach (no sand, too many rocks), but it's very popular for surfing and paddleboarding lessons.  There are several sandy beaches just a short drive (or healthy walk) away.  Kihei in general is a great spot to stay, as it's near several  great beaches (Big Beach in Makena is epic) and is central to a lot of things you'll want to see - the upscale Wailea area is just a short drive away and several other destinations are easily driveable from Kihei.  There are lots of food choices close by and many of them offer some of the best value you'll find in Maui.  There's also 2 supermarkets right down the road (and Foodland is open until 1am).

To summarize, the condo was more "rustic" than we were expecting, but I will say that in the area, you'd likely have to pay a bit more for something more updated that has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
Wonderful host great location

Jennifer's place has everything you need in the perfect location. It was my first time in Maui, & I absolutely enjoyed it. Jennifer's place was literally right across the street from Kalama Beach Park & a very short walk (~10 min.) from Charley Young Beach. Her place is very centrally located in Kihei: directly next to the surf/paddleboard rental, 5 min. walking distance from a shopping village, & in the middle of the island, which is nice if you plan on doing the drives to Mt. Haleakala or the Road to Hana. Safeway is a short ~5 min. drive & Costco & the airport are a ~30 minute drive away. Her place has everything you need: kitchen, washer/dryer, beach towels/chairs, nice outdoor patio with a nice, small pool. I highly recommend her place if you want a quiet, quaint, peaceful place to relax where everything you need is a short distance away. Jennifer was also very prompt in her responses and very easy to get a hold of. Thanks again for everything, Jennifer!!! My family & I loved everything about our stay at your place.

We had a fabulous stay. The condo is in a great location with amazing view of sunset across the road, which you can enjoy from the pool and short 10 min walk to a very nice beach. The apartment is spacious and kitchen was well equipped. Jennifer was a very nice host! We will definitely stay again.

This condo is in a great place in Kihei next to great beaches, shopping, restaurants and a grocery store. Jennifer was an outstanding host and worked diligently to help solve some credit card issues prevent us from booking. Compared to other condos in this area this is a great deal even if it is a tad dated. We would highly recommend this place to anyone staying in the kehei area of Maui!
We loved this location, close to several beautiful beaches, shops and farmers market.  Jennifer was always available to answer questions and concerns.  House is well equipped for our family of five.

This condo is in the perfect location and has a lot of space for the price. Loved having two bedrooms and 1 1/2 baths. The pool area is beautiful and you are right across the street from the ocean. The condo is slightly outdated, but it doesn’t affect the overall experience of being in Maui. Washing machine and dryer were a huge plus.
Awesome location. Very easy and straight forward checkin please process. The host was very easy to communicate and always respond very quickly.
Everything was as expected. Pool was quite small but who needs that when you have wonderful beaches close by. Great place to stay overall!
Great location, amenities, and responsiveness by the host. Whether you want to explore or relax, you have it all available here.
Nice, clean and well stocked place. GREAT LOCATION.

name: UWS Brownstone Near Central Park
summary: This spacious one bedroom apartment has a bonus space with two extra beds as well as a fold out sofa.  Close to the park, the subway, museums and restaurants.  This apartment is the perfect quiet getaway in the middle of Manhattan.

host.about: We live in San Francisco and spend time in New York as well.  We also have another place in Northern California in the country we spend time at.  I'm a private pilot and Paul is quite an accomplished ceramicist, though he does non-profit management consulting by profession. I run a retreat center ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) and am a computer consultant some of the time and real estate investor other times.  We have a cat who stays at our house here in San Francisco when we travel.  She is very, very affectionate and easy to care for.

reviews.txt: We stayed in the brownstone for 4 nights and had a lovely time.  The apartment was spacious enough for us (a family of four) and the location was amazing.  You are steps to Central Park and to the 86th subway.  There are wonderful restaurants and shopping nearby if you need that but the small kitchen is fine for quick snacks and breakfast.  It was especially nice to sit on the little patio to eat my toast and tea and even with the NYC humming around you it is lovely to have an outdoor space.  Chas answered all my many questions with great patience and care...he really wanted us to have a wonderful time and went beyond the call of duty by even sending us links to good places to watch big soccer matches.  The apartment was clean when we arrived and had the basic things we needed such as towels and extra sheets.  While not the cheapest option on BNB it gave us all a wonderful bed to sleep in, space to spread out in when needed, and a fantastic location!  We even found street parking for the full 5 days!  Picking up the keys was a breeze and we left a few basic things for the next guests to enjoy from the corner store.   It is a gorgeous street to stay on and felt very safe. Thank you so much Chas!  We hope to return one day soon.

Our stay in New York at this apartment was vastly superior to staying at a hotel.  The location is perfect particularly for those wanting access to Central Park and the museum mile (Guggenheim etc) but it was also a revelation to explore that end of Broadway.  The apartment is lovely and has everything.  We especially appreciated the study nook and ability to use our laptop with wifi access and the well equipped kitchen for easy prep for meals (and deli close by makes it so easy to stock up).  The lounge, bedroom and bathroom are all in good, comfortable condition.  The little balconies and view of the courtyard topped it off.  A great experience and thoroughly recommend.

After a small glitch with the house keys, which was straightened out straight away, our stay was perfect. The apartment is lovely, in a great neighborhood and right by the subway. Even my husband. who is very picky, gave it a two thumbs up ! Our hosts were attentive and gracious over the emails and the whole thing was easy and pleasant. We'd definitaly book again.

It's hard to imagine a more authentic and enjoyable NYC experience than the one we had staying in this UWS apartment. There are so many details -- from the art on the walls to the spices in the kitchen -- that make it feel like a home away from home. The apartment is small but imminently comfortable with high ceilings and patios that make it feel spacious. The unit is off the street (on a courtyard)  so it was very quiet (that  and the comfortable bed made for great nights of sleeping). It's a beautiful street, just off Central Park and just around the corner from the subway. There are abundant restaurants within a 5 minute walk and the best coffee in NY (Joe's) is only about two blocks away. Chas was a great host who was quick to answer all our questions and make our stay as enjoyable as possible. We had our two sons with us (ages 10 and 12) and the living arrangements were ideal for a family our size. Thanks, Chas!

We just spent Christmas week at the apartment with our two daughters (aged 2.5 and 1). The space was well stocked and furnished and the location was perfect. It's not a huge apartment but the lofted ceilings give it a nice, open feel. Central Park, the subway, a convenience store, a wine store, and Starbucks are all within a block or two. When I first booked the reservation I was unsure about the process to get the keys, but it turns out I had no reason to be worried whatsoever. It was very easy and worked out well. Chas answered questions promptly and is a great host. We hope to be back soon!

A great experience - Chas was a good communicator so picking up the key went exactly as planned (a good thing for a first timer!), the apartment was just what we needed and the location (and quiet street) really were fabulous.

I don't think we could of asked for the most perfect spot to stay at while visiting NYC. This home is close to everything we wanted to experience while being in the city.... the park, museums, great places to eat at, major subway lines to take you to midtown and lower Manhattan, etc, etc,.  The apartment was so nice, quiet, comfortable, and cool to come back to after being out and about ( we had a couple of days during our stay where it was very warm ) and that was a plus !  Both Paul and Chas were quickly responsive and accommodating to any questions or needs we had. All in all, if you really want to get a great NYC experience, this beautiful UWS retreat is the way to go.  Thank you Chas and Paul !!

My Mum and I recently spent 11 nights at Chas' Upper West Side apartment. We had not used AirBnB before, but the whole process ran very smoothly. Both Chas and Paul were quick at answering emails and provided us with plenty of information re local grocery shops etc. The pick-up of the keys was also very simple. 
The apartment is in a great location, half a block from Central Park and close to several subway lines. Only up one flight of stairs, which was good because there are no lifts! 
The apartment was very well equipped with everything you need for a stay away from home - bedding, towels, full kitchen etc. It was a bit smaller than it appears in the photos and could do with a lick of paint, but was very clean and had plenty of storage. Also, keep in mind that the beds in the loft may provide a bit of a problem for some guests - definitely best for kids. 
Overall, we had a great time at Chas' apartment and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to visit New York!
We had a great time in the apartment! Location was great with just steps to Central Park and the subway right around the corner. Would stay here again for sure! Thanks!

Our stay in the apartment on 87th St was really wonderful. The neighborhood was cosy and felt safe, the subway was only steps away and it was close both to the park and to the shops and restaurants on Amsterdam and Broadway. It couldn't have been better. The apartment itself was nice and roomy for being in New York, and had everything we needed. The kitchen was small but well equipped and the beds were comfortable. Chas was very helpful and answered all our questions very quickly. Overall, it was a really wonderful stay!

We're grateful to Chas and Paul being were flexible and accommodating with our arrival / departure times and our queries over the first day or so.  
The description and pictures were accurate and the apartment was well-maintained and very neat and clean.  The mezzanine floor is best suited for storage or sleeping arrangements for children or understanding teens or adults.
The upper West Side felt very safe at all times and the apartment was on the same block for the subway stops for B and C trains and a short walk to restaurants / cafes on Columbus and Amsterdam.  Overall, the apartment offered a genuine feeling of how it would be to live as a New Yorker, rather than a hotel tourist.  Highly recommended.
The reservation was canceled 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We felt like home during a wonderful week in October. I have been to NY repeatedly and I was always reluctant to return because of the hotels which I didn't like at all. Now there is a reason to come back again: the cozy apartment, the lovely neighborhood, close to Central Park and subway made our stay just perfect. Thank you very much!
Clean well maintained apartment in an excellent location. Good restaurants close by and subway one block away.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment was perfect for my first visit to New York and as a first-time Airbnb user. Chas was always quick to respond and very helpful. The images of the apartment are accurate and the Upper West Side area was great - close to Central Park, a heap of stores and restaurants, away from the noise. The first floor does have a low ceiling which is ideal for smaller children. The apartment was always warm so it was a treat to come back home after a long day out in the cold. Would definitely consider staying here again.

Mil gracias Chas por dejarnos compartir tu hermoso apto. Nos hemos sentido como en casa. Muy comodo y confortable, con todo lo necesario para sentirse a gusto. A pesar de las extremas temperaturas que nos tocaron, la calefaccion estuvo excelente. Y una mension especial a la ubicacion, a pasos del Central Park y al Subway. Esta demas decir que volveremos siempre y cuando no permitan. Nos sentimos unos perfectos Neoyorquinos!!!!

The apartment was exactly how we imagined it to be: cosy, but spacious by New York standards. The heating is excellent and the building is very quiet with almost no ambient noise whatsoever; again, a rarity in New York. The apartment is located in a beautiful street lined with old Brownstones, so would be perfect for those who prefer a genteel New York neighbourhood rather than an urban, grungy one. It is located a few minutes' walk from the subway and a block back from Central Park. Great spot, and the owners were easy to arrange accommodation with.
Our host was wonderful.  Everything was easy, the apartment was beautiful and the location is perfect.  We LOVED it.
A perfect spot 1 minute walk to Central Park and underground!! Highly recommended!! The location is very quite!!

name: Renovated Modern Apartment with Cathedral Views
summary: Sit with an espresso in the extensive open living space and take in the city through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. The quiet, sunny flat boasts modern furnishings and sits on the corner of the building with cathedral views.

reviews.txt: Sophie was an amazing guest. We were her first guests ever and her apartment in Barcelona could not have been any better. It was very clean and in a great location. She was incredibly flexible with check in and check out times. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.

A generous and warm welcome from Sophie. The apartment is newly furnished and decorated, light and airy, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen is well-equipped (even a Nespresso machine!) and beds very comfortable. It has some great views of the old city and is perfectly situated for exploring Barcelona - if only we had stayed longer!  Next time...

Sophie was very quick with responding and made us feel very welcome. The appartement was fantastic: bright and sunny, very clean and complete. Good beds, enough towels, nice kitchen. Very nice for us, a family with 3 children. The locating was also very good: close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia. Nice neighbourhood with lots of shops and nice small parks.

Sophie was an impeccable host, and her apartment is by far the nicest I've ever stayed in in Barcelona. It's large, light, well equipped, beautifully decorated and very well located. Sophie also went the extra mile, ensuring that the apartment had a cot and high chair for a our son, and even letting us take the travel cot with us for a couple of nights, as we still needed it. Such amazing hosting! Highly recommended.
Sophie's apartment was a lovely spacious and very clean place with great soft towels! Perfectly situated for walking to the Sagrada and with metro stops nearby a good base for exploring Barcelona.
The place was very nice. Spacious and it had all the things we needed in an apartment. Definitely somewhere I wanna stay again

The first thing to note about this apartment is just how impressive it is on first entry. The current photos really do not do it justice. It’s large, filled with sunlight in the day and extremely comfortable. Sophie has decorated it tastefully and with a lot of thought, providing a lovely selection of art and deign oriented coffee table books for you to peruse. 

Location wise it’s perfect, being a 5 min walk from the Sagrada Familia and there are a number of nice bars and restaurants in the direct vicinity of the apartment. It is also within easy reach of two central metro lines although we never once used public transport instead opting to rent bikes from a nearby rental shop (Barcelona is simply one of the best cities to ride in with you pretty much never having having to ride on the road ever!). In any case the main sites of the city are all within easy reach on foot. Its’s a 20 min walk to Place de Catalunya and Gothic Quarters and we very much enjoyed our gentle stroll’s home after a night of eating and drinking. 
 
Sophie herself could not have been more accommodating. She’s was great to communicate with on the lead up to our stay and welcoming on our arrival. We didn’t want for anything on the trip at all. 

If you book this apartment you will not be disappointed!
Good food, great sites. Location had a beautiful view. Clean. Large space.

Lovely apartment in a great location in Eixample, very close to the Sagrada Familia, Girona metro and good bars and restaurants. Great host who was really friendly and helpful with us getting to know the city. Thank you Sophie!

Excellent location in Barcelona
Spacious apartment with great view
Guests are greeted promptly
Refrigerator has staples left from previous guests which prevents the need to buy sugar, salt etc. for a short stay

Sophie was an amazing host. We was firstly met by Inna who invited us on behalf of Sophie. She was very helpful and welcoming. We received a customised booklet before our arrival which pretty much had everything we needed such as all the local restaurants and so on. All our needs and more was catered for. The location was also perfect and a 10 minute walk to Sagrada familia. I would highly recommend Sophie's spacious apartment.  

A very happy Airbnb'er :)

Absolutely wonderful apartment with the most quaint view of an old church right out the window. Very well appointed, clean, organized. Sophie went above and beyond with an informative packet of how, where, and what to do. Wish we could have stayed longer. Thank you Sophie and Inna!

The apartment is spacious and very well kept. It was great for our family , with a large parents room and two double bedrooms for the kids. Being close to the metro makes it very convenient to go everywhere

name: Vela Luxury Apartment HUTB-001280
summary: Spacious 110m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout.  Large living room/dining room area with bay window. 2 double bedrooms leading to balcony & 2 bathrooms. Office area, fully equipped kitchen & safety box. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Ideal for families, groups or professionals. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins (after 9pm)

reviews.txt: Lovely apartment in a great location. Everything as expected.
Beautiful apartment, as shown in pictures, really spacious, nice modern bathrooms and kitchen in a great location and a responsive host. Top marks!

Wonderful stay in Vega last October .Apartment design and nicely furnished, well located between Casa Pedrera and Casa Ballto. Walking distance from Catalunya plaza (about 10 min). Heike has been very supportive and nice in accommodating us during the week. 
We recommend this address. It is a bit  noisy as really in the city center but we were not bothered during the night.
Lovely apartment, great design, central location
Great location ,, beautiful apartment .. Neat and clean.. Highly recommended.

The apartment is centrally located in a very safe area of Barcelona with easy access to shops, restaurants and some excellent tourist sights.

The apartment is quite beautiful, very clean with high ceilings, wooden floors, very tall windows and doors and nicely furnished.  We visited over the last week of December and the city's Christmas lights were beautiful. 

The heating system was very efficient and no problems with hot water supply.  Fully double-glazed windows and bedroom windows are double-double glazed so no problem with road noise.  Although only on the first floor there is a small lift for those who may find it difficult to climb stairs with a suitcase.

For those interested, the apartment is directly opposite the Egyptian Museum.

Heike was a friendly and efficient host and solved a problem with one of the keys overnight for us.

We really enjoyed our stay at Vela apartment and would recommend to others seeking a classy apartment in a great location in this amazing city.

central location with great public transport close by.Wonderful ,stylish apartment with all you would want available for a short or long stay..Professional assistance from the owner and always willing to assist .The area made me feel like a local which I liked..

We have used Airbnb for our last few family European holidays, so we have some but not a huge experience with Airbnb. 

The host responded to my booking request very promptly and responded to my initial questions straight away. Communication was very good, which I found encouraging. 

When we arrived we were greeted by Alex who politely and articulately showed us around the apartment and resolved a number of very minor housekeeping issues. We had a slight issue with the internet on day 2 which again was dealt with promptly and efficiently. 

The apartment is tastefully decorated and appointed to a high standard and it was also very comfortable. We felt very much at home. 

On the first night we noticed a little traffic noise  ( as was expected from a city centre location) but this was significantly minimized when the outer shutters and inner ornate shutters were closed. 

The apartment is located in a lovely spot, very central but a block or so away from where the main tourist congregations.  We enjoyed exploring the city away from the bulk of the tourists. 

I would definitely recommend this apartment.
Great apartment in the perfect neighborhood to enjoy Barcelona.  Exactly as advertised.  Wonderful host.

Fantastic home, great location, easy communication and wonderful hospitality!  Highly recommend to anyone traveling for pleasure or business in Barcelona.  We throughly enjoyed our time and will be back again!

This apartment is in a great location within the Eixample district of Barcelona. Felt safe walking around the neighborhood even late at night. Close to restaurant, bars, local markets, shopping and within walking distance to many local attractions. The beautifully renovated apartment is in a classic building with several exterior balconies. We enjoyed sitting and enjoying our morning coffee in the glass-enclosed balcony. We loved the large clean kitchen that had everything we needed to prepare meals. Heike and Alex were great to work. Our inquiries were responded to quickly. Reported issues were resolved immediately.  We would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona. We hope to be back again soon.

The apartment is what we were looking for.  A great location that gave us the ability to dine like a local close to home or an easy walk to any attraction in Barcelona.  The apartment was clean and as advertised.  As one other reviewer wrote, waking up and having your coffee on the glassed in balcony was wonderful.  There are open air balconies off the bedrooms.  Heike was responsive with any questions we had and was very nice to do business with.
Nice apartment in a great central location.

Heike and Alex were wonderful hosts, helpful, responsive and accommodating.
The apartment is beautiful, it's in a historic building with an elevator that looks like a prop from Wes Anderson movie. It's very centrally located. When you stay there, you are surrounded by beautiful architecture, great cafes and restaurants, and lots of upscale shopping. It's also only a couple of blocks from a market and a beautiful flower shop.
We stayed for a month and the place had all the creature comforts we needed: full size oven, good coffee machine, washer/dryer, dishwasher.
Would love to stay there again in future. :)

Fantastic apartment for two couples. Wonderful building in great location. Loved the window box area for people watching. All the amenities were top notch. Very comfortable. Easy to get everywhere. Wonderful hosts!

Simply an amazing unit, in the heart and in a very prestige  part of Barcelona. Communication with both Heike and Alex were instantly responding to our inquiries. Lots of good cafes and restaurants especially the Tapas restaurant underneath the building. Definitely we recommend this place.

name: Jardim Botânico Gourmet 2 bdroom
summary: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed, 3 single bed), 2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay!

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. 
Valorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! 
Além de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. 
O VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. 
Além de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, 
em 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. 
Em 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização. Em 2019 vamos estrear nosso novo maestro com uma bateria inovadora e arrepiante. Vem!

reviews.txt: Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us.
Everything as described. Nice location, felt very safe. Everything you need is close. Wifi was a little bit spotty at times, but wasn't a big deal.
The apartment was in a great location & a friendly neighbourhood with lots of great places to eat.

We enjoyed our 4-day stay at this apartment, while we were moving house in Rio. The apartment is cute and stocked with everything you need to actually live in it, which I appreciated - good kitchen. Roberta was responsive and accessible. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!

name: Cozy bedroom Sagrada Familia
summary: Cozy bedroom next to the church Sagrada Família a great choice to stay in a residential area away from the crowds while still being at a walking distance to main attractions in Barcelona.

host.about:
Hi, I'm from Brazil, but live in Barcelona.
I'm an sportsman, who loves music and is organized.
Really looking foward to a nice deal.
Cya,
Rapha

reviews.txt: Rapha place is so tidy and the dog there is so friendly. I and my friend had a really good time there. Rapha is such a friendly host and he will always give us some suggestions of restaurants or place to travel. The location of the flat is easy to find and it is just next to the metro station and that is very convenient. The hot tourist spot Sagrada Familia is just next to the flat. We can go to the city centre just by walking. Even though at night, we still feel safe to walk to the apartment from the metro.I strongly recommend people to stay there during staying in Barcelona.

name: Single private room(Gray)
summary: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions.

host.about:
Greetings traveller!

I'm 38 years old freelancer, graduated from graphic design. Currently running my own business, renovating and renting private rooms & flats in the heart of Istanbul mostly for incoming visitors since 2010.

I will be glad if I can help for your accommodation need, and if i can make you feel at home!

reviews.txt:
I just booked a room for a night, before taking my flight. So I can't fully describe Dama's House. However, I can say Ali is a very very nice guy, he welcomed me very well. The room was clean, small but pretty and well arranged. Idem for the bathroom. About the location, it's nearby Karakoy's port (from there, you can go to Uskudar etc.) and nearby Istikal, a famous shopping street going to Taksim (a center place to take a bus and to go to the airport for example).
Finally I can recommend Ali and Dama's House ;)

I stayed two terrific nights at Dama's House.  It is in a wonderful location with shops and transportation in close proximity.  The common spaces (i.e. sitting room, kitchen and bathroom) of the house were clean, and my private room was larger than I expected.  Access to the washing machine was a very helpful amenity.

Great place to stay for a short or long term, international people, really comfortable furniture and very polite landlord. I can really recommend this accommodation. Thanks Ali, for make my stay so special in your house.

Dama's House is the perfect location if you want to discover Istanbul on your holidays or if you are there for Erasmus studies. The neighbourhood is really safe and central and the room is clean. But most of all, Ali is a great host who is helpful no matter what you need: a cab, recommendations for food and drinks, just anything!

I stayed for 4 weeks in the Gray Room in Dama's House and loved this place. The flat is very central (next street to Istiklal Caddesi), very clean and comfortable. Ali was was a great and cooperative host. Thank you very much!! :)

Ali was very communicative before I arrived in Istanbul, gave very clear directions to the apartment, and was welcoming and accessible throughout my stay.  The room itself--the grey room--was simple and lovely, in an apartment ideally located in Beyoglu within easy walking distance of everything I needed.  Perfect.  Ali also arranged reliable early morning transport to Ataturk airport for me on the day of my departure.  It was a really great place to stay, private and simple and friendly.  Strongly recommended.
Perfect location and very very nice people. Only problem was that the bed is not very good, my back was hurting when I woke up.

Ali was a great host. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed a week in the Grey Room. After a warm welcome, Ali gave me a street map of Istanbul and a nice present. The Location is just two minutes away from Istiklal Cad., very cool! Thank you Ali, for sharing your place.

Ali was a great host, so welcoming and helpful, he will make you feel at home.
he is ready to help in any situation, I had an argument with the taxi driver who was taking me to Ali's place and even before I meet with Ali in person, I called him to talk to the driver in Turkish since the communications in English was useless, Ali was ready to help and he solved the problem with the Taxi driver.
For the room its good size room, I had a stay in the Indian room as well, You will met nice people in Ali's apartment, the diversity of the guests will leave a great chance for a culture-exchange, and if you're planing to stay for a long period of time, there will be a possibility of making good friends.
Location is just perfect, 3 minutes walking up the hill to Istiklal Street where you can see the Turkish modern lifestyle surrounded by historical buildings and unique gift boutiques, live music, good food and the best part is Galatasary tower just 7 minutes walking .
I also liked the fact that the building has elevator so you don't have to worry about lefting your luggage!
I definitely recommend Ali's place and the best thing about it is Ali himself.

I had a very good experience at Dama house during my holidays in Istanbul. It's very central and that allowed me to walk to almost everywhere. The house is in a quiet street and it has all the facilities, also Ali has been always very quick replying to any questions and very easy person to deal with. I will definitely stay again there in my next trip to Istanbul.

Ali was great and met me even though I arrived a few hours later than expected.  The room was just as advertised.  The other guests seemed very nice though I didn't have much of a chance to get to know them.  The location is excellent, near the Shish-hane Metro stop, at one end of Istiklal, the pedestrian mall that leads to Taksim Square, full of boutiques, restaurants, buskers, and the world's most flamboyant ice-cream merchant.  Be aware, however, that the neighborhood is full of very steep hills--I brought only sneakers and my feet suffered.

The Grey room is a quite small room in a very nice in a very nice location right next to Istiklal. I had a very good time sharing the flat with some nice people from all over the world, mostly also "longstayers". Ali was great and allways reachable when needed. The flat was clean and in a good condition. Absolutly nothing to complain about.

Ali was great from day one - gave me all the information and help I could've possibly wanted and welcomed me personally to the flat. He even went the extra step to ask me whether I needed anything on my day of departure such as a taxi to the airport. The room is just as described and perfect for a single person travelling for a short period of time. What made the experience especially special was meeting the other young people living in the flat who were great and with whom I had a fab weekend!

The house was very clean, Is stiuated in heart of the city center, close to evrything! All safe the building looked like! 

Anything i needed Ali arranged for me. 

Hopefully going there again !
Miguel

Ali was a most welcoming host. He responded to all questions within remarkable short time and willingness to answer all of them. He also provided all necessary information to comfortably arrive to the house.
I had a specific request that involved me not being there all nights and he was very open to make the situation fit to my needs.
I would definitely come back to him and his place.
It's a comfortable and really quite place. Location is great. Ali, the owner, is a real gentlemen who helps, facilitates your stay.  I recommend this place and I'll definitely come back again.

The room is in a central but quiet place close to Sishane Metro station where you can reach several points of interest from.
Ali is a helpful host welcoming you even in the late hours. He provides you with water (drinking tap water is not recommended) towels and soap.

Ali is really an outstanding host. While it may be cliche to say that he responds to 'everything' Ali really cares about his  tenants/clients and responds to everything in a very timely and immediate fashion. Ali is always happy to help with anything. The location I stayed at was really cleanly kept, rules were fair and clear, and the price point is unbeatable for the location!  I strongly, strongly recommend Ali!

name: Cozy Nest, heart of the Plateau
summary: Come spend a few days (or weeks) in our beautiful and cozy apartment situated in the heart of Montreal's most happening neighborhood! You will share the space with me as, maybe another guest and probably a cute cat or kitten (I sometimes foster cute little furry balls). LGBTQ friendly :) Looking forward to meeting you!

host.about:
Hello,
My name is Laura, I am a young and active professional living in Montreal and working for a concert promoter.
I've been living in this apartment for over 12 years now. It holds a very special place in my heart and I am glad to be opening the doors of my cosy nest to new guests!
You will also be sharing the common space with a cat or two as well as maybe another traveling guest.
Looking forward to meeting you and helping make your stay in our lovely city as comfortable as possible.
À bientôt !

reviews.txt: An amazing and enormous room and a total bargain at the price. Nice backyard. Great neighbourhood. Friendly and accommodating host. I hereby have nothing bad to say!

I had a FABULOUS stay! The room was enormous and just as pictured. You really cannot beat the neighborhood - walking distance to a ton of great local bars/restaurants/parks and easy access to the bus and the subway. The hosts were so gracious and helpful. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
We had a wonderful stay! The host was very friendly and helpful, the room was exactly like the picture, and the location was perfect.
Lilou was a lovely host - communication was super smooth and she made me nice herbal tea before bed. The room is spacious, and you really couldn't ask for a better location in Montreal!
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

If I had to describe my stay at Laura's in one word it would be 'AMAZING'! Luckily, I have more space. 

The room is just as the pictures display: huge, clean, and comfy! There's a 2persons bed, a build-in closet, another closet with drawers, a book case, a big desk, and a comfy sofa to relax on. Although the room offers more space than you probably need, you can also just hang out in the cozy living room. But the best place has to be the back yard, which Laura turned in a little green oasis. It's the ideal spot to relax after a long day, enjoy the sun, or have a home dinner. And no need to feel lonely as Lulu - a.k.a. the most adorable cat ever - and his buddies from the block are always around somewhere (especially if you give them some of your ham sandwich or sushi). 

I've stayed at Laura's for several months and I've never felt so at home in another person's house. Laura went above and beyond to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I was new to Montreal (actually I was new to Canada) and didn't know any people other than a few colleagues. Laura embraced me as a friend and made sure I never had to feel alone or get bored, while also giving me all the privacy I wanted. 

The neighbourhood has everything you need. The house is near  shops, supermarkets, cafe's, restaurants, parks (including the Mont Royal), several busstops, 2 metro stations (Laurier & Mont Royal; both 10 min walking distance), and there's and there's always some fun - often free - festival around the corner in the summer. Despite all this the street is actually really quiet and is very safe!

Laura was a brilliant host. The key pick up was well-organized and I felt immediately welcomed into the home. Essentials/amenities were provided for which made it much easier.

She also gave us great advice on where to go and eat. Overall Laura was just an awesome host.

I stayed here for a week during one of the many festivals in Montreal. Communication before arrival was great and when I checked in there was a lovely hand written welcome letter with instructions as the host was at work.

The room was as pictured in the listing, clean and bright and the double bed was super comfy ( i slept really well). Location was also great right next to St.Laurent with cafes and restaurants near by and a large supermarket. 

Laura and her housemates made me feel super welcome in their home and would stay here again.
Super cute apartment, with a great room! Laura was super welcoming and made my stay very enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place! I had a great time!

Our stay with Laura was wonderful! The room was clean and homey and the location was very central and interesting. Lilou was great at communicating with us about arrival and departure and very friendly - providing us with some tips about what to do in the city. She really went above and beyond to accommodate us... I'd definitely recommend staying here!
Die Lage ist super, die Gastgeberin sehr herzlich und nett. Absolute Empfehlung! :)

The room was spacious and clean. Lucy was very welcoming and great to have a chat with! Our stay was only 3 days so Lucy suggested some great places to eat and things to do. Close to some great places to eat and shops.

Such a lovely space and host! Arrival was very easy, and the apartment and room I was staying in (the front room) were clean and well decorated. The backyard was an great place to chill out - very relaxing and private. 

The host, Laura, was very friendly and laid-back. The resident kitty was possibly even more friendly than Laura, and will monopolize your whole stay with her adorableness if you let her. 

The area is very close to bus routes, as well as some small coffee shops and restaurants, and of course the beautiful Mont Royale. The Mile-End neighborhood is eclectic and cute, with lots to see even if you're just wandering. 

I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to friends headed to Montreal.

Fantastic experience. Laura was incredibly friendly and accommodating. The room was comfortable and everything we needed for our week in Montreal. It was perfectly located to easily get anywhere we wanted to go into the city easily. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again next time I come to Montreal.

I loved the neighbourhood - pretty houses and cool cafes and lots of young people on bikes. I really appreciate the simple but tasteful way that Laura has furnished her house. 
Laura is super warm and lovely, helpful, kind and also gives you space you need. 

The bed is very comfortable with lovely fluffy pillows. The room is really big and lovely.

I just can't fault this accommodation. It's a fabulous inexpensive option.

name: Fabulous occasion orange
summary: You are in the epicenter of Porto's life! Monuments as Clerigos Tower, Eifell bridge "D. Luis" and Ribeira, the riverside, S. Bento train station, Restaurants, shops,cafés...everything is just around the corner.

reviews.txt: Dulce was picking us up at the corner of the street. The apartment is in a very central area close to the city center and close to the river. Everything was clean and nice. It is a charming place to stay.
Great place, right in the centre. Had a great time

It is what it is!! A FABULOUS occasion! The situation is ideal. . Dulce is very nice and always answers promptly to questions and/or other needs.. The place is sooo charming!  You cannot have a better location: everything is around you! And the appartement so clean, intimate and simple.. and the price! Just too right.. thank you SO much to offer this nice appartement to people who travels this must see area!  

We wish to come back another time! 

Marie & Billy

Beautiful studio! Everything was perfect I felt like I didn't want to leave the house lol. Thank you Dulce for being so helpful with all the useful information you have given. Will surely come back to stay there again if I'm back to Porto. Love from Malaysia, June.

LOOK NO where else!
Dulce place is superb, actual look BETTER then pictures and very clean and well equip.  Location is superb, just 300 meters from San Bentos station, and I literally walk everywhere and did not use any public transport at all and all attraction is less then 700meters from her place, shoping, restaurants and bars below her place but yet NOT noisy at night.  Can't find better place to stay in Porto.   

Dulce is swift in respond and met me in arrival despite delay of 2 hours and gave orientation of her place.  She also as assisted to book me a taxi at 4:30am to airport for my early flight.

Highly recommend for you to stay at Dulce place! You will not regret :) enjoy beautiful PORTO!
Dulce was an excellent and accommodating host. The apartment is in the best, most central location and is very sweet. Thanks for a great few days in Porto!
The apartment is in the very center of the city. Very comfortable and cosy, there's everything you could need, close to the subway. But it's very noisy there. That's the only disadvantage
The apartment was perfect for our needs. Brilliant central location, very clean, well equipped. Dulce was very welcoming and gave us some good tips on places to eat locally.

name: Apart-hotel w/ Wonderful Ocean View - 2 bedrooms!!
summary: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking;

host.about:
Hello there!

I´m Aline, and I was borned and raised in Rio de Janeiro. Excepting some periods of my life ( education and working abroad  for a couple of years and a sabatical round the world trip) I have spent all my life in this beautiful city that I´m so proud of belonging to. Please be welcome to my place!  

I enjoy eating, reading, surfing, eating again and for sure...travelling. My time abroad have gave me not only languages skills but also one understanding of how life can be enjoyed diferently, according to each reality. I hope you will have a taste of how shinny and beutiful life can be in Brazil!

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
My stay at Alines apartment has been absolutely fabulous. I was alone, working for the TeamNl Paralympics, so a lot of going in and out. Every time that I could come back to the apartment it was a safe haven with beautiful views, nice balconies for my cup of tea, clean, light, perfect bed, super nice deli style supermarket downstairs with good take away and cold beer. Aline is a great lovely host that really wants to make the best Rio time for you as a visitor.  I can really recommend the apartment, location, Rio and host Aline!
Thank you so much. I'll come back with my family.
Todo exelente como dice el aviso

Recomiendo 100% este lugar, es excelente. El depto es hermoso, la vista al mar es algo impresionante. La zona de la playa es maravillosa. El condominio es fabuloso, mucha seguridad. La zona de pileta es hermosa con todas las comodidades. Y lo mas practico es que tenes un super enorme abajo que esta abierto horario corrido. Volveria sin dudarlo.

Staying at Alines place was absolutely wonderful. The apartment was clean and comfortable with an incredible view and location. It is close to wonderful shops and services and a gorgeous Beach. Excellent for surfers! But best of all was probably Aline; she was hospitable, easy to communicate with and accommodating of our needs!
Linda vista ...bem localizado...

Excellent place in a beautiful location. Aline made check in very easy, the place was very clean with a welcome bottle of champagne, fruit and chocolates. 

I would definitely stay here again. It's right on the beach with a nice cafe and grocery store on the first floor. You can't beat it.

It seemed that the house was not cleaned before my arrival.Both of the bathrooms were not cleaned- the sink had a lot of hair/dirt, the shower had some dead bugs in them and hair, the soap/toothbrush holder which was filled with crust of dirt and toothpaste which was disgusting.In the closet there were underwear, and shirts left over from previous guests.The kitchen was filled with ants in the cabinets, near the sink, microwave, kitchen door everywhere!The refrigerator was not cleaned before my arrival it was filled with food stains and water all over it since the refrigerator leaks which causes the food to be all wet.In general the house was filled with dust.I was very disappointed in the fact that the apartment did not have a drying machine like it was stated in the listing.The appliances were old and did not work properly, the AC was there for decoration since it did not work.The hair dryer was also useless since it was made for an American outlet and there were no American outlets in the house.The host did not give enough information about check-in.I had to contact her about it and there was minimal information given.There were a total of three entrances to the building and since there was no explanation to which way to enter I went in a random one, and it turned out to be the wrong entrance for new guests to check in.During the check in process it was pretty long I had no clue that myself and all my guests needed to share our driver license numbers, make a copy of our IDs, home addresses, take a picture of ourselves in order to be able to check in.I communicated with the host that I was going to use the parking spot that she offered and that the doormen were asking for her to allow for that to happen so I could get a tag so the car could get in, well I NEVER got a response from the host so everyday once I wanted to park the car in the parking lot I had to talk to the doorman and it was a headache and it took a long time to get into the building.I stayed a total of eleven days in the apartment and I expected for there to be some basic cleaning which it was lacking.There was a lot of noise in the apartment from the cars that was unbearable at night.The building was old.Very overpriced for the lack of cleaning and for the lack of comfort that the apartment (URL HIDDEN) sofa bed had a strong scent of body odor and in general the apartment looked better in the pictures, the furniture were beaten up and old.It was great that it was a water front property but the only downside was the fact that next door there were prostitutes once it got dark.I contacted the host with some issues about that apartment but she answered only the questions she wanted to answer.
