  The final reason, most evenings we would return to the smell of pot from neighbors.  Some may not mind this, but it bothers me.  
  I know most of these are not within Marilyn's control, but they did make our stay less than desirable. As mentioned, she was a pleasant host & quickly responded to any questions we had & made us feel welcome in her home.

We absolutely loved Marilyn's home! It was perfect and exactly what we were hoping for. The condo is super clean and Marilyn is wonderful at answering any questions or giving advice! She always got back to me very quickly. 
The location was great. Everything that we wanted to do and had planned was super close to the condo. The beach across the street is great. Just steps from the condo and never over crowded. The little town just down the road has great restaurants and shops to grab some Souvenirs. We would definitely suggest checking out the Paia fish market for lunch/dinner. You can't go wrong grabbing breakfast at the Kihei Cafe. Make sure to get there early and bring cash!! That's all they accept. 
If you head in the other direction towards Waliea-Makena you can go to Makena park. Big beach is located here. It's a beautiful beach. The waves get a little big though, so keep that in mind. 
Marilyn's condo had everything we needed. The view is beautiful. The complex is clean and very quiet. We never saw or heard another person the whole week we were there. It felt like we were the only couple in the complex. Our only concern at first was that there is no AC, but after one night, we quickly realized that it was not needed. Marilyn provides multiple fans and Maui gets very cool at night. With the fan and cool breeze, we slept great!! 
We managed to get around most of the Island while we were in Maui. And honestly, we always found ourselves wanting to go right back to Kiehi! It's a
Very relaxed and laid back community with not an overwhelming amount of touristy activity, which is exactly what we wanted. 
We definitely will be back to Maui and would LOVE to stay at Marilyn's condo again!!!!

Marilyn was an excellent host and we especially appreciated that she responded immediately with any of our questions.  Our stay in her home was wonderful! She provided all the things we needed including beach towels, beach chairs and an umbrella that came in handy.  The location was perfect. Very close the the beach and restaurant options. I would definitely recommend staying at Marilyn's!

Marilyn was an amazing host and answered all our questions (including a few last minute ones) quickly and helpfully. The house itself is amazing, super comfortable and Marilyn has put a lot of thought into little touches which just made our holiday perfect such as the use of her cooler for picnics! The garden is gorgeous and the perfect place for a morning cup of tea. We also loved the location right near some amazing local snorkelling beaches as well as big beach also close to the local health food store Hawaiian Moons which we kept returning to! Her paintings are also beautiful and add to the peaceful charm of the house. Definitely recommend staying here.

The location was good very close to Waimea which is a beautiful negihborhood with exclusive resorts. We love snorkeling so this aloud us to be closer to La Peruse bay which was exceptional.  In the other hand being close to the main road it had a bit of noise. The kitchen was well equipped and the space was big and comfy. Having air conditioning will be a plus because the building gets lots of afternoon sun which make it a little hot.

We absolutely loved Kihei and kept coming back despite traveling out to other parts of Maui.This place is charming and cozy, with a central location to medical clinics, markets, especially beaches.  It is the perfect spot if you want a home-feel/based location.

We didn't get to meet the host, Marilyn, but she was in constant communication - and followed up quickly on questions.

The only downsides were:
1. There is no AC. Coming from San Francisco and being used to the cold, the afternoons in the condo despite multiple fans were almost unbearable indoors. 
2. She had some last minute instructions that we were unprepared for (unlisted on her website) regarding guests/visitors.  She did, however, accommodate our request.
3. If you love nuts, and nut products, this is not the place for you. We felt a little restricted in the food we could eat/cook at the condo. I myself have multiple food allergies, and most of my food substitutions come in the form of nuts - which I could not eat while there!

Otherwise, you will have a lot of fun, with pretty much everything you need close by, good internet speed, quiet neighborhood, and clean home.

Prior to arrival Marilyn sent a text message out to me getting me and reminding me of the house rules. Her hospitality was very much appreciated and got us started on the right foot. 

The place was exactly as described and perfect. It's not steps from the beach but it's about a 6-10 min walk from the beach. 

It's very close to food and shopping in kihei. I would definitely recommend and stay at Marilyns condo when given the opportunity

name: Ribeira Smart Flat
summary: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station.

host.about:
Originally from France, I have always been keen to discover new countries and cultures. I lived 2 years in Australia where I studied at the University of Southern Queensland. After that I headed back to Paris, thinking to settle down there. After some times I decided to change my life and landed in Porto. I have been living here since 2010.
Since then, I did not manage to get back and got in love with Porto. The seagulls, the Douro and the amazing color of the sun set, will without a doubt, make you also fall in love with this beautiful city.
Make sure that you check out the little guide! There is some nice place to visit!

reviews.txt: Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

This was a great place to stay. It's very roomie and comfortable. The apparent in general is great with modern rooms and a very modern kitchen, and the location is optimal for exploring the city with many restaurants and attractions within walking distance. Mathieu is great and was very quick to respond to any messages.
Great stay!

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment is within walking distance of the river , port caves, many restaurants, shops and Sao Bento train station. It is in a narrow cobbled street in the old part of the city where everything is either up or down hill so be prepared to walk everywhere which is the best way to discover all the hide local places. It is a short walk to get the bus # 500 to Matosinhos and the beaches on the Atlantic Ocean and the fresh fish restaurants where it is all cooked outside on the street.
The apartment was clean and comfortable and certainly adequate for our needs.

Apartment is very well located in the heart of Porto and was comfortable. Construction outside is annoying, not an issue if you are out sightseeing all day but bring earplugs if you want to sleep in. Mathieu was easy to contact and resolved problems quickly.

Lovely apartment and the bedrooms are spread along a corridor which is nice for a feeling of privacy and space. Mathieu was very efficient and agreed to a late check-in at short notice which was much appreciated.

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVN Studio  v3
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas North timeshare - Pay resort: $8-12/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.

host.about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.txt: Amazing room with ocean view!!! We were very impressed with the Westin and the 5 Star service!!! Complete with a full kitchen and washer and dryer!!! Home away from home. Mahalo :)

name: Great location in Barcelona
summary: Hello, if you are looking to stay in Barcelona here is a nice and calm neighborhood, close to the metro Navas, shopping Glories and much more. Here you have the real catalan lifestyle! Air conditioner, supermarkets and train close.

host.about: Familia multicultural!!!

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 179 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: causeway bay MTR+Tidy Quad room&YT
summary: .Near the subway: causeway bay MTR station (exit E, 2-3 minutes walk; Each room specific independent toilet, hot and cold water bath, independent air-conditioning, enjoy free WIFI Internet bring their own computers, more passengers to provide shower gel, hand sanitizer, shampoo, bath towel. Convert plug, front desk has blown ram and convenient services, the hotel fire alarm, smoke hood detectors, fire extinguishers, fire escapes light fire equipment, etc.

host.about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service
可以加我 (Hidden by Airbnb) (You can add me (Hidden by Airbnb) 
)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

loc.address: 铜锣湾, 香港岛, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Pro:
-great location & value
-quick response from the host and very adaptable 

Cons:
-hair and dust in bed
-pictures don't represent the actual apartment layout
-unstable Internet

please check careful who the true owner is. they always have different owner with the one they use in airbnb. even phone number, i had a bad experience about finding the owner about 30mins, no one take my phone until i found out they actually have different owner with different phone number.

name: Twin Room With Window
summary: (2 sigle bed inside,n have bathroom inside,24h hot water,free wifi,Free luggage) All our rooms tidy n clean,free wifi,air-condition,shower room.

host.about:
我是一個熱情好客的人,歡迎與來自世界各地的人交流｡這個賓館是我用心裝修整理的,地理位置優越,臨近旺角地鐵站,購物方便,還有專門巴士去各處的主題公園｡藉助這個機會,更能為客人介紹香港的文化與人情味｡ 
I am the manager of Amigo Inn , my name is Jim, we have 23 rooms , so I guess  one of my rooms can fit your budget
Our inn located  in city center , MONGKOK where is most busiest area n transportation center to any where in hk, as u may know
  Subway/Mtr ---MONGKOK mtr n find the exit E2 which is the nearest exit to my hostel
We also provide discounted theme park  ticket like Disney park , ocean park n peak tram

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a great time here, thank you for your instruction about interesting place and food
Jim is always ready to answer your inquiries. Place is nice and comfy. Would definitely recommend this place
Jim's place is very convenience for everythings. Jim and his staffs are really helpful and friendly. I'm really sastified with the place.

located right smack in sneakers Street so it was super convenient, within 5mins walk to mongkok mtr as well. 

note that the elevator starts on the 2nd floor so you'll still have to climb up about 4 flights of stairs! 

overall decent room

Jim and his staff were friendly and checking in and out was very easy.  Very well located in Mong Kok, close to the subway and lots of shops and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can be a bit loud if you're not used to sleeping with city sounds. A great place to stay in Hong Kong for the value and location

Jim's place is great for traveling around, it is very near the MTR (about 5 mins away). There's also the ladies market and sneakers street nearby. The toilet has a bit of odour but overall, great stay and value for money. It was a pleasant stay for two girls. Thank you Jim and the rest like Margaret for your help and kind hospitality!

name: Wan Chai Fully Furnished Studio
summary: Fully Furnished Studio located in the the center of Wan Chai area. 5 minutes walking distance to both Wan Chai and Causeway Bay MTR station. Easy access to Hong Kong Exhibition Center, Times Square, and Sogo. Perfect for bachelor with Bars/Restaurants nearby the Lockhart/Jerreries Road. Building with elevator and 24/7 security guard. Small buy cosy studio with TV, private bathroom, kitchen air-conditioning and a working desk. Free Wifi access. 7-11 and laundry shop right next to the entrance.

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Stephen's place is neat, clean and as described.  Size is perfect for single traveller.  Stephen is very responsive.  Location is good with lots of restaurants around. Walking distance to MTR station is about 5 mins, very convenient. I enjoyed my stay very much at Stephen's place.

Small, one person room (size makes it a single room) not really well sound isolated against the neigbours. Recently renovated so fresh bathroom, could be better with something that blocks out the light from the "window" if you are a person that have trouble sleeping if it's to light in the room.

My stay in Hong Kong and at Stephen's flat went very smoothly and without any inconveniences. The flat is in a central location and easy to find as Stephen provided very good directions to the place with pictures and everything.

The room was as depicted in the pics and is suitable for 1 person to stay.

The room is tinier than I thought without any windows out. Another problem was that no cleaning supplies - not even a brush - was provided in the room. If you stay several days in the flat, as I did, it would be comfortable to clean and tidy up a bit every day.
Great location and beautiful room! Had a great time there. Host is awesome!
Good budget room for HK, clean and convenient, but no outside window :) Late check-in was easy and smooth. It's a good deal, at this price it's hard to find better in Wan Chai.
This is my second stay at Stephen's.  It's as good as my last stay.

The place was hard to find for me as the entrance is small and easy to miss. Nice cosy room that's in a central location. Desk and good wifi allowed me to work in the room. Fridge is useful for keeping food and drinks! And I like how there's food places just downstairs and everywhere around the building.

Great location in a reasonably modern building with a lift (which is a huge bonus having stayed on the 8th floor of a building without a lift last time I came to HK). Host was helpful and friendly and the room was clean with decent strength wifi, cold aircon and hot water.

Please note that facilities / amenities are minimal. There is a fridge, a kettle, and some bodywash/shampoo. You will need to supply your own towels plus cutlery and cups / glasses if you wish to eat or drink in the apartment (there are no cooking or laundry facilities either).

All in all, a good budget - if basic - place to stay in central Hong Kong.
It is a confortable room very well located!
Excellent location and great host! Remember to bring your own towle to this place.
The location is good.  Neighbourhood full of eateries.  Room is bigger than some other airbnb place.  Bathroom is clean.  Lift is located at the ground floor.  Good value for money.

Stephen was easy to reach via (Hidden by Airbnb) and the checkin instructions were very clear and easy to follow. The neighborhood and building feels very authentic and it is easy to walk to everything like restaurants/MTR/buses.

The room itself is very small and has no windows, so this is not a good place if you want to spend much time in your room. However, as a place to sleep and shower (plenty of hot water and good pressure) it was just fine. And at this price, you cannot expect more in HK.

The apartment looks exactly like the photos. Clean and nice. All the amenities are working perfectly good (the wifi, fridge, water heater, aircon, kettle) Good and central location with many shops and eateries around, near the MTR station. Stephen is very friendly and responses promptly. Ideal place to stay for solo traveller, value for money too.

Pros: Stephen was super responsive. I appreciate immensely that he contacted me several days before my arrival to arrange for key handover. The building is located in a very convenient spot -- eateries, transportation (7-min walk to closest MTR station, a few minutes away on foot from bus 5/5X that goes to Stanley Market or the 100-series buses on Wanchai Rd. that go to the Kowloon side using the tunnel and you'll arrive at Hunghom where you can take the MTR and trains to NWT and China; tramway, and lots of taxis). Despite the various problems re: cleanliness, Stephen was quick to arrange for his maid to show up more than once. And as other guests noted, hard to find a place so conveniently located at this price.

Cons: I would remove the "newly" word from the property's title of "newly decorated apartment". The cleaner obviously did a superficial job only--found dust and tissue bits below the bed and mouldy caulking around the bathroom sink. A working fridge was one of my must-have items, but was disappointed to find the fridge seal was extremely mouldy, including certain parts inside. I guess my biggest surprise is that this room is actually a room within an apartment which is subdivided into five rooms. There is no window as understood through other reviews and confirmation from Stephen, so won't be suitable for those who are claustrophobic, and you'll have to rely entirely on the air conditioning for fresh air. There is, however, a pseudo-window slot that is open to the corridor in the common area. Would have made the space much more homey if there were a small curtain covering this pseudo-window space since it is half-covered by a file folder and you can still see the dirty metal guard and the sheet of dirty plastic with a hole for the air cond. unit exhaust. I was much taken aback by this after seeing the more "modern" amenities, such as the cupboards and bathroom tiles. Another thing that bothered me was the absence of hooks for clothing, except for the three tiny adhesive hooks in the bathroom (but since the shower is in the same space as the toilet, one cannot use these tiny hooks for dry clothing anyways) and the bar on the glass door (but I didn't want to hang too much on it since the bar is against a glass door). Hence, the only chair in the space is hijacked by my clothes. So if you plan to stay there more than a week, you might find it inconvenient. 

All in all, if you don't have a keen eye for cleanliness, you will like this place for its proximity to amenities and quick response from host.

Hint: If you arrive at the building by taxi, give the taxi driver the Wood Road address, but then you'll have to walk to the Heard Street entrance to enter the building since the security code doesn't work on the Wood Road entrance.
Thanks Stephen for the stay, its been great.
The location was good and there is convenient store located right below the apartment! Host was fast at reply, enjoyed my stay! Apartment was true to picture.

I've been did HK several times, this was my first time exploring the HK side instead of Kowloon. I'm glad I chose this place, it's walking distance to a lot of places, there's a bus or tram nearby to take you wherever. The neighbor's can get a little noisy, but they make sure to stop before bedtime, so if noise is a problem, just go out to a cafe or put on some headphones. I'd recommend this place.
very good location near bus stops. clean room. good sized room with enough space for a luggage.
Very nice room for a affordable price in Hong Kong!
cozy and enough hospitality.

name: The Garden Studio
summary: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre.

host.about:
I am a professional photographer, based in Sydney. Australia. Covering lifestyle subjects such as Food, Interiors and travel, mostly for magazines and books and advertising clients. Born and raised in Sydney, I do love to travel and I have been lucky to have done a lot of that both personally and professionally. 
I enjoy making things and have always got a project on the go
Cooking is another great passion of mine. Hence the offer of baked goods and homemade jam!
Please feel free to email me with any question you might have.

reviews.txt:
This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

What a wonderful experience staying in The Garden Studio. We arrived and were greeted by the very friendly and attentive Cath - who introduced us to the chickens on the way to the studio. As soon as we stepped inside we felt comfortable. The decor is modern, quirky and stylish, there is a lovely area to sit and watch television, a user friendly kitchenette, a comfortable bed and a clean and modern bathroom. Cath provided us with a lovely array of breakfast and snack options and she even baked a delicious loaf of fresh bread which she left at our doorstep the following morning along with a newspaper. There is a large collection of DVD's to watch and books to read and the studio is in a quiet location with plenty parking - also within easy walking distance of public transport. I highly recommend The Garden Studio to anyone looking for a private, convenient and comfortable place to stay. My partner and I will definitely be returning in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay with Cath.. This lovely garden studio is functional, modern and comfortable.. Delish freshly baked bread and cookies from Cath.. The breakfast hamper is welcoming and generous! Definitely highly recommended!

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !

I had a lovely stay with Cath - the studio is beautiful and her chickens are so cute! She was a fantastic host - friendly, easy going  and kind (baked fresh bread!) but respected my privacy which was great.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.
Great place to stay in a really interesting suburb I wish I had more time to explore.....

We felt so at home at The Garden Studio, it's a pity we didn't have more time to thoroughly enjoy this cosy space. 

We loved the ginger biscuits, & freshly baked bread, that Cath handed to us in the morning, still warm from the oven. Cath was approachable & helpful when we needed info on how to get around, but at the same time, gave us the space we needed. Her chickens too, were rather welcoming! A joy to talk to; we appreciated the short exchanges & enjoyed listening to her share bits about herself :) 

A gem of a place!

We had such a wonderful stay at the garden studio.
Cath is a very welcoming and generous host.  She even made us  freshly baked bread and cookies!
The studio is very well designed and has a very comfy split level bedroom. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood and close to train and bus stops. Guaranteed to make your stay in Sydney unforgettable.

My sister and I had a lovely time at Cath's Garden Studio. It was the perfect little space with everything we needed. Cath was extremely lovely and helpful making sure we were comfortable and happy whenever we crossed paths in the garden. The fresh bread was amazing to wake up to on our first morning and the food provided really helped us in keeping our spending costs down. I will most definitely return to the Garden Studio next time I am having a little getaway in Sydney!

Cath's beautiful little studio was the perfect place to visit Sydney and the local neighborhood of Merrickville. She provided a wonderful array of breakfast treats as well as fabulous teas! The place was clean, private, and had all the amenities we could need. Thanks for a great visit, Cath!

Our stay at the Garden Studio was perfect! Cath baked fresh bread and we had breakfast everyday with all the cereals, eggs, vegemite, nutella, etc. she also provided. The studio is small but cozy and she has taken care of all kind of details, we found anything we needed!
Cath also was very nice helping us with some directions and printing maps for us, thank you for a very nice stay!

My mom and I had a fantastic time.  Cath is an absolutely wonderful host and the place is lovely, super clean, relaxing and you get your privacy.  Street parking is free!  Do note that climbing the ladder might be slightly tricky, specially if you are slightly tipsy.  Ha ha.  Very happy with my stay and highly recommend the cute garden studio.  

Both my mom and I had a great time in Sydney.

I spent one whole week at Cath' studio and I loved everything about it! Cath is a very warm and generous person, nothing can beat her big breakfast hamper and the delicious bread she's providing you with. She even brought me some freshly baked muffins over!
There is a direct bus which takes you to the city within 25-35 minutes, depending on traffic. The studio is in a quiet neighborhood, it's perfect to relax after a busy day in the city.
This was a 5 star experience, I would book again anytime. Thank you for a lovely time, Cath!
Very best,
Daniela

We loved the Garden Studio. It is absolutely perfect with so much style, love and details and you have everything you need! The breakfast basket is delicious as well as the self made bread! Cath is very helpful if you have any needs. We could not imagine any better place to stay in Sydney!

name: Cosy Private Room best for long stay
summary: The room has a comfortable bed, towels and clean sheets. The room is cozy and comfortable with basic needs like a desk and hangers. We will be ready to help you with any problem at any hour.  Our Place is located in the center of old city called Sultanahmet. We are 2 munites away from Gülhane and Sirkeci Tram station. Our place is close to Metro (Marmaray), Ferry Station and Golden Horn. The best part is, it is close to all main attractions of Istanbul. Nightlife very easy to reach.

reviews.txt: Secondhome is in an ideal location for looking around the main sights of Istanbul. The hospitality was excellent, they were very helpful with our many questions and had great local tips on where to eat etc. I would highly recommend staying and if we visit Istanbul again we would rebook here. Thanks Secondhome!
Good place for it's price. Excellent location. Nothing fancy but very cheap :)
Excellent location and cool atmosphere! Rooms are comfortable, and open spaces are great!

It is a room of a hostel. The hosts are very friendly and provides a lot of tips. Room is clean and towels provided. The shared bathroom was cleaned daily and sometimes it also depends on the other guests. I suggest add more light in the 2nd floor bathrooms. They also provided laundry and printing services. The lounge area is also a good place to hangout and meet other people.

name: Private Entrance - Backyard Summer Dining - Enjoy
summary: If you appreciate the natives in the outer boroughs, we appreciate you as guest.  Brooklyn has become very popular among Brooklynites and new comers.  While visiting NYC, if you are looking for crowds, museums and shopping, visit Manhattan.  Welcome!

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Easy, breezy and enjoy having fun with friends and great people.  Appreciate a comfortable, clean home.  Favorite past time is reading or a good movie.  Family and my time, most important.

reviews.txt: Michelle was a very considerate, responsive host. The apartment is lovely and very comfortable and was furnished with everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Very nice and big enough basement apartment with two rooms. Clean and nicely furnished with a good wide bed in one room and a sofa in kitchen, with all necessary dishes and coffee machine (Michelle even provided us with coffee for it) That was much more than enough for two persons. Also we used bbq in the court which also was great. Michelle was hospitable enough to meet us in the middle of the night!  We didn`t have any problems at all living in such kind of apartment. Should notice that the connection to Mahattan is a little complicated given the G metro line which is not very frequent. But in general the enviroment is quite ok with nice dominican dely on the corner of the street (highly recomended!)
Michelle was a nice person and really easy to communicate. We had a great time in this big apartment and no problem with to get into the city.

Michelle is a fantastic host, she made us  feel very welcome.
The place was clean and perfectly organized,  quiet at night, 4 very comfortable sleeping places, safe neighborhood, we had everything we needed. the subway is literally 1minute walk from the apartment, you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. There are also buses that take you in no time to down town Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Supermarket is around the corner. Bakery for great breakfasts and deliciuos donuts place at 2 minutes walk from home.
The back garden is also very nice, we were too busy walking all day long, but it gave us a sense of big space, on a nice day you could spend time outside and enjoy a private corner of open air.
If I have the chance to go to New York again, I will surely go back to Michelle!
Everything was great in your apartment. Nice place, nice neighborhood with a subway station very close to the apartment. Thank you Michelle ! :-)

Michelle was great host for my parents and very helpful in arranging taxi, showing shops and answering questions about New York. Her flat located just next to the metro station, which made it easy to get to the downtown. Had some minor problems with the radiator but Michelle took care of that so were no bigger issues. Recommended!

This was my first time to use the Airbnb and I'm glad I chose Michelle and her house. 
The house is as it's seen on the pictures. It is pretty good size for three people. My parents slept on the bed and I slept on the couch. I am 180 cm (5' 11'') and fit on the couch and it was pretty comfortable.
When we arrived Michelle's house she greeted us right away, took her time to explain how to commute, where to eat and what to do in the city. 
The location of house is pretty good. It takes 20-30 min with metro to Manhattan downtown, depends on which line you use. You can also take the metro from JFK, otherwise the cab costs  around $50. In the house everything was clean and neat. She also provided us towels for shower etc. Besides that, whenever I texted to Michelle she responded in timely manner, which made everything easier.
Honestly, our overall experience was much better than I expected.  Me and my family had a very good time in Michelle's house and NY. If one day I go back to NY, I know where I should stay.
We spent a wonderful week at Michelle's place. She was very nice and took care of what ever we needed. The apartment is just 2 min from the subway which helped us get to Manhattan quickly.

Michelle is really nice and her place is very cozy. This was my first airbnb experience and I enjoyed it a lot. Her service is much better than anything you would get at a hotel for a much better price. She gave us a recommendation on where to get breakfast that turned out great. The place is very clean and neatly decorated. It's literally right off the subway station, so that's a huge plus. We also met her mother, who is a fascinating woman. I highly recommend her place, if you are looking to visit the area.  
-- Later Edit:
I should mention that her internet is very fast. I don't know what ISP she uses, but it was a joy to go back to a temporary accommodation and know that you are well connected while traveling. I'm not sure of the exact setup, but it appeared that we had a separate modem and router just for us. This was a huge relief. Michelle had the SSID and password printed and ready for guests, so even if you forget to ask, you would still find them in the apartment. Overall, things were very well thought out before hand and Michelle was very proactive with tiny details like this that make all the difference. This was very surprising to me knowing that I'm dealing with an individual and not a company.
Michelle was very nice and her flat is very confortable, well located with the subway at the end of the street. I recommend her. Thanks a lot Michelle and see you later.
Michelle was an outstanding host and very helpful, apartment clean and convenient.

Amazing 4 day stay with Michelle in Brooklyn! We arrived a little early but she was still able to find time to accommodate us...arriving with fresh fruit and water for us. The apartment is amazing, plenty of room with all the comforts you could ask for (small kitchen/TV with cable/wifi). Easy access to trains and transportation, with many restaurants near by. After this stay, I don't think I'll be booking a traditional hotel in NYC again. Highly recommended!! Thanks again Michelle!

name: The Porto Concierge - White Dove
summary: Beautiful house totally renewed for an excelente stay in Porto! Equipped with everything you might need for a comfortable stay! With 3 independent bedrooms, in excellent location to visit Porto, either by foot (10 minutes walk to city center) or metro (5 minutes walk to metro station).

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda  os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

loc.address: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.txt: Everything was fine
Felt very welcome, great house, good location, very clean, lots of information about Porto. Overall a great few days.
We were really happy with the place. It was close to everything but still separated so we could have our own place. The terrace is huge and sunny. I would recommend the place to everyone!
I think Jose does not exist, the guy who came did not know the place at all. The place was clean and just renovated. The neighbourhood doesn't feel really safe but we did not have any problem at all.
Good location, really nice apartament, convenient for families with children due to lerge terrace. The only minus is the paid parking place. Recomended.

The place deserves 6 stars !
 We had the entire house and it has excellent. The location is 1 min away from the metro station, 10 minutes away from the river side, prefect location. 
The apartment had everything: a big terrace, clean bathrooms, beautiful rooms and you could find all that you need there: hair dryer, iron, sandwich maker, toaster, everything. 
We did not meet the host is person, we communicated by e-mail and what's up, his response was in minutes, he even gave us tips and tricks regarding Porto. 
I definitely recommend the place .

It took more than 24 hours for The Port Concierge to reply us the day before check-in due to change in itinerary. We called, texted, messaged numerous times and couldn't contact them until 10am that day. That was a bit disappointing. Other than that the house was great, comfortable bed and soundproof environment. The kitchen doesn't have all the essentials such as oil, only salt. The free wine and water was a nice touch, but still having all the necessary amenities for cooking away from home was more important. Overall a good stay.
Great stay. Secluded but not far from city center. Very spacious balcony. Perfectly equipped kitchen. Perfect for vacation with friends.

Modern villa with all facilities required for a comfortable family stay - in good location to walk to riverside cafe's, restaurants and attractions, or take tram to City Centre. Cost effective car park and tram station literally next door. Only slight negative is the neighbour has two dogs that are put out every the night that bark at anything that moves!

name: Quiet Stylish Mosman Apartment
summary: My 3br ground floor apartment is close to Balmoral beach, buses, city, parks, harbour foreshore walks. You'll love the room as it has its own private courtyard. Lift access.. Comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

host.about: I am a retired property valuer. I love to travel. I usually do houseswaps but Airbnb is also a good way to connect with the community and far better than staying in a hotel.

reviews.txt:
Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Again we had such a lovely experience staying with Krythia. She is such a wonderful host. 
Krythia make you feel like your right at home. 
Highly recommend this apartment. 

Many thanks 
Mark and Rebecca

My wife and I had a really fantastic stay with Krythia. The apartment is super homely, cosy and private. The bedroom we stayed in was really nice and had a private courtyard attached to it. We also had access to our own private bathroom. Everything was really comfortable and clean, and we were able to do our own cooking too. Krythia herself is a lovely hostess. We had several interesting conversations with her and she made us feel welcome right from the start. The apartment is just a few minutes walk from the bus stop, with it being very easy snd convenient to get into the city from there. Highly recommend this apartment, especially if you're a cat lover - Krythia's cat Cindy is super friendly!

We stayed at krythias apartment for four nights. The apartment and the room is as you can see it on the pictures. Modern and nice looking. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfy. Krythia is a really nice lady and we had some great short conversations with her. We felt very welcomed. The only thing we like to mention for the apartment that is located in a really nice area of Sydney, is that you can only reach it by bus (5 stops) - so there is no tram nearby. The last bus we were able to find to the direction of the apartment left the city at 8:30 pm. That was sometimes a little bit early for us and we had to take an uber (which costs around 20AUD). Everything else was really awesome and we can recommend to stay there for sure. Thank you Krythia for the amazing stay in Sydney.
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.
Very good house, very clean room and private bathroom, very lovely cat and one very kindliness host. Spend a nice week with Krythia
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.
Very clean and comfortable,
Very pleasant location, spacious apartment, extremely clean bathroom and kitchen. Excellent WiFi reception. Very friendly and helpful host
Highly recommended. No problems at all .

Great apartment located at a nice area. Good public transportation to the city. Car park available and very easy to get around. Lots of cafes and restaurants around the area. The room is nice and clean with a nice private bathroom. Cindy the cat is very friendly too.

Krythia's apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable and close to beautiful Balmoral.  Krythia was very understanding about our late arrival into Sydney and ensured we could access the property in her absence.  Krythia ensured we had everything we needed to make ourselves comfortable for our brief stay (tea, coffee) and was a generous host.
Great place, host and value

The apartment is in a small, modern complex, very close to a bus route direct to the centre of Sydney (10 minutes). Shops and beach are close but a LONG walk.
The bedroom is A-C, very private with very comfortable bed.
Amazing place, friendly host and good in value

Krythia's place is central to Sydney and close to some beautiful beaches. The room is soacuous and the courtyard offers a nice private area to chill out. Krythia was a great host and very accommodating.
Krythia was a lovely host. The unit was central in Mossman and a short walk to buses which were only 10 minutes to the city. The bathroom and bedroom was lovely and we had a fantastic time.

name: Catete's Colonial Big Hause Room B
summary: Old floor, intirely reformed, destined to receive people in a very harmonious and welcoming place. Located at Catete's neighborhood, with a very easy access to the metro station, a lot of bus lines, next to a excellent trade and things to do around.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Large 3 bedrooms apartment
summary: This favourite home offers a huge balcony, lots of space, easy life, all the comfort you need and a fantastic location! The beach is only 3 minutes away. Metro is 2 blocks away (starting august 2016).

host.about: Born in London, raised in Rio, living in Lisbon. Love to travel around the world, to meet new people and their culture.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Twin Bed room+MTR Mongkok shopping&My
summary: Dining shopping conveniently located Mongkok subway E1, airport shuttle bus stops A21. Three live two beds, separate WC, 24-hour hot water. Free WIFI.

host.about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service

)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.txt: Good place to stay. It is very strategic place
Very convenient. Just a few steps to MTR. Everything is okay.

Room is small and cozy, and the alley to the room is narrow and kinda spooky lol

The room is located near the emergency exit on the 19th floor

Location can't be beat, beds were surprisingly comfortable by HK standards. The room had everything we needed. 

Only unusual thing to note is that the host asked for a 200 HKD cash safety deposit (I guess this is standard policy for the hotel they run).

Initial room given was not as advertised on either photo of the guesthouse. Rather it was a bunk bed with little to almost no room for luggage storage, when we asked for a room change we were told "That is not how business is done here. If we gave each guest the room pictured we would not make money." We were finally given a room change after voicing our concerns that room given was not a pictured and insisting for a change in rooms, but the second room was also not as advertised.
Accessable location, and Danny is responsive when I contact her.
Gd location

name: montreal monalisa
summary: Cozy apartment located in downtown, very near from public subway station(200 meters), many nice restaurants and cafés around. One free parking in back yard.

reviews.txt: The Host made us feel very welcome , we were six of us. Everything was clean and spacious and the neighbourhood  was right in downtown with all the amenities and resturants. Although it rained we still had a good time.

The apartment was lovely and in a fantastic location in Montreal. 

Just as described. 

Kenny was welcoming and helpful. He made our stay very pleasant and accommodated our arrival and departure times.

We had the most wonderful experience at Kenny's spot! It's in an awesome location central in the Plateau and a quick 10-15 min drive or cab into downtown.

It is cute, clean and he leaves you towels and other nice additions that really make you feel comfortable! 

The property is set up through an entry code so no key exchange makes everything so seamless and efficient.

We will definitely come back to stay here again!

Although we didn't meet our host in person he communicated with us via text and promptly replied to any of our exchanges. We arrived in the evening and the lights and airconditioning were on for our comfort. Fresh flowers were on the table and the apartment was clean and stocked with all necessary supplies. The apartment was spacious enough for our family of six. Great location, close to shops, clubs, and restaurants. We would definitely come again.

Very nice place with three proper bedrooms and a sofa, kitchen and living room. There were four of us and we were perfectly comfortable. In a great central location, easy walk or short drive from many Montreal destinations. Kenny was very accessible. Thank you!
It's my first time in Airbnb, overall it is a nice house!

Kenny's Airbnb was very spacious and unique. Everything was clean and the location (Plateau) was really good. Close to many bars and restaurants without the noise and crowds of the downtown core of Montreal (which can be reached by foot in 20 - 30 mins or easily via subway)

Check in / check out was convenient using a keycode. The apartment had a dishwasher, AC unit, a washer, and dryer. There's also a TV box with Netflix, a nice added touch.

Provided free parking in the back of the house was VERY helpful. Finding parking in Montreal can be a huge headache.

I would definitely stay here again!

Cute place that sleeps 3 singles comfortably (although we were only two). Loved the quirky decor. There was coffee, sugar cubes and a French press which was nice. No hair dryer though, so ladies - bring your own. :)
Very big space. The photos didn't do it justice. Has everything you need. Great location. Car space is a bit awkward.

Our experience with Kenny was wonderful.  Kenny was very quick to respond and helped us find an extra parking space for our U-Haul trailer which we had with us as we were moving our son into his apartment for the school year.  

The location is perfect, the apartment is large and I especially enjoyed sipping my coffee on the back balcony! Also, the free parking was fantastic for a small/regular sized vehicle. Parking may be too tight for a large SUV. The keyless entry was convenient, and the ac was welcome as it happened to be a hot and muggy couple of days.  Finally, we asked what we should do upon leaving and Kenny quickly wrote back "don't do a thing" and "good luck" to our son. It was a nice, personal touch.

It was great staying at the heart of Rue St Denis, just 2 blocks from the Metro. Having a parking space is an added bonus.  Airconditioning was great. Kenny was so thoughtful; she left bottles of water for us, which was a nice treat during the hot streak. The terrace was a nice treat. This is an awesome place for a family.

This property has a great location and unlike most in the area has a private (albeit small) parking spot in the rear alley. 
It has two terraces, one over busy St Denis, the other overlooks the backyard.
The parking spot is a bit hard to get in and out of. My full size car fit but I had to have my travel partner guide me when leaving the spot. 
Coffee and bottled water were on hand and a nice touch.
The Metro station is very close.
I think it would be tight getting 6 people to fit comfortably. One bed is pretty small, 5 would be more accurate.
The free WiFi was fast and reliable.
Host was very responsive with emails arranging how to access the apartment.

Great place to stay!  Very clean and was in a great convenient location near all the bars and restaurants and a metro station.  It was very quiet, so you don't hear anything from the outside.  I would definitely stay again and recommend it to future Montreal travelers!

We had a great experience for our first time  at an Airbnb.  We really enjoyed our stay, and the location was wonderful.  The rooms clean, and the place had a cozy feel to it.  We would definately repeat.
terrific place in Montreal.  great location.  clean and comfortable.

Kenny's apartment is a great place to stay in Montreal. Like others have said, it's in the heart of great neighborhood, Plateau Mont Royal, and right around the corner from a metro station. There are multiple great bars and restaurants (including a bistro called Cafe Cherrier and the famous L'Express) within just a few minutes' walk.

We were a group of four and the apartment fit us very comfortably. The rooms are spaced pretty far apart for privacy, which was an added bonus. The bathroom is large and the water pressure in the shower was excellent (it's a pet peeve of mine when pressure is low!).

Kenny was extremely responsive -- he answered a bunch of my emails before the trip and a couple I had while we were staying at the apartment, most of them nearly immediately. 

I would definitely stay here again!
Great
Kenny's Place was very clean, what we expected and she even let us come back when we forgot our trays the next day. We would definitely stay here again.

name: O charme de estar em frente à praia
summary: Apart-hotel em frente a praia. Aconchegante e com um espetacular amanhecer e entardecer. Varanda ampla para poder realizar as refeições aproveitando a vista da praia e das piscinas. Lindo! Pertinho das melhores praias do Rio de Janeiro, shopping, cinemas, excelentes restaurantes e barzinhos.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Brasileiro, Publicitário, Diretor de Arte, apaixonado por viagens e gastronomia.

name: DOUBLE ROOM (1 or 2 people)
summary: DOUBLE ROOM IN A FOUR BEDROOM FLAT (TWO DOUBLES AND TWO SINGLES) AND TWO SHARED BATHROOMS. CLEAN TOWELS, WIFI AND COMMON ELEMENTS ARE INCLUDED. ALSO THE CLEANING OF THE COMMON AREAS ONCE A WEEK. THE DAY OF ENTER WE SIGN A CONTRACT TO GIVE GUARANTEES TO BOTH PARTS AND WE ASK FOR HALF MONTH OF DEPOSIT.

host.about:
Nos gusta mucho viajar, conocer gente y compartir birras, vinos, o bebidas raras que se toman por el mundo.
Disfrutamos mucho del tiempo compartido con nuestros amigos y familia.
Fanáticos de hacer deporte y de comer asado

reviews.txt: Very nice guy, thanks for your help
Neiguel was a great host. We had great time in Barcelona.
Neiguel and his flatmate are really easygoing people. The flat was nicely located near Camp Nou (only 2 blocks away!) and for the cheap price, we get what we paid. Recommended! Thanks Niguel! :)

We enjoyed our stay,  it was super easy to communicate and Very nice apartment with such nice Guys to host us! Everything was perfect,  so close to the metro station,  and to almost  20 supermarket!  Thank you a lot! :)

It was a good stay in Barcelona city. Comfortable room - that exactly on the picture you see. Perfect view from the window. Five minutes to famous Camp Nou. Thousands of necessary shops. Close to metro.  Two minutes and you have all you want. What more do you need? :)
Its impossible not to mention the host of that flat.Neiguel -  good, easy-going, communicative man. He is eager to help you in any situation. Explain the easiest way and give important marks of Barca. We were happy to stay at his place and suggest you to choose that flat - you will not be dissapointed. We will come back. And now its your time to visit Minsk!

We stayed one week at Nahuel’s flat and he is a great host. We could use everything we liked in the kitchen and Nahuel always said: It’s all inclusive ;-) The other (Hidden by Airbnb) are also very friendly and help you whenever you have questions!

My stay at Nahuel's place was fantastic!  It was the 1st place I stayed in Barcelona, and I was deffinitely a bit overwhelmed when I arrived.  Nahuel, and Juaquin, couldn't have been nicer, or more hospitable!  Made me feel right at home immediately, shared stories, some wine, helped me translate some things;), always helped with directions, they just made their home feel like my home:)  So laid back, so genuinely nice.  It was a total pleasure staying there, I'd suggest them to Anyone!

Nahuel is a great host. The house is clean and tidy. The house is also really close by to Camp Nou, Barcelona FC Stadium. There is a supermarket and also a pizza shop just below the house. The metro is also really close by. Nahuel will tell you where are the tourist attractions in Barcelona. You will definitely enjoy your stay at Nahuel's house. I would recommend him to be your host at Barcelona.

Our trip in Barcelona was really short and fast but we enjoyed it alot :)
The flat looks exactly like in pictures, clean, colorful and with a nice view. It is close to the metro station and there are many shops nearby.
It is sad that we didn't have the chance to meet Nahuel, but we met his flatmate and he is really friendly and willing to help. 
We would definitely stay again. Thanks!
Well worth the money. It was exactly what we needed for the one night in Barcelona for a Champions League match.

name: Private Room (2)  in Guest House at Coogee Beach
summary: Room 2  Private room in charming recently renovated federation guest house at Coogee Beach. Prices are per room for 2 People only. A queen  and a single bed. Not suitable for group booking All rooms have  TV, desk, wardrobe, beds, unlimited wifi 2 mins from the beach, cafes and transport. This is not a party house but a safe and clean place to stay. Share bathrooms and kitchen... All common areas are cleaned daily.

host.about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.txt: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!

name: Lulapartment II
summary: Apartamento situado no centro histórico do Porto, paredes meias com a muralha Fernandina, em pleno bairro típico Portuense, com uma vista soberba!!! Recuperado e decorado com o objectivo de tornar confortável a estadia dos nossos hospedes.

host.about:
Olá!!! 
Somos um casal, pais de três crianças! Adoramos viajar!
Gostamos de viajar a dois, em família e com amigos.
Somos proprietários de dois apartamentos no centro do Porto, todos os requisitos que procuramos quando viajamos, temos nos nossos apartamentos, conforto, limpeza, baby friendly, e centralidade!
Esperemos que gostem!
Sejam bem-vindos!

reviews.txt: Nice and well located appartment.was perfect with our three children.

The apartment was clean and comfortable. Housekeeping services were a great amenity providing fresh towels/sheets and cleaning weekly.Access to the trams and metro were nearby taking you to the beautiful sights all around Porto. We highly recommend this apartment!
Great location, the apartment was beyond adorable and spacious enough for 5-6 people.  Cristina was very friendly and welcoming and we had a fantastic time in Porto.
Everything went perfect, according to announcement. The apartment is very well located, very central but also quiet. Cristina is really really nice and easygoing. No complaints at all.
Muy amables y muchos detalles.
Very clean appartment, well located. Cristina is very welcoming and cares about all details to make her hosts feeling good ! I recommand this stay ! I hope to come back soon.

name: Luxury Style Space: ideal for short or longterm!
summary: This beautiful space is like a mini-apartment in my apartment. The huge 12'x16' room was converted from my living space using a professional room converter. The bed is topped with memory foam for extra comfort, the windows are huge, couch is comfy. Just a dream of a stay! [FYI: no (further) discounts. I do have a weekly/monthly discount auto-installed for my listing already, so please do not ask]

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Dellasie was a very nice and gracious host. The room was huge, clean, and looked precisely as pictures. Her home was very conveniently located near transportation (train/bus/cabs), food... Anything you might need. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to NYC!"

My stay in the house was perfect. The house was very clean, and comfortable. With so many space. I feel like in home. She was genial. The place was in the middle of Broklyn, so many local stores (food, clothing...) good located to the subway and bus station. I recommend this place to have a good time in NYC.
The space was comfortable, convenient, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Dellasie was a great host, was friendly and kind, gave us our privacy when needed but was always up for a chat. The flat is very nice, the neighbourhood is nice and lively, it is located very close to transport links, and you can be in Manhattan in 40 mins. A great place for anybody visiting New York! We would definitely stay again

Dellasie is a very prompt, helpful and easy-going host. Everything was set very promptly and prepared for my stay. The underground is cca 3 minutes walk from the apartment. Good choice for a short NYC trip!
Very clean and comfortable space. Separated from the main apartment area by a thick curtain. The apartment is close to the subway and very easy to access by car.

Dellasie was very warm and friendly - I felt very welcome in her home. The room is right in the center of her apartment but she was careful to make me feel like the space was my own private room. The neighborhood is great and one of my favorites in Brooklyn. I felt happy wandering around on foot in the day and the subway station is very close by with useful links. And the bed is SO comfortable!

The bed is in a large space which is on the living room of the apartment. Privacy is provided by large black curtains. Dellasie was really friendly and stayed out of your way. The Kingston metro station is just a couple of blocks away. It was a good deal for a short stay.

I had a very good experience here Dellasie was a good host and very kind. The place was clean and it was nice and quiet but most of all its in the middle of all the best places to go so no where is too far. Thank you Dellasie I would definitely come back.

I loved staying at Dellasie's place! She was very friendly and so helpful with any questions I had to ask. The room was just as described. I was perfectly comfortable the entire time and I felt right at home! I spent one day being lazy in the apartment recovering from my rough travel day and she even brought me a bunch of movies to watch. Great host!
Dellasie was easy to contact. Answered all my questions and welcomed me when I arrived. No complaints. The place was spacious, clean, easily accessable with public transport.
Dellasie made me very welcome.   Convenient location.   Very secure.

I waited a couple of days to write this review, as I want to digest this experience and try to review it as objectively as I can. 

The guest before me needs to check out late so she contacted me the day before I can do the check in between 4PM to 6:30PM. I was enjoying my holiday, I guess I could as the place I stayed before is not far from hers. So I replied yes. Long story short, the following day I got stuck in the traffic and got locked out from the place I stayed before. 

I was late. 

Dellasie was not happy, even I apologized. She won't listen to me explain either, "don't argue!" That's what she said

I didn't see her much during the days I stayed. She did provide me privacy and a big bed. Thanks.

The kitchen sink was always full of dirty dishes, I was not cooking there, just not so pleasant. The neighbour was loud at night, I can hear the TV is on till 2am, but this is New York, which is ok.

Generally it is ok, liveable, have privacy, safe area, loads of good restaurants. The host could be more welcoming, which is kind of her job. Smile once doesn't hurt.

Dellasie was very welcoming when I came to stay at her place. It is a very spacious room, and Dellasie will give you all the privacy you need. The apartment is a bit far away if you look to spend most of your time in Manhattan, but it is easy to access by train. You should check out Dellasie's music, she is a very talented singer and musician!

Dellasie was a terrific host. She was quick to respond to every inquiry. She was enthusiastic and acommodating without being intrusive. Her place was easy to get to (by subway) from Manhattan. Large room, thoughtfully furnished.
Dellasie is a great host, and the space is good as described. The area was a little noisy at night, so if it summer bring your ear plug ;)

The place was easy to find. If you come by car though,  be prepared to look for parking, especially in the evening. The room is indeed very clean and spacious.  However the bed is a bit smaller than shown on the picture. The room is separated by a thick curtain. Don't worry, it will still give you total intimacy. There is a big leather couch and a large table full of magazines; I liked the attention to details.  Dellasie is a very sweet and funny hostess (she's also a great singer!). On the bed was a basket with clean towels and a bottle of water. I thought it was a nice gesture.  I didn't see her a lot but she does respond quickly to her emails. Overall,  it is a very convenient and  safe place. I would recommend this room for a single traveler.

Even though I arrived just before midnight, Dellasie was very welcoming and showed me around the apartment straight away. She made it clear that she was available for help but left me my privacy, which was much appreciated! Good location, only a few minutes to the subway and reasonably close to Manhattan downtown. Really enjoyed my stay here and would definitely recommend!

Dellasie is a wonderful host.
Very pleasant stay. Being an artist myself, it was a bit easy to connect with her and I enjoyed our conversation.
She is extremely accommodating as we arrived a bit late, also that we kept her well informed about our whereabouts and when we would arrive.
There was a bottle of water, fresh towels and a card showing the wifi password by the bed which I thought was a nice touch.
Though I disturbed her in the middle of night when I did not try the door right, after grabbing a pizza in the corner, she and her boyfriend did not mind at all. Good people!

Dellasie is very generous and the space is pretty great - there's a large black curtain that segments the living room so you have your own space. Dellasie leaves you a towel and clear instructions for the wifi etc, and there's a huge fan in place and a place to hang your clothing. The apartment is clean and spacious, though some may find the makeshift bed a little too small. The only bad thing to me was the awful heat!

name: New Furnishings! Very Private! Great Deal! GC 137
summary: Fabulous value in Wailea resort! If you want the perfect and spacious 2 bed/2 bath condo that is tastefully decorated, complete privacy and serenity and a lanai surrounded with lush shrubbery, THIS IS IT! Bright and airy, this unit is located in a quiet, ground floor, private location on the cul de sac. Tile throughout the dining to living areas and carpeting in the bedroom. Check out the recent pictures of the slide show listed on this AirBnb. Hawaii Tax ID #: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.txt: Best AirBnb experience so far! No issues at all. Everything was fine.

We had a fabulous and comfortable stay at Grand Champions! The unit was accurately depicted (actually looked even better in person) with beautiful furnishings and equipped with all the essentials for added comfort and convenience! It is private and in an excellent location within the GC community. A beautiful gift basket was awaiting our arrival. Check-in is a breeze. The lanai faces an amazing garden with views of the mountain and a peek-a-boo view of the ocean. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking if you so choose. The master bath has an amazing walk-in shower. The pools are beautiful and the grilling areas are kept clean. Some very nice beaches nearby and a great central location to get around the entire island by car. Host Amanda represents the best of hospitality; friendly, responsive, and professional! Will definitely recommend and come back again.
Amanda was great! We loved the grand champions villas and was surprised by how close it was to everything.
Very nice condo with 2 full baths and walk in shower!  Gift basket on arrival was an unexpected nice touch.   The wall mirror makes the mail room look really big.   We will be back soon!
The hosts were very responsive.  Unit was very quiet.

Beautiful place very clean and more that we expect very convenient with beach chair umbrella and beach towels. 
We will comeback and stay in the unit #137 . Very close to everything and Amanda is a very nice host ! My friends really love it !
Overall a great place
G

Excellent location, close to shops and great beaches.  We had a minor cleaning issue when we arrived, but CBI was very responsive and addressed it promptly.  The unit was well equipped with furnishings that met our needs.  The pool access, parking, and check-in was seemless.  We enjoyed our stay.

Thank you to a wonderful host! The place was immaculate and beautiful decor nice island touches. The master shower is so spacious. Location was ideal close to shopping and beaches and easy to explore the island. Looking forward to our next vacation!! Mahalo!

This unit is at the ground floor and there is another unit above it. The area is very quiet. Very short drive to the shopping resort area and the beaches. Rental car is highly recommended.
The unit comes with a dishwasher, washer and dryer, and even a juice blender. There are two bedrooms and two shower rooms. The main walk-in shower room is very pleasant to use, especially with young kids. 
The management company is professional, always fast to respond and very supportive during our few weeks stay. 
We would definitely come back again!

This place was beautiful and so centrally located. We loved that everything was either a quick drive or in some cases walkable. If we ever get a chance to get back to Maui, we would want to stay here.

name: Contemporary Remodeled Ocean View Villa in Kapalua
summary: Experience the Kapalua  lifestyle by staying at our tropical, spacious and contemporary remodeled townhouse style villa. Our romantic retreat is situated in a quiet and well appointed cul de sac at the top of The Ridge at Kapalua. Enjoy imposing direct views of both the Pacific Ocean and the internationally famous Kapalua Bay golf course. Please note these nightly rates include the 14.4% hawaii tax.

host.about: This was our home and we loved living here, however we have extended our family and now have a little boy so we decided to move into a slightly bigger house on Maui.

reviews.txt:
This house is wonderful! 
It is one of the best Airbnb experiences ever. 
Beautiful neighborhood, very nice apartment (big, elegant and comfortable) with everything you may need. 
Everything was perfect: car park, easy access, beautiful views, two fantastic bathrooms, garden and terrace, etc. 
Definitely top!

Leila's place is truly amazing. A very clean, well equiped and beautiful place for our stay on Maui. The view from the terrace was great. I would recommend friends to stay here and if ever be back in Maui, I would reach out to Leila again!

A truly piece of paradise. Lovely decorated and very clean.

We hope to happily return one day. :-)

Mahalo

Albert & Maya

Hi! Staying at Leila's condo in Lahaina was my first ever AirBnB stay! Leila was accessible. She responded to any questions I had very quickly. She was always helpful! Her condo was amazing! Very clean, just as described, and I loved the location! Woke up to so much sunlight! A great view of the ocean! Had breakfast on our patio everyday! There is a cool breeze that will make you never want to leave! As for drive, it was less than an hour from Kahului Airport and the drive to several beaches were less than 10 minutes, I would highly recommend staying at Leila's!! It was a great experience!!

Thanks again, Leila!

Can't speak highly enough of the house, great location.
House was immaculate, owners were helpful and got in touch with us to make sure all was ok. 
Great value for money and would highly recommend!
Beautiful lovely house! We really enjoyed our stay and believe it is perfect for everyone looking for a beautiful quite place on the west side of maui.
Beautiful contemporary place with everything you would need and the location was great being a short walk from Kapalua bay (swimming snorkeling) and many great restaurants and a grocery store.

The views from the bedroom
And great room are wonderful - hard to leave!   The location is perfect for us because we think Kapaluna is the best at
Area of Maui

Leila was an excellent host. We had a delayed flight and did not arrive to the condo until 1:30am. Easy to find. Easy to access. Excellent amenities. Beautiful view! Quiet. 
Very responsive to any questions. 
Location is awesome! Walking distance to beaches, restaurants, etc. or easy & FREE shuttle (5-10 minute wait) in the Kapalua area.
We are looking forward to working with her again in the near future.

We stayed here on our first trip to Maui and we couldn't have had asked for a better place to vacation. From the spacious living areas to the modern decor, Leila's condo is located in a prime spot with spectacular views of the Pacific Ccean. After staying at her place, I wanted to highlight 4 great things about our experience: 

1) Resort amenities- there is a complimentary shuttle that can take you between the Ritz Carlton and Montage resorts from your villa, along with other places in the Kapalua resort. This is great, especially for trying the top rated restaurants at the resorts without having to pay for parking...plus you can have a glass (or bottle) of wine and let someone else worry about the driving :) Or you can walk!

2) Accessibility- Whether you are looking to take in a nice stroll along the beach or play a round of golf, her villa is nestled right in the heart of the Kapalua Resort. Even in the rain, you can enjoy the nice pool with a covered eating area! And I need to mention that the views from her condo are breath-taking, so if you fancy a night in, hers is the place to do it!

3) Her Condo- I've stayed at hotels and resorts before, but I have to say that her villa exceeds anything you can find at a high end resorts. The wi-fi was strong and fast - able to be used among multiple devices. And the entire space was so clean! We had the security of knowing that the crew didn't just do a once over and be done, but actually took the time to make sure that it was ready and prepped for us, as if no one had stayed there before us. I'm a stickler for very nice bedrooms and beds, and hers was not only comfortable, but also offered me a great night's rest after a day of beach, beach and more beach :)

4) Leila & Dan - They have been a gracious host, allowing us to stay at their condo. They were quick to respond, always providing us with best in class service, and were able to provide some great recommendations on activities and events to do on the island. 

I want to thank you for taking the time to read my review. Our experience staying at Leila and Dan's condo was great, and we truly enjoyed the time we spent on Maui. I cannot thank them enjoy for allowing us this great and special opportunity, and for giving us a chance to experience this beautiful island in a way that like no other.
