For this we are very grateful! 

We wish you all the best in booking your stays through AirBnb and hope you have the opportunity to stay at Leila and Dan's condo... we hope to as well very soon! 

Mahalo!
Great location, clean and comfortable place. Leila was a responsive, helpful and kind host!

Excellent place to stay, modern with an incredible view from the bedroom. Perfect place to stay for our mini honeymoon. It really felt like a home and we look forward to watching the place grow and change with each trip to Maui.
This house and location was truly amazing and the views breath-taking!  The neighborhood was quiet and close to everything we needed!
Really good place to live in. Love it, great view! Quite clean close to beach! Def stay there if I have the chance again!

The place was perfect for us, we went to wholefoods and got our supplies for the week. Was able to do our own cooking and relax at the beach everyday. Not alot of food choice around the area for breakfast/lunch so recommend doing own shop.

Very classy place!  Check in was a breeze and since we didn't have to meet up with our host to get the keys, we were able to arrive quite late.  The "instant book" was also really nice.  This house is on a beautiful golf course in a quiet and scenic neighborhood.  We were able to watch giant crashing waves and humpback whales from the porch.  Just lovely.
Fantastic place!

Beautiful location! The view was great and the community was so quiet and convenient. Room is well stocked and comfortable. Very clean and the host was very easy to talk to and responsive. There are no beach chairs or cooler to use FYI. We hope to be back to Maui soon! Definitely would stay here again.

Leila's place was quiet, secluded, and in a beautiful neighborhood on a golf course. The house had an incredible view from both the living room and the bedroom, and while there was an air conditioner, it wasn't needed due to the lovely breeze. The house is walking distance from a small beach, and is a quick drive to the Honolua General Store which has coffee, pastries, sandwiches and hot food, toiletries, towels, sunblock... pretty much everything. 

The house comes equipped with travel size shampoo, body wash, hair conditioner, and bar soap. It also has a small hair dryer.

There are beach umbrellas and chairs in the backyard ready to be taken to the beach.

The wind gusts can get a little loud at times, I think because of how the house is situated on the hill. The bed was a little bit lumpy, but mostly soft and comfortable. The house renovations are gorgeous and look brand new, and there's a huge second bathroom with a great bathtub not pictured in the photos! Very clean, bright, and lovely. As other reviewers said, the photos do *not* do this house justice.

Overall, it was a wonderful place to stay. Thank you!
A+

name: Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow
summary: Located close to the beach-just steps to the water, you’ll love our optimal quiet location& newly renovated comfortable bungalow with oversized loft, large tropical lanai for lounging& paddle board, surfboard, boogie boards & beach gear for play. Ride your bike into historic Lahaina in just s few minutes, or stay on property and play in the 3 pools, tennis court, beautiful club house, surf breaks or wander the 30 acres. TAXID: TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

host.about: Bozeman, Montana- mother of two adorable boys-  I love to travel and explore this amazing world we live in

reviews.txt: Great communication as well as an superb property and location!

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was perfect!   The bungalow is very comfortable, in a beautiful setting and within walking distance (one mile) of shops and restaurants.  Elise had everything available for us and we felt right at home.  If we ever return to Maui, we would love to stay here again.   Thank you Elise!!!

We spent a week and a half at the Ocean Breeze Bungalow in Lahaina and it was absolutely perfect. The house was well appointed, extremely clean and  Puamana is centrally located to everything Maui has to offer. We had everything we needed to feel right at home. The complex is within walking distance of Lahaina. And a 30 minute drive to everything else. You really can't find a better place on Maui.
Elise was an ideal host and we had great communication from her and her onsite manager. 
One note - If you are looking for more of a party scene or a place to get a little wild this is probably not a great choice....if you want a sweet peaceful place that's not a pretentious resort, this is for you.
Lovely Place and quiet community

Elise was fantastic - quick and responsive to all communication.  She sent a very detailed e-mail with all the necessary check-in information. Her place was exactly as described and the photos were accurate.  It was, neat, clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen had everything necessary to cook and prepare meals. The neighborhood was awesome - clean and safe.  It was an easy walk into town and located close to many of the activities we had planned.

Fantastic location with many amenities and easy walk to all the shops, restaurants and activities that Lahaina has to offer. Limited sand on the beach at location (December), but plenty of activities for the whole family to enjoy. Elise is a pleasure to work with; outstanding communication and information shared!

This is a wonderful property, private, and walkable to the town of Lahaina. Good for family or couples getaway. Elise was readily available for any questions we had! We loved hanging out on the back porch in the beautiful Maui weather!

Great location! Just a nice walk down Front street brings you to the heart of Lahaina. A beautiful Airbnb steps away from the ocean and in a very nicely maintained community.

Elise is very very responsive. The guests before us left the place in a mild disarray breaking various items but she let me know as soon as she found out and attempted to fix what she could in one day. She sent us a lovely basket of Maui-an goods to make up for the honestly very minor inconveniences, which was a very nice gesture. Check-in instructions very clear and easy.

The house has a lovely back deck, while although not entirely private as you can see the other neighboring decks, was a nice place to enjoy some meals.  She offers many of the essentials such as a SUP, snorkels, watershoes, boogie boards and a outdoor shower, which made going out to explore the beaches hassle free. The rooms are nicely appointed and we really had everything we needed. Could not have asked for a better place to stay.

Great location and very comfortable.  Comes with everything you need for a beach vacation including boogie boards, paddle/surf boards...  we watched the sunset every day from the pool/clubhouse area.  Elise was wonderful and very responsive.  Mahalo for a wonderful vacation!!!

Puamana is the best place to stay in Maui. Elise's place is also the best place in Puamana. It had everything we needed to relax, swim, eat and play. Thank you for sharing an incredible place with us!

We had a great time. Elise's is a nice place with everything you need for a fun trip to Hawaii, including kitchen equipment, beach toys, surfing and body surfing boards, and beach lounge equipment. There was one minor mistake in the listing but Elise promptly corrected it when it was brought to her attention and made amends for the confusion. Everything else was as described and made for a wonderful trip to Maui! Thanks for sharing your place with us!

I would definitely recommend Elise's condo to anyone staying in the Lahaina area. It is even nicer than the pictures suggest and we were very comfortable during our stay. Elise thought of anything and everything you could possibly need - from making a home-cooked meal to spending a day on the beach. Also, the community of Puamana is beautiful! Do not miss the ocean front pool - it's spectacular.
Don't hesitate to book here - it's a great value and you'll love every minute of your stay!

Elise's place in Lahaina was perfect for the couple days we visited. The home is in a great location off front street, close to multiple restaurants and shopping opportunities. She has a lot of beach equipment that comes with the house. We used the snorkel equipment, SUP, and surfboard. All equipment is in good condition and beach access is everywhere you look. A really great place for a quick beach vacation. Wouldn't hesitate to go back.

Puamana and specifically Elise's lovely townhome were perfect for our family of four's vacation in Maui. We had everything we needed, most importantly an absolutely beautiful and serene central location.

Check-In was easy and the property was just as described. The property is located within a mile walk of downtown Lahaina. Wonderful selection of restaurants and the nightlife is second to none. Elise responded immediately when we needed new batteries for one of the remotes and had an issue with operating one of the ceiling fans. Her on-site handyman Rick responded within minutes to assist us. The property met all our needs and I can highly recommend the property for a comfortable stay.

We had a great stay at Elise's place. The unit was comfortable for four guests. We loved the back patio area and having the charcoal grill was really nice. There was no beach access for us as the sand was covered by rocks however, this was stated in the description that beach access can vary depending on the time of year. The grounds were neat and clean and the views of the ocean are surreal. Elise was very responsive to any messages or texts. The check in process was easy and all the information was accurately provided by Elise. We had a great stay at Puamana and loved exploring Lahaina ( several shops and restaurants are close by). We would love to come back some day.
Incredible property.  Fast communications.  All the little touches (Hulu, grill, beach gear, charcoal, etc) were awesome!

This place his just amazing. Loved the private surfbreak! Very close to downtown lahaina. Elise was very accomodating for our schedule and responded very quickly. I don't have much more to say than our vacation at Elise's place was amazing!!
This was such a nice home to stay in. We had a fabulous time. The house had everything we needed for a fantastic holiday.

name: Appartment 5 minutes walk from the beach
summary: The apartment is composed by one bedroom, one bathroom, a living room with an open kitchen and a nice terrace. It is located 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.

reviews.txt: Gwen was a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our late arrival and very early departure. The apartment was exactly as we imagined with a lot of natural light, sleek "beachy" decor and only a 5 min walk to the beach, everything you need for a perfect weekend away. I would definitely stay with Gwen again.
Great location, lovely helpful hosts.

Gwen is very sweet! met with her briefly and she gave me good tips. The flat was cozy and clean, 5 mins walk to the beach and amazing restaurants: I loved BrownSugar right in front of their place. Staying here depends on what you are doing in Bondi. If it's to party and enjoy the nearby festivities until the wee hours of the night then this is perfect for you. I have to say that this place was a little too loud for my taste. Loud music from neighbors late at night and the busy street wasn't all that fun for an early sleeper like myself dealing with jet lag but it's out of Gwen's control so I just put my earplugs in and hoped for the best. Other than that, their place is perfectly located in safe area, and very close to the beach. Like I said it all depends on what you want out of your stay!
Great location, very close to the beach. Gwen and Jim were very helpful.
Great

Best location, the apartment was lovely and super close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Would recommend  Gwen's apartment to anyone and everyone that's wanting to go somewhere funky and fun! Gwen was super helpful with places to go, things to do and with questions and communication was great. Thanks Gwen for the best weekend!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gwen and Jim's.  Both were great communicators and made our 11pm arrival a breeze!
Good little place in an amazing location, only very short walk to the water.  Thanks for having us!

House is really close to bondi beach to walk! And many restaurants are near to house;-) 
Host is also kind! She explained about nice places to visit!

Gwen and Jim went out of their way to provide me with information on the apartment and neighborhood. They were fast to reply to communication and did everything they could to make sure my stay was comfortable. 
The location is out of this world. Close to good restaurants and bars and a 5 minute walk to the stunning Bondi Beach. 
The apartment is easy to access and comfortable. I would definitely stay here next time I am in Bondi.

Gwen provided great information regarding the apartment and also the surrounding shops and cafes. 10/10 

Was also contactable 24/7 as described. :)
This property is next to a busy road with a landing walkway the other side. Very hot with no a/c or fan. A very basic apartment with a wooden create as a coffee table!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location, and very easy to deal with. 
Thanks.
Beautiful location. Lovely unique apartment. Highly recommended
Great location close to Bondi, perfect for us and our puppy. The hosts were wonderful.
Great location right in the middle of Bondi. Gwen was so helpful and made the whole process really easy. 100% would recommend.

This apartment was absolutely perfect for a holiday in Sydney. It's a fantastic location-right in the heart of Bondi, 5 minutes away from the beach. Gwen was extremely communicative, and left us some great tips for things to see and do in the area.  I wish we could have stayed longer!
Gwennaelle was very helpful in providing lots of recommendations, house was clean and in a great location
Lovely clean apartment opposite the best nightlife in bondi walking distance to everything and great balcony

name: Affordable and close to the city!
summary: Comfortable room in a modern apartment near city.

host.about: Sydney has been my home for almost 8 years now and I’m still loving this beautiful city.  Glenn grew up here so he’s as local as one can get. We both work full time and enjoy spending the weekends doing outdoor activities or just chilling at home on a wet rainy day.

reviews.txt: Irene is a lovely and very helpfully host with a very nice place, tidy and clean. Recommended!
It was a great stay in Irene's place! The apartment is clean and cozy, located within walking distance from a train station as well as bus station. Both Irene and John are very helpful and welcoming.
Lovely apartment great location Irene was very friendly definitely would recommend
Perfect place to stay a couple of days to visit Sydney ! Irene is an amazing host !
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Clean , Spacious and comfortable room.
Very close to staion and up and comming REDFERN CAFES .
Great communication and flxible peerson .

Freat host and Room
The reservation was canceled 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely & very neat apartment with a really comfortable bed & that's really conveniently located. We loved the close proximity to Redfern Station & small shops nearby. Irene was very friendly & hospitable to us & responded promptly to any questions we had prior to our arrival. Highly recommended host!
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

NICE to meet Irene&Glenn! I had a good time in their home.They provided all that we need, the location for their apartment is convenient for us, room and bathroom are both clean. I had a great trip with my friends in Sydney.
Very friendly and helpful couple, also the place is great and looks like the pictures. Would recommend it for people with smaller luggage though because the room is on the 2nd floor

Irene and Glenn were the perfect hosts, period. Their home was perfect, they made us feel welcome every step of the way and even for NYE standards, our stay was absolutely worth the money. Definitely recommend to other guests! Thank you!

name: Beautiful condo next to downtown/ Condo bien situé
summary: Mon logement est proche du du fleuve st-laurent, Restaurant Wellington, Brasserie McAuslan, Station Lasalle, Griffintown, Marché Atwater, Downtown, Old Montreal, Bixi, Food store, Liquor store, beer store, Pharmacy. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour le lit confortable, le confort, le BBQ, la proximité de tous les attraits touristiques et les restos. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles (avec enfants). 10 min du centre-ville

host.about: Voyageuse dans l'âme, chargée de projets en communications pour pouvoir me payer ces voyages, amoureuse de la nature et des sports particulièrement ceux qui se pratiquent à l'extérieur (ski alpin, hiking, camping, canot, kayak, etc.)

reviews.txt:
This was a great listing and an amazing place to stay. Sofia's place is clean, well decorated and just the right amount of space for 2-4 people. The space felt cozy and we loved it. We were only a bit disappointed that we found out at the last minute that there was no AC (as listed) but Sofia was very understanding and compensated us based on our experience. 

Sofia herself is a great host who is very attentive right from the first moment we wanted the place. She kept in touch by email and text and even checked in with us daily. The instructions she left were clear and she was available to help when we needed anything. The neighbourhood was nice and quiet as well. 

I would definitely stay at this listing again!

Sofia's place was exactly as advertised. It was really clean and her directions were very clear. Sofia kept in contact with us to make sure everything was ok. Her restaurant recommendations were good as well. I would definitely stay at Sofia's place again. I really liked her condo and the neighborhood. The building was very quiet and we enjoyed staying there. 

Thanks again for everything Sofia!
The apartment is great, clean, modern, easy to find, and with all the amenities we needed

We had a beautiful stay. The pictures represent the apartment perfectly. Sofia is a sweetheart and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment is conveniently located near the highway & the metro. Will definitely try to stay here next time we're in town!

Place was exactly as advertised. Just outside downtown Montreal and a quick drive into the heart of it. Owner was more than helpful, was available to answer any questions we had for the entirety of our trip. Would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere close to downtown without paying downtown prices.
Good

Honestly, this is one of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far! Sofia's place is really close to public transit, and she lives in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Although I didn't get to meet her, she made sure everything was ready and easy for us. Check-in was a breeze. I'd definitely try to stay here again whenever I plan another trip to montreal!
Tres beau sejour

Clean place, good owner. :)
Spacious apartment.

Sofia has a cozy apartment in a quiet place in Montreal. It is perfect to relax, and it is very easy to go downtown or other places from there. the kitchen is complete, the washing and drying machines are very modern and efficient. We had a wonderful time in Montreal, and hope to get back soon!

My mom and I loved staying at Sofia's place during our trip to Montreal. Her place was clean, quiet, and well equipped for a very comfortable stay. Parking behind the building was so convenient. My mom had to work from home for a couple of days, and the living room made a great home office as well. Definite recommend for a peaceful retreat in Montreal that's still reasonably close to downtown.

I had an amazing experience, Sofia directions was very clear and precise. 

Thank you

We had a great stay at Sofia's place! Photos are accurate. One private parking spot behind the apartment was very convenient.  It's one the third floor with no elevate, which was no problem for us. 

There is no air conditioning, but in the middle of June with the window cracked open and the fan on, it wasn't a real issue.

It's about a 10 minute walk to the subway, depending how fast you walk. We took the subway every day and  got very used to the walk. There aren't many things to do in the area, but with the subway so close, it didn't really matter to us.

At first glance, the neighborhood appeared a little sketchy and run-down, but we never had an issue. It's a very quiet neighborhood with quiet residents who seem to keep to themselves. And the interior of the apartment is very welcoming and well furnished.

All in all, we had a great time and would stay again! Montreal is a beautiful, relaxed city and I recommend it!

Sofia's place is money worth for it's value. Although it's not located in a very good neighbourhood but this is the place where close to downtown and easy access to any where. Sofia is a good host, she prepare her place like a home for family traveler and give very clear instruction and everything are accurate.
Great location, close to downtown and the Metro.  Nice quiet neighbourhood and the unit is as described.  Great value when visiting Montreal.
Great two bedroom place close to the metro with off street parking.  Easy check in/out.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Beautiful Barra da Tijuca beachfront apart-hotel !
summary: WEEKLY AND MONTHLY DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE (please contact host for calculation over the announced prices) Please note that price is for two occupants at a time (3rd and 4th guests pay 50% of the period rate each). Complimentary: Wireless internet at Reception & Swimming Pool areas; Full gym; Heated swim pool; Sauna (dry & steam); Hot tube; Playground; Game room; Beach towels & umbrellas. Rates for Holidays, Christmas and New Year's require minimum occupancy. Please ask for details.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Barra da Tijuca - Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil

name: A lovely cozy apartment near HKU
summary: A very lovely cozy apartment with high profile equipment and property management. Super convenient to everywhere in the city and quite close to HKU university.  PS: The fat cat is excluded so she will be not at home during your stay :)

host.about: After many years of working, travelling and living in different places, I come to understand better of the society and nature. I’m still on the way to know more of my self.

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Lucy is a great host. She is so helpful and responds quickly.
Her place is compact with all amenities which I needed. 6-8 minutes to the underground and plenty of good local restaurants around .
Condition of the washroom needed to be improved.

name: Most laid back-quiet place in HK
summary: Welcome to the most convenient yet quiet place in HK. Kennedy town MTR and buses are min away but yet you won't be bother by the noise of the city.

loc.address: Kennedy Town, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Really nice room with good location. Both the host and roommate are friendly and eager to help. I love the dim sum restaurant Felip recommended which is near by the apt. I love the food in HK so much that I plan to visit again. :) Btw, be careful of the mosquitos in HK when U visits in the summer time.
Nice place. Close to the down town. Would stay again :)

Great location. Right next to the backside of Victoria Peak so if you're looking for nature you've found it. Very quiet and serene surroundings. Luis is very detailed in how to get here, just follow the instructions he sends you. 
Also right next to the Kennedy-Town MTR stop. Luis is a great guy, very friendly and outgoing and we very much appreciated his hospitality. Hope to stay with him again soon! Thanks!
Was a nice place to stay. In a fairly quiet section of Hong Kong, very easy to get to off the train and airport bus. About 15 minutes to Causeway Bay.

This Airbnb is what this site all about. You get a proper feel for living amongst the locals. The flat was well laid out with everything you need and the instructions from the host were super clear. 

The neighborhood is really friendly, on a rainy day we even got to borrow an umbrella from the downstairs neighbors (using sign language as we don't speak Cantonese) and the food in the area is sublime. Definitely go to the dim sum place they recommend!!! Our best meal while in HK.
Great location, just minutes walk from Kennedy Town MTR, yet located in a peaceful neighborhood away from the main road. Small but well equipped home.
Overall, it is a pleasant stay. Comfy bed and cozy room. Clean bathroom and easily accessible from Kennedy station. Great to rest up and continue  travelling around hk. :)

Charming, nice, and personal apartment in a cozy area.
A cozy place for two people with a small suitcase is perfect as there are many stairs and the room is small. 
And thank you for all your help Connie :)

We stayed 10 days, 9 nights and had a comfortable stay. The bedroom is small and we left our 2 backpacks outside of the room. We took advantage of the facilities provided and had breakfast in the kitchen and did our laundry.  The neighbourhood is lovely and gave a real local feel with cheap restaurants and a large supermarket across the street. Transport connections are excellent. We took the tram, bus, ferry and train after purchasing an octopus card all around HK. The hosts provide detailed instructions when checking in yourself and are always available to answer questions. This worked for us perfectly as we arrived very late in the evening.  If you want to get a local feel of HK with good hosts, this is the place.

name: Beautiful Apt, Tropical Resort, Steps to the Beach
summary: Our nightly rate includes already the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 14.42%. Spacious 2BR/2BA Vacation Rental Condo in a Beautiful Resort with well-manicured Japanese zen garden. directly across the street from the beach.

host.about:
Anke Kirchner, R(S) & Property Manager - Next Maui Vacation LLC/ A Division of SRH Inc.

Aloha, I'm Anke, Realtor, surfer, runner & kiteboarder living on Maui. I specialize in buying and selling homes and condos on Maui and I love what I do! 

Love, Live Aloha!

reviews.txt: The codo is very nice, beautiful and spacious. Two bedrooms, which both stayed a decent temperature at night. Also has 2 AC units. Pretty cool balcony. I enjoyed staying on the balcony on my laptop and watching the sunshine or the rain falling. Washer/dryer were nice to have. Anke was extremely responsive to my calls, and even brought over garbage bags when we ran out. I also enjoyed the pool. The condo is within walking distance of a beach, which is nice.

Anke, 
Your place was wonderful for our family. The kids used the pool every day, my parents participated at the ukulele jam session at Keolahou Church, and my wife and I loved running by the beach.  Thank you again for making our stay memorable. 
Aloha, 
jason

We absolutely loved the place! It has everything you might need during your stay. Close to the beach and a short driving distance (~10 minutes) to a number of good restaurants. Anke was super nice and helpful. I highly recommend this place for staying in Maui.
Everything was great!

This condo is amazing and perfect for a one week plus stay. It's very spacious and, with the two AC units plus the ceiling fans, can stay cool despite the hot weather. It's right across the street from the beach and kitty corner to 2 parks. It's also really close to a lot of good eats! It has a full kitchen and comes with cooking utensils which allowed us to cook and prep meals for extended days out (i.e.  Road to Hana). To our surprise, the condo came equipped with beach chairs and a boogie board which we took full advantage of.  It also comes with in-unit laundry and dryer as well as soap and dryer sheets! The resort is very quiet and the people who live there are respectful of quiet hours. You get to meet fellow travelers and residents in the pool / jacuzzi area which is also a plus. All in all, we enjoyed our stay. Just don't forget to bring your own soap and shampoo!
Everything was as described! A very beautiful and clean condo directly at the beach in Kihei. Anke was also very responsive and helpful, would love to come back any time!

Anke communicated very well with me prior to arriving.  She sent me documents that gave me clear directions to the condo.  Once I arrived I noticed that I did not need anything as everything I could possibly need was at my finger tips.  I will definitely stay at this condo again.   Thank you Anke.

Our stay at Kihei Resort was wonderful. The place was perfect for the 4 of us. The place was spacious, clean, comfortable, quiet and well located. The condo had many amenities such as the community pool and free guest parking and was situated 5-15 mins drive from many eateries and stores. The beach is walking distance away across the street and Wailea is only about a 10-15 drive away as well. Anke was a great host giving us all the necessary information we would need as well as checking up on us via message during our stay to make sure all was fine. Definitely recommend this place for travelers! In the heart of Kihei and close to the airport and other attractions.

This is a beautiful place by a beautiful beach with great amenities, like hot tub and swimming pool. You probably don't need them though. Just walking across the street, you can snorkel in waist deep blue water, where I saw five turtles and a lot of fish. It is very safe for kids or people don't swim. 

The place provides enough towels so you don't need to pack them. Washer and dryer is conveniently located in the unit - not those coin operating ones. 

Anke is very nice too. We got a box of chocolate as gift when we arrived :)

Everything was exactly as described and we were made to feel welcome immediately with a nice little care package and local tour guide notebook!

The Kihei resort is amazing and very private and low key and relaxing.  The spa and pool area is great at the end of a long day of adventures.

I would recommend Anke and her property to anyone!
Anke was very helpful and the apartment was everything you'd expect and more. We had a great time I would highly recommend this place to others.

This place has beautiful gardens and a nice pool and hot tub in a quiet community. We really enjoyed our stay and it was a very short drive to the south or north to get to great beaches. You can easily walk to the beach as well if you don't mind using the shoulder. We did a good amount of cooking and had everything we needed.

Pros :
Close to the beaches
Quiet
Beautiful garden
Having own Washer and dryer
Beach toys, umbrella, small surf board, beach towels, beach chairs provided

Cons :
Kids under 14 years are not allowed in the hot tub (The policy we received before we got to the condo didn't mention anything about kids not allowed to use the hottub)
The sink and bathtub drains don't work very well
Old and dated property 
Restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops are in driving distance (you can only walk to the beaches and one Korean restaurant that I wouldn't recommend anyone to go. 
Poor quality kitchen equipment  (if you try to cut or cook anything, it will be challenging)
I broke $40 blender and I got charged for $80.73 for it so don't break anything :) 

This place is ok but not if you have young children. It's more suitable for people without children, retired people. 
Oh, they also don't recycle or compost so if you have any environmental consciousness, it is probably not suitable for you.

Beautiful condo in a gorgeous development full of well manicured gardens.  The view over the tropical garden and overlooking the pool is lovely.  The condo was super clean and quite huge.  Everything you could possible need and perfect for a group of 4!  Very smooth check in and communication process.  Thank you Anke for everything!
A great location and nice and spacious condo. We loved our stay here, and Anke was very quick to help us with anything we had questions about!

Anke's Condo was amazing! A beautiful two bedroom, walking distance to the water, and came with every amenity possible. Unfortunately, our flight was canceled so we did not arrive until the next day and our travel was extended. We were very nervous, because we thought we would have to arrange an extra night stay else where, but luckily Anke was very understanding and allowed another night. We could not thank her enough for her time and help. I would highly recommend Anke and her condo to anyone and everyone.

This property has it pros and cons.

Pros:
Anke was very responsive and nice.
The place is nice and clean.
The condo is right above the pool which was nice.
People there was very nice.

Cons:
It's a older property which was fine but the condo was old as well.
AC units are on the top floor and middle floor but not in the middle bedroom. Which got hot in the room but it was humid when we stayed at.
There was no sideway outside the resort which was not safe to walk outside.
There were some bikers staying there as well which was loud sometime because of the bike. 

If you to want walk around in Kihei then I would recommend another place near the kamaole beach 1-3.

Overall, it was a ok stay for us but my kids loved the place because they had the upstairs to themselves. Lol

The condo is beautiful and well-furnished.  All appliances worked.  The supplies were more than adequate and easily found.  The host was always available via telephone and answered all questions clearly and quickly.  Would book again tomorrow if I could!

Anke's place is awesome, just as advertised. Mellow, low key and quiet. More over its beautiful and close to everything you'd need. Inside the complex it's like a little tropical village with plenty of greenery and birds gently chirping in the trees. Pool, hot tub, BBQ area,etc, etc. If you never left the complex you'd still have a great vacation! Outside the resort everything you need is close: supermarket, coffee shops, gas station. Great location to access roads for any point you'd want to go. Two thumbs up & 5 stars !!! I want to stay here again.
Thanks Anke.
We enjoyed our stay.

name: Double Suite, with private bathroom.
summary: Beautiful sunny apartment  decorated with a vintage style in one of the best areas of Barcelona, well located,  close to the center but in a quiet neighborhood.

host.about:
Somos Mario y Eva, vivimos en Barcelona desde hace seis años, y nos encanta esta ciudad, podemos recomendarte sitios, y ayudarte para que tu visita en Barcelona sea lo mas placentera posible.
Nosotros estudiamos y trabajamos, nos gusta el arte, la cultura, la naturaleza, conocer personas nuevas, y compartir.

reviews.txt: Ottima posizione e in una zona tranquilla e sicura. Molto vicino alla metro e a tante attrazioni turistiche che si possono raggiungere facilmente a piedi (massimo 25 minuti). Ho davvero apprezzato la pulizia degli spazi! Ottimo in tutto!
Zona tranquila. Muy bien comunicada. Nos movimos caminando a todos lados.

name: Bundeena Garden Studio near beaches
summary: Light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Located in Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach. Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook. Please note that current construction work on an adjacent block may cause some noise on week days 7am-5pm. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or more.

host.about: I have lived with my husband Chris in Bundeena for 28 years, bringing up our two sons who have now left home. We are artists and educators. We love photography, music, food, movies and travel, and believe you are never too old for the next adventure.

reviews.txt: Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

Bundeena and Royal National Park is a wonderful getaway from Sydney. Belinda and Chris' garden studio is separate from the house. Staying there was perfect -  It was cosy and inviting, well-equipped and had everything we needed. The porch overlooking the garden was peaceful while having a morning coffee, birds chirping... We walked along Jibbon's Beach the first day, and then to Marley Beach the second day - sighting migrating whales along the way! Very ideal for exploring Royal National Park, and a short walking distance from the ferry. Belinda was a wonderful host, friendly and available whenever needed. Thanks for having us!

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

We loved our stay at Bundeena! Belinda's cottage was beautifully presented with quality comforts, privacy and has all the amenities you could need; perfect for a couple's getaway. The location is ideal just a short stroll to the beautiful beaches, bushwalking and dining. We fell in love with the area and look forward to returning there many times. Thank you for having us, we had a wonderful weekend!

Hi All, for those wanting a hideaway with the options of city experience if needed, then a cosy bungalow in Bundeena is a must. It was a lovely warm space with the fresh air or Bundeena and modern facilities. The kitchenette and bathroom were easy to use and made my life so easy. With private access it leaves you free to enjoy the environs on your own terms. The beach is a stones through away. I would love to have stayed longer. It is a quiet refreshing space in which to contemplate. A ferry ride to Cronulla is available if one needs to re-quaint once self with urban life, with the addition of train to CBD if needed. I highly recommend for those who have the time to relax and enjoy. Cheers, Brendan.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

We had a fantastic weekend staying at Belinda's studio. The location is perfect, a short stroll to the beaches, bushwalks and the local shops. Ideal setting in the back of her garden and all the privacy you could want! We wouldn't hesitate to come back again!

We had a fantastic stay. The property is lovely, has everything you need. It was very clean and tidy. Very close to the beach, great walks. Incredibly peaceful. We liked it so much we stayed an extra night. 

Belinda was accommodating and a pleasure to rent from.  

I would recommend it to any friend.

My husband and I just had a perfect weekend in Bundeena.  This garden studio is everything it claims to be - Belinda has very thoughtfully set up this private sanctuary for 2 - it is very charming.   We will definitely come back.
We had a very pleasant short stay in Bundeena.  The accommodation was clean, comfortable and close to the beach and village amenities.  We would happily come back, but next time stay for longer.

This apartment is a lovely place to stay, it's comfortable, clean and has everything you need for a stay in Bundeena, or even if you want to visit Sydney but don't just want to see city life! We would definitely recommend staying here and would love to stay again when we're back in the Sydney area.

We stayed in Belinda's garden studio for three days last week, and found it to be exactly as advertised. Very private and comfortable.  The location is really good, being so close to the beach. Overall the experience was very pleasant indeed and reasonably priced.  Lee

Belinda was great to deal with - she was organised, communicated well and best of all provided a perfect retreat! Her granny flat/studio has plenty of space, love and comfort and is perfectly positioned within walking distance to all the attractions!

We were very pleased with our accommodation and hosts Belinda and Chris. They have accessed what their guests needs may be then thoughtfully provided  everything down to an umbrella I noticed on the verandah. Everything was clean and fresh no tired old cast offs of any kind. We would recommend this BnB highly.

You can't really beat Belinda's place in terms of location and experience. I had a friend visiting from overseas and we had a lovely time in this little laid back beach town. Belinda's place is a cute little place where you can hear the birds sing in the morning and the waves crashing on the shores as you sleep. 

Just lovely and I couldn't be more happy to recommend it to anyone looking to get out of Sydney for a few days!

name: João´s beach house
summary: Amazing apartment by the beach, excellent for vacations or work.  Recently renovated with everything you will need.  Cleaned and sanitized by a professional. Next to restaurants, bars, shopping, sport activities.. Free pickup from the airport, train or BUS station.  Free early check-in and late check-out, due to availability from other reservations. It´s a great space in a great neighborhood. I love it and I hope you will too! Check new apartment in the same building: https://abnb.me/9HC720e97L

host.about:
Hello
My name is João, and I'm from Porto, Portugal.
Love to travel but always happy when I get back home.
Surfer for the last 27 years and IRONMAN finisher ;)))
I´m looking forward to receive you in my house.
También hablo español.

reviews.txt: We loved our stay at Joao's beach house! He is an awesome host. So helpful. And it is an amazing spot. Hopefully we will be back some day soon!

Joao is a great host! He met with us at the apartment and help us bring the luggage up. There was food for us to use at our arrival so we did not have to run at the convenient store right away. Everything is just as explained, very clean and modern. We walk on the beach and used the bikes to go to Porto! We loved our stay!

Picked us up from the airport, and took us for a little tour round. Dropped us at the shopping center and picked us up an hour later. A very sweet and talkative man, very quick to offer help and quick at replying to our questions. Apartment was very clean and spacious. Very modern with a large television.
Excelente!!
The flat is fantastic! Great location, not close to the city but right next to the sea and with nice restaurants, coffee shops and bars around! We spent an amazing new year eve!
Joao was the perfect host I could not ask for anything more. He was helpful, informative and honest.  This is the one air bnb place I truly would like to come back and stay at.  Thank you.

Joao is very kind and open-minded guy. He met us at the airport and made a little city tour. His apartment is very nice and clean with amazing view of the ocean. The bus stop is near the house. It was really beautiful holidays. thank U so much

name: Beautiful Ensuite Room -Easy access to city
summary: The house is big, clean and spacious, with all modern amenities,multiple living rooms, and large courtyard w/ bbq.  Ensuite Room with private balcony, walk in wardrobe & TV . It will feel like staying in a hotel room  :) Express buses to the city and 1 stop to central on the train.

host.about: I'm new to Airbnb and so far I'm loving the experience as I've met some gorgeous people. I'm an outgoing friendly person who enjoys travel, great wine & food and meeting new people.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Midillis 202 (Double Room)
summary: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul.

reviews.txt: The house is really near to the main sightseeings of istanbul old city, with a nice terrace. The hosts are confortable and polite. I had really good time and was glad choosing Kamuran's flat.

Kamuran is very kind host. She gave us full information and support us all the way from airport to the end of our trip. Apartment looks smaller than on photo but it's very clean and light. Looks like new shower installed in the room.  Absolutely unbelievable  view from terrace: one side is Blue Mosque, another is seaside. This apartment lefts only positive emotion for us. Just 2 min walk and you are in the heart of the Old sity. Very suitable for peoples who first time in Istanbul. 
P.S. Be ready for morning praying  in the Blue  Mosque )

Nice and simple room. Good central location in Sultanahmad. Just a short walk to the blue mosque and Hajia Sofia through a nice bazar. The rooms facing the street side are a bit noisy from the street traffic, so if you want a quite room, get the ones facing the garden. There is a washer and a small kitchen upstairs that you can use, and it connects to a terrace. Kamuran welcomed us when we got there and showed us our room. She's usually in the travel agency office downstairs so you can reach her easily if you need anything and get some recommendations on what to do or where to go. Word of advice, don't use their airport transfer car because it's more expensive then just getting a taxi from the airport (taxis run about 50 TL to Sultanahmed and their car transfer is 20$ which is about 72 TL ). We also had to wait 30 minutes outside the airport for the driver to pick us up.

We booked this room for 5 days because we wanted to split our visit to Istanbul between the Sultanahmet area and the Taksim area. But as soon as we got here, we knew that this is where we wanna be and so extended our stay. The emplacement of this place is just PERFECT. We have walked all over from here, the metro stop is also close. There is a small kitchen and laundry place on the roof, which was great. Also the view is beautiful. ONE small inconvenience would be the morning noises from the street, but that didn't keep us from having a great stay here. I recommend it, and would certainly stay here again if I ever visit Istanbul again!

We had an amazing time at one of the rooms rented by Kamuran , when we saw the place for the first time we were surprise by the view on the blue mosque and the sea from the roof terrace ,we were having our breakfasts here and enjoying a beer/ wine in the night. The room was very clean we had everything ,even a shower gels and hairdryer, iron,washing machine,we could stuck over food in the fridge that was very useful. During our stay it was very hot in Istanbul so air-conditioning was a life saviour. For all the questions we had about where to go and how to get we got the most detailed explanation,me and my boyfriend couldn't imagine best host then that. All the problems you might possibly have with the room will be solved in a blink of an eye! Location was more then just great, Sultanahmet is the best district to have all the points of interest around you, Hagia Sofia 10min,Blue mosque 7 min ,tram station 8min,lots of place to eat around, only be weary Turkish people(sellers/restaurants) cheat the whole time ,don't order a beer in the restaurant without asking the price ,don't pick up a brush from the shoe cleaning man when he dropped it,in Istanbul is a lot of scam is going on!

Location is just awesome, it's really 2 min walk to Blue Mosque. Many shops, cafes, markets are nearby, which is so much convenient. Approximately 7-10 min walk to tram stop, also so cool. And it's a magnificent atmosphere there. We already miss this place. Host are so nice people, which will be glad to help you with everything. The view from the top is amazing. The room is small, but very clean and cozy. There are candles in rooms which make chill and warm atmosphere. Highly recommend to my friends and will definitely cone back again!
Great location. Easy to walk to many areas of Istanbul

All in all AMAZING!!
Super nice people welcoming you! Super central, but still quite. Super view. Super service. Just great. I recommend this place to everybody!

It was amazing week in great accommodation - clean, cozy, great view from rooftop and very convenient location in the center of Istanbul. We had a great Blue Mosque view from window and it was fantastic and authentic experience.

Lovely lovely stay @ Kamurans!!! The place was clean and well stocked with necessities (everything exactly like in photos).
Istanbul was amazing but I think staying here made it all that much better. Great location, safe, exciting.  Everything was perfect.
The terrace is amazing, I will never forget the view.
Clean and very nice hospitable hosts
Great place to stay!
This was an amazing stay. Clean, comfortable, and very close to Hagia Sophia and Blue mosque. Perfect!

name: Your spot in Copacabana
summary: Having a large airy living room. The apartment is well divided. Fully furnished and cozy. The building has a 24h doorman and camera services in the corridors. It is very well located, close to the beach, restaurants, pubs and several shops and supermarkets. And it offers a good mobility being close to the subway.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Tenho muito prazer em fazer novos amigos, com outras culturas, informações e vivências. Gosto de ser uma anfitriã atenciosa e disponível. O que estiver ao meu alcance tenha certeza que será feito, para tornar sua estadia no Rio inesquecível.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Ana Lucia made us feel right at home with fresh fruit and snacks! The apt is blocks away from the beach, near tons of great food (Go to Amir and Galeto Sats, thank me later) and plenty of places to hang out with locals (Bip Bip). Highly recommend staying here for your visit to Copacabana.
muito bom
Adorei!

name: Stylish Flat in Center of Fashion
summary: The apartment is just 5 min.s from Tesvikiye mosque, the metro station is 15 min.s away by walking. Nisantasi is surrounded by trendy cafés, restaurants, nightclubs and luxury shopping, the apartment is located in the in the most prestigious neighborhood in Istanbul. It has one bedroom, one living room very bright that related to an open kitchen.

host.about:
I have an accessories brand called as Tukutukum.
I love travelling, art and fashion.
Never be bored of discovering new cultures.

reviews.txt: It was a great stay, and Tugba is a wonderful host. Thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tugba's place was great and as described.  It's a small, but very nice and comfortable one bedroom in a great location.  Though it says Besiktas in the listing, this place is central Tesvikiye/Nisantisi and the walk to anything you'd need is extremely short.

The apartment is really cozy and exactly as described and shown in the pictures. There are a lot of nice bars, restaurants and cafes in the area - walking distance from the apartment. We got a very warm welcome with fruits and drinks and recommendations. Would come back!

Nisantasi, Istanbul'da ulasim acisindan cok avantajli bir yer. Tugba'nin evi de Nisantasi icerisinde cok avantajli bir yerde. Bircok aktivite ve ilgi cekici yere yurume mesafesinde. Taksi ile ulasim cok kolay. Asansor ve klima olmamasi biraz caninizi sikabilir ancak bu bilgi zaten onceden veriliyor.
Thank you! I like this apartment so much!

Great people! Very hospitable and helpful! We had a great experience at her place! The place is very clean and very beautiful! It exactly the same as in the photos. It is in a very nice area to. I highly recommend this place! Tugba is a great host! Thank you Tugba!
Tugba hanima tesekkur ederim.

This place is one of the most comfortable and well-provisioned apartments that I have ever had the pleasure of staying in through AirBnb. All the amenities that you would hope for are available and the location is wonderful! As a host, Tugba was quick to respond to our questions and flexible with our check-in time. My girlfriend and I chose this place in advance specifically because we liked the kitchen very much and we planned on cooking during our stay. We were definitely not disappointed! This location and price are a real bargain!

There's so many nice things I have to say about this apartment, and Tugba as a host! Location wise, this apartment is absolutely perfect its on what seems like the border of Nisantasi and Besiktas. Nisantasi is fabulous - lots of high end designer fashion stores, and Besiktas has endless lovely restaurants and cafes. The apartment is also a short walk to the Besiktas ferry, which has wonderful views on the Bosphorus to other great districts in Istanbul. The apartment was sparkling clean and had so much style which I can imagine comes from Tugba's great sense of style as a designer. It also next door to a small convenient store that keeps late hours, and around the corner from a big supermarket. As a host Tugba was very understanding and responsive and pleasant. I would absolutely love to return to this place, and I am going to encourage my friends to stay here when they are in Istanbul! Fabulous time here!

Tugba, was a great host and the place was very comfy, cozy and neat. I stayed there with my brother for the first week and the 2nd week with two friends after  my brother left. We all enjoyed the place very much. It was very well equipped. Thanks to Tugba and Ali for their nice place, help and advices.

Super comfortable apartment, with all the facilities. It is located in an excellent area. 
Tugba is very kind and she is willing to help you in whatever you need. 
I highly recommend this place for a stay in Istanbul!

Evin yeri gercekten cok guzel, hem toplu tasima bakimindan hem de Nisantasi’nda olmasi sebebiyle kalmaya elverisli bir ev. Ayni zamanda evin dekorasyonu oldukca guzel ve evin ici oldukca bakimli, fotograflarda gorunmeyen giyinme odasi ise cok ise yariyor.

A very nice flat in a great location.   I particularly appreciated the very comfortable bed and the selection of pillows, including an orthopedic pillow, as I have back and neck pain problems.  The shower is excellent, which was also a big plus for me.  I would have liked to have air-conditioning, as it was very hot when I was in Istanbul.  There is a mobile ventilator which helps a lot, but sometimes it is not enough.  You have to be aware that there is no lift, so you will need to go up two flights of stairs which might be a problem for those who have trouble carrying heavy luggage. Tugba is very kind and attentive and is very quick in responding to any queries.   Recommended!

Tugba’s place is strategically located between Besiktas and Nisantasi both of them are very nice neighbourhoods. The apartment is spacious and has everything you need even for a long-term stay. There are plenty of eateries, cafes and bars nearby too as well as supermarkets that are open till late.
Tugba is very nice, she met me in person while my flight had 2 hrs of delay and I literally arrived 1 am. Very pleasant stay, highly recommended.

name: Merkez'de Ferah BAHÇELİ DAİRE ! Sporsalonu/ 1+1
summary: Şişli merkezi konumda sakin bir mahallede Otoparklı Dairedir. Dairenin 1+1 , kendine ait özel bahçesi bulunmaktadır.

reviews.txt:
Thank u!
For sure will be there again :)
Irmac is a great host. Very nice and pleasant and always responsive.

name: 20% off - Cozy Studio Near Subway with Wifi LT4
summary: Please contact me before booking :) Location, location, location!! Only 1 block to Sai Ying Pun MTR Station and a few minutes ride to Macau Ferry Terminal, Airport Express HK Station and International Finance Centre (IFC). Nearby Buses to IFC, ICC, Airport express train.   Building has doorman and an elevator.

host.about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Mark is very helpful n friendly! The location of the accommodation is perfect, close to Soho n central. Not to mention the tram station is just opposite the building n the mtr is nearby!
Really cozy and awesome apartment on a really convenient and authentic location. Easy check-in/check-out with no keys required -> really handy. And my favorite coffee shop now is just 2 mins away :)

I had a very good time at Mark’s studio . The flat is very well located in Hong Kong . Only two subway station to Central . There is also the tram line to discover the island . The area is quiet if you compare to busiest area in HK . It is also a good mix of Chinese culture (restaurants,shops) and trendy western venues ( good eateries,bars). Mark is a great host always answering any request or question I had . Overall a great experience in this city and a great stay .
Quemeneur Philippe
Enjoyed staying at Mark's place. Amazing host!
Very good!
Mark's studio is modern. It is very close to MTR, tram and bus stops. There are lots of nice restaurants and bars close by. He also is good at sending information

When you're not used to Hong Kong, this place is of course small for a relatively high price, but in HK this is not at all unusual. The quality of the place is very high - it is nicely designed, in a great location, well taken care of, and I found it quite comfortable. I loved the feeling of being in the middle of Hong Kong when you step out of the door and the fact that it is a modern apartment but in an older building means that it is comfortable, yet feels very local. The size is really small, but the way the space is used is very clever.

There are multiple units and not all of them seem to have windows. Mine did, with a nice view of opposite flats and Des Voeux Rd.

I would definitely recommend this place.

name: Family Matters | Historic Centre
summary: Designed to be suitable for couples, individual adventures and families (with kids).

host.about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

reviews.txt: The flat is really lovely as seen in pictures. It's new, clean and well located, close to the centre, shops and restaurants. We had a great time staying there. Tomas was very nice and incredibly helpful introducing the main attractions in town. He made sure we had everything we needed, welcoming us with complementary tea and biscuits. He was a wonderful host and genuinely cares about the property and people renting it out.  I recommend this place!

It was an amazing stay at Tomas's. Really beautiful apartment, right in the middle of the centre. Communication 1A!
Will def. come back-

Clean, attractive remodel, comfortable sleep accommodations for at least five people. Tastefully decorated, fun and funky. Great location, near top sites and restaurants, cafes. Tomas was very responsive and accommodating; he forwarded a helpful info guide, and in the flat had an even more helpful book full of suggestions and commentary on local restaurants and sites. The part of town can be noisy - especially the seagulls! - and lots of sound leakage from other flats, so earplugs may be helpful at night. Though that's true of most central city accommodations.
The apartment in Porto was great. Really new and clean. Great bathroom. Nice living space. And a greta area close to the shops the night life and the sights.
Very friendly!

Tomas was extremely helpful and professional throughout the process. He emailed instructions with the best way to get to the apartment well in advance, and there was a detailed guide book waiting for us when we arrived that included restaurants, attractions, and maps.

The apartment itself was very clean and fairly well-appointed. A wine opener would have been nice to have, but we successfully cooked fajitas for dinner without any issues, and the location is very convenient to all the sites in the old city.

The apartment can be noisy in the evenings depending on other residents/guests. Also, there is no A/C (which is not necessary in Porto), but the area can be loud overnight with the windows open.
The apartment corresponds perfectly to the announcement. It is functional, comfortable and placed well. Do not hesitate!
Tomas was extremely welcoming and helpful with everything we needed. The apartment has an amazing location, however it is fairly small.

Tomas' apartment is quite cute. Equipped kitchen, fridge, big table for dinners, etc.
Rooms are big as well and double beds are comfortable. Single bed is not so comfortable, probably it's expected to be used by a baby or little boys.

Very well located, you can reach any point of interest in max 20 minutes walking (have a good breakfast, Porto' slopes are exhausting!)
A very nice flat located in the heart of a great city. WiFi was a little slow at times but it didn't matter as the rest of the flat (and specially location) made up for it.

Fui con unos amigos y la verdad que nos sorprendio mucho la ubicacion y el trato de el hacia nosotros. Como teniamos que hacer checking a las 15h nos dejo dejar antes las maletas en su oficina. Seguro que cuando volvamos a Oporto repetiremos. 100% recomendable.

name: OportoBatalha  (by The HOST)
summary: The apartment is located in Praça da Batalha (downtow center), in 3th floor with elevator. The apartment is perfect for a small family, or  4 friends . The neighborhood have cafes, restaurants, ATM's, supermarket's, and shops. Nearby Santa Catarina,Aliados, Clerigos Tower, São Bento metro/train station, Bolhão metro station.

host.about:
Hello, I am responsible for the reservations of that property. 
The apartments are very clean and well equipped; however feel free to ask any item you could miss, or cannot find. We will try to provided it during your stay. 
The properties are rented in whole, No sharing with other guests or owner. 
I live in O Porto and i will be always available to take care of your check in and assist you during your stay. 
Looking forward to have the pleasure to welcome you and provide you a memorable stay! 

I speak fluently English, Portuguese and a little bit of  Spanish. 
I take your reservation very seriously and I never cancel. 
Please make first an inquiry clicking on the button: "contact me" 
Than I will reply to your request with a accurate offer. At this point you are free to book it on line. 
I do not advise you to press the button "book it" because some dates may have 5 nights minimum stay policy or are on hold. 
I did decline some reservations 24 hours after the guest book it, but I never cancelled it. 
Kind regards, Bruno

reviews.txt: Thank you so much for everything. An amazing place and good communication. Bruno was always there and answer all the questions quickly. The apartment is in a good location and clean. We will definitely choose this apartment again when we go to Porto. Thanks a lot Bruno.

I've stayed in this apartment for two night with other two friends. Everything was fine. The location is very central, close to every important monuments in the city. There are also many nice bars in the square just in front of it.
The apartment was clean, maybe just a little bit cold, but it was raining while we were there, so we were not that lucky with the weather.
Bruno's girlfriend welcomed us to the aparment and she was really nice and gave us valuable tips for exploring the city.
Highly recommended!

The apartment is in a great location and kept very clean. Bruno does a good job making sure his guests are happy, and he's readily available to answer any questions of concerns. I liked the place so much that I decided to stay a little longer. I'll stay here again whenever in Porto.
Todo bom

Je recommande !!!!
Merci pour tout
Great place, in great location. Easy access from the airport and railway station. Highly recommended.
We had a short holiday in Bruno's place. He's been very helpful throughout our stay. The place is very central, clean and comfortable.

We had an absolutely fantastic time at Bruno's place.

The flat is cozy and located right next to the most important city highlights. The two balconies are an absolute treat. The rooms are spacious and well organized.

Bruno is an amazing host - he took the time during check-in to show us around the map and give recommendations.

Thumbs up from us :)
Muy bien localizado. Amplio y comodo. El anfitrion muy amable
Great!!!!!

name: SUPERHOST- Wifi- METRO-Near Pierloti-
summary: You will not regret to stay in this room because my home is very clean and you can use kitchen and saloon. You can sit saloon and every night i make tea, coffee, prepare fruit table and regional flavor. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk for your travel 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport, taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi,big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7.Towels, shampoo

host.about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.txt: he is the best thanks nice clean comfy home

Kubilay is a very welcoming and kind guy, I can easily recommend anyone to stay with him. Comfortable bed, nice room and nice flat. The location is in a non-touristy area, which is great for good, cheap food and a better experience of local life. There are also good transport connections to the rest of the city for when you want to do sightseeing.

At this point Kubilay feels just like a member of my family , an older brother  I'd say (even that he's younger than me :) ). I always know that no matter what when I go to Istanbul there is a warm welcoming Kubilay there always ready to do what ever to make your stay more pleasant.

Don't miss having that delcious breakfast with him on the weekend.

We arrived home with wonderful experience. Kubi is excelent host, everything was exactly as on explanation on site. Happy that we have new friend in Istanbul, and our warm recommandation for everyone who want to stay in this city. Can not wait till summer to meet this wonderful guy again! 
Resime: PERFECT!

I throughly enjoyed my stay with Kubilay. Although he wasn't there the first few days he stayed in touch and made sure that my stay in Istanbul was going smoothly, as well as having his friend meet us and show us the neighborhood etc. 

Kubilay is very sweet, trustworthy, friendly and good person to stay with. He is dedicated to making sure that your stay is as good as possible and extremely helpful. Makes for great conversation with a great vibe. I hope to return to Istanbul and when I do I'll stay with him once more!

This apartment is very nice for the duration of your stay in Istanbul. Kubi best and very good man. Spacious and clean apartment. Near the apartment there is a restaurant, a market all the necessary. If you want to leave a good impression living in Istanbul, I Recommend Kubi apartment)))

I liked that Kubilay's place because was nearby public transportation. I liked that there mere many resturants and shops close by. I enjoyed the farmers market on Wednesday, that was in walking distance from his house.
Everything is simply satisfying and great, the host is very helpful and his english is really good so it was eazy for both to communicate, i advise everyone for this house

It was a wonderful time for me in Mr. Kubilay house , I spent almost a month in his beautiful house and enjoyed a lot of Discussion and talking about cultures and Istanbul with him , also the neighborhood is quiet and very warm.

Kubilay is the best! Truly a superhost, there are not enough words to describe how great the Istanbul experience is when your host is Kubi. Thank you Kubi for your hospitality, friendliness and for for being such an amazing person!

This is my first AirBnB stay with a super host and now I know what it means.
Kubi truly is a super host, he made my stay in a Istanbul more lovely, he is really a very helpful person.
The place is nice, many shops & supermarkets nearby, Buses and metro are close.

I was a bit afraid to go to Istambul alone, but thanks to Kubilay I enjoyed my stay there. He is very hospitable, sociable, always ready to answer any questions and give advice. 
The house is very spacious and warm, with all necessary equipment, and the atmosphere is so that I felt like at home)  
You will need about 30-40 minutes to go to the centre of Istambul by bus, keep it in mind when you plan your trip.
But though it is a bit far from the centre, there are advantages too. The house is situated in the district for locals, not for tourists. So you can buy cheap food there. You can find locum for 6 lira/kilo, cheap nuts and other turkish delights. There are also local shops near the house with good quality cotton clothes, underwear, tights etc.
Definitely recommend this host! Thank you very much for your hospitality!

I  stayed at   Kubilay’s place for  7 days and it was everything as advertised. It is the best location and shortest walk to access the bus and metro and minibus . It is also very convenient to shopping, restaurants, . The location of  the unit is incredible. My experience with the Kubilay’s  was very responsive and helpful . He personally makes us breakfast every Saturday and Sunday . The bottom line is I received very good value for my money and  Kubilay’s place will be my first choice on future trips to Istanbul .

Kubilay house is amazing good. Kubi is good and so nice guy who help me to search everything. He inform me everything about what i need. This place near from everywhere you no need scare for hungry becuase this place really central place. You just need walk little to get bus station and the hostes really nice to help you. No dispointed to stay here. I will stay here everytime i go to turkey. Good experience. Tessekur ederiz kubilay for your services

Would highly recommend Kabulai. Friendly down to earth and very hospitable - dont hesitate. The guy is awesome and his place is very spacious and clean. Made me breakfast on the Sunday I was leaving which was a good gesture. Wish I could've stayed longer.
The gentle home of a gentleman's educator, he can give you the utmost enthusiasm and help. You can't be mistaken for living here.

name: Whole Apt. in East Williamsburg
summary: Beautiful open floor one bedroom apartment in small building. Located in a quiet street, only 10 min from downtown Manhattan on the L train and a short walk away from the heart of Williamsburg and Bushwick.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I am an artist and curator based in New York for over 15 years.

reviews.txt: What a great place this is, walkable from cool part of east williamsburg and short subway or walk from williamsburg so great for exploring. Guillermo is a real friendly host and the apartment is really clean spacious and comfy to relax in after all that exploring!

Appartement tres agreable Avec salle de Bain tres bien equipee,cuisine adapte pour petit dejeuner principalement
Guillermo tres sympathique et tres a l' ecoute
Station de metro tres proche. Et tres pratique pour se rendre sur manan than ( ligne L ) 
Quartier sympathique Avec magasin alimentaire 
Seul bemol travaux nombreux Avec bop de passage de Camion  et de betoniere  sur borom street Avec en prime un parking de betoniere mitoyen de l  'immeuble difficile de faire la sieste
Bonne adresse tout de meme

Guillermo met us when we arrived and showed us round the place, as well as giving us some good recommendations for the local area. The apartment is very light and a really nice space to come back to after a long day. The road can be a little noisy at times, we had the windows open at night as it got quite warm in the apartment. However,  Guillermo offered as an AC Unit when I mentioned it to him. Good restaurants/bars/coffee shops a few minutes walk away, and the subway is 2/3 minutes walk too. Would definitely stay here again, thanks for having us.
We met Guillemo on our arrival. We were shown around the apartment  and made to feel really welcome. The apartment was just great. Perfect for our needs..

This second floor walkup is just a few blocks from my son's place in Williamsburg making it a perfect location for us.  The apt is modern, new construction, spacious and conveniently located to the subway line at Montrose and Bushwick.

The  host was extremely accurate and dipicted what the place looked like. The room was very clean, very organized without too much clutter within the living spaces. Host was also always in reach in case of questions or concerns and answered within minutes of the requests. Me and my girlfriend had an absolutely amazing time during our stay and really had no complaints. All wifi passwords and tv show programs worked. 10/10.
Walking distance to most places we wanted to see.  Subway two blocks away.  Restaurants, grocer, pharmacy close by.

Guillermo was a great host. He recommended plenty of places for breakfast/coffee around the neighbourhood. The place is beautiful, clean and spacious. As described it is near the L-train and very convenient to get to most places. We had a wonderful time staying and exploring the city. Thank you!

We had a great stay at Guillermo's lovely apartment. It was close to the L train to head into Manhattan or to Bedford and also some great places in the neighbourhood for food, coffee etc. Guillermo was quick to respond to any queries we had and arranged a cab to the airport for us on the way home. Thanks for a great time!

Lovely apartment. Very clean, modern and spacious. Comfy bed! Was exactly as was advertised. Met Guillermo half way through stay - very friendly and welcoming. Quite far east in Williamsburg - 30min walk to main Williamsburg strip but 5 minute walk to the nearest subway, with a couple of bars and coffee shops along the way. Very easy to get across to Manhattan. Only downside was no decent convenience store - closest one was very expensive and didn't have everything we were looking for. Otherwise lovely stay and would highly recommend.

This host was a great host. His host skills were very host like and it's what a lot of people would expect from a host. 
Overall score I'll give him is an A

Guillermo's place was ideal fo us. Close enough to walk into Williamsberg and just around the corner from the fantastic Roberta's.

The apartment itself is immaculate and stylish.

The key handovers were really efficient even though we landed quite late; and although we needed no help, and liked to be legft alone - it felt that Guillermo would have been there.

Highly recommended.
