Lovely quiet well well appointed spacious one bedder in Brooklyn . Guillermo was there to meet us at the apartment when we arrived as he lives downstairs . He was kind enough to prepare an extra bed for my daughter who came with us at short notice . We stayed for 4 days and found it a great area although we spent all our days in Manhattan , we are looking forward to returning in a few weeks and exploring   The area around East Williamsburg . Fabulous comfortable apartment ,

Guillermo's place is very well lit, spacious, clean and very close (about a 3 min walk) to a subway station which is definitely a plus..wifi worked properly the whole time..the bathroom amenities functioned really well and all in all our stay was very pleasant and (Website hidden by Airbnb) is also great that our host was in touch with us through our stay and answered promptly on Airbnb chat..We would definitely recommend this lovely appartment in Williamsburg to anyone looking to visit NYC while trying to relax and have a quiet time when they are not in the heart of the city

Guillermo's place was a wonderful refuge after spending long hot days  in the city. Communication with Guillermo was simple and we had no problem getting into the place. The space was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.

Guillermo's place not only met, but surpassed our expectations! It was really comfortable, super clean, much less noisy than we anticipated and very convenient to lots of great places in the neighborhood (especially the subway station.) Guillermo was a fantastic host -  a really nice person and very considerate in every regard. I would highly recommend staying here!

I stayed here 4 nights, very comfortable bed, very close to Montrose metro stop, very very clean, and to top it off some of the best graffiti art/ street art areas in the city are right outside the door. I would definitely stay here again.

We are a family of 3 and stayed at Guillermo's apartment twice during our month long stay in the US and Canada. During our trip we stayed in many Airbnb apartments but none as fabulous as this Brooklyn gem .
 Clean,comfortable , spacious and in a great location . Although in a heavy industrial area noise was not a problem as we were away during the day and in fact it was such a quiet haven and great to return to at the end of a busy day sight seeing.
Guillermo was an lovely host and kind enough to accept and prepare  a futon  for my daughter who travelled with (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was excellent as Guillermo  lives down stairs from the apartment .  Wi- fi was excellent and strong. This was a fabulous and memorable stay.  I cannot recommend it highly enough .

Great, clean, stylish and spacious apartment between Bushwick and Williamsburg. Guillermo was communicative and check in and check out were easy. The area immediately around the apartment has quite an industrial feel but once you know where you're going there are some great places - Arrogant Swine was a particular favourite for us.

name: 2BR, Walk to the Beach, 2 Lanais, Stunning Views!
summary: Come visit beautiful Kihei! We're located at the Maui Sunset, close to family-friendly activities, public transport, and Kihei nightlife. You’ll love the complex amenities, renovated kitchen, walking distance beach access and the open, airy and light decor. This 4th floor condo has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (both with showers, no bath), wifi, and 2 lanais that are perfect for watching sunsets and sunrises. Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids).

reviews.txt:
This condo was in a very convenient location, near shopping, beaches, and grocery stores. Very nice well-kept condo complex and a fantastic pool. Good AC that kept the condo comfortable.

This was our first visit to Maui and it was great! When we visit Maui again we would absolutely stay here again. Condo owner was very helpful with very quick replies to our questions.

Andrew was a very responsive and enthusiastic host!  He made us feel very welcome at the unit, which we appreciated.  He also replied very quickly to emails and checked in with us when we arrived and left.

The apartment itself is very well-stocked with kitchen appliances, cookware, dining essentials, and beach gear (e.g., boogie boards and beach towels).  We appreciated the convenience of the dishwasher and washer and dryer.  The grounds themselves are perfectly manicured and have many bbq grills which we used on several occasions.  The grounds are very clean and the bbq grills themselves are cleaned by the apartment complex's maintenance crew.  The grounds are right on the edge of a shore (not exactly a beach that one would go to for swimming and lounging) that provide stunning views of the water and sunset.

This apartment is a great value in that you are centrally located among different sights such as Wailea Beach and Lahaina (a 15-30 minute drive).  We would recommend renting a car so that you can drive around the island.  Very few sights would be easily accessible to you otherwise.  There are also a full bathroom for each bedroom, so you have a 2-bedroom, 2-bath apartment.  The master bedroom has a lanai the provides a good view of the island.  The second bedroom's window looks out into the dark hallway of the apartment floor though.  A free parking spot was provided for the unit, which was convenient for our rental car.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen that provides you with a great view of the water.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this unit!

The listing is in a great location with an incredible pool and great place to watch the sunset. It is close to a grocery story, restaurants, etc. The listing was about as described. Bathrooms were both small but worked, and lots of towels and beach gear were provided.

Andrew is a fantastic host - he is a very active and quick communicator. His apartment in Kihei, Maui is beautiful: the location is ideal, the building complex even has a swimming pool and is right at the beach. The apartment itself is spacious, well maintained and gives of a holiday/aloha vibe. Andrew is a generous and flexible host and tried to accommodate wherever possible. We truly enjoyed our experience and stay on the island and I can only recommend his place if you are looking for a fantastic vacation!

Andrew is a perfect host ! I recommended this host to all ...
If all host was like im! That will be perfect
Great place for the money!! Nice beach and clean condo.  Andrew is VERY responsive and great to deal with!

Andrews condo home  is excellent but the check in at the front desk will be unexpected if early going in. It is not what I expected cuz I was told to check at the front desk and I will receive the keys  ASAP but she made us wait until 14:00hours... it was a bummer..

The condo is in a great location central to everything.   The place is well maintained.  My only complaint would be that you will not want to spend much time at this beach.   The ocean is very rocky and not good for any activities.  Also, no walk on the beach as have to go to Walea to do anytime of beach path walking.  The rooms were ok and everything was there that you needed.
Tons of cool beach gear available, very nice place. Road noise a little much, but quiet other than that. Beautiful sunsets & beach a 3 minute walk away.

Andrews place was PERFECT for our group in town for a family wedding.  VERY well stocked with all of the perfect amenities and even some extra touches for the beach, etc.  The condo is convenient to EVERYTHING around Kihei.  The sunsets were AMAZING!  We LOVED the pool.  Andrew was easy to work with, easy to reach and had all of the info we needed to enjoy our stay.  GREAT AirBnB experience
Great location, a lot of equipments for beach entertainment, very clean. We will definitely stay here again.

Andrew's condo in Kihei is steps from the ocean.  Tennis courts/gym/hot tub and pool will keep you entertained all day.   The condo is. Also stocked with everything needed for a smooth vacation.  After hours check is was a breeze and Andrew's timely responses made the vacation that much better.   Will definitely be back!
Andrew’s place was great!!! Has everything you could need. He was incredibly quick to answer any questions I had. We loved it. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 327 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The house has just about everything one would have at their own home! Very well stocked! Thanks.
Very nice place, excellent location!

name: West Maui/Napili. Entire Condo. QUIET! BEACHES!
summary: Second floor 1bd/1 ba condo in Napili (West Maui). Great price Great Place! Furnished, complete kitchen and bath. Short walk to Napili Bay beach.  Minutes away from Lahaina, Kapalua and Honolua Bay. Napili enjoys island breezes with the tradewinds. No AC but fans keep it cool. Maui is a tropical island with warm weather. Please check Napili weather for average temperatures. This is a  quiet residential condo complex.  If you like serenity, peace and quiet this is it.

host.about: Exploring is my hobby but Maui no ka'oi!

reviews.txt: Everything was great! Location, equipment and surroundings were really good. I would recommend you to rent a car, but there is a bus stop really close. About 1 mile from apartment there is a nice shopping center Napili Plaza. Also it is really quit place so it is better for couples or business trip rather than for families.

We had a great stay. The apartment is as advertised - clean, spacious, quiet. Kitchen had everything we needed for cooking. Donell answered all our questions, check-in/check-out was a breeze. The beach is a short walk away and very nice.

To all looking at staying in Maui, this place is fantastic. It is a 5 minute walk to a beautiful beach with snorkelling, two restaurants, and sea turtles. By the beach there is also a rental place where you can do a week rental of all snorkelling equipment for $20 which I recommend. The place is very clean, has a bunch of amenities, and also has some beach accessories. We came as a couple but we able to make a couple breakfast meals and just relax instead of always having to go to a restaurant. It is about 45 minutes from the airport but is only 20 minutes from the main town of Lahaina (which is great to walk around, shop, and eat) and 10 minutes from kanapali which has a lot of great restaurants and shopping. If I were to come back to Maui I would stay in this same area! 
Donell has been fantastic, accommodating, and very open to offering advice and tips. We thank her very much for her help! 
Mahalo!
Check in was super easy. Location was a short walk to beach and local mini shopping plaza. House was clean and neighborhood very quiet. I would stay again for sure!

Great place to stay in upmarket Napili. Amazing sunsets and restaurants and beaches very nearby (all a walk away). We basically chose to stay close by for our 3 day trip, enjoying Merrimans, Honolua bay and Lahaina. Donnell's served as the perfect base!
Place was clean great location very close to beach store not far at all you won't regret booking mahalo

Wonderful experience. Safe neighborhood, well equipped space, and close to the beach. Great communication.
The home felt very much like a home.

Imagine everything you could need from an Airbnb apartment. You got it. And more. The apartment is BEAUTIFULL, in a very quiet and safe neighborhood. You are 5 minutes waling from a beach, and 15 minutes drive from the best beach on the Island. The place is very clean, you have a lot of beach accesories like a body board and more. Donell is very very very kind and sweet. She will respond every message within 5 minutes. Check in was super fast and easy. I definitley recomend you to stay here.

We really enjoyed our stay at Maria's place. Pleasant, quiet place for vacation.Very close to restaurants, beaches, anything you could want. Large amount of beach equipment. We would stay there again.
Walking distance from the beach and the Gazebo restaurant! We had a great stay!

Great Airbnb, Maria's place has everything you need and more. It's breeze cooled and it's great to sleep with no a/c and feel the breeze blow through at night. The location is awesome, Napili Bay is a  really nice beach and Sea House restaurant is perfect for a drink at the bar looking at the sunset. Kapalua is a couple minutes further along and is even better, spend a day there you won't regret it. Great value for money and perfect place to stay in West Maui!
Maria's home was perfect! It was exactly what we were looking for! We felt right at home, we were comfortable, and we really enjoyed the breeze and the sounds that it brought at night!

Great location for exploring west Maui! 

Beautiful view out from the back of the apartment very private feel yet minutes away from the beach and shops.
Secluded, quiet, affordable get-a-way that was close to a beautiful beach!  We walked down there a number of times.  Nice breezes through the night.
Well located, clean, well stocked Condo walking distance to Napili bay and Gazebo restaurant. Pool and barbeque too.
Best Airbnb experience so far. Wonderful apartment, cozy and clean, perfect located. Feels like a home far away :-) Highly recommended!

Great spot, apartment is fully kitted out with all the gear your need for a great stay in Hawaii. You can wake up in the morning and jump in the local Cove and swim with the turtles and grab hot cinnamon buns and coffee by the beach! Would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone! Thanks again!
Great location. Beaches and shops were very close by and the area was just amazing.

My situation is somewhat different in that I own and reside full-time in a condo at the same property, and I work for a vacation rental/property management co. that's been here 30+ years (long before Airbnb).  My husband and I stayed 3 nights when our own condo was undergoing some maintenance.  I have to say that renting from Maria was an absolute pleasure.  Her condo is clean and fresh and perfect for anyone who really wants to experience authentic Maui living. Maria's home is located in a very private and tranquil area of the property.  I'm grateful the time we rented fell on my days off from work because I got to enjoy reading on the lanai, grilling dinner and night swimming in the evening at the common area pool (hubby and I do this anyway, but this felt like an actual getaway!).  Also, the breezes everyone talks about? They're amazing.  It's a special place.  I highly recommended.

Napili is a wonderful place to stay. Napili Bay is beautiful and great for snorkeling, lots of turtles. You can walk to The Gazebo restaurant from the place. It rains a bit more up north and it's a more local vibe. I'm from the west side of Maui and really love Napili. Kapalua has excellent restaurants and is very close by. The condo had a couple little things that made it seem very "lived in" like a dirty bar of soap in the shower. The towels smelled a little musty. You must be VERY quiet as it was only two of us there, going to bed by 9:30 PM and still got a note on our car. It read "we can hear you walking heel tow down the stairs". Basically tiptoe around because the walls are very thin. Overall affordable spot, good communication and Napili is great.

name: STUDIO APARTMENT + WIFI!!!!
summary: This fully furnished apartment includes marble bathroom with shower, kitchennette, Laundry and full access to a spacious gym and pool with a view!

host.about:
Hey! I'm A, absolutely love travelling, eating carbs with some good wine and helping people. 
First encounter with Airbnb was in Japan and loved the concept, our hosts helped us through and through. 
I thought to myself, why not help people with their holidays in my favourite city in the world, Sydney!! So here i am!! I will do my very best to make sure you enjoy your stay!! One Love! x

reviews.txt: The apartment was neat and tidy. Very close to transport and good location of you're working in the CBD. The check in procedure was very flexible and Angela was very easy to get in touch with and followed up. She even left me a box of chocolates as a warm welcome. Will stay again.
Great area and beautifully presented apartment, very clean. Angela was extremely helpful and easy to deal with. Loved staying here.

Angela was an excellent host - extremely welcoming and helpful throughout my stay. The apartment is immaculate - extremely clean and new, central location, close to shops and the train station. A perfect apartment for people who want to explore Sydney. I highly recommend this Airbnb without any reservations.
It was a perfect stay. The location was great as was the friendly service. It was meticulously clean and had the most comfy bed IVE EVER SLEPT ON!!!
Really enjoyed my stay and I am looking forward in staying again, it's clean, great location for my needs .. Prefect and great wonderful hospitality best regards
Outstanding communication prior to and during the stay. The apartment was great - would stay again!

Angela was a fantastic host! She was very friendly and responded to any questions that I had.

The apartment was nice, clean, and most of all comfortable! It had all the amenities that I needed. Wifi worked perfectly. Great location as it was within walking distance to many sights such as the Rocks, Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Darling Harbor, and George Street (shopping district). It was also conveniently located near the train station if I needed to head someplace far and to the ferries (that I took to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach).

Would highly recommend Angela as a host and her apartment to others!

Fantastic apartment in very convenient location. Getting the keys wasn't a problem at all and was a pleasure to walk into a very clean apartment and have 2 cold beers in the fridge awaiting me too. I was very quiet which suited me as I was staying for business.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sydney.

Great location!!!! 10min walk to Pitt at and 10min walk to circular quay. Great little apartment, especially if you're staying in Sydney for more then a weekend! Has a washing machine/drier, which was super convenient. Also a little kitchenette so we could have breakfast etc in. Also Angela left us a cute little gift on arrival, which was the sweetest touch. Definitely will be staying here again next time and recommending it to friends. 
Thank you!!!!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I feel so fortunate to have stayed at Angela's property.  Angela is extremely responsive and friendly, and the studio is just perfect - so clean and spacious with everything I needed.  Staying here was a breeze :). She even provided me with chocolates and grocery items when she found out this was an extended stay!  I would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend Angela and the property to everyone visiting Sydney :)

I booked for an extended stay at Angela's apartment and it was everything I could hope for in an Airbnb stay and more! The apartment was extremely clean and well-kept with all the amenities included.  I loved the beautiful marble bathroom and the spacious living space.  The kitchen included a stove top, microwave, toaster and kettle so I was able to easily prepare simple meals and breakfast.  The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and there are various cafes and restaurants just around the corner.  It is also within a short walk to Wynyard station and major shopping spots.  This apartment was perfect for my stay in Sydney and I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a home away from home :)
Angela's place was exactly as pictured in a nice and secure building. I enjoyed the quietness, and she was very respectful of my needs and privacy. I'd return to her place next time I visit Sydney!
Angela was fast to respond to any queries, and provided excellent directions and arrival instructions.  The apartment was as described, and the location suited me perfectly.  I will be booking again.

Could not speak highly enough of the host! I let her know it was a surprise for my husbands birthday. She went out of the way to put up banners and purchase a cake as a surprise for us! Communication was A+! The room was fabulous and so clean and comfy! Thanku so very much!
The studio is comfortable and really clean.  Great location for exploring Sydney.  Quick walk to The Rocks, Sydney Harbor Bridge and Circular Quay.  Host is very accommodating.

Angela was extremely easy to deal with and was wonderful in going above and beyond to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Her communication was amazing and the overall experience was very positive. 

We felt very welcomed and can't speak highly enough of her kindness and professionalism.

The property is located in an excellent spot - very safe and super close to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD (all within 5-10 mins walk).

The building has excellent facilities and the apartment is very clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and most definitely will not be our last.

We highly recommend Angela and the apartment. Thank you so much again for everything :)

A gem for any discerning traveller to Sydney! Lovely well appointed apartment with everything you could ask for in a stay, the marble bathroom was a bonus. Private but convenient location in the city - ten minutes walk to Wynyard's main attractions and the shopping district. Angela was a wonderful host, leaving some groceries in the fridge and communicating well to ensure I had a smooth stay. I'd love to be back the next time I'm in town!

My husband and I had a great time staying at A's place. It was super cozy, clean and in a good location close to the rocks, circular quay, transit and a grocery store. A was very responsive whenever we had a question. Definitely will recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney CBD

This was the perfect place for my friend and I for our first trip to Sydney! The place looks exactly like the pictures and was as clean as a hotel room when we arrived! Angela was very accommodating and even provided some basic foodstuffs for us in the fridge when we arrived. 

You could not ask for a better location staying here. It's only a few blocks to Darling Harbour and a short walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay. It was easily accessible and we had no issues throughout our time staying there. I highly recommend this studio and would definitely stay here again!

I've never used Airbnb until this trip, and I was a bit nervous my first go around in an international city, but Angela made the process very smooth and saw to it that everything was taken care of for me. Very clean place and comfortable to stay in.

name: Hip 2BR in Downtown Montréal by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants.

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt:
really good location, and the centre of downtown is in walk distance.
Room is marvelous, new and mordern decoration, except there's a little bit decoration odour.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful apartment right in the middle of all the action downtown Montreal! Very easy check in, responsive host service, and everything you need for a short stay! I would definitely want to stay here again for my next visit.
the place is very clean and things are accurately described.
Awesome apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again !
Very nice appartment, very well located. Only problem: buiding ventilation is very noisy. However, host provided ear plugs and was very quick to respond. Excellent customer service!
They were very helpful!
Bon endroit. Tres propre. Tres bon rapport qualite prix.
No keys required. Great location.
Great stay, host was easy to communicate with via (Hidden by Airbnb) messenger. They fixed a problem with the smoke detector in a timely manner. Would stay again.
Place is in a prime location downtown Montreal. Can walk right up Mt Royal and close to many bars and restaurants in the middle of the city. The place was exactly as it appeared in the pictures.
Great apartment great location
Great spot!

I stayed in this listing w/ a colleague on a business trip. It was perfect and the area is really nice too. Communication w/ Sonder is so incredibly fast and easy. Entry was via keypad so check-in was super easy.
Superbe appartement dans le centre-ville!
I really recommend this rental which was beyon expectations, well located and very clean and tidy.
Nice place!

We can't say enough great things about this host . Any question or concern we had he responded within minutes . The unit was clean and looked like the photos that were posted & all the details about the location were accurate . We would highly recommend this unit and host to anyone considering visiting downtown Montreal .

This apartment was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It looks like the pictures and was very quiet, though nearby to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area as well as Mont Royal. The kitchen had all the standard amenities. They provided shampoo/soap/conditioner and towels as well. I would stay in this apartment again. There were only 2 of us but it is large enough to hold a couple more people (though only has 1 bathroom).

Two things to note: as stated in the description, the building is currently under construction. It was very loud for 2 days of the trip but we didn't hear it at all on the 3rd day. Keep that in mind if you choose to book while the construction continues. Second, Sonder requires you to register on their website (with name, email address, and phone number) in order to rent an apartment from them.

The highlight of this place is its location. Easy to access shops, the metro, restaurants, etc. The amenities are good. The kitchen, dinning area, and living room have basic furniture that will work for most travelers. The beds are a little stiff but there are worse places to lay your head. The bedroom with the ball lamps on the side table is very bright while the other bedroom is wonderfully dark. Temperature control is challenging since the only AC unit is in the dining area. Water temp fluctuates without adjusting the nozzle/valve, but that's probably building-wide. During our stay there was construction on our balcony so we woke up each morning to those sounds. We were instructed not to open the windows to avoid dust coming in. On the morning of checkout the next client came in at 7 AM. That was awkward. In summary, it's a nice place but this wouldn't be my first choice for the next visit to MTL.

name: ★Cozy doble bedroom ★Nearby Christ the Redeemer★
summary: Stay in a quiet place with great location! Free wifi access throughout the house. Close to shops, restaurants, bakery, pharmacies, bus stops and subway. We're also close from the tram to the Christ the Redeemer! Situated on the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro, on the charming neighborhood of Laranjeiras, which lies between the city center and the beaches, the house is an ideal base to relax and explore this wonderful city.  Come see for yourself! ♡ LGBT+ guests are welcome! ♡

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
※ENGLISH※ESPAÑOL※FRANÇAIS

Hi there!

I`m Rafaela, a professional actress who loves the arts.

I have a degree in Theater Theory from the Federal University of the State of Rio de Janeiro.

I started receiving people through AirBnB at the 2016 Olympics and since then Edson, my co-host, and I have welcomed more than 500 guests from over 29 countries across 5 continents.

Thanks to AirBnB I discovered a new passion beyond the arts and traveling. I discovered the pleasure of learning new languages and being able to communicate with people from different cultures.

Maybe I will greeting you in your language. Who Knows?

Rio is amazing! Come see for yourself!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
¡Hola!

Soy Rafaela, una actriz profesional que ama el arte.

Tengo un título en Teoría del Teatro de la Universidad Federal del Estado de Río de Janeiro.

Comencé a recibir huéspedes a través del AirBnB en los Juegos Olímpicos de 2016  y desde entonces, yo y Edson, mi coanfitrión, hemos dado la bienvenida a más de 500 huéspedes de 29 países de los 5 continentes.

Gracias a AirBnB, descubrí una nueva pasión más allá del arte y los viajes. Descubrí el placer de aprender nuevos idiomas y poder comunicarme con personas de diferentes culturas.

Tal vez te saludo en tu idioma. ¿Quién sabe?

Rio es increíble! ¡Ven a verlo tu mismo!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Salut!

Je suis Rafaela, une actrice professionnelle qui aime les arts.

J'ai un diplôme en théorie du théâtre de l'Université Fédérale de l'État de Rio de Janeiro.

J'ai commencé à recevoir des invités par le biais d'AirBnB aux Jeux Olympiques de 2016 et depuis, Edson, mon co-hôte, et moi-même avons accueilli plus de 500 invités de plus de 29 pays sur les 5 continents.

Grâce à AirBnB, j'ai découvert une nouvelle passion au-delà des arts et des voyages. J'ai découvert le plaisir d'apprendre de nouvelles langues et de pouvoir communiquer avec des personnes de cultures différentes.

Peut-être que je vais vous saluer dans votre langue. Qui sait?

Rio est incroyable! Venez voir par vous-même!

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: One of our favourite airbnb stays. Rafaela and Edson are amazing hosts and made it a great stay. The house is quite tucked away and is really nice! The room was great, very clean and it had one of the best kitchens for guests to use that we've had. Overall, a fantastic stay with lovely hosts. 100% recommend.

Our contact person was Edson. He was amazing! He went above and beyond during our stay. We could not have hoped for a better host.

The place is really nice. The private rooms are simple, good and clean. The common area is very nice and cozy. Every area of the place is clean. 

The area is complete safe even at night. Several supermarkeds and small cafes and restaurants close by. 

Its located 18 min. from the metro station, but there are busses 2 min from the place. 

We highly recommend this place! 
We would choose to stay here again if we return to Rio 

Thank you very, very much Edson!!!!
TUDO PERFEITO!

Rafaela and Edson have a really nice flat. It is a good and central area where you have a lot of supermarkets, bakerys, banks, busstations and restaurants.
Everywhere you want to go, it's easy to reach from that place even by walking. 
Rafaela and Edson are really pleasent people, asking for any needs to make the stay as comfortable as they can for you. The flat is really clean and has everything you need for cooking. I think I will prefer that one, when I come back to Rio

We couldn't have wished for a better accommodation in Rio! The house was big and super clean. Edson was a great host and always open to all our questions. 
Laranjeiras neighborhood is really nice and even though there are lots of bars and restaurants the house is located in a quiet area. You can reach all tourist attractions easily by public transport or Uber. 
We would definitively come back when in Rio again!!
Perfect place in a very nice area. A great room, very good facilities and very nice people. I very much enjoyed my stay there.

name: Cozy house at Beyoğlu
summary: Hello dear Guests, wellcome to istanbul. My House is 2+1 and at second floor. 1 privite room is for my international guests. House is Very close to Taksim Square. You can Walk in 30 minutes or you can take a bus.  The bus stop is only 100 m from home. You can go Taksim, Eminönü, Karaköy, Kadıköy, Beyazıt, Sultanahmet easily from home.  I have 1 bed, two people can sleep together. Second person should pay extra. You can use kitchen, bathroom, free Wifi, dishwasher, washing machine, Ironing.

host.about:
I am Ali, 33 years old and a Psychological Counceler - Teacher.  I am working at Secondary School. 
I like  meet with new people, chess, cinema and arts. I have blog about cinema and write critics sometimes. 

I like travel, I visited Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Kosovo, Macedonia, Netherlands, Portugal, Serbia, Spain and Ukraine. And I met many peaople in this countries, I think Airbnb is one of the best way to meet new people and share the life. So I opened my home for guests who is coming from the any part of the world.

Usualy I watch films, some of my favourite directors are Michael Haneke, Kim Ki Duk, Emir Kustarica, Lars Von Trier, Andrei Zyvanigitsev, Bahman Ghobadi, Majid Majidi, Abbas Kiyarüstemi, Ingmar Bergman, Stanley Kubrick etc. 

My favorite Tv Series are Prison Break, Breaking Bad, Better Call Soul, Mr. Robot, Black Mirror, Narcos, Intreatmant. 

I try to explain of me. You wellcome to my home.  My house is very safety, lovely and peaceful.

Easy access to popular destinations : Taksim, Beyoğlu, Eminönü, Sultanahmet, Topkapı Palace, Galata Tower, Kadıköy, Princes Islands.
I am pleased to welcome you.

People who stay with me are from Germany, Canada, Norway, Sweeden, Jordan, Russian, Iran, China, South Korea, United States, Mexico City, Malasia, Italy, Australia until yet.

reviews.txt:
Ali's place is easily accessible. From this place you can visit most monuments in the European side of Istanbul with the least complications (bus stop 1 min away and it serves Sishane metro in 10 min). If you take the bus to Sishane you can have 1 hour walk to most historical places in the European part. Next to his place there is a big market (both sides of a long street) with lots of local Turkish food. Just before his place, you can identify a small restaurant and a small grocery store. 

Ali is such a great host with distinguished Turkish hospitality. He helped me several times to locate appropriate places for buying gifts. We had interesting discussions and his excellent English helped us had rich cultural exchanges. 

I'd recommend this place if you want to get a great value of your money and enjoy a true Turkish life experience (neighborhood and hosting).
I never expected I can find a friend in Istanbul,Ali he is a good guy,he is a friend very thoughtful and comfortable.i recommend to everybody.

It was such a pleasure to live at Ali’s place. My flight was very late at night and I arrived around 1.00 am but He made sure that I checked in without any problem.
He gave me many usefull tips about the city, talked with my taxi drivers, ordered food for me and replay to all my messages fast. 
The turkish coffe He made was really god :)
Ali just makes you feel at home, He is easy going, nice to chat with and full og joy.
His lovely cat is just aswome 
Thank you for a great experience amd see you next time!

Ali was such a welcoming host when I initially just arrived. His hospitality attest to the warm and friendliness of the Turkish people. Though I only spent a few time and night interacting with him, I know that he could assist me with any way he can if I needed help. 
He has such a cute cat who loves to  play with his host! Perks if you love furry animals. In terms of location wise, Ali's apartment is located very near to the bus stop. There is one metro station that you can take that leads you to different and touristy parts of Istanbul.

Ali is a great host and makes you feel at home my 2 brothers stayed at his place for a week and they both say great things about Ali. 

Thank you for having us and looking forward to welcoming you in our place if you ever visit :)
This place exceeded my expectations. On of my best Airbnb experiences.
Very nice!
Very good
Very clean and comfortable place with an adorable cat included! Ali was so helpful when I arrived very late. Highly recommended!
Ali is very kind & helpful.  Though the bed is a sofa bed its shockingly comfortable; perfect combination of firmness & softness.  If you don't like energetic cats, I recommend not staying here.
More than I could imagine. Ali was not only our host, but he has become a friend. He lives in a very good position to explore Istanbul. I strongly recommend him. Thank you for everything buddy.
Ali's a great guy and super kind,I had a fantastic time in Istanbul and to his place! Also has a super cool cat that wants to play all the time! I loved it!
Nice flat with a great view from the balcony. super helpful and friendly host with a great taste of music :)

Ali’s hospitality is absolutely amazing! He never let you feel yourself like a stranger in Istanbul.
He was always ready to help me with everything and answer my questions about turkish culture. We had a lot of really great conversations.
And his home... oh, it’s sooo admiring. There are many things which are made by Ali. So you can’t leave his home without a portion of inspiration! 
By the way for every guest he has an gorgeous surprise :)

If you want to meet a friend, not just a host, don’t doubt - come to Ali’s home!

Ali is very accomdating and very quick at responding messages. He gave me some good tips and showed me to a very cool local dive bar on Saturday night! The place is just as picture, convenient with bus to tourist places in less than 30min.

Ali was a charming and thoughtful host. He was good company but also respectful of your privacy and the fact you would have your own things to do. The room was basic but clean and tidy, and he provided a lovely breakfast. Highly recommended.
Good stay in Ali's home. Nice talking with each other and give me a lot of information. And good music in home. Hope meeting again.

name: Napili Ridge, Maui ~ J1 ~ Garden View
summary: Beautiful studio surrounded with lush landscaping close to Napili and Kapalua Bays. Air Conditioning portable style ~ Coin operated laundry facility on site ~ Pool ~ BBQ ~ Secure & Complimentary WiFi ~ Assigned Parking ~ Ground level unit with garden view ~  Ceiling fan ~ Room darkening curtains for a great nights sleep ~ * Click on the "See Photos" tab ~ lower left of the listing page *  Tax has been included in rate.  2 guests max   The responsible renter must beat least 21 years of age.

reviews.txt:
This place is great. It's a small studio unit in a neighborhood/apartment complex like area. There is a washer dryer on property. It costs $1 to wash and about $1 to dry clothes. 

The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, and dishes. The fridge worked great. A short drive away from Napili Plaza that has a grocery store, coffee shop, a good taco place, and a pharmacy. Also there is a shop there that has snorkel gear for rent. You will need this to swim with the sea turtles. 

The unit does not have air conditioning. I kept the sliding glass door open while I slept to keep the air circulating. Also the front door has a gate that you can lock while keeping the front door open. However some moths and the ocassional mosquito can get in. There is a screen on the sliding glass door in the back and a privacy shade that you can pull down. 

You can walk to the Napili bay beach from the condo, about 10 mins, it's better than trying to find parking. There is a weird beeping noise right outside the bathroom window. You can hear it very clearly from the bed at night. This was distracting sometimes as I am a writer so it was hard to focus. I did most of my writing at the coffee shop which as described does have Wi-Fi and is very good. 

There are two beach towels in the closet and a mini cooler for the beach. The condo unit is small, so there is no living space to hang out. But most of your day you will be out and about or at the beach all day. So you really only need this place for some cooking and sleeping. 

I did not use the TV. I turned it on once and couldn't figure out the cable so I didn't bother with it. The host is very helpful, just text if you need anything. 

There is a specific parking spot. Use the parking decal provided and stay in that spot. The trash is located at the entrance to the property. I did not check out the pool area as the beach was amazing and took up all my time. Also 5 mins away from Spa Montage. If you get a day pass for $55 you can hang out at the spa all day between the pool, hot tubs, and hydrocircuit.  It was a fun way for me to kill half a day and read in the relaxation lounge. 

From Lahaina harbor you can get day trips on a ferry over to lanai or Molokai islands as well. I heard the snorkeling at Kaanapali was a little clearer, but I noticed the currents were much stronger there. I prefer Napili bay. Give the shower pull thing a jiggle if it doesn't make the water go all the way up.
Clean, quiet, comfortable!!!

Debra's place is very clean, quiet, comfy, and easy to get were ever you want to go. She offers Wi-Fi and TV if you so need and just down the road within walking distance is the beach, many restaurant's, and even a bus if needed to get you around if you do not have a car. I spent 10 days here and walked to most everything. There is a market less than 10 minuets walking with everything you could need for a once in a lifetime vacation. Best I have ever stayed at and will be returning often.

Had an extremely pleasant stay at Napili ridge.
Debra was also always available to answer questions which we had.
The condo is a short walk to the beach (Napili) with great snorkeling visibility.
Ideally located if you wish to spread your beach time between Napili, Kanapali, and Kapalua.
Very walkable to Napili bay. Very close drive to honolua , kaanapali, kapalua, Lahaina. Parking was easy and close, laundry was inexpensive. Nice little place.
The studio at G1 was as clean as a whistle, recently remodeled  with new everything. Close to food shopping so you can prep a meal in an up to date kitchen.
Nice studio apt. Was great for my business travel
The location and parking spot was good for our stay on Maui. Close to the beach! They were currently updating the facade of the building while we were staying which was not ideal.
Wonderfully quiet neighborhood complex, located just blocks away from wonderful restaurants and amazing beaches!

Had an amazing time in Maui! Condo is walking distance to the beach, good restaurants, and a grocery store. The complex is quiet and felt safe. The kitchen has all the necessities. Bed comfortable, and the condo was very clean and simple. Pool is close by, everyone I ran into at the complex were friendly. 

This was my first experience using Airbnb. Debra was very helpful. She responds fast and is a fantastic host. Checking in, making sure everything is ok and provided me with clear instructions on how to get to the condo, how to get in, and where to park. I would highly recommend this place and will definitely come back and book this condo again!
Easy to get to and from beaches and restaurants. Was the perfect studio size for 2 people.
It's a lovely place, comfortable bed, and nice amenities. We had a nice, quiet stay and easy access to area. Thanks so much!
Great place to stay. You're walking distance from the beach. It's an oversized extra comfy studio with a modern feel. It really has everything you need.
We had a lovely stay at the apartment. Clean, comfortable and safe. The apartment is very close to Lahaina which offers restaurants, whale watching tours, and beautiful beaches. Enjoy!

Debra was a perfect host and very responsive. The room was clean and perfectly located in Napili. 5 min walk to Napili Beach (one of the best beaches on Maui with great snorkeling), 5 min walk to the best breakfast on the island, The Gazebo Restaurant (white chocolate macadamia nut pancakes with coconut syrup), and a 3 min drive to the best coffee shop on the island, The Coffee Store (get the iced blended coconut mocha). Lahaina is a 10 min drive and has all kinds of shops, restaurants, and tours. If you need good quality and well priced snorkeling/dive equipment, I recommend Boss Frog's right next to The Coffee Store in Napili. We had the best trip and a large part of that was due to Debra and her condo. We are already planning our trip next year!

Charming studio condo in Pilani with other permanent residents. Extremely clean and welcoming. Check in and parking is simple and straightforward, although the door to the condo doesn't have a number. 
We found our stay here to be pleasant. All amenities listed are included, but are bare bones (except the huge beach towels). The kitchen is nice to look at but is a little dysfunctional for cooking anything more than light meals (but who cooks on vacation in Maui anyway?) There are a handful of restaurants nearby and a great coffee house. 

If you're a light sleeper, bring earplugs. The birds start chirping early and the wind through the palm trees make it sound like it's raining outside.
Just a short walk or really short drive from several of the best beaches in the world! Always had plenty of places to park too. Debra is a great communicator and really makes things easy!

We loved our stay here at the studio condo in Napilli.  Roomy studio condo, clean and very well taken care of.   Napilli Bay is within a 5-minute walk from the property and has wonderful snorkeling. The birds will definitely wake you up in the am so if you want to sleep in earplugs are recommended.  The kitchen is spacious and great but dishes are a little difficult to wash in the little sink.  All in all, it was a great place to stay.  Debra was a wonderful host and very responsive.

This unit served as a great little hub for our 2 week vacation in Maui. It includes all the amenities you will need -- fast wifi, cable TV, full kitchen. It did take a couple of days to get used to living with no AC but there was always a nice breeze coming through the screen doors.  

Our favorite beach on the island was Napili Bay Beach, which is only a few minutes from the unit. Parking is available along the lower road if you get down there early enough. Kaanapali and Lahaina are only a short drive south. 

Debra was very hospitable and super responsive to any questions we had. She was also very accommodating with our early check in and late check out requests. I would not hesitate to recommend this unit and area to anyone. 

Thanks Debra!

Debra's apartment was exactly what I needed. I had booked other accommodation but had a creepy incident that caused me to leave abruptly. I was able to message and confirm booking with Debra all within an hour on a Saturday night which is amazing. THANK YOU DEBRA! 

The apartment was very clean and had good add-ons for going to the beach (cooler, beach towels, snorkel mask). 

My major feedback:

1. The apartment gets hot at night unless you're comfortable sleeping with the sliding door glass open. Coming from my creepy situation, I did not feel comfortable sleeping with it open and there are not other windows in the sleeping/common area. Debra mentions something along these lines in her posting so take that seriously. 

2. You can hear your neighbors. One neighbor was up at 5am and it sounded like they were literally on my patio. The other neighbor upstairs had a young baby that I heard crying. The apartment is also under the stairs so you can hear people walking up/down the stairs when it's extra quiet at night. I'll admit that I was a little harder to please than usual -- I was more jumpy to noises since my space had been violated at the other accommodation. Also, you're in Maui. If you're up at 5am it's not the worst thing in the world. 

3) I paid $200/night total w/ fees and it felt slightly overpriced. Small things that made me feel that way -- no dish towels (I think?),  a rusty shower head + dingy shower curtain, no place to leave wet things (you're warned that you'll be fined if you leave clutter or beach gear on the patio or walk way) All that said, perspective! We're in Maui and $200 night was some of the cheapest accommodation I could find. It's all relative. 

Overall, the place was safe, clean, and convent to driving Route 30 south/north to the other towns beyond Napili. There's a grocery store and some great happy hours nearby. Really grateful I had a roof over my head, a comfy bed to collapse into and a door that locked. Thank you Debra.

name: Charming urban 1 Bedroom apartment
summary: Our cute and comfortable one bedroom apartment has an actual urban city feel.Located in the Trendy area of Sai Ying Pun, where markets stalls and mechanic shops blend with hipster bars and restaurants. Beat the Central/ Soho crowds and head just a ten-minute walk west to this perfect little oasis from which you can explore.

host.about: Professional, New Zealander, 30+ living in Hong Kong.

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 87 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 1 or 2 rooms with private terrace in shared flat
summary: Room located in the Eixample district in central Barcelona, only 5 minutes walk from Plaza Spain where you find public transport to the airport, other cities etc. It is a penthouse with two terraces on, and lots of light. Private terrace and possibility to receive a third person in another room.

host.about:
Hello I am Christophe, I am French and live in Barcelona since 8 years now. I know a reasonably well the city and I will be happy to advise you on places to visit, restaurant or where to have a nice drink. 

I work in sales and travel also a lot so I know the meaning of "feel like at home" when you travel somewhere.

I really hope you will enjoy your stay in Barcelona.

reviews.txt:
I had a marvellous time staying in Barcelona and felt very at home x the apartment is fab with two roof terraces and the hospitality is even better.
Capitaine checked I was ok regularly on my way to the apartment and gave transport, restaurant, general advice all the time I was there. I now have flat envy!!

My stay here was great. Just like the listing shows, the apartment is very tidy and has two amazing rooftop patios. Its close to a lot of tourist attractions and right next to the subway. The neighborhood is calm and quiet.

It was my first time in Spain and first time using airbnb and everything went amazing! Pretty good area for a lot of tourist attractions and the place itself is so clean and nice (his balconies have good views and are very pretty). My friends loved this place as well. Also, Capitaine is an amazing host, always asked me if I needed anything, offered a lot of stuff and even suggested me bars I can go. I would definitely want to stay here again if I visit Barcelona again :)
First, I will start by saying how accommodating he was. Second, the flat is as pictured. The views, the views, THE VIEWS. Great location, seconds from the metro and all in all a good stay!

The best things of this house are amazing terrace and location. There are two terraces. One is common area which is very spacious and cozy. The other one is only for guest and we loved this place. Sunrise and sunset from terrace were unforgettable. The metro station is on same block, so very convenient. You can go to Katalunya station directly.(only 3 stops). Cristophe is nice guy and helpful! He is always willing to help us. 
I can't say the house is perfectly clean. A cleaness is ok but it can be improved.

Truly one of the best Airbnb locations I have stayed at. Christophe is so warm and accommodating, and the flat can't be beat for its amazing patio spaces, comfort and ideal location. I only wish I would have been able to spend more evenings there on the patio enjoying the sunset.

We couldn't have had more a lovely stay. Our host made sure our space was impeccable and not only that he wanted our trip to be a fulfilled one, he had tips for us that even after we left we still followed. If only we could've stayed longer.

Capitaine is a lovely young man who was always available when needed without being intrusive during our stay. Our private room & terrace was lovely. Great views over Barcelona. We had the whole flat mainly to ourselves as Capitaine is a very busy young man on a project of constant improvement. Thanks for a lovely holiday. Anita & Al
Fantastic place and great host, extremely welcoming and caring

Christophe is a very nice person. We left the keys inside the house and he was in France at the moment, but he called his friends to open the door for us! The house is close to a metro station of L1. And 5 min walk to Spain square!

Christophe is a great host and really made me feel at home. The communication was really smooth and he helped me with every question I had. I really enjoyed staying at Christophe's nice apartment. I appreciated the comfortable bed, the silence and that he offered water, tea and coffee. He was even letting me cook und use from his own food so I hadn't got to rush out on the first evening and organize something. 
The apartment is nicely furnished and the two terrasses are really amazing. Wished I had had more time to enjoy the wonderful terrasse. 
And although I haven't seen hin much I enjoyed the few conversations we had. Christophe is a very friendly person, charming and willing to help make your stay a great experience. 
Thanks for everything, Christophe! Staying at your place was definitely a great airbnb experience!

Christophe is very friendly and proactively asking for possible requests one might have. We had a good time living in his beautiful apartment. Our room and bed was in great condition and the highlight are the two specious Terraces, especially also for guests who like plants and flowers.
Thank you again Christophe, for having been such an excellent host.
I would definitely recommend this place!

Christophe is a wonderful host. His apartment was perfect for my stay in Barcelona--clean, comfortable, and gorgeous rooftop space. He left a large bottle of water, tea, and coffee in my room. I enjoyed spending time with Christophe and his friends. He is friendly, accommodating, and knowledgeable about Barcelona. I highly recommend his flat !! :)

name: Cozy & in the heart of Kowloon
summary: My apartment is about 310 sqft, fully furnished and in the heart of busy and lovely Tsim Sha Tsui. This area is full of restaurants and stores.  Perfect location to explore the city!

host.about: I'm a very open-minded person who loves other cultures and meeting new people. Originally I am Swiss and moved to Hong Kong 2,5 years ago for my job. HK is an amazing city - I love living and working here.

reviews.txt: Isabelle's apartment is cozy and close to everything. Even though we did not get the chance to meet her, we enjoy the facilities in the apartment. As a local Hong Konger, I will definitely recommend others and my friends to live in this apartment
stayed here for 8 days. Highly recommend! the location is epic! and super easy to find.
It is a very nice place. It is clean and very convenience.

name: IDEAL APARTMENT SAGRADA FAMILIA
summary: Our apartment is completely updated, comfortable, functional, warm. You´re sure to spend a few unforgettable days in Barcelona. The apartment has everything necessary to make your stay perfect! The location is superb! Just two minutes from the Sagrada Familia, the extraordinary basilica by Antonio Gaudí!

reviews.txt: Great place great host. Very well located and clean. I really recommend this place
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

She was very nice and Friendly. The Apartment was really Cosy. 
Its not so far to the Central, very nearly.
We loved this apartment. Building facilities are in excellent conditions. Great location. Definitely recommend if you plan to discover this awesome city.

We had a lovely time at this apartment.  It is very close to Sagrada Familia and also to the Metro station which is really handy for getting around the city.  We were welcomed at the stated time and told where everything was etc.  We didn't get a chance to meet Marisa, but her cleaner did a fantastic job of greeting us and making us feel very welcome.  The apartment block is quiet - you rarely hear/see the neighbours - but you will hear traffic.  But it didn't bother us.

name: Beautiful Area Single Room
summary: FREE PICK UP TAXI CAR WITH 6 OR MORE DAYS BOOKING!!Best Place of the city in the residencial area of les Corts, just 15 minutes to the city center by metro.  Near University, ESADE, Nou Camp, many shopping near by.

host.about: Spanish guy living in Barcelona, working in the retail field. I like sport and I'm very healthy person, when I have free time I like to go to the swimmpool. Happy to give to my guess information about Barcelona city and the best things to do.

reviews.txt: El piso es ideal y muy bien situado en una zona tranquila y llena de facilicidades.El trato con Marcos fantastico, muy servicial y atento en todo momento .Merci Marcos.

I had a busy 5-day stay in Barcelona and Marcos provided me with a great place to stay. The location is good, not touristic but where local people live, very safe and clean neighborhood. It was easy to get from the airport to the apartment by train and metro, costing just one trip. Metro station was quite close. The apartment was nice, Marcos was very helpful and flexible and let me use his wifi. The room is small but cosy, just enough for one guest, so it's great value for the price!

I stayed Marcos' flat for 15 days and it was great. The flat is clean and comfortable. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe. Easy to access tram and metro. You can find supermarkets, shops, bars, restaurants nearly. Marcos is very friendly. He is always ready to inform about Barcelona and help about any issue.

I really enjoyed my holiday while I was staying at Marcos's place. He's so sweet guy who's willing to help you whenever you need. The room is clean as well as the entire flat. This tidy flat shows how great this guy is!

Marcos is a very polite, friendly and respectful host.  He welcomed me with a map and useful directions, patiently answered all my questions, and in general was very accommodating whenever I needed something. His apartment is small but cozy, and the area is indeed quite charming and very well-connected. The metro is a few minutes away, and all "tourist attractions" are accessible within 15 minutes to maximum half an hour. The night bus stop is also nearby. I really enjoyed my stay in Barcelona, and would definitely like to stay in Marcos' apartment when I visit again. I recommend all travelers to do so!

Nice city, nice flat, very nice Marcos! :)
So its perfect place for really great holidays.
Although we didn't spend much time together, everything was ok and the apartnent is pretty nice located!!! Thanks
Marcos is a friendly host and it's really a nice stay at his place. The room is clean and quite. It's in a very safe neighborhood and very close to the metro stantion. Highly recommend it!

Marcos was a great host! very helpful and went out of his way to provide me with anything I needed to know

sincerely recommend this listing, if you're staying in this amazing city.

The neighbourhood is relatively safe and is about a 10 minute subway ride to the city centre

From the moment you arrive, Marcos does an excellent job getting you situated to get the most out of Barcelona. He had great suggestions of what to try out, and was always on hand if you had any questions regarding navigating the city.
Where he's located is convenient to shops, a market, public transport and very close to a lovely plaza with surrounding neighborhood with friendly locals.
And I couldn't have been happier with the room and hospitality! Marcos will make you feel at ease immediately and that definitely has a wonderful affect on your time in Barcelona!
I had stayed for a weekend in BCN. Also, I was pretty familiar with the City, Marcos was really helpful in specific details. In general he is very flexible, very polite and awesome person!

Marcos was a great host during my short stay in Barcelona. My previously booked accommodation fell through and I found myself needing a room at 8pm! Marcos was prompt and helpful, and I made a good decision to book with him. he was even accommodating when I turned up a little later than planned.

The room itself is basic - it has everything necessary but not much more - So it's suited to a budget conscious traveler. The area is quite nice, and well located. I can highly recommend this room and this host.
I stayed with marcos for 4 days. Marcos is an exeptionally friendly, welcoming person and very helpful if you need some informations about the city. I can warmly recommend to stay with him!

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.

host.about:
Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

We've done quite a lot of share living both at home and abroad so we'd like to think we know what makes a good environment in a home.

Hope to meet you soon!

Wayne and Kate

reviews.txt:
The apartment exceeded expectations.  
First, the location was incredible.  Literally overlooking the Tamarama beach and a beautifull balcany to sit on and watch the world go by.  
Secondly, the apartment itself was perfect.  It is clean, with great entertaining spaces and very welcoming.  You don't feel like your invading another persons home but it still feels homely - if that makes sense!  The beds, couch and linen were all clean, fresh and comfortable.
Third, it's only a 10 min walk to Bondi!
Finally, Wayne is lovely and immediately responded to all my questions.  We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kate's place. We travelled to Sydney for a family long weekend and from the moment we opened the door we felt at home. Their home is open and airy with a fantastic view of the beach. The location is perfect, we went on walks along the "ocean walk" to Bondi and the opposite direction to Coogee and Bronte. It was great sitting on the balcony looking out at the beach and the many energetic people pounding the pavements and in the water enjoying the waves. Wayne and Kate were great hosts emailing and messaging us with directions to their home and suggestions of places to visit. Nothing was too much trouble. The champagne and chocolate they left for us was also well received . We can not wait to return. Thankyou Wayne and Kate for sharing your beautiful home with us.

Wayne and Kate were wonderful to deal with, quick responses in the lead-up to our stay and comprehensive instructions on how to get the key when we arrived. As soon as we walked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. The view is magnificent and the apartment is spacious and airy, and well-represented in the photos on the website. The kids loved the big TV which meant more time on the deck for us! Great walks and easy parking which is not easy to come by in Sydney. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

Holy moly what an apartment. Actually better than the photos! The vibe is clean, open, breezy, sophisticated. After a picnic lunch at Bronte, We enjoyed dinner together at the table and an evening swim. We were a party of 6, and all of us slept comfortably and felt like a million dollars the entire time. The kitchen was awesome to cook in and the balcony a peaceful breakfast spot. It could not have been more perfect.

Everything went smoothly and Wayne and Kate were very easy to deal with. The apartment is stunning, wonderful views of the beach, and although I only spent the afternoon there, my Mum and her friends who stayed over found everything they needed and were raving about the location. I'll be back! :)

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Wayne and Kate's place.. you cannot beat waking up to the sounds of the ocean! We had friends travelling from overseas for our wedding, and we could not have asked for a better place to stay; 2-10 mins walk to any of Sydney's great beaches, and all the anemities that you need in an apartment to make the place as comfortable as possible. Wayne and Kate were fantastic in getting back to us on any inquiries and were very thoughtful and approachable. The perfect hosts! now we need another excuse to rent out the place again ;) Thanks for everything!

We had a great time staying at Wayne and Kate's place. It is an absolutely beautiful apartment in an amazing spot. It was great to fall asleep listening to the sea.
Me and 5 girlfriends stayed for a weekend and we were all blown away. The apartment had everything we needed, we just added a few bottles of champers to sip on the balcony and soak up the Tamarama atmosphere. 
Thanks Wayne and Kate :)

From the first contact with Wayne and Kate my first experience using AirBNB has been fabulous! Their regular and thoughtful communication was perfect and we were so excited to stay at their beautiful apartment overlooking Tamarama Beach. We arrived to find cold bubbles in the fridge, a block of chocolate and a 'house and area manual' to assist use with everything we needed to know during our stay. The apartment was perfect! Great size for a larger group and it was so nice to have the home comforts right at our fingertips. I cannot recommend this experience enough and look forward to staying at Wayne and Kate's apartment again in the near future!
Thanks Wayne and Kate we had a lovely time at your apartment. Was clean, beds comfy and great view of the beach!!

What an absolutely fantastic apartment and view! The hosts were fantastic to deal with and gave quick and very helpful replies! The apartment had everything we could need for a girly weekend away. Thanks so much, we all had a ball =)
Wayne and Kate's apartment is in a fabulous location right on the beach of Tamarama. It is clean, well maintained and suited our needs with 2 teenage boys. Thumbs up!

We had a great time, the apartment was lovely, clean, the views were spectacular and all expectations from the posting were met! They even left us bubbly!
The owners were very kind and even left us tips for the area.
I recommend this apartment and experience highly.

-Boyana

Absolutely perfect place to stay in Sydney! The beach is quite literally, across the road! The views are to die for day and night. Short and beautiful walk to Bondi or Bronte for restaurants, bars and bigger beaches if you want them. The apartment is clean and very comfortable,  it has everything and more you could want. And the hosts are extremely kind and accommodating. We had a ball staying here!

We loved staying at Wayne and Kate's beautiful apartment right on the beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished and we felt right at home. Wayne and Kate were fantastic hosts and were in regular contact to make us feel welcome. We can't stress enough how good the location is, being able to walk across the road for a swim at a moments notice is amazing. Highly recommended!
Wonderful apartment and extremely responsive hosts. Wish I were back on the beach!

Fantastic apartment, fantastic location, fantastic hosts! Everything was thought of for us and we had a wonderful stay. The best equipped apartment we have ever stayed in...enough of everything, and more!
 thanks guys!  xx

name: Cozy Room w/ Office | The Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: The Plateau Mont-Royal: At once, Quiet, Cozy, and Lively.  - Beautiful Parcs. - Great Places to Eat & Drink. - In proximity to Downtown, the Mile-End, and the Old Port. See the 'Interactive Map' for nearby Eateries. Ask me directly for additional information!

host.about:
Easy-going, average cook, and continuing education (Urban Planning).
Interests include: Cities, Landscapes, Gardening, Music, and other things.

Just looking to provide you with a cozy retreat.

reviews.txt: Shane welcomed us in with open arms, he was very friendly and helpful. Stayed up to chat with us, suggested some places for us, and worked very hard to be sure we were having a good stay. First thing he did when we walked in the door was offer us food. Cozy, affordable, and pretty close to a lot of cool stuff.

Shane was a GREAT host.  When my father and I arrived, there was a lack of bed space for the two of us and Shane voluntarily gave up his bed so that we could be comfortable.  He went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay.  I felt safe and secure and was able to live according to my odd schedule and hours without any problems !

Nice, Nice, Nice. European and artistic but well organized and covenient house. Perfect location. A block away from great street filled with international restraunts and grocery stores. While you arw enjoying the scene, you will get to the Metro or Bixie bikes. I did write this because of Shane. He is a kind and good guy. He will give you a full support while you are staying his place. So have a nice time!!

Shane was a a great host. He is very accommodating, communicative and fluent in both French and English. I never felt I was intruding in his space and I felt at ease sharing his kitchen and bathroom. His place is situated in a quiet neighborhood that is safe, charming and short commute to downtown. It is a short walk from his place to restaurants, bars and shopping (produce and clothing). I highly recommend this listing.
Shane was very helpful and amenable with check in time. The apartment is very clean, spacious and centrally located to food and drink. We loved our time in Montreal and Shane was very helpful!

Shane was an AWESOME host! I couldn't have asked for anything better; the place was cozy, close enough to everything I needed (I did have a Bixi membership for the month though which was also great), and I felt perfectly comfortable and safe. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone :)

name: Cozy Art Top Floor Apt in PRIME Williamsburg!
summary: My Apt it's right in the middle of the best and hot spots in the heart of REAL Williamsburg on Bedford Ave. Close to everything. 4 Subway stations (L/G/JMZ) around, same distance all! Very chill and cozy! 2 people only. No kids and pets please.

host.about: I'm a Photographer and I love music, travel and good food! I speak Spanish, Italian and English!

reviews.txt:
Adela's apartment is fantastic – perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg, very clean, nicely furnished and convenient.
Definitely one of the best New York apartments I stayed in recently.
Adela was very helpful and easy to communicate with.
Highly recommended!

Ade has an AWESOME apt in Williamsburg -- location is nuts, a reasonable price considering the location, and a great vibe.  Close to about everything in Williamsburg.

Wouldve stayed longer if i couldve.

Very nice Apt. in the hearth of Williamsburg and Bedford, wich is like the coolest place in Brooklyn, but in a very quiet and safety street. The apt, is in a 4th floor (no elevator) very clean and luminous.

You have two subway stations at 10'walk, and is really cool also if you want to bike the city.

Ade is really nice, will let everything ready for you and give some suggestions, se can speak Spanish too and in general all was as I expected, I would def. Recommend this place.
The apartment is nice (a bit small). Great location in Williamsburg. Nice bars and restaurants near by. 3 minutes from the subway
Ade was a perfect hote. She was there for everything. Her appartement is nice, clean and the location is perfect. Thank you Ade.

Adela's apartment is perfect, just as it looks in the photos, and was immaculately clean. The bed is comfy, the heating is warm ( we stayed in mid November)  and the location is really good, close to all the bars restaurants and shops of the local area but the street is quiet so you will sleep well!  It is only a short walk to the L train subway, and there's also 2 other subway lines a little further walk away so it's easy to travel around the whole of NYC from here. We loved staying here! Adela is easy and quick to communicate with and very kind, she gave us a fantastic list of recommendations for food and other things in the local area. Thank you Adela!

Ade is an excellent hostess. It was great to meet her upon checking in, and to get her awesome list of local recommendations which we immediately put to use from the fist night. The apartment is in a great location, close to the L train which is a 10min ride into the city. Not that you need to leave Williamsburg, we had some of the best food and drinks there during our NY visit! Ade's place is clean, with an eclectic decor, it's comfortable and surprisingly quiet. Communication with Ade was easy, and everything went very smoothly over our week-long stay. Thanks again for having us, Ade :)

Clean, quiet and perfectly located. From the list of local places of interest, to the willingness of Ade to assist us with any problems during our stay, we felt very well taken care of. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in Williamsburg!
Ade's apartment is one of my favorites in Williamsburg, cozy, clean, bright and perfectly located steps away from all nice restaurants, bars and subway stop. Highly recommended!
The reservation was canceled 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely little apartment in the heart of Williamsburg.
Ade is super nice and really accommodating.
Book it!

Adela's place was awesome.  The location could not be beat - close to everything in Williamsburg including the waterfront and both the JMZ and L Trains for easy access to Manhattan.  Her unit is decent sized and quiet.  The bed was very comfortable and the furniture and decorations nice.  It was also very clean.  While I never met her, check in and communication were a breeze.  We would not hesitate to stay at her place again.

Ade's apt was really well-decorated, clean & cosy. Besides, it's so well-located in the heart of Williamsburg surrounded with a lot of restaurants and bars and close to Manhattan(1 stop - Metro L Bedford 5-minute walking). If you want to discover Brooklyn, it's the perfect place. Ade will give you the name of all the places she likes around her flat. We had the chance to meet Ade our last day and she'is as her flat : really nice and charming :) She let us leave our luggages very late as our plane was at midnight whereas she has already came back from her trip and was jetlag! Thanks a lot Ade for everything! Do not hesitate to rent her flat

We had a great time staying at Ade's apartment.  The place was very comfortable, exactly like on the photos.  It was a hot week in New York but the air con worked fine.  The bed was comfortable and the decor made you feel instantly at home.  Wifi was excellent and a decent sized TV with Netflix which we didn't use once because there were more exciting things to do.

As mentioned, the apartment block is very quiet ... amazing given how close it is to the main road of restaurants, shops and bars of Bedford Avenue.  

We walked around day and night in perfectly safe environment.  We took Ade up on some recommended places to eat and they were all great local places, well researched.

It was easy walking distance to all points of interest in Williamsburg, from the vintage market to the regular street food festival and East River Ferry, providing access to other parts of Brooklyn, downtown NYC and Governor's Island.  

The short walk to different subways meant getting into the city was very fast, particularly areas such as East Village and Park Slope.  We regularly went from the heart of the city back to the apartment within 20-30 minutes, a good escape when the crowds got too much in  Manhattan.

Ade welcomed in and helped us up with the bags on day 1.  There is no lift but compared to subways, a few flights of stairs was not a problem.  Again, on departure day she was very accommodating letting us leave the bags and helping us with getting them down again.

Ade's place was terrific.  Its location is lovely in Williamsburg and brilliant for getting in to Manhattan. The apartment is clean and comfortable. Ade is a friendly and helpful host. The top floor location really does make it quiet.  This is a great place to stay, whether you want to spend time in Williamsburg or Manhattan.
Ade's apartment was great. We're booking a lot through airbnb and her apartment was definitely a winner. Our collaborator loved to stay there and we'll definitely book it again!
The place was really great!! Best location ever and very friendly host. Thanks again

Location location location: Ade's apartment is perfectly situated in the best part of Williamsburg, making it so easy to hit the bars, the waterfront, and the metro.  With a location this great, you can walk two blocks in any direction and find fantastic food and entertainment.  Super hip Greenpoint is a lovely stroll away, and the East Village is just one stop away on the subway.  Ade's place was the ideal home base for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Ade herself was very cool, friendly, and helpful throughout the trip.

name: Au cœur de la Petite Patrie
summary: Logement de 3chambres pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 6 personnes. Cuisine rénovée et complètement équipée. Wi-fi et cable. Près du cinéma beaubien et du parc Molson, au cœur d'un quartier vivant de Montreal et près d'un métro. Il me fera plaisir de vous suggérer des endroits à découvrir dans le quartier.

host.about: Je suis entrepreneure et mère de deux enfants. J'adore voyager et découvrir le monde et toutes ses saveurs. Je suis mariée depuis 9 ans avec un cubain, nous parlons espagnol et français. Nous voyageons le plus souvent possible et nous aimons vivre auprès des gens du pays visité plutôt que dans des hôtels. Nous sommes toujours respectueux de notre environnement. Au plaisir!

reviews.txt: What you see is what you get.  The place was very clean and no problem with parking.  It's fully furnished especially the kitchen. The neighbourhood is peaceful.
