Maia was a fantastic host - leaving a bag of wonderful coffee, excellent local recommendations and responding promptly to all of our queries. The flat is great and I recommend it to all. I stayed there with a close friend and it was easy to share the space and it served us well.

Awesome gem in a great neighborhood. Really cute and tidy place - has everything you want, including a small kitchen. Perfect for a couple wanting to be close to the city but in a unique neighborhood. F train is super close. Highly recommended - would stay there again!
Great place

The location was absolutely perfect and very central. Maia and her husband were very gracious and helpful whether that be suggesting a nice restaurant to offering to let me store my luggage in their home past checkout time. Would suggest as a nice place for singles/couples who would like to be in a authentic part of town!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is an amazing place! Much bigger than it looks in the photos. Great New York neighborhood. Clean and open and bright. Maia could not have been a more gracious host. Magical little space. I highly recommend.

This apartment is a gem and Maia was a nice host. I stayed for five nights while in NY for work. It was under 30 minutes to get to my office at Union Square. The apartment was comfortable and was perfect for this trip. I would recommend this for anyone who appreciates a quiet space to retreat to at the end of the day.
This was an incredible value for being right in Lower Manhattan! Great for a young married couple looking for a weekend getaway!
Great studio apartment in china town. Clean, with everything you need and Maia was a perfect host. Would definitely recommend. Thanks for having us! Kat and James

Maia's studio is so cute and cozy.  The apartment is very well designed and even though it is small it does not feel that way!  Everything was super clean and Maia greeted me on the street to show me around right as I got out of the taxi from the airport!

It’s in a quieter part of town, great studio in NY. Maia had everything we needed. We didn’t want to be in the middle of it all but still easy to get everywhere and that was great. If you don’t mind stairs this is perfect.
The bed is comfy too and she was very communicative when we needed. Also super accommodating to our arrival, as we did have a flight delay. Highly recommend if your looking for a great value and clean place.
You get what you spend.
Great stay! Maia’s appartement is very well located and well furnished.

Everything in Maia’s apartment is very nice. It’s bigger than on the pictures and the subway is very close (F train).
Maia was very helpful and check in was easy. Would definitely recommend.

This is a great apartment to explore the city from. The neighbourhood is such that you have lots of cheap delicious food all around you and beautiful views of the bridge. The F train is close and the neighbourhood that surrounds the apartment is still an authentic part of New York City, including with all its grit and grime. The tall ceilings of the apartment make it feel very airy and spacious and it stays cool even when its warm out because it is in the back of the building. Its a great space to unwind and rest from all the hubbub outside. Not for parties or the heavy footed as neighbours can be sensitive.

This apartment was an excellent place to stay! We stayed here for 5 nights, 6 days. It was very convenient to trains and multiple neighborhoods/attractions. 
Maia was quick with her responses and went out of her way to do what she could to make us feel welcome. 

Great space for couples to utilize!
Maia was a great host! Would definitely stay here again :)

name: Room Close to LGA and 35 mins to Times Square
summary: A private small bedroom in a 2 BR 1BA apartment. There’s no living area as I converted to live in. The location is 2 minutes to Q33 bus stop, 5 minutes to 7 train station ( which directly takes you to Times Square in 35-40 minutes ).

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Host was wonderful. She and her husband were awesome host with nothing strict. they volunteered to send me off knowing i have many baggage. i would love to stay with her if given the chance again and at this price. its a steal folks in NYC. love the pet as well, furry and fun
Wonderful stay at Cheer s apartment, the room is cozy and clean. Cheer and her roommates showed great hospitality. I had great time talk with them.

It's an amazing place to stay in New York, Cheer and her husband were really welcoming and answered all my queries quickly, they even helped me with all the touristy things and all. The room is as advertised, cleaned. The dog is really amazing and if you're a dog lover then it's the best place to stay at this price. I highly recommend this place.

Cheer and her husband were incredibly nice and welcoming. Their place is very nice and clean. I loved the neighborhood, it's very diverse and safe. It's only a 5 min walk to the 7 train which connects you to everywhere. I would definitely recommended staying with Cheer!

Very lovely couple, nice and clean place, they did 150%. 
5 Stars allarround, highly reccomended.
I will return to this place ever.
Thank you very very very much

When I reached Cheer was there to attend me and the place was clean and ready for me to stay. They provided everything they claimed and also more.
Pudit was also very helpful.The puppy is really sweet. I'm not a dog person but it didn't bother me.Its really well trained for guests. Usually you won't even notice its in the house. 
I had to extend my stay but the place was already booked after me. Cheer helped me to find a nearby Airbnb proactively.Also Pudit offered his cart to carry my guitars. It was really sweet of them. They are really approachable people.
Thanks for making my stay comfortable guys!
Cheer was so nice .She suggested memany things .I want to come back to  stay at this place again.
I love the place, Cheer and her husband were very kind, the apartment was very close to the subway, definately I'm going to stay with them if I'm back to New York

Cheer was very accommodating and her puppy was adorable. The room was very clean, especially the towels and bed sheets. It was nice to have an air conditioner in the room, although I didn't need it. I was worried about the location at first but it was great and safe to roam around even at night. Lots of fruit stands around during the day! There was a train station close by so I was able to go to Manhattan easily.

Cheer is so so helpful with what to do in the neighbor! She is also such a nice person. I very much enjoyed talking to her. I didn't want to leave just because I want to talk to her more! Her husband is also a great guy, who helped out when I got some blisters in my feet.

The neighbor is very good. 37th Ave is great. You can take long walk to either direction and end up at either Corona Park or Diversity Plaza. A very cultural distinctive place.

Cheer's place is fantastic! 
Very friendly and a cozy clean room. Excellent location and would stay again and recommend to friends and family.
Thanks, Cheer!

Cheer's place was great! I like the room - simple, comfy, and clean. It's like your old room back in the city that you just want to retire after a very exhausting day. =) 

Mostly my fault that I didn't get to interact as much with Cheer and her housemates during my stay (coz US Open), but they were wonderful and easy to get along. Sorry that I wasn't able to personally say goodbye coz of my super early flight. But until next time! =)
The room was just as described. The 7 line is just 2-3 minutes away and you also have a lot of nice places you can eat shop right there in the vecinity. Felt like I had everything I needed.

Cheer and Pudit made sure that my stay in New York is one for the books...  The room is super clean and the restroom as well... They value your privacy and they don't restrict you when it comes to time in coming home... And Nathan the cute french bull dog is the bonus mascot in the house!!! I highly recommend cheer's place if you want value for your money, good location and tidiness!!!

Cheer and her husband were wonderful. The room was clean and cozy and felt like home. Another big plus is that it is only about a five minute walk to the 7 train. 
Overall, I would definitely recommend staying with Cheer. 
Thanks again for making my first Airbnb experience a great one!!

For me this place is a perfect place to stay if you want to visit new york. Cheer and her husband were really nice and they welcome me. Their dog, Mason, is really friendly and i enjoy playing with it.

The experience is the first for me and I was say it's a good one. The couple is very friendly and it's. Very clean place, and you go in and out as you please. Only drawback, no parking like anywhere else.

Cheer was a perfect host! I arrived later than we had originally planned, but she was completely understanding and was there to welcome me in. The room has everything to make you feel at home : a closet equipped with hangers, umbrella, and iron; television, books, tissues, towels; even a mini-fridge with water and some snacks. The apartment itself is impeccably clean. Lots of restaurants nearby. Safe area. Bonus: cute puppy and chinchillas.

name: Bright, Modern, Spacious Duplex Apt
summary: We recently updated this listing from a room to the full apartment! That means more privacy for our guests, and an even better experience. Please ask about the changes if you have questions! Astoria is 15 minutes from midtown via subway (N and Q lines near the 30th ave stop). Relax on the couch, enjoy the queen-sized bed, or do some work in the sunlight dinning room. There's no better place to rest up and recharge during your stay in NYC.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hey there! I'm Gabe, a software development manager from NYC. I work in life insurance and love all things digital, I'm an Airbnb host because I enjoy sharing with people!

reviews.txt:
I had the pleasure of being  Gabriel's first Airbnb customer. With that said I do not think it would matter if you were the first or the 61st, Gabriel and his Mother, Mirta made ever effort to make the stay an absolute pleasure. The space is private,quiet and very comfortable, with a separate private entrance.  The location is close to many good restaurants and the train. You have easy access to the city (train) as well as walking distance to all of Astoria. 
I would  highly recommend this site for 1 or two people. 
Jerry

There are no words to describe accurately the experience I had staying with Gabriel and his mum in Astoria for ten days so I will try to be systematic so i can maybe help other travelers.
Firstly the room was amazing. It was the basement of their home with a lot of space and a half bathroom. Really relaxing experience with all the privacy you want, a large TV with Netflix and Amazon  for those who like to watch a nice movie when coming back from a long day in New York. The photos on airbnb are not really capturing how nicely decorated and well kept is the room. Nothing compared to other rooms I have seen in Astoria. The towels provided are of very good quality and very large, the wi-fi works perfectly and there is plenty of space for your things. To me and after seeing a lot of rooms, there is no doubt that this one is the best taking into consideration the space provided, the location and the price asked!
The neighborhood was again really pretty. Very safe with lots of shops for food and interesting markets. I had the feeling and really wanted to go back to Astoria and walk around after a busy day in Manhattan. 4min walk to 30th station and 16 min ride to Lex avenue and the upper east side which in my opinion is the best area in NY 
I can't say enough about Gabe and his mum. Their hospitality was awesome! I was welcomed with a lot of snacks, fruits and a bottle of wine waiting for me when I arrived and kept coming during my stay. Gabe was answering immediately to all my texts and tried to sort out anything I needed in order to feel more at home! But besides that the most important thing is that both of them are very interesting and well educated people. You can have a lot of discussions about lots of things and learn, which at least for me is very important! I think I made some friends in NYC, which by the way is a truly amazing city.
Highly recommended, no need to look anywhere else! Thanks a lot guys.

Staying at Gabe's apartment was a domestic Experience with a capital E.

Gabe met me when I arrived and showed me the place. He had answers to my questions about the area and was good company while I settled in, great guy.

His guest floor includes a private entrance and bath, custom furniture laid out to fit the space, and enough artwork to befit a museum.

Let me count the ways I loved this place:
1) Laid out and available were snacks, coffee machine + spindle of flavor cups, water, and a toothbrush.
2) The place has style. I keep a good home but Gabe clearly has a future career as interior decorator awaiting him.
3) Plants! There's a garden of greenery spread around the apt.
4) Everything useful is labeled, from the lightswitches to the recycling bin.
5) There is a pre-sentient voice-activated music player in the living room. "Alexa play some Jazz". "Alexa louder". "Alexa next". I'll be getting one of these for myself, it's from Amazon apparently.

Hosts like Gabe make Airbnb amazing to use. I hope all my future hosts will be similarly excellent.

My boyfriend and I had a fantastic stay at Gabe's home. This is what AirBnb is all about! From the first moment, Gabe and his mother made us feel welcome and were eager to make our stay more comfortable. We were even provided with some food, fresh linen and towels! The room is better than as advertised and has all of the necessary amenities. The apartment is a short two minute walk to the nearest metro, and about a half hour train into Manhattan. I would highly recommend this room to anyone and will definitely return one day!

Very cozy, tidy and spacious suite, helpful and nice hosts. You get a huge room and restroom in the basement, separate entrance, shower and kitchen are shared, but considering it's NYC, it's a great deal. The metro is 5 min walk away, there are groceries, restaurants and gyms around. Gabriel was always there to answer all our silly questions and gave us good advice about anything we would ask. Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to explore the great city.

My girlfriend and I had an extended stay in Gabriel's Astoria location, and everything about it was absolutely perfect. Gabe is an incredible host, makes you feel like you're living in your own home (even provided a ridiculous amount of Keurig coffee for us), and gave us all the info and advice we needed to have a great time in the city. His home is beautiful and you are able to live in the entire lower floor, and it truly feels like you have your own personal space. We were both very comfortable for our whole trip and I cannot recommend staying with Gabe enough, it was a wonderful experience!

Gabe was the consummate host.  When (Hidden by Airbnb) maps misinformed us about the directions, he came to fetch us from the station.
Great location and ambiance.

Gabriel was an expert host. So friendly and on hand with any queries or questions. While talking one night he noticed the smallest piece of dirt on the floor(which I didnt notice) and immediately cleaned it up. He also has great knowledge about the local area which you should tap into.

Gabriels place is amazing and alot more space which the photos do not do justice. From the bed and couch being extremely comfortable to the shower and everything being immaculate it was just an absolute pleasure staying with Gabriel. By far the best airbnb experience I have had. Well done Gabriel you were a great host.

I had a fairly lengthy stay with Gabe at the apt when I was looking for my own place after moving to NYC.  Really a very comfortable place, almost like your own studio in that you have a relatively large basement room with toilet to yourself, your own entrance, etc.  They keep the place spotless an clean regularly, change sheets and towels, etc.  5 min walk to the N/Q train and lots of food, shopping etc very nearby.  Probably one of the best Airbnb options in Astoria and definitely way better (in terms of value for money) than any hotel, especially if you are staying for more than a few days.  

Bottom line - was very happy there and would stay again or reccommend to friends.

Gabriel and his mum were amazing and made us feel so comfortable right from the start of our holiday! The room we had was lovely, private, and spacious. Definitely will be staying here again! Thankyou Gabe and Mirta!
All good, clean and tidy and as promised.  Really close to subway so great location.

Gabriel's mother welcomed us at the arranged time. The apartment was modern and clean. Our downstairs space was large and private. It was especially nice to have our own half bath and separate entrance to the suite. Full kitchen and bath upstairs were always available. Neighborhood was safe and quiet. Very convenient location with subway and bus stops only 2 blocks away which makes for easy access to Laguardia airport or midtown Manhattan. Small shops near by to stock up on groceries, bake goods, wine, etc. Jimbo's is an excellent Greek bar and grill one block away that has entertainment 6 nights a week. Paid short and long term parking available 2 blocks away. Excellent NYC stay!

We had a wonderful stay. Having the whole apartment was lovely and there was all the privacy we needed. The apartment was impeccably clean and in a great area! Adorable and even better in person. I would definitely recommend this apartment to all and would totally stay here again when in Astoria!
Exactly as described, replies almost instantly and the place is only 2 minutes from the subway station. Very quiet and comfortable.
Place was clean, very well decorated and easy to get to.  I had a very nice stay.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I've stayed in probably 5-10 airbnbs in NYC, this was the best one in terms of single apartment. Really wonderful stay and honestly you are so close to the subway that its also a very well connected area (when MTA is running properly of course =P). Regarless of that, Gabriel is a super host, makes everything easy going. The flat is beautiful and comfy. I'd stay here again for sure.
Great location near subway and lots of great restaurants.  Sparkling clean!

name: VERY LARGE 5 Bedroom Home, free onsite parking
summary: This property has 5 bedrooms catering for 10 people in comfort.  You can travel from the ferry wharf to the city or Darling Harbour in two stops.   Onsite parking can be purchased at an additional cost.

host.about: Hi,  we look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful home. Book today !

reviews.txt: Very happy with the house, beautifully decorated and very spacious. Only issue was there was no wifi.
Great location. Really close to city. Tidy and clean and absolutely artistic. Vanessa replied all questions on time and really helpful.
Vanessa very helpful, a great spot!

A botiuge place to stay, a little sparse in furnishings and would be a little cold in winter, lots of concrete. 
In general a nice place to stay and very convenient to restaurants and the city of Sydney. A short walk to the bottom of the hill and you are at the waterfront looking at the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and Luna Park.

Vanessa was extremely prompt in returning all emails.  The location was brilliant and close to many great places to eat, catch a ferry and public transport.  The kitchen was great with all you needed to make a great meal and serve.  I would definitely stay here again.

We loved the house! We came as 6 colleagues on a conference and had a great time. There was so much space and lots of places to sit, chill or catch up on work. The house was the most unique , modern and trendy place I have ever been to - like a 5* hotel. I might be wary if I had kids though as there its a lot of artwork that I would hate to damage.

The house was quirky with lots of lovely artwork, as well as being very large easily accommodating 6 adults. The house was fully equipped with anything you can imagine - and if there is anything you need, it is central to both North Sydney train station and Mcmahons Point ferry terminal.  Lots of local restaurants, pubs, shops (IGA, Aldi and Coles as well as the fantastic Mcmahons Grocers).  Vanessa was very quick with responses and accommodating us after some previous accommodation with another host ended up being double booked.  Her information and instructions were well written and documented.  The house was very quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and didn't want to leave.

True to the pictures. The space was huge and more than enough for our family of seven. We loved that we could dine together when we liked in the roomy dining area. It was also a short walk down to a lovely Thai restaurant (Chet Thai), a little playground for kids, a small grocery store, and if you have time, walk down to the ferry point and you will be struck awe by the view of the harbour.
It is a nice place, our family enjoy the stay very much. The host is very helpful when we have some questions.
Great apartment and Vanessa was so nice. We loved staying here and we give it the best score that is possible.

Over all a good place to stay. Two rooms with their own shower /toilett was perfect, the third one needs some finishing... 
Wifi exist but slow.
Big house near Sydney center around 10 mins driving. Tidy, clean and wide space could accommodate almost 10 people. Most of restaurant, bar and groceries nearby.

We were a party of 8 and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Vanessa's place. 

There is more than ample room and you never feel you're in front of someone else's face. 

The location of the house is in a beautiful neighbourhood - under 10 mins walk to the North Sydney train station and another 10 mins walk to this fabulous look out point down Blues Point Road.

Recommended.

This place is perfect for few families and those with children! Plenty of space and not to mention many interest art pieces. Very Walkable to Luna Park, harbour bridge plus North Sydney train station and Greenwood plaza for all your grocery needs. Highly recommend for short or even long stay. :) do bring a clothes rack along if you have plenty of washing to do. Thank you Venessa!!!
Great location near parks, shops, ferries, buses and trains.  Extremely spacious and well appointed place with beautiful artwork. Quiet and peaceful for large family groups travelling together.

Great place to stay... everything was perfect. We had 5 people go over for a conference and it had plenty of space for everyone to have their own room and sitting areas. Vanessa was great to deal with too. Thanks for having us!

The house is absolutely beautiful and stylish! The location is great and close to public transport, cafe and restaurant. Every detail in the house is carefully designed. It represents a very good taste of the host. It is not only a house but a great piece of art. It is definitely enjoyable and lovely staying there. The host is warm-hearted and has very fast response. I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Sydney.
Recommended for family stay and great location for sydney visit

The place is very large, with very big common areas that could accommodate everyone twice over. The location is great with transport connections from the airport bring very simple with short walk and train ride. The surrounding cafes and parks. Given the look in photos I was concerned that my 1 and 3 year old might reek havoc this was not the case. The little outdoor areas and the nearby playground were great for them. Supermarket  cafes, pubs are 5mins walk away. Vanessa was helpful and quick to respond.

name: Sunny Bedroom in Downtown Montreal
summary: Sunny bedroom in the Downtown of Montreal, 2min of walk away from the Atwater metro station and close to the main attractions of the city.

name: Ribeira Charming Duplex
summary: Fantastic duplex apartment with three bedrooms, located in the historic area of Porto, Ribeira (Cube) - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Centenary building fully rehabilitated, without losing their original character.

host.about: Gostamos de passear, de viajar, de conhecer pessoas e locais novos, gostamos de desporto e animais! Vivemos na cidade mais linda do mundo!!!

reviews.txt: Ana and Goncalo were very helpful and accommodating. When they were not available they put us in touch with their nephew who was equally as helpful. The flat was as described, neat and tidy. The weather was quite cold, but thankfully A&G left us with extra blankets and electric heaters to use. Location was great. Outside the flat there was a slight smell of the river/ sewage, but in all honesty it did not come into the flat, and once you go down the road it doesn't carry on. This may also have been down to the very wet weather we had while there. All in all, very happy and would definitely recommend.

The hosts were very accommodating and agreed to meet with my parents as they were arriving before us. Communicated very well and always responded in a very timely manner. You couldn't have asked for a better location of this apartment and the place was identical to the pictures in the in the listing.

We had a great time in Porto. Ana’s & Goncalo’s apartment is located right in the heart of the Old Town and is great value for money. You really are at the centre of things and it’s the perfect place to get swept away in the hustle and bustle of Porto. Ana and Goncalo were great hosts.

The appartment was great, it is really nice and cosy, and it is situated at a perfect location. Ana and Goncalo were very friendly, they were very helpfull during our stay. We had a great time during our stay in Porto!
Great location, comfortable place, responsive and friendly host! Highly recommended!

This house is in the heart of Porto, set back enough to be away from the hustle and bustle but only a few steps up from the river, bars and restaurants. A great place to stay.
The house was clean and functional. Ana and Goncalo are perfect hosts with lots of information on places to visit and   eat.

We spend a really good time in Porto, the flat is so well situated. The bridge is just next door, the view on the river is amazing, and plenty of restaurants and pubs, transport are just around.
Gonzalo is very kind to wait for us, also lat, for the check in, thank you.

Thanks for a great stay! 6 of us were in Porto for a long weekend and we had a blast. The apartment was perfect; location and size to accomodate us. The hosts were great, then even picked us up at the airport (for a fee but it was a great service). Thanks again! Bridget.
Superb location and very nice, big and overall pleasant apartment!
The apartment provides basic facilities but is good value for money and very well positioned for easy access to restaurants and bars, the Ribeira district and the Port house in Gaia.

name: King Size Private Bedroom in Surry Hills
summary: Welcome to Surry Hills! Private room with a King size bed close to the CBD, Oxford Street, Central Station and Hyde Park. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the location and the homeliness. There is a fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso machine and breakfast essentials. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

host.about:
Hi, I'm Hayley. I moved from the UK to Australia in November 2015 with my boyfriend and we love living in Surry Hills.
I'm very active; I enjoy the gym, running in Centennial Park and exploring all of the great walks around NSW and beyond. I volunteer for a women's charity and I'm also a Girl Guides leader.
I love to cook but with the variety of amazing restaurants on our doorstep it's hard to not eat out all the time!
As both a guest and host I'm polite, considerate and tidy. I like for our guests to feel at home when they stay with us - so if there's anything you need, just ask.

reviews.txt: We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.

The room was just as described, and was in a perfect location in the heart of Surry Hills.  Getting to the CBD, or walking around the neighborhood were so easy from the apartment.

Hayley and Jack made my stay really pleasant, with lots of amenities and insights into the neighborhood and Sydney in general.  They even went out of my way helping me get to my next location.  Couldn't recommend them enough.
Comfortable place to stay, good kitchen facilities, easy access to transport and nearby supermarket, places to eat etc.
My boyfriend was in Sydney for a job interview. Hayley was a great host. The location was perfect as well.
Clean and comfortable lodgings, the hosts made me feel welcome. It's a relaxed household and I'm a returning guest. My preferred place to stay in Surry Hills.

This is a cute little cottage in the heart of Surry Hills close to Oxford Street and Central Station 
Hosts were friendly and made me feel very welcome with brekky provided in the mornings 
All necessary info was given to me before hand and  any questions I had were promptly answered
Arrangements were made to provide a key for my arrival when they could not make themselves available
Jack and Hayley were great hosts. I felt welcome, the room was comfortable. No problems at all.
Hayley and Jack made me feel very welcome. Everything about the listing was accurate and it was a great location and neighbourhood.
Jack and Hayley are awesome. Down to earth. Welcoming. Made us feel at home. Would def stay there again.
Hayley & Jack we're very easy & friendly hosts who I would stay with again.

The location was great, comfortable bed, close to nice cafes and restaurants, easy walk into the city and to central station.  The only issue was the parking, however we parked in a secure car park which was only a 10min walk from the accommodation.  Would definitely stay again.  Thank you Hayley.
Very nice host and room, comfort bed, clean bathroom. House is near byaround museum station of airport link, and there are a lot of good restaurants around.:)
They were awesome and very accomodating.  Highly recommended

Jack and Hayley have a wonderfully located, comfortable apartment right in the middle of the city. I was able to walk almost anywhere and when that wasn't an option Jack was available to give me some tips on how to reach where I wanted to go (Bus and Train Stations are close by). The place itself is very clean and would definitely stay there and/or recommend it to other people staying in Sydney.
Great location and super easy to organise, check in etc.
Very helpful and warm-hearted hosts. Very good journey in Sydney with the perfect accommodation they have provided.
Hayley & Jack were very welcoming and friendly. The location was great, comfortable room and clean bathroom. Would highly recommend and stay again if we were in Sydney.
Jack and Hayley were very accommodating, friendly and easy going. Loved the location and the room was just lovely!

name: FloresRooms 3T
summary: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Tem disponível Internet por wireless e TV por cabo, como maquina de café , frigorífico e micro-ondas.

reviews.txt: This is a small and very comfortable apartment. The location is excellent. It is just one minute walk to metro and train station. And it is located in a central area. Andrea is very nice and helpful. She responses every email I sent very quickly and provides all the information I need. I would choose to stay at this apartment again next time if I travelled there.
La casa es tal como se describe en el anuncio, estupenda y muy bien ubicada. La anfitriona encantadora.Recomiendo este alojamiento sin duda, para repetir!

Andreias Studio is on a very central and easy to reach spot! We really enjoyed having breakfast in your restaurant ;-) thanks a lot!
Also cool to have a balcony, a perfect hideout for two ;-)

We stayed at this apartment for 3 nights , it is modern with all necessary amenities, nice and clean. The main advantage is that it's in centre of historical porto most of the places you can visit in short time. Also many restaurants nearby.

name: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay) Sunny Aprt'
summary: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment.

host.about:
I'm a Kiwi now living in NZ
I have spent time living, working and travelling in Hong Kong - experiences that have built my love of travel.
I work as a counsellor in a school and in an agency.
I enjoy walking, biking, going to the theatre or movies, enjoying a good coffee and spending time with my family (whom I actually like) and my friends (whom I also like!).

loc.address: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay), Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Very comfortable apartment, perfect for what we needed.  Lots of good local amenities, good location, easy for buses, taxis and 5 mins to Tin Hau MTR (Metro).  Causway Bay is only 10 mins walk for lots and lots of shopping. We had both rooms, everything was as you need it, a home from home.  Su gave us lots of information and was always available during the booking process.  Thank you Su!
2nd time booking. Everything is perfect!
Clean ! Good!

Su's appartement was a very nice choice for us.
The neighbourhood is plenty of small shops and food stalls or fancy restaurants and bars... you will find whatever you want.
Not to far from an important bus hub and metro station, but incredibly quiet.
We three slept like babies.
The house was super super clean and tidy.

Happy to have discovered such a nice place in HK.

We will definitly come back
Lovely flat in a hip neighbourhood. Recommended
Lovely place in a fantastic location . Host very friendly

Su’s apartment is in a great local neighbourhood close to lots of shops, restaurants and the MTR. The apartment itself is bright and clean with enough space for a comfortable stay. Su is very well organised and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended.

The place is well equipped and very compact and in a good location. Metro is close by and the bus to and from the airport stop a few minutes walk from the house.
Su is an amazing host, extremely helpful and very responsive to all sorts of questions. 
I can highly recommend her to anyone who wishes to spend some days in Hong Kong.

name: Renovated 2 Bedroom/2 Bathroom Apartment P0305
summary: All of our apartments include free wireless internet, air conditioning/heating, satellite TV, a phone with free US/Canada calls, one outdoor parking space, and weekly cleaning services. Extra rollaway bed available!

host.about: Je vous propose une location de vacances au Sunset Suites, le choix parfait pour le temps libre des voyageurs qui veulent le confort d’un atmosphère a la maison loin de chez eux avec les services d’un hôtel. Mes appartements totalement équipés sont situés, dans la Ville de Mont-Royal, un secteur dans le centre de Montréal. Proche du centre commercial Rockland et a quelques minutes en voiture de l’aéroport et du centre-ville de Montréal. Sunset Suites satisfait principalement les voyageurs de longue durée (7 jours ou plus), mais je fais de mon mieux pour héberger les voyageurs recherchant un séjour de 3 jours minimum.

reviews.txt:
I would strongly recommend Maya's suite to any one whether you are by yourself, with friends, or family. It is very clean , supplies in abundance, WIFI is strong. The only thing I would suggest to Maya is to try to get in touch with client upon request. I did try even emailed her but vainly.


I had a great time. I felt like home.
Maya was very welcoming from the beginning of our stay to check out. She was very willing to help us and even called us an uber for our travels. She was very kind and made our stay very pleasurable.

name: In Sisli. Walking distance to Taksim,Nişantaşı.
summary: At the center of Istanbul,Sisli.  You can arrive “Osmanbey” Subway Station in 3 minutes by walking:)  5 minutes to Taksim by subway, 15 mins to Taksim by walking.  Walking distance to Mecidiyeköy & Nişantaşı.  Only for females.

host.about:
My name is Gokce. I am a clinical psychologist and a pHD student :)
I of course love traveling !! :)

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Brick House: Unique Garden Apartment! King Bed!
summary: *Please keep in mind  before you decide to book that this is my home, not a hotel, so basic courtesy is appreciated and expected *Please be informed that I am connected with local law enforcement so read house rules *Contact Before Booking Brick House is a renovated open floor garden apartment nestled in the heart of the Bedford Stuyvesant enclave of Brooklyn, NY. Brick House is located 2-12 minute walk from 5 train stations (mass transit) A, C, J, and L train

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I have a love of travel and people and am excited when I get to meet good people and explore the world.  I have lived on 3 different continents and am eager to spend time on the other 4.  Thankfully, Bnb allows me to continue to travel the world through the people I have the pleasure of hosting.

reviews.txt: Exactly as pictured. If you're gonna be in Brooklyn with a loved one, this is the place.

Aswad our host was very professional and friendly, he met with us when we arrived at check-in and gave us a tour of not only the apartment we booked, but of all the other apartments at the building. 

The apartment is EXACTLY as pictured, its such a wonderful space. I would recommend any of Aswad's apartments as places to stay while visiting New York.

Thanks again Aswad.

Literally a home away from home!  Very spacious and accommodating. Definitely comfortable. The neighborhood was fairly quiet and nice. In a great location that is close to the nearest shops and restaurants. The host was awesome!  He was very polite and very knowledgeable of the area.  I will be back!

The place was not as it appeared in the picture and my guests had to move out the next morning into a hotel. The location was not good either and it wasn't clean. There was no drinking water in the apartment. I have always stayed in air b and b's and never had a problem. This was a first time issue which was quite shocking for me.

Fabulous! If I could give this place 6 stars, I would. Super clean, very close to trains. Aswad is an excellent host. I'm a repeat guest here and am never disappointed. This is my go-to spot whenever I'm in NYC. If you're looking for a clean, comfortable place that's conveniently located with a super friendly host - this is the place!

I can't say enough good things about this place. Aswad's home was beautiful, clean, spacious and comfortable. He was such an accommodating host, allowed me to check in and out based on my flight times. The neighborhood is a wonderful breath of fresh air. It's perfect for those who are trying to get a taste of real life as a New Yorker. I will definitely be returning!

Aswad is friendly and professional guy good with communication. and helped us check out late , flat was clean and like the pictures ... it had good local spots to check out connections to trains very near a real Brooklyn experience
Aswad's place is awesome! It has character, is clean and in a very nice neighborhood. Would def come back!
Clean, great location, cozy.
Great location in Brooklyn. Nice and very clean apartment. Close to public transport to get anywhere you need to go! Bed was very comfortable!

I loved my staying in aswad’s House
It was clean and very big space and the public transport was very close to the house .

Aswad seems to be a very nice guy. The apartment is as pictured.  Check in and checkout were very easy. However, his bed was the only warm and cozy place in the apartment. If you're staying In the winter go to the store and get you at least 2 additional space heaters because the basement/garden apartment is definitely not warm and cozy. If you are afraid of waterbugs  or cockroaches than don't even bother booking.
Great space in general and Aswad is a gracious host. One piece of advice is to make sure you don’t need much privacy because everything (including the shower) is in one large room.
Goede uitvalsbasis voor de ontdekking van greater New York !
Aswad is a very nice and welcoming person !

Our stay at Aswad’a was amazing!! Great location in Brooklyn, close to transit, stores & not far from the city at all. Check in & out was a breeze! The place looks just as pictured! Very clean & cozy! We really enjoyed our stay! Wouldn’t change a thing!
Great place! Thanks for accepting us with a very short notice.

name: YÜZME HAVUZLU VE DENİZ MANZARALI
summary: Adalar ve Marmara Denizi manzaralı, stüdyo,1+1 ve 2+1 tarzındaki 60 misafir odası ve 200 yatak kapasitesi ile odalarında hızlı internet erişimi, HDTV ve Vazo Özel Uyku Deneyimli yatakları ile lüks ve şık bir İstanbul deneyimi yaşatmayı vaat ediyor.  Vazo Suite Anadolu yakasında iş merkezlerinin yanı başında olan Maltepe bölgesinde otoyol bağlantısı, boğaz köprüsü, Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı, Maltepe Sahil, E-5 ve Metro İstasyonuna yakınlığı ile sizlere bölge ulaşımlarında kolaylık sağlamaktadır.

host.about:
Ne türde bir seyahat planlıyorsunuz? İş seyahati, turistik gezi, şehir gezisi…. 

Evinizden uzakta geçireceğiniz seyahatlerinizde sizin için en iyi seçim Vazo Suite olacaktır. Vazo Suite konum olarak İstanbul adalar, alışveriş merkezleri gibi birçok yaşam alanlarına komşudur.

Hayalinizdeki ev konforunu yaşayabileceğiniz Vazo Suite, özgün mimarisi, deniz ve adalar manzaralı odaları, açık ve kapalı yüzme havuzu, sauna, jakuzi ve fitness salonları ile isteklerinize cevap vermek için sizleri bekliyor.

name: MODERN DESIGNED STUDIO APARTMENT IN TAKSIM PLACE
summary: A glowing trip to Beyoglu and exotic history of Pera  Luce Di Pera is a boutique hotel enviably located in the heart of Istanbul -  Taksim, Beyoglu of the historical Pera region;  right in the center Beyoglu’s most popular attractions. The boutique hotel has 9 large, design and elegant rooms provide a refreshing night’s rest in the city that never sleeps. Our staff takes great pride in consistently offering an exceptional experience to our guests.

reviews.txt:
Very much enjoyed staying here. Very friendly & helpfull staff, really good location, nicely furnished, clean.
Enjoyed The Complimentary tea coffee in the foyer. Great 24hour reception.
I’m so glad to spent my vacations on this place!

What a wonderful place! What wonderful people....
Brilliant safe location - just off the busy Balik market and Istiklal Caddesi so it was quiet at night but just a step away from the hectic excitement of the street-life, and only a 5 minute walk from the Taksim or Sishane  metro stops, making to very accessible for exploring the rest of Istanbul.
Our room (22) was great - perfectly clean and tidy with some beautiful touches and the most amazing, powerful and hot, if uniquely shaped, shower.
The friendliness and recommendations from our hosts were spot-on and added to the incredible experience that is Istanbul. Definitely recommended. Thank you Pelin for your hospitality.

Location is fantastic and room bedding is romantic fabricated, colors and design. 
Room size is decent compared to other hotels of the same category. 
Will come back again :-)

Everything was great, we had a good time 
The staff were really helpful 
I would stay there again
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It’s on a very good location easy to reach everywhere. The hotel was so nice it was perfect for my honeymoon! The staff was very kind and friendly on a professional level. The hotel was very clean also. I will return here again thank you very much.
See you guys again !!

Nice hotel located on Balil Sokak, a street that is very lively at night filled with clubs and bars, the hotel is located on a side road so it's just a few minutes walk away from some attractions and 10 mins from the tram, far enough away from the party scene to easily get a good nights rest.

Me and my family booked two rooms here because of the great interior. Thanks to our host Pelin that she complied with my wish and gave us rooms on the same floor. 
The hotel by itself was clean, comfortable and so close to istiklal caddesi (less than 5 minutes walk). Pelin and her staff were very helpful and friendly. 
I can highly recommend this place since its price and location are really attractive.
Amazing location and cute place overall.

Location was the best thing about the place. We stayed in a different hotel on the first night which wasn’t as nice as the Luce di Pera and was only informed the day before. Other the host is friendly and helpful. The room was modern and clean and set away from the noise of the Taksim night life

We had a lovely stay in our room at Pelin's. The cute decoration of the place and the good location were very nice. 
There were not table and chairs on the balcony as on the photos but otherwise the photos are completely the same as in reality.
The service and location are valuable! I totally recommend this place.
Luce di Pera has fantastic rooms, very well decorated and clean. All the staff has been kind and friendly

Great location, really close to public transit and an amazing pedestrian area. The alley it is located on is full with great restaurants and shops. Extremely easy to find your way to Galata Kulesi or the metro/tram/funicular and then Sultanahmet or any other neighborhood one would like to visit. The room was clean, bed was comfy and the heated floors in the bathroom were a very nice touch! 10/10 would come again.
Great location and the hotel was nice at some point i huess but maintenance is very poor. Needs urgent work

name: Ideal para famílias!Muita segurança
summary: Meu Apto fica em um condomínio que fica dentro de outro condomínio. Fica a 150 metros de uma delegacia, 350 metros de um chopping, e 5 minutos de caminhada da práia. Muita segurança e comodidade para quem deseja curtir o Rio de Janeiro sem Trânsito!

host.about: Fácil trato e sem frescuras.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Augusto e um anfitriao de primera classe.
Gracias Augusto por el servicio.  Muy atento.
Lugar sensacional

name: Adorable Garden Gingerbread House
summary: Romantic hideaway! This property has the lush beauty and privacy of Hana, without the drive! Only 15-20 minutes to the airport, 10 minutes to beaches, 2 minutes to restaurants and shops...on a private gated property with organic nursery. BEAUTIFUL!

host.about:
We are friendly, fun, hardworking people happy to share our beautiful piece of paradise with you. We are writers, photographers, gardeners/farmers, divers, entrepreneurs, animal lovers, artistic, creative people dedicated to living peaceful, drama-free lives. We have been together for over 20 years, and on Maui longer than that. 
This property is the cure for "Nature-Deficit-Disorder"....let us give you a tour of the farm and garden, teach you about coffee production and tropical plants....then make a smoothie (or other delicious tropical beverage!) from fresh banana, mango or likikoi!

reviews.txt:
We had a great time at your brand newly upgraded cozy, little gingerbread home! Eve and Steve (Jeff Bridges twin brother LOL!!!) are amazing hosts. This is a beautiful location, very lush, wooded garden with a nice river in the back of the cabin. Eve has an awesome sacred garden located on the property. It is very unique, peaceful, serene, excellent for relaxing and meditation. The gingerbread is close to a cool little beach town called Paia and the Baldwin Beach Park. Thank you for letting us enjoy your beautiful property. We definitely recommend the Gingerbread House for couples!
P.S. Don't bring an alarm clock, the roosters will be happy to wake you up in the morning!

This was a great place to stay and a great experience.  There are interesting grounds and the amazing plant nursery to explore, and there is also Eve's Forbidden Fruit Stand.  The Gingerbread House is truely unique.  It is very interesting and has been recently remodeled.  A beautiful place inside and out.  The grounds offer a variety of fruit trees and it is set in tropical rain forest.  It was a most pleasurable base for our adventures on Maui.

Eve's enchanted jungle cottage was amazing! It was just what we needed! The seasonal creek behind the house was flowing, the tangerines were juicy and ripe, and the succulent garden was spectacular! Eve has really created a special place with her creativity and green thumb! The labyrinths arranged on the property were fantastic for clearing the mind so we even bought a book Eve wrote about labyrinths. Thanks for the beautiful accommodations! Bodhi the dog is super chilled out and cool to have around too. Very private but not overly isolated. Perfect place!
We love this place and this house. It's a small paradise. Eve is a great host and woman.

Eve's place is sweet, cozy and a complemented our Maui experience. Nestled next to a stream with trees laden with oranges, lemons and bananas, the Gingerbread House delivered all the comforts and ease of home, while providing great views of the tropical trees towering above us. Morning chickens would cluck near our door and the friendliest dog in the world, Bodhi, always gave us a nuzzle. The house is on property shared with Eve's plant nursery -a beautiful setting that completes the picture.

We loved this cozy little cottage!  It was close to the airport, and only a few miles away from Paia, a happening little town.  The Sacred Garden was pretty amazing. The grounds were quiet, and we loved the rain at night falling on our rooftop.  It was a very peaceful and relaxing place.  Thanks Eve for letting us stay.  Hoping to come back and visit again one day. Mahalo!

Eve and Steve were really outgoing and helpful -- and the cottage was fantastic. The place is situated in a beautiful landscape with lots to explore. Inside it's cozy, clean and the sort of place you want to tuck away inside for a few days to relax. There's a great little kitchen and big bathroom so there's no "roughing it" about this place. Highly recommend this spot as Eve and Steve have clearly thought through all of the details to make it a great place to stay in Maui.
This beautiful, clean, comfy cabin is located in a gorgeous haven called the Sacred Garden.  It was everything we hoped it would be!!

Eve's Gingerbread House really is adorable and the grounds around it is so beautiful. There's even a stream running close by which you can hear from inside the house. The place looks even better than the photos. Wifi and cellular reception can be spotty, but what a great location to explore this part of Maui! Makawao and Paia is a five to fifteen minute drive away with restaurants and hiking trails close by. I highly recommend staying here. The place is charming, comfy, and cozy!

This was a wonderful experience! It was also our first time using Airbnb and visiting a Hawaiian Island and we would definitely do it all over again. Early in our planning we intentionally made the decision to avoid the big resorts and seek out something that felt a little more like the "real" Hawaii. Eve's rustic cabin provided just that. The cabin was clean and comfy, with a great amount of lighting and windows. One of my favorite parts of the cabin was the large window high above the kitchen that looks into the jungle across the stream. It almost looks like a framed painting every morning when you wakeup.  The chirping birds in the jungle made it that much better. The property is close to Makawao and Pa'ia, both of which have great dinning and shopping and a great small town feel. We still visited the big resort towns for the beaches which weren't too far away. A baby beach protected by a reef is also just 10 min away! We found the cabin to be a great central location to see just about everything on the island. 

Tip: We bought the book "Maui Revealed" before we made this trip and used it religiously the entire time we were there. Kula Bistro is a must, Makawao fresh morning doughnuts in the white building with green trim and usually a line (it's quick I promise!) 808 Cafe has great food and is across the street from our favorite beaches. Drive to Hana takes all day if you go all the way around, but is so very worth it. Get out and see everything! Bring food!
The Gingerbread Cottage is a perfect central location to everything on the island, but far enough from the hustle of the towns. Be sure to do the labyrinth walks on the property, it's a great way to prepare your mind to enjoy your vacation, also go sit by the river and read a bit, it's very relaxing. We will be back next year!!!

Steve met me when I arrived. He was friendly and suggested places to eat during my stay. The gingerbread house was clean and comfortable. It had everything you might need. A kitchen area with fridge and microwave. A nice bathroom with a large shower. I enjoyed my time there.

The Gingerbread House was a great place for a stay at Maui. Perfect gateaway for our Honeymoon! Very privat and direct in jungle. 
Staying at the Gingerbread House was a great experience! 
Mahalo

Loved the Garden Gingerbread house.  It was peaceful, great location and had everything I needed.

Thanks Eve.

Me and my girlfriend had a wonderful time staying at the  Gingerbread house!  We wanted to be excluded from  other tourists  and the big hotels and this was exactly what we were looking for.  The stream flowing in the back of the house is great,!  The inside and outside is beautiful!  It's at a high elevation so driving  to or from other cities is awesome seeing  the views!  I would definitely recommend staying here!!!

Staying at the Garden Gingerbread House was the best decision of our trip. This beautiful oasis in the center of the gulch is where to find tranquility and peace. Eve was a phenomenal host who met us upon arrival to explain the ins and outs of this spectacular property. The smell of  cedar permeated throughout and it had every amenity we could ever need. As we walked the grounds, we were able to benefit from the sounds of water running through the creek, birds chirping, Bodhi on his latest adventure and explore The Sacred Garden next door. The labyrinth is a must! Mahalo to Eve for all of her recommendations. We found healing in a very special place and will never forget this glorious experience. Hope to be back again!

We had a wonderful stay at the gingerbread house. Eve and Steve were wonderful and attentive hosts. They had great tips on what to do and where to go, and we spent the week eating lilikois from their garden. The cottage is just enough for two, comfortable with a killing shower. The cooler was a very nice touch and we carried it everyday with us. It is the ideal location if you want to explore Upcountry Maui and still be very private. That is if you can do with the upside of a forest getaway: bugs. Unfortunately for us I had a bad reaction to mosquito bites, but that's on us.
Eve was very hospitable and the property was so much more amazing than advertised! Felt so tranquil and magical there, exactly what we needed to get away. Thank you Eve!

Eve is very helpful and sweet.
The house is wonderful, a dream. Unfortunately I was afraid for spider and insects. The house is very clean and complete with everything but it's in wood and in the middle of a fantastic Garden.
Eve understand immediately and give us other accomodation, as beautiful as that.
We lived four relaxing days in her home so wonderful that was very difficult leave that place..
Thank you Eve, we lived a dream.
The house was absolutely adorable & homey & very tastefully decorated. It was exactly as the listing described it as.

name: Greystone Apartment 2
summary: Hi my name is Julie and ı am originally from the UK. I understand when traveling the importance of comfort and cleanliness. We wish for you to Feel at home in one of our stylishly decorated Greystone Apartments. Tastefully renovated, with winding marble staircase, set amidst the hustle and bustle of Bohemian Beyoglu. Relax on your own private terrace. Bed linen and towels provided. Fully equipped kitchen, WiFi, TV, air-con in bedrooms.  5 min walk from Taxim square and metro stops.

host.about:
We are an Anglo Turkish family run business, renting out refurbished apartments tastefully decorated to a high standard. 

Our 19th century apartments are situated among 18th century Armenian architecture, where churches and mosques mingle. You can feel the energy and pulse of this unique area. As a person who enjoys photography this is the area for you to explore and wander. Staying at our apartments you have a range of amenities right on your doorstep. Taksim underground metro station is within easy walking distance, putting the whole of Istanbul at your disposal.

We would like to offer our guests a comfortable and cultural stay with either long or short term agreements in the historical Tarlabashi district in the heart of Istanbul.

reviews.txt: Great flat, Nice host, good location!

The flat is finished to a good standard and is the perfect size for a couple having a long weekend. The location is excellent where you can walk to bars, restaurants, and all the main tourist sites. You can also easily get taxis from the main road.

Julie was a wonderful host, giving us local advice about Istanbul and what to do to get around. When I fell ill and had to go to hospital she went above and beyond, accompanying me to hospital so she could speak to the Turkish doctors. We want to come back to Istanbul soon so that we can stay with Julie again!
l'ost e' stato molto gentile e (Website hidden by Airbnb) ha fornito molte indicazioni su tutto, il posto corrispondeva esattamente alle nostre aspettative

Julie personally welcomed us at the apartment and informed us about all the important things including places to visit and all the necessary stores around the apartment. She was very friendly and always available for help during our stay.The apartment is located in the middle of Beyoglu (10 Minutes away from Taksim Square), a district where you can hardly find any tourists. (which is great if you want to feel like a real person from Istanbul). The apartment is exactly like shown in the pictures. It is very clean and you have everything you need. All together it was a very nice stay and i can just highly recommend this apartment ! We will definitly book this apartment again if we come back to Istanbul!

Our trip to Istanbul was brilliant, made even better by the beautiful and well-maintained apartment as our base. It is perfectly situated to the bustling nightlife and great places to eat, and to get the team over to the historic district. Julie had left lots of useful information in a pack, which we used - including booking a great local luxury Hamam - and she also arranged taxis for us to and from the airport, which really helped. Great service, lovely apartment. Perfect :)

It was a wonderful time we had at Greystone! Great place! The interior is amazing and we enjoyed the nice terrace...
The recommendations of Faruk were great and we enjoyed the best turkish food we ever had with a Raki ;-)

Unfortunatelly we haven't had the chance to meet Julie. But she always helped out if we had any questions!

The only think was that we didn't expect to pay extra for a third person when we arrived... But we managed in the end.

I would definately recommend that place!

Julie's apartments are a great place to stay in Istanbul. We loved the comfortable rooms and especially the big balcony (Apartment 2)...although we didn't really use it as the weither was a bit rainy. Julie was a great help explaining our confused taxi driver where the Greystones Apartments are located and arranging a ride back to the airport on very short notice. I can highly recommend this lovely place in the heart of Istanbul!

The neighborhood was very authentic, felt like we lived there. Great proximity to main artery of the city, shopping street. Apt was clean, modern, beautiful, spacious, shining, awesome shower. Beautiful little touches. Julie was welcoming, kind, gave us a homemade guidebook. I would recommend! :)
We loved the apartment and Julie was incredibly helpful!

What a wonderful place in Istanbul. We spent many an evening on the expansive terrace off our bedroom, enjoyed coming home to fresh towels and a made bed, were pleased to find everything we needed was already available, and loved how easy it was to walk to many of Istanbul's highlights from our front door. The Greystone team was a sheer delight - helpful, friendly, generous, and fun. I highly recommend staying with them and I personally can't wait to return. Thank you, Miss Julie and Faruk!

I really could not fault the Greystone apartment. I stayed in apartment 2 which was on the first floor. You get a lot for you money, big apartment with tall ceilings, very tastefully (and newly) decorated and with a huge terrace which was nice but I hardly used it as I was out so much. 

The host was very friendly and communicative. In terms of location it's within a stone's throw from the main shopping and nightlife of Taksim but enough out the way that it won't disturb your sleep. Restaurants, cash machines etc are all less than a five minute walk. It's barely a minute from the main road so you're not walking deep into a potentially dodgy neighbourhood. Do your (Hidden by Airbnb) maps homework before you get there and it's easy enough to find. 

I took the Havatas bus from Attaturk Airport which took around 50 mins and dropped me off in Taksim (Point hotel). From there it was about a 15/20 minute walk. If you come with suitcases however you'll want to get a cab as the pavements in Istanbul are not build for cases! Next time I'm in Istanbul I'll definitely be coming back here.
This is a very quiet great place, in a great location. We had a wonderful time. Julie was a great host.

My boyfriend and I spent 4 nights here for over New Years. We really loved the apartment. It was very spacious and nicely decorated. The heating worked really well (which was useful as it was freezing with 2 foot of snow!) and the kitchen was well equipped. The area is great. Close to all the bars and restaurants. Really responsive communication  from Julie. The only minus was the water temperature in the shower was slightly temperamental.

Julie was an incredible host!!! nothing was too much trouble and she went over and above with enquiries and her response times were excellent!
The apartment is exactly as you see on the photos. Homely, spotlessly clean and just a breath of fresh air! The apartments are maintained daily. 
Wifi is excellent. Just about everything is within walking distance and there are loads of fantastic restaurants and bars close by. If you feel the desire to self-Cater there are two brilliant fruit & veg stalls a couple of doors down and a good little supermarket. I always felt safe in the street, even at night and staying at Greystone offered a brilliant insight into local life whilst being so close to all of the attractions! And I was an Airbnb virgin too!
I seriously could not have had a better choice of accomodation for this trip!! Thanks so much for an incredible stay Julie!!!!

Thank you so much Julie and Faruk for making our stay wonderful. The apartment was just perfect specially the decor. It had everything we needed and so convenient location. We didn't want to be right in the middle of Taksim square's hussle bussle and noise but not too far either, we could walk to Istaklal street. Julie advised us very clearly about the traffic to the airport which we didn't know and would have missed our flight otherwise.
Hope we can comae back again :)

Julie and her apartments are amazing! She was there to welcome us when we arrived and provided us with a map and a booklet of places to go. The apartment is exactly what you see in the photos. The location was perfect, only a few blocks away from Istiklal and the Beyoglu district but far enough to where its not too loud. Theres alot of great food nearby and markets if you want to cook. We wanted to really feel like we were living in Istanbul for the few days we were there and Julie helped us achieve that, thanks Julie!

Faruk and Julie were absolutely incredible people, very helpful and kind. Anything that we ever needed was handled immediately and with care. The place itself was PERFECT for my fiance and I, the view from the balconies were stunning and exactly what we were looking for in a home in the city for a month. The place was cleaned 3 days out of the week by the live in house keeper, Hatije, who was an unexpected but very welcomed surprise. 10 min walk to Taksim square with plenty of great places to eat every day, or fresh vegetables from the markets right outside the front door!  If you stay here, you must go have a bite to eat at Merhi, it's great place to have some traditional Turkish home-cooked foods. The Turkish rice pilaf is an instant favorite of ours now. We heard some news of some areas being dangerous, but never felt a bit in danger ourselves and we traveled all throughout the city. We will stay here again and again every chance we get to return! Thank you so much Julie and Faruk, you are amazing!

name: Private Room with perfect location in Bostanci
summary: The house is the perfect choice for travelers who wants to discover and experience local side of Istanbul. . It's located at the heart of the Asian Side ''Bostanci'' where you can find all the transport possibilities for traveling all the sites.  The location of the apartment is very quiet, silence and safe. The flat is fully equipped for your comfort.

host.about:
Hello,

I am an easy going person. I love to travel, learning different cultures, meeting with new people from all around the world. I have travelled around 40 countries. I would like to travel more.

I love to enjoy having quality time with people. I love to explore new experiences. I like going out with friends, tasting different food, participate concerts. 

I am a finance professional. I work for a multinational retail company.

reviews.txt: I had to sleep on a couch instead of private room which I booked before and paid for it. Because there were another couple who have booked room before and wanted to extend their accommodation after booking room from Airbnb. So also he was renting house to people after meeting with them on Airbnb and not keeping his promises. Entering house was horrible because he gaved room another people there were no enough keys, I had to wait for them on the door for long time and it happened couple times. Bathroom was not clean and in the shared living room which I had to sleep was noisy and dirty smelled. I am sorry that I couldn't be able to write a command about room that I've booked..

Engin's place is located in very nice neighborhood, near to all amenities, personnaly! it was a big pleasure to meet Engin, he made us to feel such as we are in our home, he's helpful, and a cultivated person! I hope I could get another trip to his beautiful city. Thank you Engin.

Engin fue muy amable y flexible con nosotros. Tuvimos una buena charla sobre la vida. Su casa es muy grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hospedarse.
Muy recomendado

name: Inner City Spacious Loft- City View
summary: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like.

host.about:
I am a retired solicitor living in our home with my wife Judith who is a high school French teacher. Currently two of our three grown-up children live with us and we have a spare room. We have always had guests in our house since the children were very little and it is something that we would like to continue doing as I believe connecting with other people and learning about different cultures is wonderful. 
We love film, food, travel and music. This is a very musical household. Sport is also a very big thing- you will always find somebody watching the tennis/cricket/football on the television or going for a wok or bike ride. 
We ourselves love Airbnb and have used it all over the world in recent years. In Canada, France, South America and of course all around here in Australia. 
My life motto: you could die tomorrow so live life to the full!

reviews.txt: I had a lovely stay at Paul and Judith's beautiful home. The house is in a great area and as hosts Paul and Judith were extremely hospitable.

Paul and his family were incredibly welcoming, hospitable and really helpful as I started to find my feet in Sydney. The room was lovely and spacious with a very comfy bed. The family were always happy to chat and share a meal but likewise you could have your own space if needed. I cannot recommend this Airbnb more highly.

Paul was not there to receive us , however he got his son, Tim to help us with the check in procedures. Both Tim and Nicole are very helpful and friendly, sharing with us food places around the vicinity.  

The city is easily accessible from the place.
There are lots of food choices in the location as well. 

The room and toilet is true to picture, it was really comfortable and spacious. We enjoyed our stay there.

We especially love the two dogs; really friendly and cute:)

We had a wonderful time at Paul and Judith's lovely, spacious and peaceful home. We were well looked after by Nicola and Tim in Paul and Judith's absence and enjoyed having their home for us alone. We felt very much at home, enjoyed a cosy room upstairs and the location was perfect for my work and close to some wonderful cafes and bakeries in Redfern and Surry Hills. Paul and Judith were especially kind to send me something that I unfortunately left behind. Truly generous hosts and we can absolutely recommend anyone to stay at their beautiful home!!

Paul and his lovely family were very hospitable and more than accommodating. Everything from the room to the kitchen to the rest of the house had personality, charm and above all, a wonderful homey atmosphere. The best part about our stay was Judith's (Paul's wife) excellent selection of coffee and of course, their two very friendly dogs.

Beautiful house in a great location of Sydney. The room was very nice, clean and tidy, in a private spot of the house on the top floor. Also, guests have their own bathroom.

My mom and a friend stayed with Paul and his family and I also had the pleasure to meet him one day.

Paul is a great host, very hospitable and absolutely helpful, it was great staying with him! 

Thanks so much for letting them have a great time in Sydney :)

A lovely family,  very friendly and welcoming. We felt comfortable as being in our home. Excellent location with good transport connections. City centre and Airport 15 minutes faraway. Wonderful dogs, we loved stay with them because they are easygoing and affectionate
Judith and family were wonderful hosts. Great location and very comfortable room .

Perfect location for an affordable stay in Sydney! Grocery, liquor, and pharmacy  nearby, and commute to Circular Quay or Central train station is easy with a 5 minute walk to 2 different bus stops. Additionally, an Uber to the airport from this location can cost less than public transit! The space is great for single or couple use, with a comfy bed to fall into after a day of sightseeing. The family is very welcoming and resourceful if you need help with anything. The dogs are a great bonus, if you're pet lovers like us. Judith was very flexible with our arrival time considering our flight schedules which made logistics that much easier.

We spent 10 days at Paul's and Judith's house and felt welcomed from the very first moment. The house is very nice and in a great location. There're many restaurants around and a bus stop just by the corner. The room and bathroom are  spacious, clean and nicely decorated.
Paul and Judith, as well as the rest of the family, were very nice, friendly and interesting to talk to. They also gave us many tips about things to do and places to visit in Sydney. We shared many good times with them and we would definitely book this room again.
Highly recommended!

I had a lovely time staying with Paul and his family in gorgeous Redfern! The location is fantastic - not too busy but super conveniently located. Paul, Judith, Tim and Nicola treated me like one of the family. Highly recommended.

After a long day in the city it always felt like coming home, because Paul was so friendly and kind. When we arrived he invited us to watch the Melbourne Cup together and explained us the importance of this event in Australia, which was in fact very new for us and interesting to learn. Paul did everything he could to help us navigate through Sydney and even had Opal cards prepared for us. He and his wife Judith are wonderful people who we enjoyed a lot to stay with. Thank you for a wonderful week!
Paul, Judith and Tim were really friendly and welcoming and I felt at home immediately. The house is so well situated for travelling to city or beaches, its a great place to stay in Sydney.

Paul, Judith and Tim were welcoming, friendly and completely lovely. They allowed me the space I needed yet were open to a nice chat each evening too. I highly recommend this AirBnB. It's delightful and so are the hosts.

We were attending a conference at Technology Park in Redfern, we walked their every day, we were only 5 minutes walk to an amazing array of eateries, Paul's house is a beautiful old terrace in an historic area and as hosts, he and Judith treated us like old friends. Just be aware the room is on the third floor and the stairs are steep. Would highly recommend
Lovely house owned by delightful people in an interesting location

name: MySweetHomePT
summary: Apartment in prime area of the city, easy access to major points of interest in the city of Porto, fully furnished and equipped.

host.about: Olá, o meu nome é Alexandra Cunha, abraço este projeto pois para mim é uma mais valia conhecer pessoas de todo o mundo e culturas diferentes, penso ser muito enriquecedor. Sou sociável, mãe, amiga, comunicativa e divertida. Espero que o meu espaço seja tratado com respeito, tal como se estivesse em sua casa. Espero que todos os meus hóspedes se sintam confortáveis, acarinhados e em casa. Quanto a mim, farei os possíveis para que tal aconteça e para que aproveitem ao máximo o que a cidade do Porto tem para oferecer. Obrigada.

reviews.txt: The apartment was great!! Even better than in the pics. Communication was extra smooth with Alexandra. We loved the location, walking distance to the city centre of Porto. Parking and aircon were awesome. Recommendations on restaurants were wonderful, plenty of local choices very close to the apartment. Safe area and comfortable bed. Strongly recommended. With no doubt we'll stay there when we go back to Porto. Obrigada!!!!

De las mejores experiencias con airbnb, el apartamento esta genial, muy acogedor limpio y no muy lejos del centro. 

Alexandra es una chica encantadora que nos ha tratado muy bien. 

En general una experiencia estupenda. 100% recomendable!

The apartment is great, very comfortable and better than the pictures. Location is good, 10mins walk from the port. Communication was easy. 
The host and especially her husband were Amazing, they agreed to meet us at 4h30 in the morning for the check in because we had a flight delay, they even offered to give us a ride from the train station!
Amazing people and amazing apartment, we had a great time.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Alexandra and her husband were wonderful hosts! They went above and beyond in every way possible! They left detailed maps and went through with me step by step which roads to take, buses to travel on, places to see. They left many suggestions for cafes, restaurants, etc. They were prompt, extremely helpful and communicative both in person and via email and text. The place is exactly as it is photographed and is in a very central and accessible location.

Alexandra, Rui and Francescita are  charming with nice attention If you are looking for a very nice apartment extra clean and well located , do not hesitate . The days in Porto went by so fast , We.will return one day
Definitely at the same apartment 
Marlene and Charles

The stay was great. Host met us right outside their house. And was very accommodating. Gave us a full tour of the house. Provided many local places to check out. 
After we were provided some must see sites of Porto which were great as well. Recommend this house for anyone going to Porto. The house is clean, and the friendly accommodations make it a place to visit multiple times.

Apartamento nuevo con buenas vistas y garage
Alexandra nos recibio y dio todo tipo de explicaciones
Esta a 15 min del centro 
Muy buena experiencia

High standard, modern apartment, walking distance from the heart of Porto. Alexandra and her partner gave us all the information needed to see what the best in this wonderful city and adviced us where to eat a proper portugese francesinha ;))
Thank you :)

Alexandra's welcome and explanation of facilities and nearby attractions was fantastic. The best we have ever experienced on Airbnb. Her apartment is on the 4th floor with beautiful district views. The  apartment is modern, very clean and artistically decorated. The secure parking is a great feature. The location is great -  a 10 to 15 minute walk into the centre of Porto and there is a bus stop for the red and blue hop on hop off bus about 5 minutes away. Would highly recommend Alexandra's apartment to anyone.

Great accomodation! 
Everything was perfect, Alexandra is very helpful and flexible for the check-in and check-out, she gave us all the information about facilities and surrounding that we needed, she is a very kind and attentive person. The flat is modern, comforatable and very clean, we enjoyed a lot our stay there. The location is great, you can easily walk to the centre (10-15min) and the secure parking is a big plus if you have a car. 
I agree with all the positive reviews and would also highly recommend Alexandra's place!

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá!!
