Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Fue una experiencia increible, Ana siempre se comporto amable, disponible, siempre ayudando a facilitar mi viaje, aconsejando como llegar a lugares a los cuales queria visitar.

El lugar para dormir es super comodo, super limpio y super tranquilo, buena onda. 

Estoy muy feliz de haber quedado en esta casa.

Muchas gracias.

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Ana Rita's apartment for ten days during the Olympics, and it was definitely the best Airbnb experience we ever had.

The flat is very well located, Botafogo metro station is about 10/15 minuts walking. The area is full of markets, bars and restaurants, and above all is very safe.
The apartment was perfectly clean at our arrival, and the room equipped with a double bed, a big drawers and a closet.
Ana Rita (and her father too) was friendly and very helpful since the beginning of our stay. During our vacation in Rio we lost our credit cards, and her help was fundamental to get them back. She also suggested us a lot of good places to eat :)
We could use the kitchen and also do the laundry, which was quite necessary since our stay was long.

I can certainly recommend Ana Rita and her flat, you will have a great stay there!

name: Rent All Apartament (100m²) netx to BRT station
summary: Apartamento com um quarto com frigobar, sala moderna com home theater e TV de tela grande, are gourmet de café,  cozinha moderna com gelada e freezer. Mesa de sinuca, área de leitura e um amplo bar. Ônibus Público e estação de BRT próximo (3 min) One apartment with fridge, modern living room with home theater and large screen TV , gourmet coffee area , modern kitchen with cold and freezer. Pool table , reading area and a large bar . Public buses and BRT station near ( 3 min)

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: 1BR COZY, SPACIOUS, NEXT TO METRO FLAMENGO, RIO
summary: Large and spacious 1 bedroom, full kitchen, charming apart an eclectic neighborhood where “Cariocas” live, eat, drink, play live music at Praça São Salvador. Walking distance to everything, just steps away from restaurants and transportation to Corcovado. No car needed when staying at this apartment. The Subway/metro is very close, 5 min walking distance. Perfect for 1 person or couple comfortably.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: I am a freelance web and graphic designer. I was born in Rio but have lived in San Francisco/CA for a long period. I love travelling: new sights, culture, unfamiliar food and I know how important it is to "feel home" at where you stay. I look forward to being your host during your stay in Rio and I can definitely recommend some great spots, good food and a tour around the city.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: It was a pleasure. Great apartment in Flamengo.

Sonia's been an amazing host from beginning to end of my trip to Rio! She was very welcoming and full of good tips about how to enjoy my stay in the city. The apartment is very cozy and had all I needed to feel at home! Very clean, comfortable and perfectly located, a few blocks from the subway and surrounded with a fun nightlife! 
My next visit to Rio will definitely be with Sonia again!
Great location :)
Um apartamento muito bem localizado, perto do aeroporto, metro, onibus numa rua tranquila, perto de tudo.

Great and quiet apartment right in a lively part of Rio... supe close to the Aterro park and beach.
Very tastefully furnished and decorated. 
The bed is very comfortable which is not always the case in a Airbnb.
Sonia is a great and super nice hostess. She made my arrival and departure very easy.
Special thanks to the great doorman Cesar who's so nice!
We had a great time in Sonia's flat! Great apartment great location good amenities and Sonia was always here to help in case we needed anything. I definitely recommend staying here!

name: Oporto Central Flat
summary: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta.

host.location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

reviews.txt:
The apartment is located 20 minutes away from Boavista square on foot, and 2 minutes away from bus stops to downtown (15 minutes). In the neighborhood you can find everything you need: tobacco shops where you can buy your bus pass (andante), grocery stores (e.g. Lidl), pharmacy, etc. A taxi from downtown at night is between 6-8 euro. In short, it is a very convenient location.
The apartment is exactly what you see in the pictures. There is no access to the main bedroom, but the two single beds in the living room were comfortable and the apartment was really clean.
The host canceled this reservation 134 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Everything was as we expected, Natalia was really nice and told us good spot to visit!
Obrigada!
Laurida was a great host helping us find the apartment and providing good tips for the area and helped us with coordinating transport
Perfecto

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!

host.about: I’m a bilingual (French/English) Montrealer passionate about social justice, anthropology, playing the piano, and meeting cool people from near and far.

reviews.txt: Really great place ! Super close to the metro station and many restaurants. Host was amazing with communication and check in was smooth.
Super apart bien placé
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, great stay!
I highly recommend Emilie's place. Its super convenient and 10 min drive to downtown. If you are lucky you can find a parking spot right by her apartment. Its clean and comfy.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sight-seeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!
Great place, in a great location. Emilie was quick to respond to any questions.

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!

host.about: I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

reviews.txt:
We loved staying at Zahia's place.  Alexandra welcomed us very warmly and gave us good tips about Porto. The house ist very well furnished and there is nothing at all we were missing. More – we loved the design and everything  including the dishes of villeroy & boch. We felt like at home! 
Everything is new and clean. Also the beds are very comfortable - in addition it's a quiet neighborhood and we slept very well. We were very lucky to find a place like this and can recomend it to everyone. 
We'll be back...

This was the best house we have stayed so far for the Portugal/Spain trip. Zahia house was really very neat, tidy, spacious and tastefully decorated. Her friend was there for the check in. He was such a great help and host. I highly recommend Zahia house if u and your friend are in Porto and would like to do some cooking and enjoying by the backyard with wine.  Also not to mention, u can walk by foot to a lot of places from Zahia house between 15-20mins, and a lot of eateries just 2-3mins walk from her place.

The appartment is very well located, very conveniet, fully equipped.
We have been welcome, and provided with lot of tips (best locations to have lunch, to go shopping or to enjoy pasteries and drinks.  So much that we preferred not use the kitchen so as to enjoy the portuguese food (even the vegetarian!).
We warmly recommend this location.

I would return to Porto just to repeat the experience of my visit to Zahia's home in the old city of Porto!

Every step of the process, from making first contact to sadly having to say goodbye, was a pleasure.  Such beautiful energy and style. Thank you so much Zahia, Alexandra and Diogo for your kindness, care and assistance. Also very much enjoyed meeting some of your lovely friends in the neighbourhood at Mondo Deli. 

A word of warning though when staying at Zahia's home, her beds are so comfortable, they will wrap their silky sheets around you and not want to let you go  : ) zzzz

Could not recommend more highly to visit Porto and Zahia's home.

Obrigado

: ) errol

Exactly as described. Communication was excellent and host was flexible with check in & out with regard to leaving our bags at the house. V clean in general with a very well equipped kitchen. Great location for exploring Porto.

Zahia and her wonderfully helpful friend Alexandra provided the most fantastic welcome via their friend Diogo. He gave us all the best restaurant tips and was so helpful. The house itself was absolutely gorgeous, and in a fabulous area, close to the city. The garden also was a lovely place to relax in. Would wholeheartedly recommend staying in this memorably beautiful home!

This is a roomy, light, and well-equipped apartment. There is a lovely private garden area and a balcony over-looking the garden. Everything was as described, including very comfortable beds.

The neighborhood is within walking distance of everything in the historic area of the city and is also a few blocks walk from the Metro. There are several grocery stores and cafes, bakeries and restaurants close by.

Our host, Zahia, and her assistant, Alexandra, were gracious and helpful. Alexandra made certain that we had a taxi waiting for us at our 4 AM departure. 

Great apartment, great city, and great hosts.

The stay at Zahia's place was just perfect. The house is charming .. the neighbourhood was what we where looking for .. quiet, far from the crowds still very much in the old city, with lovely restaurants and coffee places nearby ... we loved it !!!

Zahia's house is warm, quiet and confortable. The decoration and furnitures will make every one feeling home. The terrace and the whole house is perfect to chill after the walks through the up and down city of Porto.

The house is perfect with a spacious, beautiful interior and a magical small garden. The location is ideal with everything in walking distance including good food shopping and restaurants but the block is just far enough from the center to feel calm.

An old house in the centre of Porto that was converted one year ago. Beautifully converted with good sized accommodation on two floors - a large kitchen, and separate lounge on the first floor, and two good sized en suite bedrooms on the second floor. Very clean and perfect high quality accommodation for visiting Porto. We had a great time and we would recommend highly this property.

name: Casa S. Miguel 6 - The Yellow House
summary: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price.

host.about:
Hello, I am Ana, I enjoy travelling and meeting new people. 
I have a passion for old buildings, love to refurbish them and bring them back to peoples life. The house in Porto is located in the Old Town Centre and Porto is a fantastic city with plenty to do and see. 
The house in Figueira da Foz is also located in the Old Town Centre close to all amenities. Figueira is in the Centre of Portugal and offers sandy beaches, a Casino and events all year round!

reviews.txt: Ana was a wonderful and gracious host. She was always accessible, punctual and welcoming. The apartment was truly incredible and just as pictured in the Airbnb description with plenty of space for everyone. The apartment is in a fantastic location, right down the street from the Torre dos Clerigos which means that all of Porto's major sights are within walking distance. The only tricky part is finding parking near the house if you drove a car to Porto. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Porto.

Ana has been really helpful and welcoming. She even got us some special things as we were travelling with our 2 little girls.
She answered to our "request" immediately with extreme efficiency....like I rarely have seen before.
(For example, she changed the microwave in only a few hours after we mentioned her it was not working).
The apartment is in a perfect location, just a few step from one of the best view of Porto and Gaia. 
There was parking in the streets.
We had everything needed and expected.
Ana, thanks again for everything.
We l (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ed Porto and really annoyed our stay at your place!
Ana's house was vey nice. A lot of space, very well equiped, with modern furniture and really close to the center. I reccomend it !
A perfect place for our large group and a lovely view at your doorstep and from your balcony. Communication was easy and beyond accommodating. We had a lovely time.

Even though we were a little late, Ana gave us a very warm welcome, made us feel at home right away and even helped us with parking our car. The house was clean, spacious, comfortable and had everything we required. The location was fantastic. Would definitely recommend. Thank you Ana! :)

Het huis was exact zoals beschreven; ruim, schoon en gezellig ingericht.
De ligging in het centrum is perfect. Echt een goede uitvalsbasis voor het bezoeken van de stad. een echt buiten terras is er niet maar door de ligging is er altijd een terras dicht in de buurt.
Kortom; een aanrader.

Staying at Ana`s place was one of our best experiences. Starting with the excellent communication with Ana and her very beautiful apartment. Ana`s apt is exactly as in the photos, modern, clean, comfy and with all the necessary items for our stay. Everything was first class. Thank you for a fantastic weekend in Porto

The apartment is in a wonderful location within super easy walking distance of all of the wonderful treasures of Porto.  We easily walked to the Tower and all of the churches and walked along the river.  There are so many amazing, local restaurants right in the neighborhood, and the coffee shop that is only 50 feet from the apartment was amazing with incredibly friendly owners and great food and coffee.  The weather during our visit was unseasonably cold for Portugal, so the apartment was a bit chilly, but we can't wait to visit again when it is warmer.  The neighborhood is lively and you can hear the cars and people outside the apartment, but it was not a problem for us.  Our host was incredibly helpful!  She introduced us to the owners of the coffee shop and arranged for our very early cab back to the airport.  We loved Porto and would definitely use this apartment if we go back.
Everything perfect! Charming old house with 4 bedrooms and located very well!

This house is perfectly located next to everything. It accommodated all of us perfectly. 
Ana introduced us to Fernando who owns the little shop on the next street and it was amazing. Fernando brought us breakfast every morning, he was so sweet. 
The only thing we did not like was the bathrooms. Wish they were a little cleaner.

We had an excellent stay in Porto and Ana was the most gracious and helpful host. The townhouse was well-equipped and comfortable. The location was central to all of the sites in Porto, which was great. The townhouse is located at the top of the hill, so we also got a great workout. We were worried that the townhouse did not have air conditioning, but the stone walls kept the place at a comfortable temperature. This place is great for a group and I highly recommend it!

name: Apartment in Ipanema with Balcony
summary: Apartment in Ipanema with a large balcony and a barbecue, two blocks from the beach. Ideal for families, couples with children. A space for demanding people, as the apartment is fully equipped with first grade furniture and appliances.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá, Sou o Armando Machado.

Sou carioca, apaixonado pelas cidades do Rio de Janeiro e de Florianópolis. Sou amante de viagens, e gosto de andar de moto e fazer Snowboard. 

O projeto do Jurerê Loft nasceu de muitas idas à Ilha da Magia, e decidi que precisava de um bom motivo para voltar mais vezes. Decidi investir nos apartamentos assim que os vi. O Alex me apresentou cada um dos 4, me apaixonei e pensei: Porquê não transformar esses lofts em uma experiência mágica para os hóspedes do mundo todo? Até hoje o Alex me ajuda com a gestão do Airbnb e a cada comentário elogiando o local e nosso atendimento, me sinto de fato realizado.

Tudo que temos aprendido nesse tempo de Airbnb tem nos ensinado muito, e espero sempre oferecer uma excelente experiência na estadia dos nossos hóspedes!

Estou sempre disponível para dúvidas sobre qualquer uma das cidades, dicas e sugestões (Sempre bem vindas).

Um Grande Abraço!
____________________________________

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
El departamento esta muy bien ubicado. Y tiene un balcon divino.
Pero el departamento es para 5 personas, tiene solo un dormitorio grande con dos camas matrimoniales y despues un cuarto muyyyyy chico con una cama individual.
La comunicacion con armando fue muy buena y la predisposicion para arreglar el problema ya que me confirmo que entrabamos 9 personas por como dice la publicacion. 
Sacando de lado eso, que se soluciono trayendo colchones, lo demas bien

Everything was wonderful, I highly recommend this place. 
It's one block from the beach and near supermarkets, drug stores, atms, stores, bars, etc. Very convenient! Armando was always available to answer questions, very thoughtful throughout the whole booking process and also when we were there and after we left. The apartment is lovely, everything is new and clean!

Fantastic apartment in an amazing location. Armando couldn't have been a kinder host. I stupidly left my wallet (with a sizeable amount of money) behind, and he went above and beyond to return it to me. Top marks, top host!
Excelente hospitalidad por parte de Armando. Muy buen departamento, muy moderno y comodo

name: Artsy 3BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: Overall a good experience. This unit is in a great location and the perfect home base for me and my friends during our stay. We were a bit surprised by the level of noise and on the streets at nice (the windows are not very thick)

This place was an amazing find! We were in awe from the moment we walked into the apartment! Location was fantastic, all the amenities and the service we received from flatbook throughout our stay was top notch! 

We were aware that there was no AC but when we arrived we were so happy to see a small unit set up for us! It was a pleasant surprise and they had many fans for us to use as well. 

All the guests had a wonderful experience, 5 stars!!
Great place, best bang for your buck anywhere near this neighbourhood for sure.
The place was beautiful and clean
Looks nice on surface but over busy street w/minimum in amenities, and comfort
The condo was beautiful and very comfortable. The location was perfect walking distance to little restaurants, shops and bars. Overall the stay was great and I had a wonderful time in Montreal.
Very nice stay!
Great place.   Super spacious and well equipped. In a great neighborhood.

We had a great stay in the Sonder flat. It was perfectly located for us in the center of nightlife, great food and bars. As a large group of 6 the flat was a nice size and we slept very well at night. The only drawbacks for us was the lack of kitchen staples (most rental homes include ample sugar, salt, olive oil bottles, etc) and some issues with electricity (the only way to turn on bedroom lights was via turning on the living room light as well and there was lacking useable sockets in the bedrooms). Otherwise, we had a great time and would definitely return with larger groups again.
Awesome area for going out with a lot of cool small restaurants

Great location, coffee across the street and pretty much anything else you need was walking distance. Furniture and floors were cheap, some parts of the floor were broken. The apartment overall was quite sterile and dark.  Not super cozy but served its purpose as a place to sleep and shower.

An amazing place to stay in Montreal! It was a clean, and stylish apartment that offered some great amenities.  However, the best part of the whole apartment is its location. We were close to so many great restaurants, and activities. This apartment is an easy recommendation.
Amazing location, and great value for a spot in montreal

The apartment is big, well located, near good restaurants in Le Plateau. Some parts of the floor were broken and the floor of the kitchen and bathroom were sticking. We asked for an extra cleaning and the concierge in a few minutes answered our message, but unfortunately, even with an extra cleaning the floor was sticking yet. The best part of the apartment is the location.
AMAZING LOCATION. Clean and stylish space. Super fun - best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at.

Great location, comfortable amenities, but what you don’t see (or hear) in the add are: music from the downstairs retail store, noise from the upstairs renters, one bedroom with no windows, outlets, or ventilation, a TV with no cable or antenna access, and street noise. It’s a great rental if you plan to be out and about in Montreal.

This is a great place to rent in the heart of the night life. My friends and I really enjoyed the location and the space was beautiful. It looks even bigger in person than the photos! Thanks for the stay! Would totally stay here again

name: Homely Room in 5-Star New Condo@MTR
summary: Located in Mongkok, close to everything. 2min walk to both Mongkok and Mongkok East station. Gym, sauna and swimming pool (in summer) are available in the clubhouse.   You'll have a private double room. Washroom and kitchen are shared with host. We are family of 3, my husband, 1y old son and me. The guest bedroom can accommodate two people, the 3rd person has to sleep on the couch (3'x6') in the living room.

reviews.txt:
1) Well located: close to the Mongkok Metro Station. The bus stop A21 to the airport is also within 6 minutes walking. 
2) Very convenient for shopping.
3) Personal space and privacy is guaranteed for guests: I felt convenient and relaxed while staying here.
4) patient, considerate and friendly hosts: Crystal and her husband are of great help and they are very easy to get along with. When I were leaving, they noticed that I got two pieces of  heavy luggage. They helped me take it to the bus station and saw me off. As a first-time traveler to Hong Kong and a Main-lander, I thank Crystal and her husband for offering me such a pleasant experience.

Great location in heart of Mong Kong. Super clean abd well organized house with all confort you need. Mike and Crystal are very sweet and cheerful person. I enjoyed stayed with them and Sauna at 5 floors was so good.  My first choice in Hong Kong.

This is a clean and beatiful apartment, I really enjoy staying here. Also, Crystal and Alon are very nice. It is the coldest in HK, luckily, with Alon's help, I enjoyed the warm air conditioner and felt warm and safty. Thanks the sweety couple! Highly recommended you to live Crystal's apartment.

Thank you  very much Crystal , for providing such a beautiful and convenient room for us . The room was well decorated and equipped .  The couple , they were really hospitable and  helpful , we immediately got what we wanted when we asked for the ways to Vitoria Bay.   Thank you again Crystal. We will have another go if we go to hk in next time.
Modern n safe building , central located, friendly hosts, comfortable apartment. Highly recommended!!
Great experience. The apartment has premium location and superb facilities. Chrystal and Thl are probably the best host you can expect. Highly recommend!
Crystal's husband meet us at the train station, they are young and nice couple. The apartment is new and located at Mongkok, very near to the MRT (Mongkok East Station).

There is wonderful place.,, I'm highly regard clean,,, also He has very clean room. Everything is perfect. The Host was very kind and civil. He gave us delicious snacks :-) The lodging was taken a share for our trip!! Thankyou for my Host.

name: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views
summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.

host.location: North Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: I'm a born and bred Sydneysider, working as a Cellist and teacher full time. After living in the apartment myself for many years, I now live around the corner with my husband and daughter. I love living in Sydney and travelling, trying new places to eat and enjoying all the great things to do in our beautiful local area.

reviews.txt: Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

Lovely compact apartment in a convenient location. Close to nice restaurants in Kirribilli and Milson's point train station. Also a two minute walk from the ferry. Everything we needed was in the apartment and Eleanor quickly sorted out any minor problems we had.

Why would you stay in a hotel when you could stay in this compact but all-you-need apartment in a perfect location just on the north side of the bridge in Sydney?  There are great eateries near by (our favourite - takeaway gourmet burgers overlooking the Opera House and harbour), and train and ferry only a few minutes away. Eleanor was very flexible and everything went very smoothly, and her provision of breakfast food and staples was very helpful.
Recommended.

I booked this for family staying in Sydney for my wedding.  My family members staying here thoroughly enjoyed their stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean and within a great area for being central whilst also away from the hussle and bustle of the city!!  Eleanor communicated well and helped out with all our queries before and during the booking.  Thank you!

My wife and I stayed at Eleanor's apartment for a week - we were met by Eleanor's mum who showed us around and provided us with a welcome pack of food.  The apartment is perfectly located with bus & ferry 2 minutes walk and trains only 5 minutes away. Kirribilli village is great for local shopping and eating out. The communal laundry one floor down was very convenient. The view of the bridge from the balcony is a bonus. We would definitely recommend Eleanor's apartment to other visitors.

Fabulous location. close to ferry, train and every great eatery that North Sydney has to offer. Fabulous apartment. very quiet retreat with the hustle and bustle only a short ferry ride away or 15 mins walk over the Sydney Harbour Bridge and you're in The Rocks.

We had a wonderful time at Eleanor's harbourside apartment. You really do have a view of beautiful Sydney harbour and the Bridge from her balcony; a lovely spot to sit outside, have a glass of wine and relax. The location couldn't be better - a 2 minute walk to the ferry and within walking distance of the Ensemble theatre, Flying Squadron bar, the cafes of Kiribilli and we even walked past Luna Park round to the restaurants of Lavender Bay. The apartment is cosy and had everything we needed for our stay. Car parking was a bonus for this area.

Everything about this stay was perfect! While I did not meet Eleanor in person, she was very helpful prior to arrival and communicated in a timely manner. The home was great, it's an awesome location, and was well maintained. No surprises here--just a truly wonderful stay. I spent 30 days at Eleanor's home and would stay there again if I came back to Sydney for a long work assignment.

Eleanor's apartment is very well situated with great access to the city by train, bus, ferry or even by walking across the bridge. The apartment was bright and comfortable with a nice view. Eleanor is a conscientious and friendly host.

A beautiful, well presented place in a lovely location. Eleanor is a very welcoming host with a great appreciation of the area and provided plenty of suggestions for what to do/where to go. highly recommend.

Eleanor's place is lovely and both Eleanor and her mother were great to deal with and went out of their way to make me feel welcome and help me out. The flat is really great - it has everything you need, including an amazing view of the harbour bridge, and the obligatory Sydney fireworks!!

Eleanor's place was very clean, comfortable and in a great location, the apartment was well equipped with everything you would need for a stay, including a well stocked fridge, comfortable bed and lounge, and a beautiful little balcony with amazing city views! The fans in the bedroom and lounge were very effective and quiet, and the location was so convenient. It was magical taking the ferry from the city to the apartment on my last night. I would definitely recommend Eleanor's home to other travellers.
Great location, very easy to navigate and perfect for a couple. Thanks for a great stay.

Eleanor was kind to let us check in early.
House manual was comprehensive. Little disappointed with little fridge space for 6 nights stay.  Small area to prepare meals. About shower leakage was told on the day. Mould around screen from wet floor was unhygienic.
Eleanor was great!  Great neighborhood!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Eleanor's apartment was very cosy and just a stone throw away from the ferries which allowed us to access the main tourist spots like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge easily. We were welcomed by Eleanor's mom who showed us how to access the property with ease. The apartment was perfect for couples and provided a homely feeling.

We had 3 nights at Eleanor's place and it was perfect. Location, communication, very warm welcome with a fabulous breakfast hamper.  The views from the windows and front balcony are stunning and the locality offers really handy restaurants, cafes, convenience stores. A 10/10 apartment/location.  Thanks so much Eleanor.

Fantastic location! Very easy access to both ferry and train. Shops 5min walk away.  Clean and tidy place,  perfect for a couple or single.  The breakfast basket was much appreciated! Thanks again for having us stay.
Great place. Quiet location. Generous breakfast and great place.

name: Cozy Room at TKL MTR
summary: 我的房源靠近優美的景色､公園､餐廳和餐飲､市中心｡因為舒適的床､廚房､溫馨,您一定會愛上我的房源｡我的房源適合情侶､獨自旅行的冒險家､商務旅行者｡

host.about:
Originally from China.Now working and living in Hong Kong. Enjoy climbing, hiking and travelling around the world. Speak fluent English and Cantonese, native Mandarin speaker.
I am a easygoing and humorous person to get along with. The experience of traveling around world has equiped me with a cross culture perspective and the personality easy to making friends.
I am more than happy to share with you about cultures and my living experience in Hong Kong and other major cities of China.

loc.address: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
First of all, I would give Will a thumb up, who is very considerable and easygoing. He gave me clear instruction to find the location of his house even including the bus to take. 
The next thing is the location. It's in Sai Kung, so its near to some scenic spots like Wong Tai Sin Temple, the seaside park and HK Heritage Museum in Shatin.
And then the community. It's near the mtr, the gate is just the entrance to mtr. And it's safe, thanks to the guards, outsiders have no access to get in. The infrustructure is good and there are some entertainment facilities for the kids too.
Finally it comes to the apartment. You can just find it home there, yeah a sweet home, from the window you can have a sea view. The power adapter is available.
That's it, it's a place where you would like to live for a second time.

This surely is one of the best place to stay in HK. Full value for money. You get to stay at the sea front with a sea view from your room window. Location and apartment is great. Nicely kept, clean, tidy and with all the amenities you require as a traveller are already there (e.g. Room heater when outside temperature gets freezing cold). Not very far from Tie Keng Lang (TKL) MTR (subway) station. About 5 to 7 mins walk. Room partner Ning was very friendly and helpful. Also the Ocean shore apartments seem to be great society very well maintained, spotlessly clean and tidy. I will definitely miss my first ever stay in Hong Kong at this residence.

Will was an excellent host, who provided impeccable service. He picked me up at at the MRT station at the agreed time. He also helped me with some personal questions I had around the public transportation in HK. Furthermore he is a very sociable person and I enjoyed the conversation with him a lot. I will definitely stay again at his place when going back to HK.
Thanks for Will and roommate served a very good place and I sleep very warm and comfortable, hope next time I can stay longer.
a nice place for transfer, nice host.

I enjoyed staying in Will's apartment.  He met me at the MTR station to take me to the apartment, which is less than a 10-minute walk.
The room is quite small (as anticipated and as might b e expected in Hong Kong), but since I was by myself I was able to manage satisfactorily.
At the apartment, I could use the bathroom, kitchen and living room, which was convenient as I needed to work for part of the time.  I felt at home there.
On a future visit to Hong Kong, I would return to Will's apartment if available.

name: The Porto Concierge - Bouganvillea Oporto Flat
summary: Lovely apartment in a retro style, fully equipped, in the heart of Porto downtown, right next to one of the most iconic spots: Mercado do Bolhão. Very bright and comfortable with balcony. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.

reviews.txt: Stayed in Edgar's place for 5 days. Great location, super clean, perfect location for walking everywhere and exploring the city. The apartment itself is really amazing, the photos definitely don't do it justice!

We really enjoyed the flat. It is very well equipped, well located and completely conform to pictures.
Perfect for the long weekend we spent in Porto.
Only negative aspect was a really poor soundproofing, but as we stayed mostly outside, it was not such a problem for us.
Very much appreciated all attentions among others, a bottle of wine, bath towels... 
Another positive thing is the supermarket next door :)

Perfect location and amazing hospitality! Edgar set up a ride for us from the airport to the apartment, and also had a concierge member waiting at the front door to explain the apartment and surrounding area. Also, Edgar had a very quick response time. He answered all questions within minutes. The apartment itself is very modern and has great personality. The back "garden" is secluded and is a nice area to have a morning coffee. There is minimal street/neighborhood noise. All-in-all, the entire experience surpassed my expectations, and I would highly recommend this as a great Porto location!

It was an immaculate apartment, very clean and smelt amazing. It had everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. The location is convienient and close to shops and market, and within walking distance to major attractions. Communication with the host was easy. We thouroughly enjoyed our stay in Porto!

This apartment is probably the best AirBnB we have stayed in so far.
It is in a fantastic location and was very easy to find.
The apartment has recently been renovated and has all the essentials you need.
We cooked in the apartment for 2 evenings and the kitchen had everything we required.
The outdoor balcony is a beautiful quiet spot where you can sit back and enjoy a glass of wine after a day of sightseeing.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone. We loved (Website hidden by Airbnb) we hope to be back again.

We had a perfect 3 days in Porto. The apartment is perfectly placed, the communication and welcome anticipated our flight delay. The apartment is just beautiful, the photos do not do it justice! Spacious, lovely afternoon light, calm even though it is in the centre. We are definitely keeping this on our list for future visits to Porto. Highly recommend!

The flat looks brand new and modern, better than in pictures. Everything was very clean and we had a pleasant stay. 
The flat is fully equipped with modern appliances, including a dish-washing machine. Also, the coffee machine was very useful in the morning. The led lightning provided a cozy atmosphere.

Although it's on a main street, 5-10 minutes of walking from the main train station, it's not facing the street and it's very quiet.
There are some sources of noise for sensible ears: 
- the early morning resupply of the down stairs supermarket (rather annoying)
- the building is not soundproofed and one can hear some noise from other flats (in our experience it was very limited)

Extremely beautiful and nicely decorated apartment at the perfect spot in Porto! I wish we had more time to spend there. It is very well located on a street that gets quiet at night and very close to the busy nightlife. Definitely recommend and will book there the next time.
Really nice apartment in the city center, with all the comforts and a nice welcome by the host.

We loved this apartment. It is right next to the old market square in a most central location to get around the entire city. There are plenty of shops, eateries, taxi stands nearby. We were greeted on time right as the apartment finished getting cleaned. We really enjoyed our stay here and will be back the next time we swing through Porto!

Mooi ingericht appartement, op een centrale lokatie. Alles binnen loopafstand, en metro om de hoek. 
Het appartement is zeer compleet, alle mogelijke keukenspullen en apparaten aanwezig.  Prima bedden, alles schoon en netjes. Aanrader!

Top! It was a pleasure to stay in this apartment ! Everything was good!
Be careful with your hour of arrival, it s a concierge service (not in the same place)

I have to say, we've stayed in many Airbnbs, and this has to be one of our favorites so far. We loved the layout, design, location, and price. The apartment is very close to the train station, so it was very easy to get to. Once we arrived, we were greeted very promptly and courteously. The apartment is AMAZING! The pictures are exactly what you get. We would DEFINITELY recommend this place to other people.
We had great stay in Porto. The apartment was wonderful in a great location. Definitely next time again.

name: Chic Queen Bed in 5 Star Location!
summary: Spacious Rooftop Terrace in a Cosmopolitan Suburb. Close to Centenial Park, Right on Oxford st! Close to Paddington Pubs, Restaurants & shops, 15min walk to Central CBD &  15min bus to Bondi Beach. You'll love the apartment which is artfully decorated & the only one (1st floor of townhouse) so very peaceful & private.  I pride myself on giving my guests the best value for money, as that’s what I look for in my air bnbs when I travel too!  Can’t wait to welcome you to Sydney :)

host.about: Travel girl with a free spirit:)

reviews.txt: It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location was great, with Paddington's amazing restaurants and shops just on our doorstep. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!

Jessica is a genuinely kind hearted person. She made me and my boyfriend feel welcome and helped us in the ways that she could.  She also collects art and has excellent taste, so her flat is absolutely adorable! We stayed 5 nights, and everything was comfortable. There's even an electric blanket in the bed. Paddington is a very nice neighborhood mainly of boutique shopping on the main road. Centennial Park is also a 10 minute walk away, so we took advantage of that. I've been in many a Airbnb, and I definitely recommend Jessica and her flat!
Gorgeous host and such a lovely comfortable room. Very flexible with my arrival.

Jessica is a great host! Amazing location of the place, wonderful accommodations. Seriously, if you're visiting Sydney I highly recommend staying with Jessica. In between the city and the beach. Amazing!
A beautiful, clean and cosy place in a nice and convenient neighbourhood. Jessica is a very friendly and helpful host. We enjoyed our stay here!

Staying at Jessica's was great value for money and in a top location! A clean and tidy place and Jessica was lovely.
Thanks for having us!

Jessica's place was lovely! She was so easy to communicate with and accommodating. The bed was super comfortable and had such nice sheets! She provided us with towels and had some lovely complimentary tea and cookies. Jessica was able to recommend many great local spots and made us feel very welcome. I totally recommend if you're looking for a nice spot to stay!
Lots of stairs. No windows but has ample natural skylights.  The neighborhood is trendy with great transportation access.

We stayed at Jess' place over the Easter break and it was a great spot in Paddington with lots of nice bars, shops and restaurants near by. It's just around the corner from the bus stop which has buses running to the city centre and also to Bondi. Jess was friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome during our stay.
Jessica is a nice person! She gave us a lot of useful suggestion! Cats are quiet and cute. Thanks!

Jessica was a lovely host! Despite her being unwell while I stayed there I could always rely on her to help me out with anything around the flat, awesome restaurant and sightseeing recommendations and just generally pleasant company :) The cats were lovely and very affectionate. I definitely felt at home at Jessica's flat. Extremely well located for buses to take you to either Bondi or central Sydney, as it's basically halfway in between. I walked to Mrs McQuarries point one day and it took just over an hour to do so, buses take 10-15 minutes to central. Paddington itself is a cute neighbourhood with some nice places to eat/drink/shop nearby. Quite a few steps to take up to the flat just for anyone who might have issues with that, I didn't. Really enjoyed my stay at Jessica's flat highly recommend it!
Great location, comfy clean bed and great value. Jess is a lovely, friendly, helpful host.
Jessica has a funky Paddo pad in the middle of everything Sydney has to offer. Perfect Sydney stay.
Jessica is so amazing ! She is so sweet and it is in a great location
Very basic but great value for money if you spend most of your time out and about. Host was lovely and accomodating.
Great place to stay! Very clean and comfortable. Good location and some great eating options around.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: São João
summary: The apartment in Oporto has 2 bedrooms and has capacity for 5 people.  The apartment is homely, is fully-equiped, and  is 120 m².  It has views of the mountain.  The house is situated in a family-friendly neighborhood in the center of the city.

host.about:
Férias, escapadelas, trabalho,... qualquer que seja o motivo da sua visita à cidade do Porto, o Oporto Trendy Apartments oferece-lhe apartamentos totalmente equipados, onde o conforto e bem estar foram pensados ao pormenor.

Holiday, getaways, work ... whatever the purpose of your visit to the city of Oporto, Oporto Trendy Apartments offers fully equipped apartments, where comfort and well-being was thought to detail.

reviews.txt: Apartment was very nice and it's situated right next to the landmark Ponte Luis. It has refreshing terrace which was perfect during the warm nights. Communication with the host was swift and without a problem. Only downside was a staircase inside the apartment which everybody bumped into, and the only set of keys (keypads were supposed to work in the middle of our stay but they didn't) for four people.

Very cute and brand new place. Perfectly located close to the historic center with a convenient parking in front of the building. Confortable beds, nice terrasse facing the back court yard, performant wifi.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment is clean and Morden. Newly renovated and it's right in the heart of Porto and we even find free parking space out of apartment.

Highly recommend location which is close to the hot spots, attractions and everything you could need. It's literally 2 mins walk from the main river restaurants and the view is breathtaking. Place was well maintained and very comfortable. 5 Stars!
Great location and beautiful apartment!
You can't find a better place to stay in Porto, really !

This was a great apartment in a wonderful location right by the water. Everything was walkable including great restaurants and tourist attractions. The apartment also was clean and spacious. Hugo also was a excellent host who was accommodating, friendly and knew a lot about the city. Overall excellent place and experience in a beautiful city.

The apartment was in a great location (nice walking/running paths by river) and easily walkable to good restaurants and sights in Porto. The apartment was clean and perfect for a family of four with older children. Communication with Oporto was very good and they stayed in touch with us even after our flights were cancelled, then delayed rearranging our airport transfer (highly recommend). Other plus, a key pad to enter building and apartment. No concern over losing keys or tricky entry!
The apartment was absolutely beautiful and in the best location in Porto. My girlfriends and I traveled to multiple places in Portugal and this was by far the best airbnb experience.

The location was great, a sweet little outside terrace outside from the top floor.  Everything was very clean and new.  Guests need to know about the little spiral staircase...not for the aged,  nor for younger children.  The spindles could be taken out with a big suitcase and a bad misstep.  Everything was very accommodating.  However, one issue we had was our morning when we were leaving.  We were not told that the code to get into the front door and to our apartment would be voided exactly at noon.  We had to make a quick run to a shop just next door and got back to the apartment and could not get in.  We were 5 minutes late.   We finally got in and the cleaning crew was waiting for us with some very impatient faces.  We were all packed, we just had to toss a couple of things in a bag and leave.  We always tip cleaning crews, and this time we were able to hand the tip to them in person, which seemed to ameliorate the situation.  Otherwise, all went smoothly.  I broke a wine glass, but left money in it for a replacement.

name: Shiny BALCONY:)) room CENTRAL ISTANBUL ŞİŞLİ
summary: from a Londoner...Not in dark streets. BALCONY:)) New room with king size bed for two in a large flat in the central of Istanbul-ŞİŞLİ that so close Beyoğlu,Taksim(2km),Galata, Sultanahmet Grand Bazaar by Subway or Bus.Cevahir, Trump Shopping Malls are just 5min.Buses that cover whole lstanbul,are stopping in front of the home.Kitchen, bathroom and the living-room are open for our guests.There are Restaurants,Burger King,coffee shop, Supermarkets next to home which is infront of Şişli Nuroltower

host.about: Londoner I m:)) a lawyer in Istanbul and have been to London and stayed in many places all around the world. That's why I know what kinda feeling being a guest in someone's home. so Let's do it so easy and make it comfortable like your own :))

reviews.txt: Erdinc is an awesome person and he helped us a lot!!! Although he is not stay at home a lot but he tried to help us every time and he provided everything we need. Also the house is in a good location you can go to lots of malls for shopping. Lots of restaurants, transportations and supermarkets around so it's convenient.

Erdinc is a wonderfully friendly and incredibly helpful. The room was basic but clean and the bed was comfortable. The balcony lets you look out onto Istanbul life. It is near a big road which makes it a little bit noisy, but the insulation is good, so when everything is closed you barely hear a thing. 

You can walk to Taskin square in a little over 30 minutes or you can just take the Metro which is very close and will drop you off wherever you need to go. 

In other words, great location and great value for money

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVS 2BR
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas South timeshare - Pay resort: $14-20/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.

host.about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.txt: Awesome location and venue. We loved our stay.
A perfect ocean view apartment in Westin time share resort.
This was a great vacation with my kids! Everything was better than advertised and made for good lodging. We had separate spaces and spaces where we could all interact. Just perfect.

name: Quarto de Casal em Ipanema
summary: Ideal para hóspedes do mundo todo que buscam um lugar para poderem descansar e se socializarem depois de um longo dia na Cidade Maravilhosa.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Eu sou a Gabi, sou jornalista. Falo português, inglês, francês e um pouco de espanhol. Sou extrovertida e animada. Adoro ficar com a casa cheia! Espero recebê-lo em breve. :)
 
I`m Gabi, I`m a journalist. I speak Portuguese, English, French and Spanish (a little). I am a lively and outgoing person and I love when the house is crowded! Hope to host you soon. :)

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Very friendly couple in a tidy, very well located spot right in the heart of Ipanema beach. Grabiela is such a warm and welcoming character! The room I stayed in was spacious, neat and with affordable price. Would definitely recommend this place to other tourists who are looking to enjoy a good time in the wonderful city of Rio De Janeiro!

Gabriela is very welcomy and do a lot to make you feel confortable.
Would recommend.

name: Sunny 1 or 2 BR apt in Boerum Hill
summary: Large, sunny apartment in a classic Brooklyn 3-story row house in historic and trendy Boerum Hill neighborhood known for its charming, brownstone buildings and tree-lined streets.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about:
My husband (a West coast transplant) and I (East coast native) bought and renovated this 19th century row house in Brooklyn several years ago.  Since then we have been enjoying the unique vibe here.  
We are both passionate about design (I am also an architect), so we really enjoyed setting up the vacation rental and hope our guests enjoy it too!

reviews.txt:
Great apartment! Super clean, comfortable, and plenty of space. Very close to the A/C and only a short trip to Manhattan. Beautiful neighborhood full of restaurants, bars and coffee shops. 

Would recommend anyone to stay here!

My husband, son and I stayed in Judy's apartment for a week. We loved it! The location was brilliant and the apartment was stunning. A fantastic kitchen that we cooked in every night, a great dining area for friends to pop around and very spacious, clean and stylish furnishings. Judy was brilliant. A caring and energetic host always there to ask questions and check in if we needed anything. On arrival she greeted us with some food and even helped me to organise my little son when we had to leave. Would definitely stay again and hope to do so later in the year :) Many thanks again Judy!

My parents came for their first visit (in a decade) to New York, so I booked Judy's second-floor apartment, just down the block from my flat. They spent a long weekend (three nights) in this spacious airy apartment.  The accommodations are clean, comfortable, secure, and include a well-equipped modern kitchen.   Judy was very nice and welcoming, providing a supply of breakfast staples as well as great hints about neighborhood cafes and restaurants.  My mother - always apprehensive about parking - was especially pleased that there is lots of free on-street parking available in the surrounding neighborhood.  Judy was easy to correspond with in advance and to connect with the day they arrived - she's very responsive, and even let me preview the space to ensure it would be accessible for my older parents. I hope the apartment is available the next time they visit Brooklyn - which they are excited to do as a result of a very restful, comfortable weekend.

Excellent experience! Judy met me at the curb and even helped carry our bags upstairs. We mostly communicated via text, she always responded promptly so it was very useful. The apartment itself is incredibly convenient, near many subway lines, excellent restaurants, and various interesting sections of Brooklyn. It was lots of space for two people, with plenty of light and a comfortable bed. Recommended all around as classy and convenient NYC lodging.

I honestly loved staying at Judy's apartment. She and her husband was really helpful, they gave us tips on restaurant, yoga classes...  The apartment was really clean and pictures are representative of the place. New kitchen and new bathroom. 

The area was great as well, a lot of restaurant and ship close by. It was our first time staying in Brooklyn and we enjoyed it a lot.
We had a wonderful stay at Judy's and absolutely recommend her place!  It was beautiful, extremely clean and in a great location near shops and restaurants and the subway! We will be repeat visitors.

My husband and I, along with our one year old son, had a wonderful stay at this apartment. Judy was great and very responsive via email and text. The apartment itself was spacious and had lovely amenities. Looks just like the photos. The washer and dryer was a huge plus for us since we were traveling with a toddler. The location is fantastic too. I cannot say enough good things about this apartment and experience!

I booked Judy's apartment for 2 nights last week along with my adult son and his girlfriend.  Judy was extremely helpful and easy to deal with!  The apartment was very spacious and immaculate.  There were fresh cut flowers on the table and a few essentials in the kitchen: milk, cereal, coffee, tea bags, etc.  These nice little touches were very much appreciated!  We had a quick breakfast at the apartment and then were on our way and ready to explore.  There were also toiletries (shower gel/shampoo) in the bathroom for those (like my son! who do not bring their own!  Judy also had an extra bedroom just down the hall that I rented as well (for privacy).  The apartment is located in a very nice and charming area with lots of (inexpensive) restaurants nearby along with some cute shops.  You can walk down Atlantic Avenue or State to get to Brooklyn Bridge Park (which is quite lovely!).  It's about a 10 minute walk.  We were literally a 3 minute walk to the nearest subway heading into Manhattan, so that was a plus.  Staying in Brooklyn is the way to go if you like a less chaotic and quieter place to stay.  We will definitely be back!

This apartment was fantastic. It's a lovely, charming place, very bright. The kitchen and bathroom have both recently been fully renovated. The apartment was very clean. 

Judy was a great host. When we arrived, we found that she had left us a carton of organic milk, granola, and a package of Stumptown coffee. She gave us some good tips for local restaurants, and she let us store our luggage in the building for a little while after we checked out. 

The location is great. There are some good restaurants just around the corner on Atlantic, as well as a very good french bakery. Just a couple of blocks down Bond are two more very good restaurants, Building on Bond and Ruccola. The neighborhood is great to walk around. Smith St. is just a couple of blocks away with tons of shops, bars, restaurants. The Hoyt Schermerhorn metro is just a couple of blocks away, which can take you into the city on the A or C, or further into Brooklyn on the G. Other statios are a few minutes walk away. 

We would love to stay here again.

This is a fantastic apartment - great space, great location, great price - and Judy is a wonderful host.  She responded to all of my questions and concerns promptly, accommodated an early arrival and late check out, and even promptly took care of a small issue that occurred during our stay.  I would absolutely stay here again.

We came to visit family in Brooklyn. This was an amazing space to relax and the perfect location to get around everywhere! Judy was so nice and accommodating. Her little touches made us feel so welcome :) We would recommend this and plan on staying here in the future.

The apartment is superb: spacious, immaculate, furnished with impeccable taste, and renovated with excellent quality materials!!!!! We loved the open space full of light and the spaciousness to relax after a busy day .Judy added so many touches that made our stay remarkable: basics like juice, milk, coffee and granola; toiletries, laundry detergent, fresh flowers. Everything was very clean and there were cleaning products available for our use.  The washer and dryer were a big plus. We were not able to meet Judy since she was not in town  but all our communications and the arrival/departure arrangements were perfect. We liked the neighborhood: diverse, vibrant, close to Atlantic terminal/subway/buses and with nice grocery/dinner options. It was a wonderful way to enjoy Manhattan since it was an easy and short subway ride away. We had the best pizza in many years at Lucali's. We could not asked for anything else and we are extremely thankful to Judy.

Judy was a fantastic host and my family and I couldn't have been happier with the (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartment is beautiful. Renovated, sunny and well kept, it was perfect for my family. The kitchen and dining room sealed the deal with the dining table where we were able to have a family meal. The eye for detail throughout my family's stay was so helpful- from the instructions on every set of keys, printing out of maps and a binder full of recommendations, I'm definitely going to tell my friends to stay here in the future.  Judy is super easy to get a hold of and happily answered all of my questions. Thanks again, Judy!

If you wanna explore Manhattan and especially Brooklyn (which has so much to offer), this is the place to stay and relax! We felt instantly at home in Judy's stylish apartment, which has every amenity you can think of. Moreover Judy was a kind and helpful host. We recommend this place warmly!

The apartment was clean and uncluttered with a modern kitchen and bathroom.  It met all of our expectations.  My wife loved the fact that the kitchen was well stocked with the basics.  We will definitely stay there again on our next trip to Brooklyn to visit our son.  Dave, Cindie, Brian
Judy was great all around. And the place was lovely and clean and convenient with plenty of space. Would definitely stay there again.

Judy has an absolutely beautiful apartment!  Great communication the whole time.  My mother enjoyed her stay, and it was right around the corner from my apt.  Quiet, great light, comfortable bed, gorgeous decor, lots of space.  Thanks, Judy!

We had a great time at Judy's apartment. It is very nice, clean and sunny and fully equipped with everything you need during a 5-day city trip. The location is great, it takes just a few minutes by subway to Manhattan downtown. There are a few nice restaurants and coffee bars in the area as well as a small supermarket. We'd definitely come back to this place!
Thanks Judy, you made us feel at home in Brooklyn! 
Stephanie

name: Designer's Historical Apartment
summary: This tastefully functional Istanbul apartment with a great soul is in the heart of the city. Offers lot's  of sunlight during the day and quiet sleeps at night. Enjoy the historical neighborhood with antique stores, galleries, and coffee shops.

host.about: Born and raised in Europe, educated in California. I am an artist and international school teacher, currently work/live in SE Asia. I practice yoga, surf, and lead a conscious and healthy lifestyle.

reviews.txt:
Staying at Pia's was very nice. Pia was most helpful and hospitable. She gave us detailed instructions upfront, met us at Taksim and explained a lot about the neighborhoud. Her apartment is newly and nicely refurbished, with all appliances you might need. The bedrom is quiet with sun and sound of birds in the morning. The apartment is well situated between the lively Istiklal and a net of peaceful small streets with shops, restaurants and galleries. We enjoyed walking around, all the way down to the Bosphorus. We are grateful for experiencing Istanbul. 

Branimir and Marina

Pia was a great host, took time to describe the neighborhood to us, and helped us settle in. The place is clean, and in a great location tucked away from the crowds. Lots of great places to eat nearby, and quiet at night.

Just an amazing apartment! So clean, luminous and comfortably spacious. I spent wonderful 2 days in this calm, cozy and modern decorated apartment in a historical building. Besides being SO much cheaper than a hotel, there is a very comfortable bed and artistically designed sitting room.  Clean furniture, towels and bed linens. It is also possible to prepare something to eat as there is a kitchen. 
 
Just 5 minutes by waking to Taksim Square and Istiklal. But still in a very special historic quiet street full of vintage, art and antique shop. Nice neighborhood with homemade food restaurants and small authentic cafeterias. There are also bakeries that you can find freshly-baked bread and other Turkish specialties. Metro and tramway is in walking distance. I just felt like an inhabitant of the quarter.
Owner is so kind and friendly!

The flat had a calm, relaxing feel. I enjoyed hanging out there when I wasn't being a tourist. It is stylish and well designed. The furniture, which I liked, is made by the owner. 
It has a good location too. Cihangir is a cool neighbourhood in its own right but also centrally located. The flat is near cafes for the morning, as well as interesting restaurants and good bars for the evening.
The shops in the area are very individual too.
The flat is just a walk and short tram ride from the main tourist sites such as Topkapi Palace and Haghia.
I had a great time and can really recommend staying here.
Richard

I found this Apartment through a friend where I work at the University of California , and was thoroughly disarmed   by the quality accommodations that I found upon-my  arrival.
Pia was the consummate host and went out of her way to ease my arrival into Istanbul which was for my first time ever In Turkey.She even met me at my air bus  in Taksim square and personally walked me to her place which is only a few blocks away.This beautiful flat in a storybook location, is situated on a street that one would swear is from the the back lot set of Goldwyn Studios in Hollywood. The neighborhood is truly in the fashion of a Bohemian San Francisco with steep winding streets and many excellent restaurants, flea markets,and designer shops all near by.
The best surprise of all was the the fantastic roof patio where one can sit and see the beautiful views of the Golden Horn and the Blue Mosque in the distance.
The rooms are airy and light with tall ceilings, and her personally designed cabinets and interior ,had such a simple elegant feel.
The separate bedroom is extremely cool in the summer and relaxing ,which has a view to the back over a tree covered 400 year old Hamam .The combined call to prayer and  the sound of many birds is positively magic. 
I highly recommend this Flat
Michael Schmitt 
Santa Barbara California

Truly, it was very hard to leave this beautiful apartment in the most wonderful area of the most wonderful city. Pia was an excellent host, staying up until the wee hours to greet us after we arrived on a very late flight and got stuck in traffic for hours. She provided lots of useful advice on what to do, where to eat and what to see; and not just for Istanbul, Pia was very obliging in offering us tips for one of our future destinations (India). The apartment itself is serene, peaceful, spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished making it hard to resist the temptation to simply stay in and relax! We wouldn't hesitate for a moment on recommending Pia's apartment. Thank you Pia for a wonderful stay, Michael & Kieran.

Pia's home is very comfortable and she is a great hostess. It is very conveniently located. 

The house was very clean and very relaxing. I would definitely recommend it and would stay there again.
Pia was a very kind host, her appartment is beautiful. She even took my to Yoga classes and we had dinner together. Thanks Pia!

We spent five days and nights in Istanbul and were happy to stay at Pias appartment. We very much enjoyed our stay. The appartment is perfectly located in Beyoglu where you have many shops, restaurants and bars. The neighbourhood is very lively and sometimes loud at night but the appartment is in a quiet street which is perfect. Unfortunatelly for some reason there was no possibility to use the roof terrasse that is shown on the pictures as I was told by Pias friend who showed me the appartment when arriving. So if you attach importance to a terrasse, better check this out.

Location is simply great: few steps away from nice evening-out places, the main shopping street, about 10min to get to the tram, etc. At the same time the flat and the bedroom was quiet and had everything we needed. 

Pia is very nice person and very good host.

First of all, Pia was a very kind host, she waited for us while we arrived with a very late flight, checked if everything was ok during the stay, kept our luggages in the appartment the day we left & called us a cab to return to the airport.
The appartment is perfectly located, in modern Istanbul, 2mn from Istikal street, but at the same time is very quiet. There is no noise at night, while there are plenty of nice coffees and restaurant very close. There is also a tram station to get to old Istanbul (Sulthnamet) walking distance,15mn walk down the hill. 
The appartment itself is very nicely decorated, very clean and confortable. Only you should know, if you do not come in the summer, that there is no central heating, only one portative heater that you can move one room to another. In March, we were quite cold. So we would recommand with no hesitation the place, but preferably with summer weather.

Pia's place was fantastic. Located minutes from the bustling IIstiklal Street and Taksim Square, the apartment is clean and cozy.

Shops selling great food are nearby. And if you need the metro, it's also walking distance.

Pia was very helpful and even though I arrived late at night, she waited for me and spoke to the taxi driver to give him instructions.

And Pia even made the effort to take us around despite her busy schedule. What a host!

This is an ideal place if you want peace and quiet, and yet want to be at a central location.

Amazing apartment in the best area! We had a lovely time in Pia's apartment and we couldn't have wished for a better location. It is in the middle of all the cool shops and new trendy local restaurants. She was a lovely host and we can definitely recommend this place.
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great experience! Very beautiful area, beautiful place!
The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Apartamento/Flat T2 com vista mar
summary: O apartamento fica perto do centro da cidade, praia e mar, parques, belas paisagens e bons restaurantes. Supermecados muito próximos. Metro em direção ao Porto e vias de acesso rápido a cidades vizinhas a 300 metros. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de a iluminação, o aconchego dos quartos, as vistas do por do sol, decoração, sossego, localização. O meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes, e famílias. A praia no verão e o sossego do inverno são convidativos. Possui lugar de garagem fechado.

host.about:
Professor, com gostos simples.
Gosto de viajar, fazer desporto, cinema e leitura.
Conhecer pessoas e aprender.

reviews.txt:
The flat is a top floor, nice view to the sea in the background, bed very comfortable, very clean and well designed flat. 
We have been received with local little cake. A nice touch from the host.
The host took the time to explain where to go and eat. Thanks for the tips.
La casa genial., tal cual las fotos.  Esta muy bien equipada, relativamente cerca de playa y muy cerca de supermercado y farmacia
The appartment is fantastic and close to all.
Great host. Warm welcoming. Gives good details on Porto and suggestions.

name: Oba Hotel istanbul Quadruple Room
summary: My place is close to Sultan Ahmet Camii and İstanbul. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

host.about: Tourism Professional

reviews.txt: Really good location 5 mins walk from the Blue Mosque and hippodrome. Ismail was a really good host, great with kids, helpful in all respects from sightseeing to tips on how to get around. Room was clean and cozy. Fresh towels linen etc every day. Highly recommended.

name: SPECTACULAR OCEAN VIEW  IN THE HEART OF KIHEI TOWN
summary: *PLEASE NOTE A 14.8% HAWAII STATE TA/GE TAX WILL BE ADDED AND COLLECTED BY THE END OF YOUR STAY COMPLETELY REMODELED THIS SUMMER IN A COMFORTABLE MODERN-TROPICAL STYLE. THE HIGHEST THREAD- COUNT LINENS AND TEAK THROUGHOUT THIS HIGH STYLED CONDO. HUGE VIEWS FROM THE MODERN KITCHEN, LIVING ROOM AND LANAI All SET IN THE HEART OF KIHEI. FABULOUS LOADS OF BEACH GEAR SURFING LESSONS DOWNSTAIRS BIKE RENTALS DOWNSTAIRS PARKS AND BEACHES ACROSS THE STREET 2 BLOCKS FROM SOME OF KIHEI'S FINEST RESTAURANTS

host.about: Stylist from New York City designing and making things beautiful.

reviews.txt:
Todd was an excellent host and such a nice person! He made sure the condo was very clean before we arrived, was able to meet us to explain how the condo worked, answer any questions we had, and left us with restaurant recommendations. Todd was quick to respond to all communication before and during our stay. We truly enjoyed staying in his condo; the layout was great, decor BEAUTIFUL, and location was really nice. The condo was equipped with extra bedding, towels, dishes and utensils, plenty of storage space, and beach equipment. This place definitely felt like a home away from home (bonus: just steps away from the beach!). One note: Please keep the kitchen counters clean or sugar ants will find your crumbs, they weren't an issue though. 
My mum and I were more than comfortable, and would love to stay here again on a future trip!

Todds apartment is just as beautiful as in the pictures and you really do have the most fantastic ocean view from the balcony which is nice and shady during the hot midday hours. The kitchen is very well equipped if you want to do some cooking or even prepare your own smoothies with fresh island produce. A lot of restaurants and cafes are in walking distance and Todd gave us some very good recommendations. A highlight for me was also that all beach equipment (towels, chairs, sunshade and snorkeling gear) is available for two (especially handy when only arriving with carry-on luggage. Overall we could not have asked for a better apartment to enjoy our Maui vacation. For those interested, there is a surf school who rents out boards right across the street and you can always watch some surfers at the beach in front of the building.

Todd was great! He's place is very unique and stylish. Has decorations from all over the world. Our favorite was the 1902  coffee table (very old beautiful wood). He gave us good tips on where to eat. Great location, walking distance to beaches, shops, and restaurants. Highly recommended. Thank you Todd

Even though I didn't meet Todd, he was an exceptional host. He checked on me repeatedly in the lead up to my stay and while I was there to ensure I was ok and to see if he could help in any way. He was very responsive as well and made great recommendations. The condo was stocked with kitchenware for cooking, towels (beach and high-thread bath), and linens. It quite spacious, comfortable, modern, clean, and decorated VERY nicely. The view of the ocean from the balcony was amazing. Overall, I had a fantastic stay considering the area and the condo. I visited friends in Wailea who stayed at a resort and condo, but still I preferred Todd's place and Kihei because of the ambiance, amenities (e.g. beach gear!), proximity to beaches, restaurants and vibe. I highly recommend Todd's place. Thanks for a memorable stay, Todd.

We booked our stay at Todd's place pretty late in the game.  He was quick to respond and super amicable too!  Great place- cool vibe-hip decor-stellar view-chill and all-around comfy-super easy to arrive into and navigate around. Mahalo Todd  \m/

We loved our stay at Todd's. The apartment was clean and very stylishly appointed, the bed was super comfy and it was in a good location with a beautiful view. Todd was an excellent host and ensured we were comfortable. I really recommend booking if it's available!

We had a really great time on Maui! We ( 2 persons) stay in the condo for 6 days. It is very well equipped (bodyboard, gear for snorkeling, beach towels,...). So everything you need! It was very clean, good located,...
Todd is friendly and really helpful! I can definitely recommend to stay here.

Everything about this stay was great, the place was super clean and neat, it had everything we needed to be comfortable and also, well equipped with beach stuff. 

Great experience, definetly would stay there again.
